segment.source: What's New in NVDA
segment.target: ﻿Što je novo u NVDA

segment.source: This release includes a number of improvements in Microsoft Office, braille, and document formatting.
segment.target: Ovo izdanje sadrži brojna poboljšanja u Microsoft Officeu, Brailleovom pismu i oblikovanju dokumenata.

segment.source: In Word or Excel, it is now possible to double-press the comment gesture to read the comment or note in a browsable dialog.
segment.target: U Wordu ili Excelu sada je moguće dvaput pritisnuti gestu komentara da biste pročitali komentar ili bilješku u dijaloškom okviru koji se može pregledavati.

segment.source: You can now use the review cursor selection command to select text in PowerPoint.
segment.target: Sada možete koristiti naredbu za pregled odabira pokazivača za odabir teksta u programu PowerPoint.

segment.source: NVDA also no longer brailles garbage characters when showing row or column header text in tables in Word when using the object model.
segment.target: NVDA također više ne šalje znakove smeća na Brailleovom pismu kada prikazuje tekst zaglavlja retka ili stupca u tablicama u Wordu kada koristite objektni model.

segment.source: NVDA can now be configured to report font attributes in speech and braille separately.
segment.target: NVDA se sada može konfigurirati za zasebno izvještavanje o atributima fonta u govoru i Brailleovom pismu.

segment.source: A new setting has been added to configure the timeout to perform a multiple press gesture, such as the report time/date command.
segment.target: Dodana je nova postavka za konfiguriranje vremenskog ograničenja za izvođenje geste višestrukog pritiska, kao što je naredba za vrijeme/datum izvješća.

segment.source: You can now configure how NVDA shows text formatting in braille, and set NVDA to show the start of paragraphs in braille.
segment.target: Sada možete konfigurirati način na koji NVDA prikazuje oblikovanje teksta na Brailleovom pismu i podesiti NVDA da prikazuje početak odlomaka na Brailleovom pismu.

segment.source: NVDA can now speak the character at the cursor when performing a braille cursor routing action.
segment.target: NVDA sada može izgovoriti znak na kursoru prilikom izvođenja radnje usmjeravanja kursora na Brailleovom pismu.

segment.source: Cursor routing reliability has been improved, and support for routing keys in PowerPoint has been added.
segment.target: Poboljšana je pouzdanost usmjeravanja kursora i dodana je podrška za tipke za usmjeravanje u programu PowerPoint.

segment.source: All lines of cells will now be used when using a multi-line braille display via HID braille.
segment.target: Svi redovi ćelija sada će se koristiti kada koristite višelinijski brajični redak putem HID brajice.

segment.source: NVDA is no longer unstable after restarting NVDA during an automatic Braille Bluetooth scan.
segment.target: NVDA više nije nestabilan nakon ponovnog pokretanja NVDA tijekom automatskog Bluetooth skeniranja Brailleovog pisma.

segment.source: The minimum required version of Poedit that works with NVDA is now version 3.5.
segment.target: Minimalna potrebna verzija Poedita koja radi s NVDA sada je verzija 3.5.

segment.source: eSpeak NG has been updated, adding support for the Faroese and Xextan languages.
segment.target: eSpeak NG je ažuriran, dodajući podršku za farski i xextanski jezik.

segment.source: LibLouis has been updated, adding new Braille tables for Thai and Greek international braille with single-cell accented letters.
segment.target: LibLouis je ažuriran, dodajući nove tablice na Brailleovom pismu za tajlandsku i grčku međunarodnu Brailleovu pismo s jednoćelijskim naglašenim slovima.

segment.source: There have also been a number of fixes, including to mouse tracking in Firefox, and the on-demand speech mode.
segment.target: Također je bilo nekoliko popravaka, uključujući praćenje miša u Firefoxu i govorni način rada na zahtjev.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove značajke

segment.source: New braille features:
segment.target: Nove značajke Brailleovog pisma:

segment.source: It is now possible to change the way NVDA displays certain text formatting attributes in braille.
segment.target: Sada je moguće promijeniti način na koji NVDA prikazuje određene atribute oblikovanja teksta na Brailleovom pismu.

segment.source: The available options are:
segment.target: Dostupne opcije su:

segment.source: Liblouis (default): Uses formatting markers defined in the selected braille table.
segment.target: Liblouis (zadano): Koristi oznake oblikovanja definirane u odabranoj tablici brajice.

segment.source: Tags: Uses start and end tags to denote where certain font attributes begin and end. (#16864)
segment.target: Oznake: koristi početne i završne oznake za označavanje gdje određeni atributi fonta počinju i završavaju. (#16864)

segment.source: When the "Read by paragraph" option is enabled, NVDA can now be configured to indicate the start of paragraphs in braille. (#16895, @nvdaes)
segment.target: Kada je opcija "Čitaj po odlomku" omogućena, NVDA se sada može konfigurirati tako da označava početak odlomaka na Brailleovom pismu. (#16895, @nvdaes)

segment.source: When performing a braille cursor routing action, NVDA can now automatically speak the character at the cursor. (#8072, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Prilikom izvođenja radnje usmjeravanja kursora na Brailleovom pismu, NVDA sada može automatski izgovoriti znak na pokazivaču. (#8072, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: This option is disabled by default.
segment.target: Ova je opcija onemogućena prema zadanim postavkama.

segment.source: You can enable "Speak character when routing cursor in text" in NVDA's braille settings.
segment.target: Možete omogućiti "Izgovori znakove prilikom usmjeravanja kursora u tekstu" u NVDA postavkama brajice.

segment.source: The comment command in Microsoft Word and notes command in Microsoft Excel can now be pressed twice to show the comment or note in a browsable message. (#16800, #16878, @Cary-Rowen)
segment.target: Naredba za komentare u programu Microsoft Word i naredba za bilješke u programu Microsoft Excel sada se mogu pritisnuti dvaput da bi se prikazao komentar ili bilješka u poruci koja se može pregledavati. (#16800, #16878, @Cary-Rowen)

segment.source: NVDA can now be configured to report font attributes in speech and braille separately. (#16755)
segment.target: NVDA se sada može konfigurirati za zasebno izvještavanje o atributima fonta u govoru i Brailleovom pismu. (#16755)

segment.source: The timeout to perform a multiple keypress is now configurable; this may be especially useful for people with dexterity impairment. (#11929, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: Vremensko ograničenje za izvođenje višestrukog pritiska tipke sada se može konfigurirati; Ovo može biti posebno korisno za osobe s oštećenjem spretnosti. (#11929, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: The `-c`/`--config-path` and `--disable-addons` command line options are now respected when launching an update from within NVDA. (#16937)
segment.target: Opcije naredbenog retka '-c'/'--config-path' i '--disable-addons' sada se poštuju prilikom pokretanja ažuriranja iz NVDA-a. (#16937)

segment.source: Component updates:
segment.target: Ažuriranja komponenti:

segment.source: Updated LibLouis Braille translator to [3.31.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.31.0). (#17080, @LeonarddeR, @codeofdusk)
segment.target: Ažuriran LibLouis Brailleov prevoditelj na [3.31.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.31.0). (#17080, @LeonarddeR, @codeofdusk)

segment.source: Fixed translation of numbers in Spanish Braille.
segment.target: Popravljen prijevod brojeva na španjolskom Brailleovom pismu.

segment.source: New Braille tables:
segment.target: Nove tablice na Brailleovom pismu:

segment.source: Thai grade 1
segment.target: Tajlandski razred 1

segment.source: Greek international Braille (single-cell accented letters)
segment.target: Grčka međunarodna brajica (jednoznačini naglasni sustav)

segment.source: Renamed tables:
segment.target: Preimenovane tablice:

segment.source: "Thai 6 dot" was renamed to "Thai grade 0" for consistency reasons.
segment.target: "Tajlandski 6 točaka" preimenovan je u "Tajlandski stupanj 0" zbog dosljednosti.

segment.source: The existing "Greek international braille" table was renamed to "Greek international braille (2-cell accented letters)" to clarify the distinction between the two Greek systems.
segment.target: Postojeća tablica "Grčka međunarodna brajica" preimenovana je u "Grčka međunarodna brajica (slova s naglaskom u 2 ćelije)" kako bi se razjasnila razlika između dva grčka sustava.

segment.source: eSpeak NG has been updated to 1.52-dev commit `961454ff`. (#16775)
segment.target: eSpeak NG je ažuriran na 1.52-dev commit '961454ff'. (#16775)

segment.source: Added new languages Faroese and Xextan.
segment.target: Dodani su novi jezici farski i xextan.

segment.source: When using a multi-line braille display via the standard HID braille driver, all lines of cells will be used. (#16993, @alexmoon)
segment.target: Kada koristite višeredni brajični zaslon putem standardnog HID upravljačkog programa za brajicu, koristit će se svi redovi ćelija. (#16993, @alexmoon)

segment.source: The stability of NVDA's Poedit support has been improved with the side effect that the minimum required version of Poedit is now version 3.5. (#16889, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Stabilnost NVDA-ine podrške za Poedit je poboljšana s nuspojavom da je minimalna potrebna verzija Poedita sada verzija 3.5. (#16889, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci grešaka

segment.source: Braille fixes:
segment.target: Popravci Brailleovog pisma:

segment.source: It is now possible to use braille display routing keys to move the text cursor in Microsoft PowerPoint. (#9101)
segment.target: Sada je moguće koristiti tipke za usmjeravanje brajice za pomicanje tekstnog pokazivača u programu Microsoft PowerPoint. (#9101)

segment.source: When accessing Microsoft Word without UI Automation, NVDA no longer outputs garbage characters in table headers defined with the set row and column header commands. (#7212)
segment.target: Kada pristupate Microsoft Wordu bez automatizacije korisničkog sučelja, NVDA više ne ispisuje znakove smeća u zaglavljima tablice definiranim naredbama za postavljanje zaglavlja retka i stupca. (#7212)

segment.source: The Seika Notetaker driver now correctly generates braille input for space, backspace and dots with space/backspace gestures. (#16642, @school510587)
segment.target: Upravljački program Seika Notetaker sada ispravno generira Brailleov unos za razmak, backspace i točke s gestama razmaka/backspacea. (#16642, @school510587)

segment.source: Cursor routing is now much more reliable when a line contains one or more Unicode variation selectors or decomposed characters. (#10960, @mltony, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Usmjeravanje kursora sada je mnogo pouzdanije kada redak sadrži jedan ili više Unicode birača varijacija ili dekomponiranih znakova. (#10960, @mltony, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: NVDA no longer throws an error when panning the braille display forward in some empty edit controls. (#12885)
segment.target: NVDA više ne izbacuje pogrešku prilikom pomicanja brajičnog pisma prema naprijed u nekim praznim kontrolama za uređivanje. (#12885)

segment.source: NVDA is no longer unstable after restarting NVDA during an automatic Braille Bluetooth scan. (#16933)
segment.target: NVDA više nije nestabilan nakon ponovnog pokretanja NVDA tijekom automatskog Bluetooth skeniranja Brailleovog pisma. (#16933)

segment.source: It is now possible to use the review cursor selection commands to select text in Microsoft PowerPoint. (#17004)
segment.target: Sada je moguće koristiti naredbe za odabir kursora za pregled za odabir teksta u programu Microsoft PowerPoint. (#17004)

segment.source: In on-demand speech mode, NVDA does not talk any more when a message is opened in Outlook, when a new page is loaded in a browser, or when displaying a new slide in a PowerPoint slideshow. (#16825, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: U načinu govora na zahtjev, NVDA više ne govori kada se poruka otvori u Outlooku, kada se nova stranica učita u pregledniku ili kada se prikazuje novi slajd u PowerPoint slideshowu. (#16825, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: In Mozilla Firefox, moving the mouse over text before or after a link now reliably reports the text. (#15990, @jcsteh)
segment.target: U pregledniku Mozilla Firefox, pomicanje miša preko teksta prije ili poslije veze sada pouzdano izvještava o tekstu. (#15990, @jcsteh)

segment.source: NVDA no longer occasionally fails to open browsable messages (such as pressing `NVDA+f` twice). (#16806, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: NVDA više ne uspijeva povremeno otvarati poruke koje se mogu pregledavati (kao što je dvaput pritisak na NVDA+f'). (#16806, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Updating NVDA while add-on updates are pending no longer results in the add-on being removed. (#16837)
segment.target: Ažuriranje NVDA-a dok su ažuriranja dodataka na čekanju više ne rezultira uklanjanjem dodatka. (#16837)

segment.source: It is now possible to interact with Data validation dropdown lists in Microsoft Excel 365. (#15138)
segment.target: Sada je moguća interakcija s padajućim popisima za provjeru valjanosti podataka u programu Microsoft Excel 365. (#15138)

segment.source: NVDA is no longer as sluggish when arrowing up and down through large files in VS Code. (#17039)
segment.target: NVDA više nije tako spor kada se strelicama kreće gore-dolje kroz velike datoteke u VS Codeu. (#17039)

segment.source: NVDA no longer becomes unresponsive after holding down an arrow key for a long time while in browse mode, particularly in Microsoft Word and Microsoft Outlook. (#16812)
segment.target: NVDA više ne reagira nakon duljeg držanja tipke sa strelicom dok je u načinu pregledavanja, posebno u Microsoft Wordu i Microsoft Outlooku. (#16812)

segment.source: NVDA no longer reads the last line when the cursor is on the second-last line of a multiline edit control in Java applications. (#17027)
segment.target: NVDA više ne čita zadnji redak kada je pokazivač na pretposljednjem retku kontrole za uređivanje s više redaka u Java aplikacijama. (#17027)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: Please refer to [the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) for information on NVDA's API deprecation and removal process.
segment.target: Molimo pogledajte [vodič za razvojne programere](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) za informacije o postupku zastarjelosti i uklanjanja NVDA API-ja.

segment.source: Component updates:
segment.target: Ažuriranja komponenti:

segment.source: Updated py2exe to 0.13.0.2 (#16907, @dpy013)
segment.target: Ažuriran py2exe na 0.13.0.2 (#16907, @dpy013)

segment.source: Updated setuptools to 72.0 (#16907, @dpy013)
segment.target: Ažurirani alati za postavljanje na 72.0 (#16907, @dpy013)

segment.source: Updated Ruff to 0.5.6. (#16868, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Ažuriran Ruff na 0.5.6. (#16868, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Updated nh3 to 0.2.18 (#17020, @dpy013)
segment.target: Ažurirano NH3 na 0.2.18 (#17020, @dpy013)

segment.source: Added a `.editorconfig` file to NVDA's repository in order for several IDEs to pick up basic NVDA code style rules by default. (#16795, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Dodana je datoteka '.editorconfig' u NVDA repozitorij kako bi nekoliko IDE datoteka prema zadanim postavkama pokupilo osnovna pravila stila NVDA koda. (#16795, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Added support for custom speech symbol dictionaries. (#16739, #16823, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Dodana je podrška za prilagođene rječnike govornih simbola. (#16739, #16823, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Dictionaries can be provided in locale specific folders in an add-on package, e.g. `locale\en`.
segment.target: Rječnici se mogu pronaći u mapama specifičnim za lokalizaciju u dodatnom paketu, npr. 'locale\en'.

segment.source: Dictionary metadata can be added to an optional `symbolDictionaries` section in the add-on manifest.
segment.target: Metapodaci rječnika mogu se dodati u neobavezni odjeljak 'simbolDictionaries' u manifestu dodatka.

segment.source: Please consult the [Custom speech symbol dictionaries section in the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#AddonSymbolDictionaries) for more details.
segment.target: Dodatne pojedinosti potražite u odjeljku [Rječnici prilagođenih simbola govora u vodiču za razvojne programere](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#AddonSymbolDictionaries).

segment.source: It is now possible to redirect objects retrieved from on-screen coordinates, by using the `NVDAObject.objectFromPointRedirect` method. (#16788, @Emil-18)
segment.target: Sada je moguće preusmjeriti objekte dohvaćene s koordinata na zaslonu pomoću metode 'NVDAObject.objectFromPointRedirect'. (#16788, @Emil-18)

segment.source: Running SCons with the parameter `--all-cores` will automatically pick the maximum number of available CPU cores. (#16943, #16868, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Pokretanje SCona s parametrom '--all-cores' automatski će odabrati maksimalan broj dostupnih CPU jezgri. (#16943, #16868, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Developer info now includes information on app architecture (such as AMD64) for the navigator object. (#16488, @josephsl)
segment.target: Informacije za razvojne inženjere sada uključuju informacije o arhitekturi aplikacije (kao što je AMD64) za objekt navigatora. (#16488, @josephsl)

segment.source: Deprecations
segment.target: Zastarjelosti

segment.source: The `bool` configuration key `[documentFormatting][reportFontAttributes]` is deprecated for removal in 2025.1, instead use `[fontAttributeReporting]`. (#16748)
segment.target: Konfiguracijski ključ 'bool' '[documentFormatting][reportFontAttributes]' zastario je za uklanjanje u 2025.1, umjesto toga koristite '[fontAttributeReporting]'. (#16748)

segment.source: The new key has an `int` value matching an `OutputMode` `enum` with options for speech, braille, speech and braille and off.
segment.target: Novi ključ ima vrijednost 'int' koja odgovara 'OutputMode' 'enum' s opcijama za govor, Brailleovo pismo, govor i Brailleovo pismo i isključeno.

segment.source: API consumers can use the `bool` value as previously, or check the `OutputMode` if handling speech or braille specifically.
segment.target: Korisnici API-ja mogu koristiti vrijednost 'bool' kao i prije ili provjeriti 'OutputMode' ako posebno rukuju govorom ili Brailleovim pismom.

segment.source: These keys are currently synchronized until 2025.1.
segment.target: Ti su ključevi trenutno sinkronizirani do 2025.1.

segment.source: `NVDAObjects.UIA.InaccurateTextChangeEventEmittingEditableText` is deprecated with no replacement. (#16817, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: 'NVDAObjects.UIA.Inaccurate TextChangeEventEmittingEditableText' je zastario bez zamjene. (#16817, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: This is a patch release to fix a bug with the automatic add-on update notification.
segment.target: Ovo je izdanje zakrpe za ispravljanje greške s automatskom obavijesti o ažuriranju dodatka.

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci grešaka

segment.source: When automatically checking for add-on updates, NVDA no longer freezes on poor connections. (#17036)
segment.target: Prilikom automatske provjere ažuriranja dodataka, NVDA se više ne zamrzava na lošim vezama. (#17036)

segment.source: The Add-on Store will now notify you if any add-on updates are available on NVDA startup.
segment.target: Add-on store će vas obavijestiti o dostupnosti ažuriranja dodataka prilikom pokretanja NVDA.

segment.source: There are now options to apply Unicode normalization to speech and braille output.
segment.target: Dodane su opcije za primjenu unicode normalizacije na govor i brajicu.

segment.source: This can be useful when reading characters that are unknown to a particular speech synthesizer or braille table and which have a compatible alternative, like the bold and italic characters commonly used on social media.
segment.target: To može biti korisno pri čitanju znakova koji su nepoznati određenoj govornoj jedinici ili ne postoje u određenoj brajičnoj tablici. Takvi znakovi mogu imati kompatibilnu alternativu, poput podebljanih ili kosih slova koja se uobičajeno koriste na društvenim mrežama.

segment.source: It also allows reading of equations in the Microsoft Word equation editor.
segment.target: Ta opcija također omogućuje čitanje jednadžbi u Microsoft Word uređivaču jednadžbi.

segment.source: Help Tech Activator Pro braille displays are now supported.
segment.target: Help Tech Activator Pro brajični redci su sada podržani.

segment.source: Unassigned commands have been added to scroll the mouse wheel vertically and horizontally.
segment.target: Dodane su nedodijeljene geste za pomicanje kotačića miša vertikalno ili horizontalno.

segment.source: There are several bug fixes, particularly for the Windows 11 Emoji Panel and Clipboard history.
segment.target: Ispravljeno je nekoliko pogrešaka, prije svega u Windows 11 emoji panelu i povijesti međuspremnika.

segment.source: For web browsers, there are fixes for reporting error messages, figures, captions, table labels and checkbox/radio button menu items.
segment.target: Dodane su ispravke u web preglednicima za čitanje poruka o pogreškama, figure, crteže, oznake tablica te potvrdne okvire i izborne gumbe.

segment.source: LibLouis has been updated, adding new Braille tables for Cyrillic Serbian, Yiddish, several ancient languages, Turkish, and the International Phonetic Alphabet.
segment.target: Liblouis je nadograđen sa dodanom podrškom za srpsku ćirilicu, Jidiš, nekoliko drevnih jezika, turski i međunarodnu fonetsku abecedu.

segment.source: eSpeak has been updated, adding support for the Karakalpak language.
segment.target: eSpeak je nadograđen sa dodanom podrškom za karakalpački.

segment.source: Unicode CLDR has also been updated.
segment.target: Unicode CLDR je također nadograđen.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: nove značajke

segment.source: New key commands:
segment.target: Novi tipkovnički prečaci:

segment.source: Added unassigned commands for vertical and horizontal scrolling of the mouse wheel, to enhance navigation on web pages and apps with dynamic content, such as Dism++. (#16462, @Cary-Rowen)
segment.target: Dodani su prečaci za vertikalno i horizontalno pomicanje kotačića miša, kako bi se unaprijedilo kretanje u nekim aplikacijama i na nekim web stranicama čiji se sadržaj osvježava, kao što je to na primjer Dism++. (#16462, @Cary-Rowen)

segment.source: Added support for Unicode Normalization to speech and braille output. (#11570, #16466 @LeonarddeR).
segment.target: Dodana podrška za Unicode normalizaciju za govor i brajicu. (#11570, #16466 @LeonarddeR).

segment.source: This can be useful when reading characters that are unknown to a particular speech synthesizer or braille table and which have a compatible alternative, like the bold and italic characters commonly used on social media.
segment.target: To može biti korisno kada je određeni znak nepoznat za govornu jedinicu ili ne postoji u brajičnoj tablici, ali ima kompatibilnu alternativu kao što su to na primjer podebljani ili kosi znakovi koji se uobičajeno koriste na društvenim mrežama.

segment.source: It also allows reading of equations in the Microsoft Word equation editor. (#4631)
segment.target: To također omogućuje čitanje jednadžbi u Microsoft Word uređivaču jednadžbi. (#4631)

segment.source: You can enable this functionality for both speech and braille in their respective settings categories in the NVDA Settings dialog.
segment.target: Ovu značajku možete uključiti za govor i brajicu u dijaloškom okviru postavki u pripadajućim kategorijama.

segment.source: By default, after NVDA startup, you will be notified if any add-on updates are available. (#15035)
segment.target: Od sada ćete biti podrazumijevano obavješteni o novim ažuriranjima dodataka prilikom pokretanja NVDA. (#15035)

segment.source: This can be disabled in the "Add-on Store" category of settings.
segment.target: To se može isključiti u "Add-on Store" kategoriji u postavkama.

segment.source: NVDA checks daily for add-on updates.
segment.target: NVDA provjerava svakodnevno za ažuriranje NVDA dodataka.

segment.source: Only updates within the same channel will be checked (e.g. installed beta add-ons will only notify for updates in the beta channel).
segment.target: Provjeravat će se ažuriranja samo za jedan kanal (na primjer instalirani beta dodaci će biti provjeravani iz beta kanala).

segment.source: Added support for the Help Tech Activator Pro displays. (#16668)
segment.target: Dodana podrška za Help Tech Activator Pro brajične redke. (#16668)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Izmjene

segment.source: Component updates:
segment.target: nadogradnje komponenata:

segment.source: eSpeak NG has been updated to 1.52-dev commit `54ee11a79`. (#16495)
segment.target: eSpeak NG je nadograđen na inačicu 1.52-dev commit `54ee11a79`. (#16495)

segment.source: Added new language Karakalpak.
segment.target: Dodan novi jezik: karakalpački.

segment.source: Updated Unicode CLDR to version 45.0. (#16507, @OzancanKaratas)
segment.target: Nadograđen Unicode CLDR na inačicu 45.0. (#16507, @OzancanKaratas)

segment.source: Updated fast_diff_match_patch (used to detect changes in terminals and other dynamic content) to version 2.1.0. (#16508, @codeofdusk)
segment.target: Nadograđen fast_diff_match_patch (koristi se za otkrivanje izmjena u naredbenom redku i drugom dinamičkom sadržaju) na inačicu 2.1.0. (#16508, @codeofdusk)

segment.source: Updated LibLouis braille translator to [3.30.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.30.0). (#16652, @codeofdusk)
segment.target: Nadograđen LibLouis brajični prevoditelj na inačicu [3.30.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.30.0). (#16652, @codeofdusk)

segment.source: New braille tables:
segment.target: nove brajične tablice:

segment.source: Cyrillic Serbian.
segment.target: Srpski ćirilica.

segment.source: Yiddish.
segment.target: Jidiš.

segment.source: Several ancient languages: Biblical Hebrew, Akkadian, Syriac, Ugaritic and transliterated Cuneiform text.
segment.target: Nekoliko drevnih jezika: biblijski hebrejski, akadski, sirijski, ugaricki te transliterirani klinopis.

segment.source: Turkish grade 2. (#16735)
segment.target: Turski kratkopis. (#16735)

segment.source: International Phonetic Alphabet. (#16773)
segment.target: Međunarodna fonetska abeceda. (#16773)

segment.source: Updated NSIS to 3.10 (#16674, @dpy013)
segment.target: Nadograđen NSIS na inačicu 3.10 (#16674, @dpy013)

segment.source: Updated markdown to 3.6 (#16725, @dpy013)
segment.target: Nadograđen markdown na inačicu 3.6 (#16725, @dpy013)

segment.source: Updated nh3 to 0.2.17 (#16725, @dpy013)
segment.target: Nadograđen nh3 na inačicu 0.2.17 (#16725, @dpy013)

segment.source: The fallback braille input table is now equal to the fallback output table, which is Unified English Braille Code grade 1. (#9863, @JulienCochuyt, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Sigurnosna ulazna brajična tablica je jednaka izlaznoj sigurnosnoj brajičnoj tablici, koja je "Unificirani Engleski brajični kod puno pismo". (#9863, @JulienCochuyt, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: NVDA will now report figures with no accessible children, but with a label or description. (#14514)
segment.target: NVDA će sada čitati figure bez pristupačnih podređenih objekata, ali sa oznakom i opisom. (#14514)

segment.source: When reading by line in browse mode, "caption" is no longer reported on each line of a long figure or table caption. (#14874)
segment.target: Prilikom čitanja po redku u modusu čitanja, "potpis" se više ne čita pri svakom redku potpisa ili tablice. (#14874)

segment.source: In the Python console, the last unexecuted command will no longer be lost when moving in the input history. (#16653, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: U Python konzoli, zadnja neizvršena komanda više neće biti izgubljena prilikom kretanja po povijesti ulaza. (#16653, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: A unique anonymous ID is now sent as part of optional NVDA usage statistics gathering. (#16266)
segment.target: Unikatan anonimni identifikator sada se šalje kao dio neobaveznih statistika korištenja NVDA. (#16266)

segment.source: By default, a new folder will be created when making a portable copy.
segment.target: Pri stvaranju prijenosne kopije, podrazumijevano će se automatski stvarati nova mapa.

segment.source: A warning message will inform you if you try writing to a non-empty directory. (#16686)
segment.target: Od sada će se prikazivati upozorenje ako pokušate pisati unutar mape koja nije prazna. (#16686)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravke grešaka

segment.source: Windows 11 fixes:
segment.target: Windows 11 ispravke:

segment.source: NVDA will no longer appear to get stuck when closing the clipboard history and emoji panel. (#16346, #16347, @josephsl)
segment.target: NVDA se više neće zaglavljivati prilikom zatvaranja povijesti međuspremnika i emoji panela. (#16346, #16347, @josephsl)

segment.source: NVDA will announce visible candidates again when opening the IME interface. (#14023, @josephsl)
segment.target: NVDA će ponovno izgovarati vidljive kandidate prilikom otvaranja Ime sučelja. (#14023, @josephsl)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer announce "clipboard history" twice when navigating through the emoji panel menu items. (#16532, @josephsl)
segment.target: NVDA više neće dvaput izgovoriti "povijest međuspremnika" pri kretanju stavkama izbornika emoji panela. (#16532, @josephsl)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer cut off speech and braille when reviewing kaomojis and symbols in the emoji panel. (#16533, @josephsl)
segment.target: NVDA više neće prekidati govor i brajicu pri pregledu kaomojia i znakova u emoji panelu. (#16533, @josephsl)

segment.source: Web browser fixes:
segment.target: Ispravke u preglednicima:

segment.source: Error messages referenced with `aria-errormessage` are now reported in Google Chrome and Mozilla Firefox. (#8318)
segment.target: Poruke o pogrešci zabilježene kao `aria-errormessage` sada se izgovaraju u Google Chromeu i Mozilla Firefoxu. (#8318)

segment.source: If present, NVDA will now use `aria-labelledby` to provide accessible names for tables in Mozilla Firefox. (#5183)
segment.target: Ako postoji, NVDA će sada koristiti `aria-labelledby` atribut za dohvaćanje pristupačnih naziva tablica u Mozilla Firefoxu. (#5183)

segment.source: NVDA will correctly announce radio and checkbox menu items when first entering sub-menus in Google Chrome and Mozilla Firefox. (#14550)
segment.target: NVDA će ispravno izgovarati stavke izbornika u obliku izbornih gumbi i potvrdnih okvira prilikom prvog otvaranja podizbornika u Google Chromeu i Mozilla Firefoxu. (#14550)

segment.source: NVDA's browse mode find functionality is now more accurate when the page contains emojis. (#16317, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Značajka pretrage u modusu čitanja NVDA čitača zaslona sada je točnija kada stranica sadrži emoji znakove. (#16317, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: In Mozilla Firefox, NVDA now correctly reports the current character, word and line when the cursor is at the insertion point at the end of a line. (#3156, @jcsteh)
segment.target: U Mozilla Firefoxu, NVDA sada ispravno čita trenutni znak, trenutnu riječ i trenutni redak kada se kursor nalazi na točki umetanja na kraju redka. (#3156, @jcsteh)

segment.source: No longer cause Google Chrome to crash when closing a document or exiting Chrome. (#16893)
segment.target: NVDA više ne prouzrokuje rušenje poslije zatvaranja dokumenta ili zatvaranja Google Chromea. (#16893)

segment.source: NVDA will announce correctly the autocomplete suggestions in Eclipse and other Eclipse-based environments on Windows 11. (#16416, @thgcode)
segment.target: NVDA će sada ispravno čitati prijedloge automatskog popunjavanja u Eclipse i drugim okruženjima baziranima na Eclipseu u Windowsima 11. (#16416, @thgcode)

segment.source: Improved reliability of automatic text readout, particularly in terminal applications. (#15850, #16027, @Danstiv)
segment.target: Unapređena pouzdanost automatskog čitanja teksta, osobito u aplikacijama naredbenog redka. (#15850, #16027, @Danstiv)

segment.source: It is once again possible to reset the configuration to factory defaults reliably. (#16755, @Emil-18)
segment.target: Sada je ponovno moguće pouzdano vratiti konfiguraciju na prethodne vrijednosti. (#16755, @Emil-18)

segment.source: NVDA will correctly announce selection changes when editing a cell's text in Microsoft Excel. (#15843)
segment.target: NVDA će ispravno izgovarati promjene u označavanju pri uređivanju teksta ćelije u Microsoft Excelu. (#15843)

segment.source: In applications using Java Access Bridge, NVDA will now correctly read the last blank line of a text instead of repeating the previous line. (#9376, @dmitrii-drobotov)
segment.target: U aplikacijama koje koriste Jawa access bridge, NVDA će sada ispravno pročitati zadnji prazan redak teksta umjesto ponavljanja prethodnog redka teksta. (#9376, @dmitrii-drobotov)

segment.source: In LibreOffice Writer (version 24.8 and newer), when toggling text formatting (bold, italic, underline, subscript/superscript, alignment) using the corresponding keyboard shortcut, NVDA announces the new formatting attribute (e.g. "Bold on", "Bold off"). (#4248, @michaelweghorn)
segment.target: U LibreOffice Writeru (inačica 24.8 i novijim), prilikom uključivanja ili isključivanja oblikovanja teksta (podebljanja, ukošenja, podcrtavanja, indeksa/eksponenta, poravnanja) kada se koriste odgovarajući tipkovnički prečaci, NVDA će izgovoriti novo obilježje oblikovanja (na primjer, "podebljano uključeno", "podebljano isključeno"). (#4248, @michaelweghorn)

segment.source: When navigating with the cursor keys in text boxes in applications which use UI Automation, NVDA no longer sometimes reports the wrong character, word, etc. (#16711, @jcsteh)
segment.target: pri kretanju po poljima za uređivanje u aplikacijama koje koriste UI automation, NVDA više ne izgovara krivi znak, krivu riječ, Itd. (#16711, @jcsteh)

segment.source: When pasting into the Windows 10/11 Calculator, NVDA now correctly reports the full number pasted. (#16573, @TristanBurchett)
segment.target: Pri ljepljenju u Windows 10/11 kalkulator, NVDA sada ispravno čita cijeli broj koji je zalijepljen. (#16573, @TristanBurchett)

segment.source: Speech is no longer silent after disconnecting from and reconnecting to a Remote Desktop session. (#16722, @jcsteh)
segment.target: Govor se više ne gubi prilikom ponovnog povezivanja u sesiju udaljene radne površine. (#16722, @jcsteh)

segment.source: Support added for text review commands for an object's name in Visual Studio Code. (#16248, @Cary-Rowen)
segment.target: Dodana je podrška za prečace za pregledavanje teksta za ime objekta u Visual Studio Codeu. (#16248, @Cary-Rowen)

segment.source: Playing NVDA sounds no longer fails on a mono audio device. (#16770, @jcsteh)
segment.target: Zvukovi NVDA sada se reproduciraju i na Mono audiouređajima. (#16770, @jcsteh)

segment.source: NVDA will report addresses when arrowing through To/CC/BCC fields in outlook.com / Modern Outlook. (#16856)
segment.target: NVDA će od sada čitati adrese prilikom kretanja po poljima do/kopija/skrivena kopija u prgramu outlook.com i suvremenom Outlooku. (#16856)

segment.source: NVDA now handles add-on installation failures more gracefully. (#16704)
segment.target: NVDA sada bolje rukuje pogreškama pri instalaciji dodataka. (#16704)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: NVDA now uses Ruff instead of flake8 for linting. (#14817)
segment.target: NVDA sada koristi Ruff umjesto flake8 za linting. (#14817)

segment.source: Fixed NVDA's build system to work properly when using Visual Studio 2022 version 17.10 and above. (#16480, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Popravljen je NVDA-in sustav izrade kako bi ispravno radio kada koristite Visual Studio 2022 verzije 17.10 i novije. (#16480, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: A fixed width font is now used in Log Viewer and in the NVDA Python Console so that the cursor remains in the same column during vertical navigation.
segment.target: Font fiksne širine sada se koristi u pregledniku dnevnika i u NVDA Python konzoli tako da kursor ostaje u istom stupcu tijekom okomite navigacije.

segment.source: It is especially useful to read the error location markers in tracebacks. (#16321, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: Posebno je korisno pročitati oznake lokacije pogrešaka u tragovima. (#16321, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: Support for custom braille tables has been added. (#3304, #16208, @JulienCochuyt, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Dodana je podrška za prilagođene tablice brajice. (#3304, #16208, @JulienCochuyt, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Tables can be provided in the `brailleTables` folder in an add-on package.
segment.target: Tablice se mogu pronaći u mapi 'brailleTables' u dodatnom paketu.

segment.source: Table metadata can be added to an optional `brailleTables` section in the add-on manifest or to a `.ini` file with the same format found in the brailleTables subdirectory of the scratchpad directory.
segment.target: Metapodaci tablice mogu se dodati u neobavezni odjeljak 'brailleTables' u manifestu dodatka ili u datoteku '.ini' u istom formatu koji se nalazi u poddirektoriju brailleTables direktorija bloka za ogrebotine.

segment.source: Please consult the [braille translation tables section in the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#BrailleTables) for more details.
segment.target: Više pojedinosti potražite u odjeljku [Tablice za prijevod Brailleovog pisma u vodiču za razvojne programere](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#BrailleTables).

segment.source: When a `gainFocus` event is queued with an object that has a valid `focusRedirect` property, the object pointed to by the `focusRedirect` property is now held by `eventHandler.lastQueuedFocusObject`, rather than the originally queued object. (#15843)
segment.target: Kada je događaj 'gainFocus' stavljen u red čekanja s objektom koji ima valjano svojstvo 'focusRedirect', objekt na koji upućuje svojstvo 'focusRedirect' sada drži 'eventHandler.lastQueuedFocusObject', a ne izvorni objekt u redu čekanja. (#15843)

segment.source: NVDA will log its executable architecture (x86) at startup. (#16432, @josephsl)
segment.target: NVDA će zabilježiti svoju izvršnu arhitekturu (x86) pri pokretanju. (#16432, @josephsl)

segment.source: `wx.CallAfter`, which is wrapped in `monkeyPatches/wxMonkeyPatches.py`, now includes proper `functools.wraps` indication. (#16520, @XLTechie)
segment.target: 'wx. CallAfter', koji je umotan u 'monkeyPatches/wxMonkeyPatches.py', sada uključuje odgovarajuću indikaciju 'functools.wraps'. (#16520, @XLTechie)

segment.source: There is a new module for scheduling tasks `utils.schedule`, using the pip module `schedule`. (#16636)
segment.target: Postoji novi modul za raspoređivanje zadataka 'utils.schedule', koristeći pip modul 'schedule'. (#16636)

segment.source: You can use `scheduleThread.scheduleDailyJobAtStartUp` to automatically schedule a job that happens after NVDA starts, and every 24 hours after that.
segment.target: Možete koristiti 'scheduleThread.scheduleDailyJobAtStartUp' za automatsko zakazivanje posla koji se događa nakon pokretanja NVDA i svaka 24 sata nakon toga.

segment.source: Jobs are scheduled with a delay to avoid conflicts.
segment.target: Poslovi se zakazuju sa zakašnjenjem kako bi se izbjegli sukobi.

segment.source: `scheduleThread.scheduleDailyJob` and `scheduleJob` can be used to schedule jobs at custom times, where a `JobClashError` will be raised on a known job scheduling clash.
segment.target: 'scheduleThread.scheduleDailyJob' i 'scheduleJob' mogu se koristiti za zakazivanje poslova u prilagođeno vrijeme, gdje će se 'JobClashError' pokrenuti na poznatom sukobu zakazivanja zadataka.

segment.source: It is now possible to create app modules for apps hosting Edge WebView2 (msedgewebview2.exe) controls. (#16705, @josephsl)
segment.target: Sada je moguće stvoriti module aplikacije za aplikacije koje hostiraju kontrole Edge WebView2 (msedgewebview2.exe). (#16705, @josephsl)

segment.source: There is a new feature called sound split.
segment.target: Dodana nova značajka način podjeljenog zvuka.

segment.source: This allows splitting NVDA sounds into one channel (e.g. left) while sounds from all other applications are directed to the other channel (e.g. right).
segment.target: Ta značajka omogućuje postavljanje zvuka NVDA u jedan kanal (npr. lijevi), dok su zvukovi drugih programa usmjereni u drugi kanal (na primjer desni).

segment.source: There are new commands for modifying the synth settings ring, allowing users to jump to the first or last setting, and to increase or decrease the current setting in larger steps.
segment.target: Dodani su novi prečaci za promjenu postavki prstena govorne jedinice, koje omogućuju premještanje od prve do zadnje postavke, te njihovo mijenjanje u većim koracima.

segment.source: There are also new quick navigation commands, allowing users to bind gestures to quickly jump between: paragraph, vertically aligned paragraph, same style text, different style text, menu item, toggle button, progress bar, figure, and math formula.
segment.target: Dodani su novi prečaci brze navigacije, koji omogućuju korisnicima kretanje po: odlomcima, okomito poravnatim odlomcima, tekstu istog stila, tekstu različitog stila, stavkama izbornika, preklopnim gumbima, trakama napredovanja, figurama, te matematičkim formulama.

segment.source: There are many new braille features and bug fixes.
segment.target: Dodano je puno novih značajki vezanih uz brajicu, te je ispravljeno puno pogrešaka.

segment.source: A new braille mode called "display speech output" has been added.
segment.target: Dodan je novi modus brajice "prikaz govora".

segment.source: When active, the braille display shows exactly what NVDA speaks.
segment.target: Kada je aktivan, na brajičnom se redku prikazuje točno ono što NVDA izgovara.

segment.source: Support was also added for the BrailleEdgeS2 and BrailleEdgeS3 displays.
segment.target: Također je dodana podrška za brajične redke BrailleEdgeS2, BrailleEdgeS3.

segment.source: LibLouis was updated, adding new detailed (with capital letters indicated) Belarusian and Ukrainian Braille tables, a Lao table, and a Spanish table for reading Greek texts.
segment.target: LibLouis je nadograđen sa dodanim novim brajičnim tablicama sa označavanjem velikih slova za bjeloruski i ukrajinski jezik, brajičnom tablicom za Laoski jezik te brajičnom tablicom za španjolski jezik, predviđena za čitanje starogrčkog teksta.

segment.source: eSpeak was updated, adding new language Tigrinya.
segment.target: eSpeak je nadograđensa dodanim novim jezikom Tigrinja.

segment.source: There are many minor bug fixes for applications, such as Thunderbird, Adobe Reader, web browsers, Nudi and Geekbench.
segment.target: Ispravljeno je puno pogrešaka u programima, poput Thunderbirda, Adobe Readera, web preglednika, Nudija te Geekbench-a.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove značajke

segment.source: New key commands:
segment.target: Novi tipkovnički prečaci:

segment.source: New Quick Navigation command `p` for jumping to next/previous text paragraph in browse mode. (#15998, @mltony)
segment.target: Novi prečac za brzo kretanje `p` za premještanje na sljedeći/prethodni odlomak teksta u modusu čitanja. (#15998, @mltony)

segment.source: New unassigned Quick Navigation commands, which can be used to jump to the next/previous:
segment.target: Novi nedodijeljeni prečaci, koji se mogu koristiti za kretanje po slijedećim/prethodnim:

segment.source: figure (#10826)
segment.target: figurama (#10826)

segment.source: vertically aligned paragraph (#15999, @mltony)
segment.target: okomito poravnatim odlomcima (#15999, @mltony)

segment.source: menu item (#16001, @mltony)
segment.target: stavkama izbornika (#16001, @mltony)

segment.source: toggle button (#16001, @mltony)
segment.target: preklopnim gumbima (#16001, @mltony)

segment.source: progress bar (#16001, @mltony)
segment.target: trakama napredka (#16001, @mltony)

segment.source: math formula (#16001, @mltony)
segment.target: matematičkim formulama (#16001, @mltony)

segment.source: same style text (#16000, @mltony)
segment.target: tekstovima istog stila (#16000, @mltony)

segment.source: different style text (#16000, @mltony)
segment.target: tekstovima različitog stila (#16000, @mltony)

segment.source: Added commands to jump first, last, forward and backward through the synth settings ring. (#13768, #16095, @rmcpantoja)
segment.target: Dodan prečac za premještanje između prve postavke, posljednje postavke, za kretanje u naprijed te za kretanje u nazad unutar postavki prstena govorne jedinice. (#13768, #16095, @rmcpantoja)

segment.source: Setting the first/last setting in the synth settings ring has no assigned gesture. (#13768)
segment.target: Postavljanje prve ili posljednje postavke prstena govorne jedinice nema dodijeljen prečac. (#13768)

segment.source: Decrease and increase the current setting of the synth settings ring in a larger step (#13768):
segment.target: Povećavanje ili smanjivanje postavki govorne jedinice u većim koracima (#13768):

segment.source: Desktop: `NVDA+control+pageUp` and `NVDA+control+pageDown`.
segment.target: Prečac za stolna računala: `NVDA+control+pageUp` odnosno `NVDA+control+pageDown`.

segment.source: Laptop: `NVDA+control+shift+pageUp` and `NVDA+control+shift+pageDown`.
segment.target: prečac za prijenosna računala: `NVDA+control+shift+pageUp` ili `NVDA+control+shift+pageDown`.

segment.source: Added a new unassigned input gesture to toggle the reporting of figures and captions. (#10826, #14349)
segment.target: Dodan novi nedodijeljeni prečac za uključivanje ili isključivanje izgovora figura i potpisa. (#10826, #14349)

segment.source: Braille:
segment.target: brajica:

segment.source: Added support for the BrailleEdgeS2 and BrailleEdgeS3 displays. (#16033, #16279, @EdKweon)
segment.target: Dodana podrška za brajični redak BrailleEdgeS2, BrailleEdgeS3. (#16033, #16279, @EdKweon)

segment.source: A new braille mode called "display speech output" has been added. (#15898, @Emil-18)
segment.target: Novi modus brajice "prikaz govora" je dodan. (#15898, @Emil-18)

segment.source: When active, the braille display shows exactly what NVDA speaks.
segment.target: Kada je aktivan, na brajičnom se redku prikazuje točno ono što NVDA izgovara.

segment.source: It can be toggled by pressing `NVDA+alt+t`, or from the braille settings dialog.
segment.target: Može se uključiti pritiskom `NVDA+alt+t`, ili u dijaloškom okviru postavki brajice.

segment.source: Sound split: (#12985, @mltony)
segment.target: Način podijeljenog zvuka: (#12985, @mltony)

segment.source: Allows splitting NVDA sounds into one channel (e.g. left) while sounds from all other applications are directed to the other channel (e.g. right).
segment.target: Omogućuje postavljanje NVDA u jednom kanalu (na primjer lijevom) dok su zvukovi drugih programa usmjereni u drugi kanal (na primjer desni).

segment.source: Toggled by `NVDA+alt+s`.
segment.target: Regulira se uz pomoć prečaca `NVDA+alt+s`.

segment.source: Reporting row and column headers is now supported in contenteditable HTML elements. (#14113)
segment.target: Izgovaranje zaglavlja redaka i stupaca u ContentEditable html elementima. (#14113)

segment.source: Added an option to disable the reporting of figures and captions in Document Formatting settings. (#10826, #14349)
segment.target: Dodana opcija za isključivanje čitanja figura i potpisa u postavkama oblikovanja dokumenata. (#10826, #14349)

segment.source: In Windows 11, NVDA will announce alerts from voice typing and suggested actions including the top suggestion when copying data such as phone numbers to the clipboard (Windows 11 2022 Update and later). (#16009, @josephsl)
segment.target: U Windowsima 11, NVDA će izgovarati upozorenja glasovnog upisivanja i preporučene radnje uključujući glavnu preporučenu radnju prilikom kopiranja podataka poput telefonskih brojeva u međuspremnik (Windows 11 nadogradnja 2022 i novije inačice). (#16009, @josephsl)

segment.source: NVDA will keep the audio device awake after speech stops, in order to prevent the start of the next speech being clipped with some audio devices such as Bluetooth headphones. (#14386, @jcsteh, @mltony)
segment.target: NVDA će držati audiouređaj budnim poslije zaustavljanja govora, kako bi se izbjeglo rezanje sljedeće izgovorene fraze na nekim audiouređajima poput Bluetooth slušalica. (#14386, @jcsteh, @mltony)

segment.source: HP Secure Browser is now supported. (#16377)
segment.target: HP Secure Browser je sada podržan. (#16377)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Izmjene

segment.source: Add-on Store:
segment.target: Trgovina dodataka:

segment.source: The minimum and the last tested NVDA version for an add-on are now displayed in the "other details" area. (#15776, @Nael-Sayegh)
segment.target: Minimalna verzija i posljednja testirana verzija dodatka sada se prikazuju u području "više detalja". (#15776, @Nael-Sayegh)

segment.source: The community reviews action will be available in all tabs of the store. (#16179, @nvdaes)
segment.target: Radnja "recenzije zajednice" biti će dostupna u pojedinostima u svim karticama svojstava u Add-on storeu. (#16179, @nvdaes)

segment.source: Component updates:
segment.target: Nadogradnje komponenti:

segment.source: Updated LibLouis Braille translator to [3.29.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.29.0). (#16259, @codeofdusk)
segment.target: Nadograđen LibLouis brajični prevoditelj na inačicu [3.29.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.29.0). (#16259, @codeofdusk)

segment.source: New detailed (with capital letters indicated) Belarusian and Ukrainian Braille tables.
segment.target: Nove brajične tablice za bjeloruski i ukrajinski jezik sa podrškom prikazivanja znakova za velika slova.

segment.source: New Spanish table for reading Greek texts.
segment.target: Nova španjolska brajična tablica sa podrškom za čitanje grčkog teksta.

segment.source: New table for Lao Grade 1. (#16470)
segment.target: Nova brajična tablica za laoski jezik, puno pismo. (#16470)

segment.source: eSpeak NG has been updated to 1.52-dev commit `cb62d93fd7`. (#15913)
segment.target: eSpeak NG je nadograđen na inačicu 1.52-dev commit `cb62d93fd7`. (#15913)

segment.source: Added new language Tigrinya.
segment.target: Dodan je novi jezik: tigrinya.

segment.source: Changed several gestures for BrailleSense devices to avoid conflicts with characters of the French braille table. (#15306)
segment.target: Promijenjeno je nekoliko prečaca za brajični redke BrailleSense kako bi se izbjegli konflikti sa znakovima francuske brajične tablice. (#15306)

segment.source: `alt+leftArrow` is now mapped to `dot2+dot7+space`
segment.target: `alt+strelicaLijevo` sada je promijenjen na prečac `točkica2+točkica7+razmak`

segment.source: `alt+rightArrow` is now mapped to `dot5+dot7+space`
segment.target: `alt+strelicaDesno` sada je promijenjen u `točkica5+točkica7+razmaknica`

segment.source: `alt+upArrow` is now mapped to `dot2+dot3+dot7+space`
segment.target: `alt+strelicaGore` sada je promijenjen u `točkica2+točkica3+točkica7+razmaknica`

segment.source: `alt+downArrow` is now mapped to `dot5+dot6+dot7+space`
segment.target: `alt+StrelicaDolje` sada je promijenjen u `točkica5+točkica6+točkica7+razmaknica`

segment.source: Padding dots commonly used in tables of contents are not reported anymore at low punctuation levels. (#15845, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: Višetočja koja se često koriste u tablicama sadržaja više se ne čitaju pri niskim razinama interpunkcije. (#15845, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravke grešaka

segment.source: Windows 11 fixes:
segment.target: Ispravke vezane uz Windows 11:

segment.source: NVDA will once again announce hardware keyboard input suggestions. (#16283, @josephsl)
segment.target: NVDA će opet izgovarati prijedloge za upisivanje kada se koristi hardverska tipkovnica. (#16283, @josephsl)

segment.source: In Version 24H2 (2024 Update and Windows Server 2025), mouse and touch interaction can be used in quick settings. (#16348, @josephsl)
segment.target: U inačici 24H2 (nadogradnji za 2024 godinu te Windows Server 2025), miš i dodirnik mogu se koristiti u brzim postavkama. (#16348, @josephsl)

segment.source: Add-on Store:
segment.target: Trgovina dodataka:

segment.source: When pressing `ctrl+tab`, focus properly moves to the new current tab title. (#14986, @ABuffEr)
segment.target: Kada se pritisne `ctrl+tab`, fokus se ispravno prebacuje na novi aktualni naslov kartice svojstva. (#14986, @ABuffEr)

segment.source: If cache files are not correct, NVDA no longer will restart. (#16362, @nvdaes)
segment.target: Ako datoteke predmemorije nisu ispravne, NVDA se više neće ponovno pokretati. (#16362, @nvdaes)

segment.source: Fixes for Chromium-based browsers when used with UIA:
segment.target: Ispravke za preglednike bazirane na Chromiumu kada se korise uz pomoć Uia:

segment.source: Fixed bugs causing NVDA to hang. (#16393, #16394)
segment.target: Ispravljene greške koje su prouzrokovale zaglavljivanje NVDA. (#16393, #16394)

segment.source: Backspace key is now working correctly in Gmail sign-in fields. (#16395)
segment.target: Tipka Backspace sada ispravno radi U poljima za prijavu Gmail a. (#16395)

segment.source: Backspace now works correctly when using Nudi 6.1 with NVDA's "Handle keys from other applications" setting enabled. (#15822, @jcsteh)
segment.target: Tipka backspace sada ispravno radi kada se koristi program Nudi 6.1 sa postavkom "rukuj tipkama iz drugih programa". (#15822, @jcsteh)

segment.source: Fixed a bug where audio coordinates would be played while the application is in sleep mode when "Play audio coordinates when mouse moves" is enabled. (#8059, @hwf1324)
segment.target: Ispravljena je pogreška kada se reproduciraju zvučne koordinate kada se program nalazi u stanju mirovanja kada je opcija "Reproduciraj zvučne signale prilikom pomicanja miša" uključena. (#8059, @hwf1324)

segment.source: In Adobe Reader, NVDA no longer ignores alternative text set on formulas in PDFs. (#12715)
segment.target: U Adobe Readeru, više se ne ignorira alternativni tekst na formulama u PDF datotekama. (#12715)

segment.source: Fixed a bug causing NVDA to fail to read the ribbon and options within Geekbench. (#16251, @mzanm)
segment.target: Ispravljena je pogreška koja je onemogućavala čitanje opcija i ribbona u Geekbenchu. (#16251, @mzanm)

segment.source: Fixed a rare case when saving the configuration may fail to save all profiles. (#16343, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: Ispravljen je rijedak slučaj nemogućnosti spremanja konfiguracije, kada se nisu spremali i konfiguracijski profili. (#16343, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: In Firefox and Chromium-based browsers, NVDA will correctly enter focus mode when pressing enter when positioned within a presentational list (ul / ol) inside editable content. (#16325)
segment.target: U Firefoxu i preglednicima baziranima na Chromiumu, NVDA će ispravno aktivirati modus fokusa prilikom pritiska entera kad je fokus na prezentacijskom popisu (ul / ol) unutar sadržaja za uređivanje. (#16325)

segment.source: Column state change is now correctly reported when selecting columns to display in Thunderbird message list. (#16323)
segment.target: Stanje promjena stupaca kada se označuju stupci za prikaz u popisu poruka u Thunderbirdu sada se ispravno čitaju. (#16323)

segment.source: The command line switch `-h`/`--help` works properly again. (#16522, @XLTechie)
segment.target: preklopnik u naredbenom redku `-h`/`--help` ponovno ispravno radi. (#16522, @XLTechie)

segment.source: NVDA's support for the Poedit translation software version 3.4 or higher correctly functions when translating languages with 1 or more than 2 plural forms (e.g. Chinese, Polish). (#16318)
segment.target: NVDA podrška za Poedit softver za prevođenje inačica 3.4 ili novije verzije ispravno radi prilikom prevođenja na jezike sa jednim ili više od dva oblika množine (npr: u kineskom, poljskom). (#16318)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: Please refer to [the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) for information on NVDA's API deprecation and removal process.
segment.target: Molimo pogledajte [vodič za razvojne programere](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) za informacije o postupku zastarjelosti i uklanjanja NVDA API-ja.

segment.source: Instantiating `winVersion.WinVersion` objects with unknown Windows versions above 10.0.22000 such as 10.0.25398 returns "Windows 11 unknown" instead of "Windows 10 unknown" for release name. (#15992, @josephsl)
segment.target: Instanciranje objekata 'winVersion.WinVersion' s nepoznatim verzijama sustava Windows iznad 10.0.22000, kao što je 10.0.25398, vraća "Windows 11 nepoznat" umjesto "Windows 10 nepoznato" za naziv izdanja. (#15992, @josephsl)

segment.source: Make the AppVeyor build process easier for NVDA forks, by adding configurable variables in appveyor.yml to disable or modify NV Access specific portions of the build scripts. (#16216, @XLTechie)
segment.target: Olakšajte proces izrade AppVeyor-a za NVDA forkove dodavanjem konfigurabilnih varijabli u appveyor.yml za onemogućavanje ili izmjenu NV Access specifičnih dijelova skripti za izradu. (#16216, @XLTechie)

segment.source: Added a how-to document, explaining the process of building NVDA forks on AppVeyor. (#16293, @XLTechie)
segment.target: Dodan je dokument s uputama, koji objašnjava proces izrade NVDA forkova na AppVeyoru. (#16293, @XLTechie)

segment.source: A new "on-demand" speech mode has been added.
segment.target: Dodan je novi modus govora čitanja informacija na zahtjev.

segment.source: When speech is on-demand, NVDA does not speak automatically (e.g. when moving the cursor) but still speaks when calling commands whose goal is explicitly to report something (e.g. report window title).
segment.target: Kada je modus govora postavljen da izgovara informacije na zahtjev, NVDA ne čita informacije automatski na primjer prilikom pomicanja kursora, ali još uvijek izgovara informacije i koje se dobivaju uz pomoć prečaca, čiji je cilj izgovaranja određenih informacija na primjer, izgovaranje naslovne trake.

segment.source: In the Speech category of NVDA's settings, it is now possible to exclude unwanted speech modes from the Cycle speech modes command (`NVDA+s`).
segment.target: U kategoriji "govor" NVDA postavki, sada je moguće izostavljanje neželjenih modusa govora iz odabira modusa govora (`NVDA+s`).

segment.source: A new Native Selection mode (toggled by `NVDA+shift+f10`) is now available in NVDA's browse mode for Mozilla Firefox.
segment.target: Novi način kopiranja sa sačuvanim oblikovanjem, koji se poziva uz pomoć prečaca `NVDA+shift+f10` dostupan je na web stranicama u Mozilla Firefoxu.

segment.source: When turned on, selecting text in browse mode will also manipulate Firefox's own native selection.
segment.target: Kada se uključi, koristit će se izvorno označavanje u Mozilli firefoxu.

segment.source: Copying text with `control+c` will pass straight through to Firefox, thus copying the rich content, rather than NVDA's plain text representation.
segment.target: Kopiranje teksta uz pomoć prečaca `control+c` biti će proslijeđeno direktno Mozilli firefoxu što znači da će tekst biti kopiran sa sačuvanim oblikovanjem, umjesto čistog teksta bez oblikovanja.

segment.source: The Add-on Store now supports bulk actions (e.g. installing, enabling add-ons) by selecting multiple add-ons
segment.target: NVDA store sada podržava višestruke radnje na primjer: instaliranje ili uključivanje dodataka tako da se označi više dodataka

segment.source: There is a new action to open a reviews webpage for the selected add-on.
segment.target: Dodana je nova radnja za otvaranje web stranice recenzija za bilo koji označeni dodatak.

segment.source: The audio output device and ducking mode options have been removed from the "Select Synthesizer" dialog.
segment.target: Opcije odabira zvučne kartice i načina stišavanja govora su uklonjene iz dijaloškog okvira "odabir govorne jedinice".

segment.source: They can be found in the audio settings panel which can be opened with `NVDA+control+u`.
segment.target: Ove se opcije mogu pronaći u novom dijaloškom okviru postavki zvuka koji se poziva prečacem `NVDA+control+u`.

segment.source: eSpeak-NG, LibLouis braille translator, and Unicode CLDR have been updated.
segment.target: Nadograđeni su eSpeak-NG, LibLouis braille translator, i Unicode CLDR.

segment.source: New Thai, Filipino and Romanian braille tables are available.
segment.target: Dodane su nove brajične tablice za tajski, filipinski i rumunjski jezik.

segment.source: There are many bug fixes, particularly for the Add-on Store, braille, Libre Office, Microsoft Office and audio.
segment.target: Ispravljeno je puno pogrešaka, uglavnom u Add-on Storeu, podršci za brajicu, Libre Officeu, Microsoft Officeu i podršci za zvuk.

segment.source: Important notes
segment.target: Važne napomene

segment.source: This release breaks compatibility with existing add-ons.
segment.target: Ova inačica narušava kompatibilnost sa postojećim dodacima.

segment.source: Windows 7, and Windows 8 are no longer supported.
segment.target: Windows 7, i Windows 8 više nisu podržani operacijski sustavi.

segment.source: Windows 8.1 is the minimum Windows version supported.
segment.target: Windows 8.1 je minimalna verzija operacijskog sustava Windows.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove značajke

segment.source: Add-on Store:
segment.target: Trgovina dodataka:

segment.source: The Add-on Store now supports bulk actions (e.g. installing, enabling add-ons) by selecting multiple add-ons. (#15350, #15623, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: Add-on Store sada podržava višestruke radnje na primjer instaliranje, uključivanje više dodataka) tako da se odabere više dodataka. (#15350, #15623, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: A new action has been added to open a dedicated webpage to see or provide feedback about the selected add-on. (#15576, @nvdaes)
segment.target: Dodana je opcija koja služi za davanje povratne informacije o dodacima putem posebne web stranice za svaki dodatak. (#15576, @nvdaes)

segment.source: Added support for Bluetooth Low Energy HID Braille displays. (#15470)
segment.target: Dodana podrška za Bluetooth niskonaponske brajične redke. (#15470)

segment.source: A new Native Selection mode (toggled by `NVDA+shift+f10`) is now available in NVDA's browse mode for Mozilla Firefox.
segment.target: Dodano je kopiranje sa sačuvanim oblikovanjem (koje se uključuje ili isključuje uz pomoć prečaca `NVDA+shift+f10`) na web stranicama u Mozilla firefoxu.

segment.source: When turned on, selecting text in browse mode will also manipulate Firefox's own native selection.
segment.target: Kada je uključeno, koristit će se izvorno označavanje u Mozilla firefoxu.

segment.source: Copying text with `control+c` will pass straight through to Firefox, thus copying the rich content, rather than NVDA's plain text representation.
segment.target: Prilikom kopiranja teksta uz pomoć prečaca `control+c` biti će proslijeđeno izravno Firefoxu, što će kopirati i formatiranje, a ne samo oblikovanje.

segment.source: Note however that as Firefox is handling the actual copy, NVDA will not report a "copy to clipboard" message in this mode. (#15830)
segment.target: Imajte na umu da prilikom kopiranja teksta i njegovim rukovanjem od strane Firefoxa, NVDA neće izgovoriti poruku "kopirano u međuspremnik". (#15830)

segment.source: When copying text in Microsoft Word with NVDA's browse mode enabled, formatting is now also included.
segment.target: Prilikom kopiranja teksta u Microsoft Wordu sa uključenim načinom čitanja, oblikovanje će se također kopirati.

segment.source: A side affect of this is that NVDA will no longer report a "copy to clipboard" message when pressing `control+c` in Microsoft Word / Outlook browse mode, as the application is now handling the copy, not NVDA. (#16129)
segment.target: Posljedica ovoga je da NVDA neće izgovarati poruku "kopirano u međuspremnik" kada se pritisne `control+c` u Microsoft wordu ili Outlooku, zbog toga što aplikacija upravlja kopiranjem., umjesto NVDA. (#16129)

segment.source: A new "on-demand" speech mode has been added.
segment.target: Dodan je novi modus govora "na zahtjev".

segment.source: When speech is on-demand, NVDA does not speak automatically (e.g. when moving the cursor) but still speaks when calling commands whose goal is explicitly to report something (e.g. report window title). (#481, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: Kada je govor podešen na zahtjev, NVDA neće govoriti automatski (na primjer, prilikom pomicanja kursora) ali govori kada se pozivaju prečaci čiji je cilj čitanje određene informacije (na primjer izgovaranje naslovne trake). (#481, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: In the Speech category of NVDA's settings, it is now possible to exclude unwanted speech modes from the Cycle speech modes command (`NVDA+s`). (#15806, @lukaszgo1)
segment.target: U kategoriji govor postavki NVDA, sada je moguće isključiti neželjene moduse govora iz odabira prečacem odabira modusa govora (`NVDA+s`). (#15806, @lukaszgo1)

segment.source: If you are currently using the NoBeepsSpeechMode add-on consider uninstalling it, and disabling "beeps" and "on-demand" modes in the settings.
segment.target: Ako koristite dodatak NoBeepsSpeechMode razmislite o njegovom uklanjanju, i onemogućavanjem "zvučnih signala" "i načina na zahtjev" u postavkama.

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Izmjene

segment.source: NVDA no longer supports Windows 7 and Windows 8.
segment.target: NVDA više ne podržava Windows 7 i Windows 8.

segment.source: Windows 8.1 is the minimum Windows version supported. (#15544)
segment.target: Windows 8.1 je minimalna podržana verzija sustava Windows. (#15544)

segment.source: Component updates:
segment.target: Nadogradnje komponenata:

segment.source: Updated LibLouis braille translator to [3.28.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.28.0). (#15435, #15876, @codeofdusk)
segment.target: Nadograđen LibLouis brajični prevoditelj na inačicu [3.28.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.28.0). (#15435, #15876, @codeofdusk)

segment.source: Added new Thai, Romanian, and Filipino Braille tables.
segment.target: Dodane nove brajične tablice za Tajski, Rumunjski i Filipinski.

segment.source: eSpeak NG has been updated to 1.52-dev commit `530bf0abf`. (#15036)
segment.target: eSpeak NG je nadograđen na 1.52-dev commit `530bf0abf`. (#15036)

segment.source: CLDR emoji and symbol annotations has been updated to version 44.0. (#15712, @OzancanKaratas)
segment.target: Prijevodi simbola i Emoji znakova su nadograđeni na verziju 44.0. (#15712, @OzancanKaratas)

segment.source: Updated Java Access Bridge to 17.0.9+8Zulu (17.46.19). (#15744)
segment.target: Nadograđena Java Access Bridge na 17.0.9+8Zulu (17.46.19). (#15744)

segment.source: Key Commands:
segment.target: Tipkovnički prečaci:

segment.source: The following commands now support two and three presses to spell the reported information and spell with character descriptions: report selection, report clipboard text and report focused object. (#15449, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: Slijedeći tipkovnički prečaci od sada podržavaju dvostruke i trostruke pritiske za slovkanje informacije, te sricanje uz pomoć fonetskog opisa znakova: čitaj označeni tekst, čitaj tekst u međuspremniku i čitaj fokusirani objekt. (#15449, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: The command to toggle the screen curtain now has a default gesture: `NVDA+control+escape`. (#10560, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: Prečac za uključivanje i isključivanje zaslonske zavjese sada ima podrazumjevani tipkovnički prečac: `NVDA+control+escape`. (#10560, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: When pressed four times, the report selection command now shows the selection in a browsable message. (#15858, @Emil-18)
segment.target: Kada se pritisne četiri puta, prečac za čitanje označenog teksta sada prikazuje označeni tekst u poruci koja se može pročitati. (#15858, @Emil-18)

segment.source: Microsoft Office:
segment.target: Microsoft Office:

segment.source: When requesting formatting information on Excel cells, borders and background will only be reported if there is such formatting. (#15560, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: Kada treba pročitati oblikovanje ćelije u Excelu pozadina i rubovi biti će pročitani samo ako takvo oblikovanje postoji. (#15560, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: NVDA will again no longer report unlabelled groupings such as in recent versions of Microsoft Office 365 menus. (#15638)
segment.target: NVDA više neće čitati neoznačene grupe kao što su to u posljednjim inačicama Microsoft Office 365 izbornicima. (#15638)

segment.source: The audio output device and ducking mode options have been removed from the "Select Synthesizer" dialog.
segment.target: Opcija za odabir zvučne kartice i opcije načina stišavanja govora uklonjene su iz dijaloškog okvira "Odabir govorne jedinice".

segment.source: They can be found in the audio settings panel which can be opened with `NVDA+control+u`. (#15512, @codeofdusk)
segment.target: Možete ih pronaći u panelu postavki zvuka koji se može otvoriti pritiskom prečaca `NVDA+control+u`. (#15512, @codeofdusk)

segment.source: The option "Report role when mouse enters object" in NVDA's mouse settings category has been renamed to "Report object when mouse enters it".
segment.target: Opcija "Izgovori tip objekta kada se nađe pod mišem" u postavkama miša je preimenovan u "Pročitaj objekt kada se nađe pod mišem".

segment.source: This option now announces additional relevant information about an object when the mouse enters it, such as states (checked/pressed) or cell coordinates in a table. (#15420, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Ova opcija izgovara više relevantnih informacija kada se objekt nađe pod mišem poput stanja: označeno ili pritisnuto ili koordinate ćelija u tablici. (#15420, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: New items have been added to the Help menu for the NV Access "Get Help" page and Shop. (#14631)
segment.target: Nove stavke su dodane u izbornik pomoć Pomoć obuka i podrška i NV acces trgovina. (#14631)

segment.source: NVDA's support for [Poedit](https://poedit.net) is overhauled for Poedit version 3 and above.
segment.target: Podrška NVDA za [Poedit](https://poedit.net) je kompletno prepisana za inačicu 3 i novije.

segment.source: Users of Poedit 1 are encouraged to update to Poedit 3 if they want to rely on enhanced accessibility in Poedit, such as shortcuts to read translator notes and comments. (#15313, #7303, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Korisnicima Poedita 1 se preporučuje nadogradnja na Poedit 3 ako žele koristiti unapređenu pristupačnost Poedita, kao što su to prečaci za čitanje bilježaka za prevoditelje i komentara. (#15313, #7303, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Braille viewer and speech viewer are now disabled in secure mode. (#15680)
segment.target: Preglednik brajice i preglednik govora od sada su isključeni u Sigurnom načinu. (#15680)

segment.source: During object navigation, disabled (unavailable) objects will not be ignored anymore. (#15477, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: Prilikom korištenja objektne navigacije, onemogućeni (nedostupni) objekti više neće biti ignorirani. (#15477, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: Added table of contents to key commands document. (#16106)
segment.target: Dodan sadržaj u dokument "popis tipkovničkih prečaca". (#16106)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravke grešaka

segment.source: Add-on Store:
segment.target: Trgovina dodataka:

segment.source: When the status of an add-on is changed while it has focus, e.g. a change from "downloading" to "downloaded", the updated item is now announced correctly. (#15859, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Ako je status dodatka promijenjen kada se nalazi u fokusu, na primjer promjena iz "preuzimanje" u "preuzeto", osvježena se stavka sada potpuno izgovara. (#15859, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: When installing add-ons install prompts are no longer overlapped by the restart dialog. (#15613, @lukaszgo1)
segment.target: Prilikom instalacije dodataka instalacijska pitanja se više ne prekrivaju dijaloškim okvirom ponovnog pokretanja. (#15613, @lukaszgo1)

segment.source: When reinstalling an incompatible add-on it is no longer forcefully disabled. (#15584, @lukaszgo1)
segment.target: Prilikom reinstalacije nekompatibilnog dodatka isti se neće nasilno onemogućavati. (#15584, @lukaszgo1)

segment.source: Disabled and incompatible add-ons can now be updated. (#15568, #15029)
segment.target: Onemogućeni i nekompatibilni dodaci se sada mogu ažurirati. (#15568, #15029)

segment.source: NVDA now recovers and displays an error in a case where an add-on fails to download correctly. (#15796)
segment.target: NVDA se sada obnavlja i pokazuje grešku u slučaju neuspješnog preuzimanja dodatka. (#15796)

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to restart intermittently after opening and closing Add-on Store. (#16019, @lukaszgo1)
segment.target: NVDA se više ne pokreće ponovno poslije ponovnog otvaranja i zatvaranja Add'on storea. (#16019, @lukaszgo1)

segment.source: Audio:
segment.target: Zvuk:

segment.source: NVDA no longer freezes briefly when multiple sounds are played in rapid succession. (#15311, #15757, @jcsteh)
segment.target: NVDA se više ne smrzava kada se zvukovi reproduciraju brzo. (#15311, #15757, @jcsteh)

segment.source: If the audio output device is set to something other than the default and that device becomes available again after being unavailable, NVDA will now switch back to the configured device instead of continuing to use the default device. (#15759, @jcsteh)
segment.target: Ako je zvučna kartica postavljena na jednu od onih koja nije podrazumijevana a ta kartica postane dostupna, NVDA će se prebaciti na tu zvučnu karticu. (#15759, @jcsteh)

segment.source: NVDA now resumes audio if the configuration of the output device changes or another application releases exclusive control of the device. (#15758, #15775, @jcsteh)
segment.target: NVDA će sada ponovno reproducirati zvuk ako konfiguracija zvučne kartice bude promijenjena ili druga aplikacija prestane ekskluzivno koristiti zvučnu karticu. (#15758, #15775, @jcsteh)

segment.source: Braille:
segment.target: Brajica:

segment.source: Multi line braille displays will no longer crash the BRLTTY driver and are treated as one continuous display. (#15386)
segment.target: Višeredni brajični redci više neće dovesti upravljački program BRLTTY do rušenja, te su tretirani kao jedan kontinuirani brajični redak. (#15386)

segment.source: More objects which contain useful text are detected, and text content is displayed in braille. (#15605)
segment.target: Od sada se na brajičnom redku prikazuju objekti koji sadrže koristan tekst. (#15605)

segment.source: Contracted braille input works properly again. (#15773, @aaclause)
segment.target: Sada ponovno radi upisivanje brajičnih znakova kada se koristi kratkopis. (#15773, @aaclause)

segment.source: Braille is now updated when moving the navigator object between table cells in more situations (#15755, @Emil-18)
segment.target: Od sada se brajica osvježava prilikom pomicanja objekta navigatora u više situacija (#15755, @Emil-18)

segment.source: The result of reporting current focus, current navigator object, and current selection commands is now shown in braille. (#15844, @Emil-18)
segment.target: Rezultati izgovora trenutnog fokusa, trenutnog objekta navigatora i trenutnog označavanja sada se prikazuju na brajičnom redku. (#15844, @Emil-18)

segment.source: The Albatross braille driver no longer handles a Esp32 microcontroller as an Albatross display. (#15671)
segment.target: Albatross upravljački program više ne prepoznaje Esp32 mikrokontroler kao Albatross brajični redak. (#15671)

segment.source: LibreOffice:
segment.target: LibreOffice:

segment.source: Words deleted using the `control+backspace` keyboard shortcut are now also properly announced when the deleted word is followed by whitespace (like spaces and tabs). (#15436, @michaelweghorn)
segment.target: Riječi izbrisane uz pomoć prečaca `control+backspace` sada se također ispravno izgovaraju kada nakon izbrisane riječi slijedi bjelina (razmaci i tabulatori). (#15436, @michaelweghorn)

segment.source: Announcement of the status bar using the `NVDA+end` keyboard shortcut now also works for dialogs in LibreOffice version 24.2 and newer. (#15591, @michaelweghorn)
segment.target: Čitanje trake stanja koristeći tipkovnički prečac `NVDA+end` sada također radi u Libre office dialoškim okvirima u inačicama 24.2 i novijim. (#15591, @michaelweghorn)

segment.source: All expected text attributes are now supported in LibreOffice versions 24.2 and above.
segment.target: Svi očekivani atributi teksta sada su podržani U Libreoffice inačicama 24.2 i novijim.

segment.source: This makes the announcement of spelling errors work when announcing a line in Writer. (#15648, @michaelweghorn)
segment.target: Ova ispravka omogućuje čitanje pravopisnih pogrešaka prilikom čitanja redaka u Writeru. (#15648, @michaelweghorn)

segment.source: Announcement of heading levels now also works for LibreOffice versions 24.2 and newer. (#15881, @michaelweghorn)
segment.target: Čitanje razine naslova sada također radi u LibreOfficeu inačicama 24.2 i novijim. (#15881, @michaelweghorn)

segment.source: Microsoft Office:
segment.target: Microsoft Office:

segment.source: In Excel with UIA disabled, braille is updated, and the active cell content is spoken, when `control+y`, `control+z` or `alt+backspace` is pressed. (#15547)
segment.target: U Excelu sa isključenim UIA, brajica se osvježava, a aktivni sadržaj ćelije se izgovara, kada se pritisne `control+y`, `control+z` ili `alt+backspace`. (#15547)

segment.source: In Word with UIA disabled braille is updated when `control+v`, `control+x`, `control+y`, `control+z`, `alt+backspace`, `backspace` or `control+backspace` is pressed.
segment.target: U Wordu sa isključenim Uia brajica se osvježava kada se pritisnu `control+v`, `control+x`, `control+y`, `control+z`, `alt+backspace`, `backspace` ili `control+backspace`.

segment.source: It is also updated with UIA enabled, when typing text and braille is tethered to review and review follows caret. (#3276)
segment.target: Također se osvježava kada je UIA omogućen, kada se upisuje tekst, a brajica je povezana na pregled a pregled prati kursor sustava. (#3276)

segment.source: In Word, the landing cell will now be correctly reported when using the native Word commands for table navigation `alt+home`, `alt+end`, `alt+pageUp` and `alt+pageDown`. (#15805, @CyrilleB79)
