segment.target: 'Gui. MainFrame.onAddonsManagerCommand' je zastario, koristite 'gui. MainFrame.onAddonStoreCommand'. (#13985)

segment.source: `speechDictHandler.speechDictVars.speechDictsPath` is deprecated, use `NVDAState.WritePaths.speechDictsDir` instead. (#15021)
segment.target: 'speechDictHandler.speechDictVars.speechDictsPath' je zastario, umjesto toga koristite 'NVDAState.WritePaths.speechDictsDir'. (#15021)

segment.source: Importing `voiceDictsPath` and `voiceDictsBackupPath` from `speechDictHandler.dictFormatUpgrade` is deprecated.
segment.target: Uvoz 'voiceDictsPath' i 'voiceDictsBackupPath' iz 'speechDictHandler.dictFormatUpgrade' je zastario.

segment.source: Instead use `WritePaths.voiceDictsDir` and `WritePaths.voiceDictsBackupDir` from `NVDAState`. (#15048)
segment.target: Umjesto toga koristite 'WritePaths.voiceDictsDir' i 'WritePaths.voiceDictsBackupDir' iz 'NVDAState'. (#15048)

segment.source: `config.CONFIG_IN_LOCAL_APPDATA_SUBKEY` is deprecated.
segment.target: 'config.CONFIG_IN_LOCAL_APPDATA_SUBKEY' je zastarjelo.

segment.source: Instead use `config.RegistryKey.CONFIG_IN_LOCAL_APPDATA_SUBKEY`. (#15049)
segment.target: Umjesto toga koristite 'config. RegistryKey.CONFIG_IN_LOCAL_APPDATA_SUBKEY'. (#15049)

segment.source: A new option has been added, "Paragraph Style" in "Document Navigation".
segment.target: Dodana je nova opcija, "stil odlomka" u kategoriji "kretanje po dokumentu".

segment.source: This can be used with text editors that do not support paragraph navigation natively, such as Notepad and Notepad++.
segment.target: Ona se može koristiti u tekstualnim editorima koji ne podržavaju nativno kretanje po odlomcima, kao što su to Notepad i Notepad++.

segment.source: There is a new global command to report the destination of a link, mapped to `NVDA+k`.
segment.target: Dodan je novi prečac za čitanje odredišta na koje vodi poveznica, određen kao `NVDA+k`.

segment.source: Support for annotated web content (such as comments and footnotes) has improved.
segment.target: Podrška za anotiran web sadržaj (poput komentara i rubnih bilježaka) je unaprijeđena.

segment.source: Press `NVDA+d` to cycle through summaries when annotations are reported (e.g. "has comment, has footnote").
segment.target: Pritišćite `NVDA+d` kako biste se kretali po sadržajima (na primjer "ima komentar, ima rubnu bilješku").

segment.source: Tivomatic Caiku Albatross 46/80 braille displays are now supported.
segment.target: Tivomatic Caiku Albatross 46/80 brajični redci su sada podržani.

segment.source: Support for ARM64 and AMD64 versions of Windows has improved.
segment.target: Podrška za ARM64 i AMD64 inačica sustava Windows je unapređena.

segment.source: There are many bug fixes, notably Windows 11 fixes.
segment.target: Ispravljeno je mnoštvo grešaka, među kojima ispravke za Windows 11 čine većinu.

segment.source: eSpeak, LibLouis, Sonic rate boost and Unicode CLDR have been updated.
segment.target: eSpeak, LibLouis, Sonic povećivač brzine i Unicode su ažurirani.

segment.source: There are new Georgian, Swahili (Kenya) and Chichewa (Malawi) braille tables.
segment.target: Dodane su nove brajične tablice za gruzijski, Swahili (Kenija) i Chichewa (Malawi).

segment.source: Note:
segment.target: Upozorenje:

segment.source: This release breaks compatibility with existing add-ons.
segment.target: U ovoj inačici narušena je kompatibilnost s postojećim dodacima.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove značajke

segment.source: Microsoft Excel via UI Automation: Automatic reporting of column and row headers in tables. (#14228)
segment.target: Microsoft Excel s sučeljem UI automation: automatsko čitanje zaglavlja i stupaca tablica. (#14228)

segment.source: Note: This is referring to tables formatted via the "Table" button on the Insert pane of the Ribbon.
segment.target: Upozorenje: ovo se odnosi na tablice oblikovane uz pomoć gumba "tablica" na kratici umetanje na ribbonu.

segment.source: "First Column" and "Header Row" in "Table Style Options" correspond to column and row headers respectively.
segment.target: "prvi stupac" i "zaglavlje redka" u "opcijama stila tablice" odnose se na zaglavlja redaka i stupaca.

segment.source: This is not referring to screen reader specific headers via named ranges, which is currently not supported via UI Automation.
segment.target: Ovo se ne odnosi na specifična zaglavlja čitača zaslona uz pomoć imenovanih raspona, koje se ne podržavaju uz pomoć UI automation.

segment.source: An unassigned script has been added to toggle delayed character descriptions. (#14267)
segment.target: Dodan je nedodijeljen prečac za uključivanje i isključivanje opisa znakova poslije kursora. (#14267)

segment.source: Added an experimental option to leverage the UIA notification support in Windows Terminal to report new or changed text in the terminal, resulting in improved stability and responsivity. (#13781)
segment.target: Dodana je podrška za čitanje sadržaja naredbenog redka uz pomoć UIA obavijesti, što ima za cilj unađređenje stabilnosti i responsivnosti. (#13781)

segment.source: Consult the user guide for limitations of this experimental option.
segment.target: Kako biste saznali koja su ograničenja ove opcije, molimo pogledajte korisnički vodič za više informacija.

segment.source: On Windows 11 ARM64, browse mode is now available in AMD64 apps such as Firefox, Google Chrome and 1Password. (#14397)
segment.target: U Windowsima 11 ARM64, modus pregleda je sada dostupan u AMD64 aplikacijama poput Firefoxa, Google Chromea i 1Passworda. (#14397)

segment.source: A new option has been added, "Paragraph Style" in "Document Navigation".
segment.target: Nova opcija je dodana, "Stil odlomaka" u kategoriji "kretanje po dokumentu".

segment.source: This adds support for single line break (normal) and multi line break (block) paragraph navigation.
segment.target: Ovo dodaje podršku za kretanje po pojedinačnim prijelomima redka (normalnim) i višerednim prijelomima redka (blokovnim).

segment.source: This can be used with text editors that do not support paragraph navigation natively, such as Notepad and Notepad++. (#13797)
segment.target: Ovo se može koristiti sa editorima teksta koji ne podržavaju kretanje po odlomcima nativno, kao što su to Notepad i Notepad++. (#13797)

segment.source: The presence of multiple annotations are now reported.
segment.target: Izgovarana je prisutnost više anotacija.

segment.source: `NVDA+d` now cycles through reporting the summary of each annotation target for origins with multiple annotation targets.
segment.target: `NVDA+d` sada prebacuje između izgovora sadržaja svake ciljne anotacije za izvore sa višestrukim ciljnim anotacijama.

segment.source: For example, when text has a comment and a footnote associated with it. (#14507, #14480)
segment.target: Na primjer, kada tekst sadrži komentar i fusnotu. (#14507, #14480)

segment.source: Added support for Tivomatic Caiku Albatross 46/80 braille displays. (#13045)
segment.target: Dodana je podrška za Tivomatic Caiku Albatross 46/80 brajične redke. (#13045)

segment.source: New global command: Report link destination (`NVDA+k`).
segment.target: Novi globalni prečac: Čitaj odredište poveznice (`NVDA+k`).

segment.source: Pressed once will speak/braille the destination of the link that is in the navigator object.
segment.target: Kada se pritisne jednom odredište linka koje se nalazi u objektu navigatora će biti izgovoreno i i prikazano na brajičnom redku.

segment.source: Pressing twice will show it in a window, for more detailed review. (#14583)
segment.target: Kada se pritisne dvaput, poveznica će biti prikazana u prozoru u svrhu detaljnijeg pregleda. (#14583)

segment.source: New unmapped global command (Tools category): Report link destination in a window.
segment.target: Nova nedodijeljena gesta (u kategoriji alati): je dodana prikaži odredište poveznice u prozoru.

segment.source: Same as pressing `NVDA+k` twice, but may be more useful for braille users. (#14583)
segment.target: Isto kao pritisak `NVDA+k` dvaput, ali može biti korisnije za korisnike brajice. (#14583)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Izmjene

segment.source: Updated LibLouis braille translator to [3.24.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.24.0). (#14436)
segment.target: nadograđen LibLouis brajični prevoditelj na inačicu [3.24.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.24.0). (#14436)

segment.source: Major updates to Hungarian, UEB, and Chinese bopomofo braille.
segment.target: Drastično su osvježene Mađarska, univerzalna engleska, i kineska bopomofo brajična tablica.

segment.source: Support for the Danish braille standard 2022.
segment.target: Podržan je danski brajični standard, koji se promijenio u 2022 godini.

segment.source: New braille tables for Georgian literary braille, Swahili (Kenya) and Chichewa (Malawi).
segment.target: Nove brajične tablice za gruzijsku literarnu brajicu, Swahili (Kenija) i Chichewa (Malawi).

segment.source: Updated Sonic rate boost library to commit `1d70513`. (#14180)
segment.target: Nadograđena biblioteka Sonic za ubrzanje govora na inačicu `1d70513`. (#14180)

segment.source: CLDR has been updated to version 42.0. (#14273)
segment.target: CLDR je nadograđen na inačicu 42.0. (#14273)

segment.source: eSpeak NG has been updated to 1.52-dev commit `f520fecb`. (#14281, #14675)
segment.target: eSpeak NG je nadograđen na inačicu 1.52-dev commit `f520fecb`. (#14281, #14675)

segment.source: Fixed reporting of large numbers. (#14241)
segment.target: Ispravljeno čitanje velikih brojeva. (#14241)

segment.source: Java applications with controls using the selectable state will now announce when an item is not selected rather than when the item is selected. (#14336)
segment.target: Java aplikacije sa kontrolama koje koriste status označenosti će izgovarati kada stavka nije označena umjesto obrnutog. (#14336)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravke grešaka

segment.source: Windows 11 fixes:
segment.target: Ispravke koje se primjenjuju u Windowsima 11:

segment.source: NVDA will announce search highlights when opening Start menu. (#13841)
segment.target: NVDA će izgovarati rezultate pretrage prilikom otvaranja izbornika start. (#13841)

segment.source: On ARM, x64 apps are no longer identified as ARM64 applications. (#14403)
segment.target: Na arhitekturi ARM, x64 aplikacije više nisu pogrešno identificirane kao ARM64 aplikacije. (#14403)

segment.source: Clipboard history menu items such as "pin item" can be accessed. (#14508)
segment.target: Stavkama izbornika povijesti međuspremnika poput "prikvači stavku" može se ponovno pristupiti. (#14508)

segment.source: In Windows 11 22H2 and newer, it is again possible to use mouse and touch interaction to interact with areas such as the system tray overflow window and "Open With" dialog. (#14538, #14539)
segment.target: U Windowsima 11 22H2 i novijima, moguće je opet koristiti miš i interakciju dodirom kako bi se moglo koristiti područje obavijesti i dijaloški okvir "otvori sa". (#14538, #14539)

segment.source: Suggestions are reported when typing an @mention in in Microsoft Excel comments. (#13764)
segment.target: Izgovaraju se prijedlozi prilikom upisivanja znaka @osvrta u Microsoft Excel komentarima. (#13764)

segment.source: In the Google Chrome location bar, suggestion controls (switch to tab, remove suggestion etc) are now reported when selected. (#13522)
segment.target: U Google Chrome adresnoj traci, kontrole prijedloga (prebaci se na karticu, ukloni prijedlog itd) sada se izgovaraju kada su označene. (#13522)

segment.source: When requesting formatting information, colors are now explicitly reported in Wordpad or log viewer, rather than only "Default color". (#13959)
segment.target: Prilikom dohvaćanja informacija o oblikovanju, boje su sada eksplicitno čitane u Wordpadu ili pregledniku zapisnika, umjesto "podrazumjevana boja". (#13959)

segment.source: In Firefox, activating the "Show options" button on GitHub issue pages now works reliably. (#14269)
segment.target: U Firefoxu, aktiviranje opcije "Show options" na stranici za github probleme sada pouzdano radi. (#14269)

segment.source: The date picker controls in Outlook 2016 / 365 Advanced search dialog now report their label and value. (#12726)
segment.target: Kontroke za odabir datuma u Outlooku 2016 / 365 dijaloškom okviru napredne pretrage sada se izgovaraju zajedno sa svojim vrijednostima. (#12726)

segment.source: ARIA switch controls are now actually reported as switches in Firefox, Chrome and Edge, rather than checkboxes. (#11310)
segment.target: ARIA switch kontrole sada se točnije izgovaraju kao preklopnici u Firefoxu, Chromeu i Edgeu, umjesto potvrdnih okvira. (#11310)

segment.source: NVDA will automatically announce the sort state on an HTML table column header when changed by pressing an inner button. (#10890)
segment.target: NVDA će automatski izgovoriti status razvrstavanja na HTML zaglavlju stupca tablice kada se promjeni, prilikom pritiska unutrašnjeg gumba. (#10890)

segment.source: A landmark or region's name is always automatically spoken when jumping inside from outside using quick navigation or focus in browse mode. (#13307)
segment.target: Naziv Orijentira i regije sada će se automatski čitati prilikom skananja u kontrolu ili fokusiranjem kontrole u modusu pregleda. (#13307)

segment.source: When beep or announce 'cap' for capitals is enabled with delayed character descriptions, NVDA no longer beeps or announces 'cap' twice. (#14239)
segment.target: Kada je uključena opcija reproduciraj zvučni signal ili izgovori 'veliko' za velika slova, sa uključenim opisima znakova poslije kursora, NVDA više ne reproducira zvučni signal, niti ne izgovara 'veliko' dvaput. (#14239)

segment.source: Controls in tables in Java applications will now be announced more accurately by NVDA. (#14347)
segment.target: Kontrole u tablicama u Java aplikacijama biti će pročitane točnije. (#14347)

segment.source: Some settings will no longer be unexpectedly different when used with multiple profiles. (#14170)
segment.target: Neke postavke više neće biti neočekivano drugaćije kada se koristi više konfiguracijskih profila. (#14170)

segment.source: The following settings have been addressed:
segment.target: Slijedeće postavke su ispravljene:

segment.source: Line indentation in Document formatting settings.
segment.target: Uvlačenje redka u postavkama oblikovanja dokumenta.

segment.source: Cell borders in doc formatting settings
segment.target: Rubovi ćelija u postavkama oblikovanja dokumenta

segment.source: Show messages in braille settings
segment.target: Prikaz poruka u postavkama brajice

segment.source: Tether Braille in braille settings
segment.target: Povezivanje brajice u postavkama brajice

segment.source: In some rare cases, these settings used in profiles may be unexpectedly modified when installing this version of NVDA.
segment.target: U nekim rijedkim slučajevima, ove postavke korištene u profilima mogu biti neočekivano izmijenjene kada se instalira iva inačica NVDA.

segment.source: Please check these options in your profiles after upgrading NVDA to this version.
segment.target: Molimo provjerite ove postavke u vašem profilu poslije nadogradnje na ovu inačicu.

segment.source: Emojis should now be reported in more languages. (#14433)
segment.target: Emoji će se moći čitati na više jezika. (#14433)

segment.source: The presence of an annotation is no longer missing in braille for some elements. (#13815)
segment.target: Prisutnost anotacija više ne nedostaje kada se prikazuju na brajičnom redku za neke elemente. (#13815)

segment.source: Fixed an issue where config changes not save correctly when changing between a "Default" option and the value of the "Default" option. (#14133)
segment.target: Ispravljena je pogreška u kojoj se izmjene ne spremaju ispravno prilikom izmjene "podrazumjevane" opcije i i vrijednosti "podrazumjevane" opcije. (#14133)

segment.source: When configuring NVDA there will always be at least one key defined as an NVDA key. (#14527)
segment.target: Prilikom konfiguriranja NVDA uvijek će biti definirana barem jedna tipka kao NVDA modifikacijaka tipka. (#14527)

segment.source: When accessing the NVDA menu via the notification area, NVDA will not suggest a pending update anymore when no update is available. (#14523)
segment.target: Prilikom pristupanja NVDA izborniku preko popisa obavijesti, NVDA neće predložiti nadogradnju koja se očekuje kada isto nije dostupno. (#14523)

segment.source: Remaining, elapsed and total time is now reported correctly for audio files over a day long in foobar2000. (#14127)
segment.target: Preostalo, proteklo i ukupno vrijeme sada se točno izgovara za audio datoteke čije trajanje prekoračuje jedan dan u foobar2000 programu. (#14127)

segment.source: In web browsers such as Chrome and Firefox, alerts such as file downloads are shown in braille in addition to being spoken. (#14562)
segment.target: U preglednicima poput Chromea i Firefoxa, upozorenja kao što su to preuzimanja biti će prikazana i na brajičnom redku. (#14562)

segment.source: Bug fixed when navigating to the first and last column in a table in Firefox (#14554)
segment.target: Ispravljena je greška prilikom kretanja između prvog i zadnjeg stupca u tablici u Firefoxu (#14554)

segment.source: When NVDA is launched with `--lang=Windows` parameter, it is again possible to open NVDA's General settings dialog. (#14407)
segment.target: Kada je NVDA pokrenut sa parametrom naredbenog redka `--lang=Windows`, sada je ponovo moguće otvoriti prozor općenitih postavki.. (#14407)

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to continue reading in Kindle for PC after turning the page. (#14390)
segment.target: NVDA sada ponovno nastavlja čitanje u programu Kindle for PC poslije okretanja stranice. (#14390)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: Note: this is an Add-on API compatibility breaking release.
segment.target: Napomena: ovo je izdanje koje krši kompatibilnost dodatnog API-ja.

segment.source: Add-ons will need to be re-tested and have their manifest updated.
segment.target: Dodatke će trebati ponovno testirati i ažurirati njihov manifest.

segment.source: Please refer to [the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) for information on NVDA's API deprecation and removal process.
segment.target: Molimo pogledajte [vodič za razvojne programere](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) za informacije o postupku zastarjelosti i uklanjanja NVDA API-ja.

segment.source: System tests should now pass when run locally on non-English systems. (#13362)
segment.target: Testovi sustava sada bi trebali proći kada se pokreću lokalno na sustavima koji nisu engleski. (#13362)

segment.source: In Windows 11 on ARM, x64 apps are no longer identified as ARM64 applications. (#14403)
segment.target: U sustavu Windows 11 na ARM-u, x64 aplikacije više nisu identificirane kao ARM64 aplikacije. (#14403)

segment.source: It is no longer necessary to use `SearchField` and `SuggestionListItem` `UIA` `NVDAObjects` in new UI Automation scenarios, where automatic reporting of search suggestions, and where typing has been exposed via UI Automation with the `controllerFor` pattern.
segment.target: Više nije potrebno koristiti 'SearchField' i 'SuggestionListItem' 'UIA' 'NVDAObjects' u novim scenarijima automatizacije korisničkog sučelja, gdje je automatsko izvješćivanje o prijedlozima pretraživanja i gdje je tipkanje izloženo putem automatizacije korisničkog sučelja s obrascem 'controllerFor'.

segment.source: This functionality is now available generically via `behaviours.EditableText` and the base `NVDAObject` respectively. (#14222)
segment.target: Ova je funkcija sada dostupna općenito putem 'ponašanja. EditableText' i osnovni 'NVDAObject'. (#14222)

segment.source: The UIA debug logging category when enabled now produces significantly more logging for UIA event handlers and utilities. (#14256)
segment.target: Kategorija zapisivanja pogrešaka UIA kada je omogućena sada proizvodi znatno više zapisivanja za rukovatelje događajima UIA i uslužne programe. (#14256)

segment.source: NVDAHelper build standards updated. (#13072)
segment.target: Ažurirani su standardi izrade NVDAHelpera. (#13072)

segment.source: Now uses the C++20 standard, was C++17.
segment.target: Sada koristi standard C++20, bio je C++17.

segment.source: Now uses the `/permissive-` compiler flag which disables permissive behaviors, and sets the `/Zc` compiler options for strict conformance.
segment.target: Sada koristi zastavicu kompajlera '/permissive-' koja onemogućuje permisivno ponašanje i postavlja opcije kompajlera '/Zc' za strogu usklađenost.

segment.source: Some plugin objects (e.g. drivers and add-ons) now have a more informative description in the NVDA python console. (#14463)
segment.target: Neki objekti dodataka (npr. upravljački programi i dodaci) sada imaju informativniji opis u NVDA python konzoli. (#14463)

segment.source: NVDA can now be fully compiled with Visual Studio 2022, no longer requiring the Visual Studio 2019 build tools. (#14326)
segment.target: NVDA se sada može u potpunosti kompajlirati sa Visual Studio 2022 i više ne zahtijeva alate za izradu Visual Studio 2019. (#14326)

segment.source: More detailed logging for NVDA freezes to aid debugging. (#14309)
segment.target: Detaljnije bilježenje NVDA zamrzava se kako bi se olakšalo otklanjanje pogrešaka. (#14309)

segment.source: The singleton `braille._BgThread` class has been replaced with `hwIo.ioThread.IoThread`. (#14130)
segment.target: Klasa singleton 'braille._BgThread' zamijenjena je klasom 'hwIo.ioThread.IoThread'. (#14130)

segment.source: A single instance `hwIo.bgThread` (in NVDA core) of this class provides background i/o for thread safe braille display drivers.
segment.target: Jedna instanca 'hwIo.bgThread' (u NVDA jezgri) ove klase pruža pozadinske ulaze/izlaze za upravljačke programe za Brailleovo pismo.

segment.source: This new class is not a singleton by design, add-on authors are encouraged to use their own instance when doing hardware i/o.
segment.target: Ova nova klasa nije jedinstvena po dizajnu, autori dodataka potiču se da koriste vlastitu instancu kada rade hardverske i/o.

segment.source: The processor architecture for the computer can be queried from `winVersion.WinVersion.processorArchitecture attribute.` (#14439)
segment.target: Arhitektura procesora za računalo može se upitati iz atributa "winVersion.WinVersion.processorArchitecture". (#14439)

segment.source: New extension points have been added. (#14503)
segment.target: Dodane su nove točke proširenja. (#14503)

segment.source: `inputCore.decide_executeGesture`
segment.target: 'inputCore.decide_executeGesture'

segment.source: `tones.decide_beep`
segment.target: 'tones.decide_beep'

segment.source: `nvwave.decide_playWaveFile`
segment.target: 'nvwave.decide_playWaveFile'

segment.source: `braille.pre_writeCells`
segment.target: 'braille.pre_writeCells'

segment.source: `braille.filter_displaySize`
segment.target: 'braille.filter_displaySize'

segment.source: `braille.decide_enabled`
segment.target: 'braille.decide_enabled'

segment.source: `braille.displayChanged`
segment.target: 'braille.displayChanged'

segment.source: `braille.displaySizeChanged`
segment.target: 'braille.displaySizeChanged'

segment.source: It is possible to set useConfig to False on supported settings for a synthesizer driver. (#14601)
segment.target: Moguće je postaviti useConfig na False na podržanim postavkama za upravljački program sintisajzera. (#14601)

segment.source: API Breaking Changes
segment.target: Promjene koje prekidaju API

segment.source: These are breaking API changes.
segment.target: To su pokvarene promjene API-ja.

segment.source: Please open a GitHub issue if your Add-on has an issue with updating to the new API.
segment.target: Otvorite problem s GitHubom ako vaš dodatak ima problema s ažuriranjem na novi API.

segment.source: The configuration specification has been altered, keys have been removed or modified:
segment.target: Specifikacija konfiguracije je promijenjena, ključevi su uklonjeni ili izmijenjeni:

segment.source: In `[documentFormatting]` section (#14233):
segment.target: U odjeljku '[documentFormatting]' (#14233):

segment.source: `reportLineIndentation` stores an int value (0 to 3) instead of a boolean
segment.target: 'reportLineIndentation' pohranjuje int vrijednost (0 do 3) umjesto logičke vrijednosti

segment.source: `reportLineIndentationWithTones` has been removed.
segment.target: 'reportLineIndentationWithTones' je uklonjen.

segment.source: `reportBorderStyle` and `reportBorderColor` have been removed and are replaced by `reportCellBorders`.
segment.target: 'reportBorderStyle' i 'reportBorderColor' uklonjeni su i zamijenjeni su s 'reportCellBorders'.

segment.source: In `[braille]` section (#14233):
segment.target: U odjeljku '[Brailleovo pismo]' (#14233):

segment.source: `noMessageTimeout` has been removed, replaced by a value for `showMessages`.
segment.target: 'noMessageTimeout' je uklonjen, zamijenjen vrijednošću za 'showMessages'.

segment.source: `messageTimeout` cannot take the value 0 anymore, replaced by a value for `showMessages`.
segment.target: 'messageTimeout' više ne može primati vrijednost 0, zamijenjena vrijednošću za 'showMessages'.

segment.source: `autoTether` has been removed; `tetherTo` can now take the value "auto" instead.
segment.target: 'autoTether' je uklonjen; 'tetherTo' sada umjesto toga može uzeti vrijednost "auto".

segment.source: In `[keyboard]` section (#14528):
segment.target: U odjeljku '[tipkovnica]' (#14528):

segment.source: `useCapsLockAsNVDAModifierKey`, `useNumpadInsertAsNVDAModifierKey`, `useExtendedInsertAsNVDAModifierKey` have been removed.
segment.target: 'useCapsLockAsNVDAModifierKey', 'useNumpadInsertAsNVDAModifierKey', 'useExtendedInsertAsNVDAModifierKey' su uklonjeni.

segment.source: They are replaced by `NVDAModifierKeys`.
segment.target: Zamjenjuju se s 'NVDAModifierKeys'.

segment.source: The `NVDAHelper.RemoteLoader64` class has been removed with no replacement. (#14449)
segment.target: Klasa 'NVDAHelper.RemoteLoader64' uklonjena je bez zamjene. (#14449)

segment.source: The following functions in `winAPI.sessionTracking` are removed with no replacement. (#14416, #14490)
segment.target: Sljedeće funkcije u 'winAPI.sessionTracking' uklanjaju se bez zamjene. (#14416, #14490)

segment.source: `isWindowsLocked`
segment.target: 'isWindowsLocked'

segment.source: `handleSessionChange`
segment.target: 'handleSessionChange'

segment.source: `unregister`
segment.target: 'odjaviti'

segment.source: `register`
segment.target: 'Registar'

segment.source: `isLockStateSuccessfullyTracked`
segment.target: 'isLockStateSuccessfullyTracked'

segment.source: It is no longer possible to enable/disable the braille handler by setting `braille.handler.enabled`.
segment.target: Više nije moguće omogućiti/onemogućiti rukovatelj brajicom postavljanjem 'braille.handler.enabled'.

segment.source: To disable the braille handler programatically, register a handler to `braille.handler.decide_enabled`. (#14503)
segment.target: Da biste programski onemogućili rukovatelj brajicom, registrirajte rukovatelj na 'braille.handler.decide_enabled'. (#14503)

segment.source: It is no longer possible to update the display size of the handler by setting `braille.handler.displaySize`.
segment.target: Više nije moguće ažurirati veličinu zaslona rukovatelja postavljanjem 'braille.handler.displaySize'.

segment.source: To update the displaySize programatically, register a handler to `braille.handler.filter_displaySize`.
segment.target: Da biste programski ažurirali displaySize, registrirajte rukovatelj na 'braille.handler.filter_displaySize'.

segment.source: Refer to `brailleViewer` for an example on how to do this. (#14503)
segment.target: Pogledajte 'brailleViewer' za primjer kako to učiniti. (#14503)

segment.source: There have been changes to the usage of `addonHandler.Addon.loadModule`. (#14481)
segment.target: Došlo je do promjena u korištenju 'addonHandler.Addon.loadModule'. (#14481)

segment.source: `loadModule` now expects dot as a separator, rather than backslash.
segment.target: 'loadModule' sada očekuje točku kao razdjelnik, a ne obrnutu kosu crtu.

segment.source: For example "lib.example" instead of "lib\example".
segment.target: Na primjer "lib.example" umjesto "lib\example".

segment.source: `loadModule` now raises an exception when a module can't be loaded or has errors, instead of silently returning `None` without giving information about the cause.
segment.target: 'loadModule' sada postavlja iznimku kada se modul ne može učitati ili ima pogreške, umjesto da tiho vraća 'None' bez davanja informacija o uzroku.

segment.source: The following symbols have been removed from `appModules.foobar2000` with no direct replacement. (#14570)
segment.target: Sljedeći simboli uklonjeni su iz 'appModules.foobar2000' bez izravne zamjene. (#14570)

segment.source: `statusBarTimes`
segment.target: 'statusBarTimes'

segment.source: `parseIntervalToTimestamp`
segment.target: 'parseIntervalToTimestamp'

segment.source: `getOutputFormat`
segment.target: 'getOutputFormat'

segment.source: `getParsingFormat`
segment.target: 'getParsingFormat'

segment.source: The following are no longer singletons - their get method has been removed.
segment.target: Sljedeći više nisu singletoni - njihova metoda dobivanja je uklonjena.

segment.source: Usage of `Example.get()` is now `Example()`. (#14248)
segment.target: Upotreba 'Example.get()' sada je 'Example()'. (#14248)

segment.source: `UIAHandler.customAnnotations.CustomAnnotationTypesCommon`
segment.target: 'UIAHandler.customAnnotations.CustomAnnotationTypesCommon'

segment.source: `UIAHandler.customProps.CustomPropertiesCommon`
segment.target: 'UIAHandler.customProps.CustomPropertiesCommon'

segment.source: `NVDAObjects.UIA.excel.ExcelCustomProperties`
segment.target: 'NVDAObjects.UIA.excel.ExcelCustomProperties'

segment.source: `NVDAObjects.UIA.excel.ExcelCustomAnnotationTypes`
segment.target: 'NVDAObjects.UIA.excel.ExcelCustomAnnotationTypes'

segment.source: Deprecations
segment.target: Zastarjelosti

segment.source: `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.WinTerminalUIA` is deprecated and usage is discouraged. (#14047)
segment.target: 'NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.WinTerminalUIA' je zastario i ne preporučuje se korištenje. (#14047)

segment.source: `config.addConfigDirsToPythonPackagePath` has been moved.
segment.target: 'config.addConfigDirsToPythonPackagePath' je premješten.

segment.source: Use `addonHandler.packaging.addDirsToPythonPackagePath` instead. (#14350)
segment.target: Umjesto toga upotrijebite 'addonHandler.packaging.addDirsToPythonPackagePath'. (#14350)

segment.source: `braille.BrailleHandler.TETHER_*` are deprecated.
segment.target: 'Brailleovo pismo. BrailleHandler.TETHER_*' su zastarjeli.

segment.source: Use `configFlags.TetherTo.*.value` instead. (#14233)
segment.target: Umjesto toga upotrijebite 'configFlags.TetherTo.*.value'. (#14233)

segment.source: `utils.security.postSessionLockStateChanged` is deprecated.
segment.target: 'utils.security.postSessionLockStateChanged' je zastario.

segment.source: Use `utils.security.post_sessionLockStateChanged` instead. (#14486)
segment.target: Umjesto toga upotrijebite 'utils.security.post_sessionLockStateChanged'. (#14486)

segment.source: `NVDAObject.hasDetails`, `NVDAObject.detailsSummary`, `NVDAObject.detailsRole` has been deprecated.
segment.target: 'NVDAObject.hasDetails', 'NVDAObject.detailsSummary', 'NVDAObject.detailsRole' je zastario.

segment.source: Use `NVDAObject.annotations` instead. (#14507)
segment.target: Umjesto toga koristite 'NVDAObject.annotations'. (#14507)

segment.source: `keyboardHandler.SUPPORTED_NVDA_MODIFIER_KEYS` is deprecated with no direct replacement.
segment.target: 'keyboardHandler.SUPPORTED_NVDA_MODIFIER_KEYS' je zastario bez izravne zamjene.

segment.source: Consider using the class `config.configFlags.NVDAKey` instead. (#14528)
segment.target: Razmislite o korištenju klase 'config.configFlags.NVDAKey' umjesto toga. (#14528)

segment.source: `gui.MainFrame.evaluateUpdatePendingUpdateMenuItemCommand` has been deprecated.
segment.target: 'Gui. MainFrame.evaluateUpdatePendingUpdateMenuItemCommand' je zastario.

segment.source: Use `gui.MainFrame.SysTrayIcon.evaluateUpdatePendingUpdateMenuItemCommand` instead. (#14523)
segment.target: Koristite 'gui. MainFrame.SysTrayIcon.evaluateUpdatePendingUpdateMenuItemCommand'. (#14523)

segment.source: This release includes several new key commands, including table say all commands.
segment.target: U ovoj je inačici dodano nekoliko novih tipkovničkih prečaca, uključujući i prečace za čitanje cijele tablice.

segment.source: A "Quick Start Guide" section has been added to the User Guide.
segment.target: Dodan je odjeljak "Vodič za brzo upoznavanje sa NVDA" u korisnički priručnik.

segment.source: There are also several bug fixes.
segment.target: Ispravljene su također neke pogreške.

segment.source: eSpeak has been updated and LibLouis has been updated.
segment.target: Espeak i LibLouis su nadograđeni.

segment.source: There are new Chinese, Swedish, Luganda and Kinyarwanda braille tables.
segment.target: Dodane su nove brajične tablice za jezike: kineski, švedski, Luganda i Kinyarwanda.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove značajke

segment.source: Added a "Quick Start Guide" section to the User Guide. (#13934)
segment.target: Dodan je odlomak "Vodič za brzo upoznavanje" u vodič za korisnike. (#13934)

segment.source: Introduced a new command to check the keyboard shortcut of the current focus. (#13960)
segment.target: Dodan je novi prečac za provjeru tipkovničkog prečaca trenutno fokusirane stavke. (#13960)

segment.source: Desktop: `shift+numpad2`.
segment.target: Za stolna računala: `shift+numerički2`.

segment.source: Laptop: `NVDA+ctrl+shift+.`.
segment.target: za prijenosna računala: `NVDA+ctrl+shift+.`.

segment.source: Introduced new commands to move the review cursor by page where supported by the application. (#14021)
segment.target: Dodani su novi prečaci preglednog kursora za kretanje po stranici gdje to aplikacija podržava. (#14021)

segment.source: Move to previous page:
segment.target: Idi na prethodnu stranicu:

segment.source: Desktop: `NVDA+pageUp`.
segment.target: za stolna računala: `NVDA+pageUp`.

segment.source: Laptop: `NVDA+shift+pageUp`.
segment.target: Za prijenosna računala: `NVDA+shift+pageUp`.

segment.source: Move to next page:
segment.target: Idi na slijedeću stranicu:

segment.source: Desktop: `NVDA+pageDown`.
segment.target: Za stolna računala: `NVDA+pageDown`.

segment.source: Laptop: `NVDA+shift+pageDown`.
segment.target: Za prijenosna računala: `NVDA+shift+pageDown`.

segment.source: Added the following table commands. (#14070)
segment.target: Dodani su slijedeći prečaci za kretanje po tablicama. (#14070)

segment.source: Say all in column: `NVDA+control+alt+downArrow`
segment.target: Čitaj sve u stupcu: `NVDA+control+alt+downArrow`

segment.source: Say all in row: `NVDA+control+alt+rightArrow`
segment.target: Čitaj sve u redku: `NVDA+control+alt+rightArrow`

segment.source: Read entire column: `NVDA+control+alt+upArrow`
segment.target: Čitaj cijeli stupac: `NVDA+control+alt+upArrow`

segment.source: Read entire row: `NVDA+control+alt+leftArrow`
segment.target: Čitaj cijeli redak: `NVDA+control+alt+leftArrow`

segment.source: Microsoft Excel via UI Automation: NVDA now announces when moving out of a table within a spreadsheet. (#14165)
segment.target: Microsoft Excel koji se koristi sa UI automation: NVDA sada obavještava o izlazku iz tablice u radnoj knjizi. (#14165)

segment.source: Reporting table headers can now be configured separately for rows and columns. (#14075)
segment.target: Čitanje zaglavlja tablica sada može biti konfigurirano odvojeno redci od stupaca. (#14075)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Izmjene

segment.source: eSpeak NG has been updated to 1.52-dev commit `735ecdb8`. (#14060, #14079, #14118, #14203)
segment.target: eSpeak NG je nadograđen na inačicu 1.52-dev commit `735ecdb8`. (#14060, #14079, #14118, #14203)

segment.source: Fixed reporting of Latin characters when using Mandarin. (#12952, #13572, #14197)
segment.target: Ispravljeno je čitanje latinice pri korištenju mandarinskog kineskog. (#12952, #13572, #14197)

segment.source: Updated LibLouis braille translator to [3.23.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.23.0). (#14112)
segment.target: Nadograđen je LibLouis brajični prevoditelj na inačicu [3.23.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.23.0). (#14112)

segment.source: Added braille tables:
segment.target: Dodane brajične tablice:

segment.source: Chinese common braille (simplified Chinese characters)
segment.target: Kineska opća brajica (pojednostavljeni kineski znakovi)

segment.source: Kinyarwanda literary braille
segment.target: Kinyarwanda puno pismo

segment.source: Luganda literary braille
segment.target: Luganda puno pismo

segment.source: Swedish uncontracted braille
segment.target: švedsko osnovno pismo

segment.source: Swedish partially contracted braille
segment.target: švedsko puno pismo

segment.source: Swedish contracted braille
segment.target: švedski kratkopis

segment.source: Chinese (China, Mandarin) Current Braille System (no tones) (#14138)
segment.target: Kineski (Kina, mandarinski) Trenutačni brajični sustav (bez tonova) (#14138)

segment.source: NVDA now includes the architecture of the operating system as part of user statistics tracking. (#14019)
segment.target: NVDA sada uključuje arhitekturu operacijskog sustava kao dio sakupljane korisničke statistike. (#14019)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravke grešaka

segment.source: When updating NVDA using the Windows Package Manager CLI (aka winget), a released version of NVDA is no longer always treated as newer than whatever alpha version is installed. (#12469)
segment.target: Prilikom nadogradnje NVDA uz pomoć Windows upravitelja paketa CLI (to jest winget), stabilna inačica se više ne tretira kao novija od bilo koje alpha inačice. (#12469)

segment.source: NVDA will now correctly announce Group boxes in Java applications. (#13962)
segment.target: NVDA će sada ispravno čitati grupiranja u java aplikacijama. (#13962)

segment.source: Caret properly follows spoken text during "say all" in applications such as Bookworm, WordPad, or the NVDA log viewer. (#13420, #9179)
segment.target: Kursor sustava sada točno slijedi tijek "prečaca čitaj sve" u programima poput Bookworm-a, WordPada ili NVDA preglednika zapisnika. (#13420, #9179)

segment.source: In programs using UI Automation, partially checked checkboxes will be reported correctly. (#13975)
segment.target: U programima koji koriste UI automation, polovično odabrani potvrdni okviri sada će biti ispravno pročitani. (#13975)

segment.source: Improved performance and stability in Microsoft Visual Studio, Windows Terminal, and other UI Automation based applications. (#11077, #11209)
segment.target: Unapređene su performanse i stabilnost u Microsoft Visual Studiu, Windows Terminalu, i drugim programima baziranim na UIA. (#11077, #11209)

segment.source: These fixes apply to Windows 11 Sun Valley 2 (version 22H2) and later.
segment.target: Ove ispravke se primjenjuju na Windows 11 Sun Valley 2 (inačica 22H2) i novije.

segment.source: Selective registration for UI Automation events and property changes now enabled by default.
segment.target: Selektivna registracija za događaje UI automation i izmjene svojstava sada je uključena podrazumjevano.

segment.source: Text reporting, Braille output, and password suppression now work as expected in the embedded Windows Terminal control in Visual Studio 2022. (#14194)
segment.target: Čitanje teksta, brajični izlaz i neizgovaranje lozinki sada rade kako je to očekivano u ugrađenoj Windows terminal kontroli u Visual Studiu 2022. (#14194)

segment.source: NVDA is now DPI aware when using multiple monitors.
segment.target: NVDA je sada DPI svjestan pri korištenju više monitora.

segment.source: There are several fixes for using a DPI setting higher than 100% or multiple monitors.
segment.target: Dodano je nekoliko ispravaka za korištenje DPI postavke više od 100% ili pri korištenju više monitora.

segment.source: Issues may still exist with versions of Windows older than Windows 10 1809.
segment.target: Još mogu postojati problemi sa inačicama operacijskog sustava Windows starijih od Windows 10 1809.

segment.source: For these fixes to work, applications which NVDA interacts with also need to be DPI aware.
segment.target: Kako bi ove ispravke radile, aplikacije s kojima NVDA ulazi u interakciju također moraju biti DPI svjesne.

segment.source: Note there are still known issues with Chrome and Edge. (#13254)
segment.target: Imajte na umu da postoje problemi sa Chrome i Edge preglednicima. (#13254)

segment.source: Visual highlighting frames should now be correctly placed in most applications. (#13370, #3875, #12070)
segment.target: Okviri vizualnog označavanja sada će se postavljati ispravno u većini aplikacija. (#13370, #3875, #12070)

segment.source: Touch screen interaction should now be accurate for most applications. (#7083)
segment.target: Interakcija putem dodirnika sada će biti točnija za većinu aplikacija. (#7083)

segment.source: Mouse tracking should now work for most applications. (#6722)
segment.target: Praćenje miša će sada raditi ispravno za neke aplikacije. (#6722)

segment.source: Orientation state (landscape/portrait) changes are now correctly ignored when there is no change (e.g. monitor changes). (#14035)
segment.target: Stanje orijentacije zaslona (okomito/vodoravno) sada se ispravno ignoriraju kada ne postoji izmjena (npr. promjene monitora). (#14035)

segment.source: NVDA will announce dragging items on screen in places such as rearranging Windows 10 Start menu tiles and virtual desktops in Windows 11. (#12271, #14081)
segment.target: NVDA će obavještavati o spuštanju stavaka na zaslonu kao što su to mjesta premještanja Windows 10 ploćica u izborniku start i virtualnim radnim površinama u Windows 11. (#12271, #14081)

segment.source: In advanced settings, "Play a sound for logged errors" option is now correctly restored to its default value when pressing the "Restore defaults" button. (#14149)
segment.target: U naprednim postavkama, opcija opcija "reproduciraj zvuk za zapisane greške" sada se ispravno vraća na svoje podrazumjevane vrijednsti prilikom pritiska gumba "vrati na zadano". (#14149)

segment.source: NVDA can now select text using the `NVDA+f10` keyboard shortcut on Java applications. (#14163)
segment.target: NVDA sada može označavati tekst koristeći `NVDA+f10` tipkovnički prečac u java aplikacijama. (#14163)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer get stuck in a menu when arrowing up and down threaded conversations in Microsoft Teams. (#14355)
segment.target: NVDA se više neće zaglavljivati u izborniku pri kretanju strelicama u тематским раѕговорима. (#14355)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: Please refer to [the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) for information on NVDA's API deprecation and removal process.
segment.target: Molimo pogledajte [vodič za razvojne programere](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) za informacije o postupku zastarjelosti i uklanjanja NVDA API-ja.

segment.source: The [NVDA API Announcement mailing list](https://groups.google.com/a/nvaccess.org/g/nvda-api/about) was created. (#13999)
segment.target: Kreirana je [Mailing lista NVDA API-ja](https://groups.google.com/a/nvaccess.org/g/nvda-api/about). (#13999)

segment.source: NVDA no longer processes `textChange` events for most UI Automation applications due to their extreme negative performance impact. (#11002, #14067)
segment.target: NVDA više ne obrađuje 'textChange' događaje za većinu aplikacija za automatizaciju korisničkog sučelja zbog njihovog ekstremnog negativnog utjecaja na performanse. (#11002, #14067)

segment.source: Deprecations
segment.target: Zastarjelosti

segment.source: `core.post_windowMessageReceipt` is deprecated, use `winAPI.messageWindow.pre_handleWindowMessage` instead.
segment.target: 'core.post_windowMessageReceipt' je zastarjelo, umjesto toga koristite 'winAPI.messageWindow.pre_handleWindowMessage'.

segment.source: `winKernel.SYSTEM_POWER_STATUS` is deprecated and usage is discouraged, this has been moved to `winAPI._powerTracking.SystemPowerStatus`.
segment.target: 'winKernel.SYSTEM_POWER_STATUS' je zastarjelo i upotreba se ne preporučuje, ovo je premješteno u 'winAPI._powerTracking.SystemPowerStatus'.

segment.source: `winUser.SM_*` constants are deprecated, use `winAPI.winUser.constants.SystemMetrics` instead.
segment.target: Konstante 'winUser.SM_*' su zastarjele, umjesto toga upotrijebite 'winAPI.winUser.constants.SystemMetrics'.

segment.source: This is a minor release to fix issues with 2022.3.2, 2022.3.1 and 2022.3.
segment.target: Ovo je mala inačica u kojoj su ispravljeni problemi iz inačica 2022.3.2, 2022.3.1 i 2022.3.

segment.source: This also addresses a security issue.
segment.target: Ova verzija također ispravlja sigurnosnu ranjivost.

segment.source: Security Fixes
segment.target: Ispravke sigurnosti

segment.source: Prevents possible system access (e.g. NVDA Python console) for unauthenticated users.
segment.target: Onemogućuje pristup za neautentificirane korisnike (npr. NVDA Python konzoli).

segment.source: ([GHSA-fpwc-2gxx-j9v7](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-fpwc-2gxx-j9v7))
segment.target: ([GHSA-fpwc-2gxx-j9v7](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-fpwc-2gxx-j9v7))

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravke grešaka

segment.source: Fixed bug where if NVDA freezes when locking, NVDA will allow access to the users desktop while on the Windows lock screen. (#14416)
segment.target: Ispravljena je pogreška, u kojoj je bilo moguće pristupiti korisničkoj radnoj površini kada se fokus nalazi na zaslonu zaključavanja. (#14416)

segment.source: Fixed bug where if NVDA freezes when locking, NVDA will not behave correctly, as if the device was still locked. (#14416)
segment.target: Ispravljena je pogreška u kojoj prilikom smrzavanja NVDA isti se neće ispravno ponašatikao da je uređaj još uvijek zaključan. (#14416)

segment.source: Fixed accessibility issues with the Windows "forgot my PIN" process and Windows update/install experience. (#14368)
segment.target: Ispravljeni problemi s pristupačnošću s procesima "zaboravio sam pin" i Windows update/iskustvom instalacije. (#14368)

segment.source: Fixed bug when trying to install NVDA in some Windows environments, e.g. Windows Server. (#14379)
segment.target: Ispravljena je pogreška prilikom instalacije NVDA u nekim okruženjima, npr: Windows Server. (#14379)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: Deprecations
segment.target: Zastarjelosti

segment.source: `utils.security.isObjectAboveLockScreen(obj)` is deprecated, instead use `obj.isBelowLockScreen`. (#14416)
segment.target: 'utils.security.isObjectAboveLockScreen(obj)' je zastario, umjesto toga koristite 'obj.isBelowLockScreen'. (#14416)

segment.source: The following functions in `winAPI.sessionTracking` are deprecated for removal in 2023.1. (#14416)
segment.target: Sljedeće funkcije u 'winAPI.sessionTracking' zastarjele su za uklanjanje u 2023.1. (#14416)

segment.source: `isWindowsLocked`
segment.target: 'isWindowsLocked'

segment.source: `handleSessionChange`
segment.target: 'handleSessionChange'

segment.source: `unregister`
segment.target: 'odjaviti'

segment.source: `register`
segment.target: 'Registar'

segment.source: `isLockStateSuccessfullyTracked`
segment.target: 'isLockStateSuccessfullyTracked'

segment.source: This is a minor release to fix regressions with 2022.3.1 and address a security issue.
segment.target: Ova inačica ispravlja regresije u inačici 2022.3.1 te ispravlja sigurnosnu ranjivost.

segment.source: Security Fixes
segment.target: Ispravke sigurnosti

segment.source: Prevents possible system level access for unauthenticated users.
segment.target: Onemogućen je mogući pristup na razini sustava za neautorizirane korisnike.

segment.source: ([GHSA-3jj9-295f-h69w](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-3jj9-295f-h69w))
segment.target: ([GHSA-3jj9-295f-h69w](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-3jj9-295f-h69w))

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravke grešaka

segment.source: Fixes a regression from 2022.3.1 where certain functionality was disabled on secure screens. (#14286)
segment.target: Ispravljena regresija iz inačice 2022.3.1 u kojoj su neke funkcionalnosti bile isključene na sigurnim zaslonima. (#14286)

segment.source: Fixes a regression from 2022.3.1 where certain functionality was disabled after sign-in, if NVDA started on the lock screen. (#14301)
segment.target: Ispravljena regresija iz inačice 2022.3.1 u kojoj su neke funkcije poslije prijave, bile nedostupne ako se NVDA pokrenuo sa zaslona zaključavanja. (#14301)

segment.source: This is a minor release to fix several security issues.
segment.target: Ovo je podverzija koja ispravlja nekoliko sigurnosnih propusta.

segment.source: Please responsibly disclose security issues to <info@nvaccess.org>.
segment.target: Molimo odgovorno izvještavajte o sigurnosnim problemima na adresu <info@nvaccess.org>.

segment.source: Security Fixes
segment.target: Sigurnosne ispravke

segment.source: Fixed exploit where it was possible to elevate from user to system privileges.
segment.target: Ispravljena ranjivost putem koje je bilo moguće podizanja prava sa korisnika na sustav.

segment.source: ([GHSA-q7c2-pgqm-vvw5](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-q7c2-pgqm-vvw5))
segment.target: ([GHSA-q7c2-pgqm-vvw5](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-q7c2-pgqm-vvw5))

segment.source: Fixed a security issue allowing access to the python console on the lock screen via a race condition for NVDA startup.
segment.target: Ispravljen je sigurnosni propust koji je omogućavao pristpu python konzoli na zaključanom zaslonu preko rizične situacije NVDA pokretanja.

segment.source: ([GHSA-72mj-mqhj-qh4w](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-72mj-mqhj-qh4w))
segment.target: ([GHSA-72mj-mqhj-qh4w](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-72mj-mqhj-qh4w))

segment.source: Fixed issue where speech viewer text is cached when locking Windows.
segment.target: Ispravljena pogreška u kojej je tekst pregledniak govora bio zadržavan prilikom zaključavanja operacijskog sustava Windows.

segment.source: ([GHSA-grvr-j2h8-3qm4](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-grvr-j2h8-3qm4))
segment.target: ([GHSA-grvr-j2h8-3qm4](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-grvr-j2h8-3qm4))

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravke grešaka

segment.source: Prevent an unauthenticated user from updating settings for speech and Braille viewer on the lock screen. ([GHSA-grvr-j2h8-3qm4](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-grvr-j2h8-3qm4))
segment.target: Neautorizirani korisnik biti će spriječen u namjeri spremanja postavki preglednika govora i brajice na zaslonu zaključavanja. ([GHSA-grvr-j2h8-3qm4](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-grvr-j2h8-3qm4))

segment.source: A significant amount of this release was contributed by the NVDA development community.
segment.target: Velikom dijelu ove inačice je doprinijela zajednica NVDA doprinositelja.

segment.source: This includes delayed character descriptions and improved Windows Console support.
segment.target: Ovo uključuje opise znakove poslije slovkanja i unapređenu podršku Windowsovog naredbenog redka.

segment.source: This release also includes several bug fixes.
segment.target: Ova inačica uključuje nekoliko ispravaka grešaka.

segment.source: Notably, up-to-date versions of Adobe Acrobat/Reader will no longer crash when reading a PDF document.
segment.target: Primjetno, posljednje inačice Adobe Acrobata/Readera neće se rušiti prilikom čitanja pdf dokumenta.

segment.source: eSpeak has been updated, which introduces 3 new languages: Belarusian, Luxembourgish and Totontepec Mixe.
segment.target: eSpeak je nadograđen, što znaći da su dodana tri nova jezika: bjeloruski, Luksenburški i Totontepec Mixe.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove značajke

segment.source: In the Windows Console Host used by Command Prompt, PowerShell, and the Windows Subsystem for Linux on Windows 11 version 22H2 (Sun Valley 2) and later:
segment.target: U hostu Windows naredbenog redka kojeg koristi naredbeni redak, PowerShell i windows podsustav za sustava Linux u Windowsima 11 inačica 22H2 (Sun Valley 2) i novijim:

segment.source: Vastly improved performance and stability. (#10964)
segment.target: značajno su unapređene performanse i stabilnost. (#10964)

segment.source: When pressing `control+f` to find text, the review cursor position is updated to follow the found term. (#11172)
segment.target: Prilikom pritiska prečaca `ctrl+f` za traženje teksta, pozicija preglednog kursora će se obnoviti kako bi pregledni kursor pratio pronađeni pojam. (#11172)

segment.source: Reporting of typed text that does not appear on-screen (such as passwords) is disabled by default.
segment.target: Izgovor upisanog teksta koji se ne pojavljuje na zaslonu poput lozinki je podrazumjevano isključen.

segment.source: It can be re-enabled in NVDA's advanced settings panel. (#11554)
segment.target: Može se uključiti u panelu NVDA Naprednih postavki. (#11554)

segment.source: Text that has scrolled offscreen can be reviewed without scrolling the console window. (#12669)
segment.target: Tekst koji se pomaknuo izvan zaslona može se pregledavati bez potrebe za pomicanjem prozora naredbenog redka. (#12669)

segment.source: More detailed text formatting information is available. ([microsoft/terminal PR 10336](https://github.com/microsoft/terminal/pull/10336))
segment.target: Detaljnije informacije o oblikovanju teksta su dostupne. ([microsoft/terminal PR 10336](https://github.com/microsoft/terminal/pull/10336))

segment.source: A new Speech option has been added to read character descriptions after a delay. (#13509)
segment.target: Dodana je nova opcija za govor koja omogućuje čitanje opisa znaka poslije zadrške. (#13509)

segment.source: A new Braille option has been added to determine if scrolling the display forward/back should interrupt speech. (#2124)
segment.target: Dodana je nova brajična opcija koja regulira dali će pomicanje teksta na brajičnom redku naprijed ili nazad prekidati govor. (#2124)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Izmjene

segment.source: eSpeak NG has been updated to 1.52-dev commit `9de65fcb`. (#13295)
segment.target: eSpeak NG je nadograđen na inačicu 1.52-dev commit `9de65fcb`. (#13295)

segment.source: Added languages:
segment.target: Dodani jezici:

segment.source: Belarusian
segment.target: Bjeloruski

segment.source: Luxembourgish
segment.target: Luksenburški

segment.source: Totontepec Mixe
segment.target: Totontepec Mixe

segment.source: When using UI Automation to access Microsoft Excel spreadsheet controls, NVDA is now able to report when a cell is merged. (#12843)
segment.target: Prilikom korištenja UI Automation za pristup Microsoft Excel proračunskim tablicama, NVDA sada može izgovarati spojene ćelije. (#12843)

segment.source: Instead of reporting "has details" the purpose of details is included where possible, for example "has comment". (#13649)
segment.target: Umjesto izgovora "sadrži detalje" uključen je tip detalja, gdje je to moguće, na primjer "sadrži komentar". (#13649)

segment.source: The installation size of NVDA is now shown in Windows Programs and Feature section. (#13909)
segment.target: Veličina instalacije NVDA sada se prikazuje u odjeljku programi i funkcije operativnog sustava Windows. (#13909)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravke grešaka

segment.source: Adobe Acrobat / Reader 64 bit will no longer crash when reading a PDF document. (#12920)
segment.target: Adobe Acrobat / Reader 64 bitne inačice više se neće rušiti prilikom čitanja PDF dokumenata. (#12920)

segment.source: Note that the most up to date version of Adobe Acrobat / Reader is also required to avoid the crash.
segment.target: Imajte na umu da je potrebna posljednja inačica Adobe/acrobat readera kako bi se izbjeglo rušenje.

segment.source: Font size measurements are now translatable in NVDA. (#13573)
segment.target: Mjere veličine fonta su od sada prevedene u NVDA. (#13573)

segment.source: Ignore Java Access Bridge events where no window handle can be found for Java applications.
segment.target: Ignorirani su događaji Java Access Bridge gdje se ne može pronaći uloga prozora za java aplikacije.

segment.source: This will improve performance for some Java applications including IntelliJ IDEA. (#13039)
segment.target: Ovo će unaprediti performanse za neke java aplikacije uključujući IntelliJ IDEA. (#13039)

segment.source: Announcement of selected cells for LibreOffice Calc is more efficient and no longer results in a Calc freeze when many cells are selected. (#13232)
segment.target: Izgovor označenih ćelija za LibreOffice Calc je točniji i ne rezultira rušenjem aplikacije Calc prilikom označavanja više ćelija. (#13232)

segment.source: When running under a different user, Microsoft Edge is no longer inaccessible. (#13032)
segment.target: Kada se pokreće od drugug korisnika, Microsoft Edge više nije nepristupačan. (#13032)

segment.source: When rate boost is off, eSpeak's rate does not drop anymore between rates 99% and 100%. (#13876)
segment.target: Kada je dopojačanje brzine uključeno,, eSpeakova brzina ne pada u međuvrijednost između brzina 99% i 100%. (#13876)

segment.source: Fix bug which allowed 2 Input Gestures dialogs to open. (#13854)
segment.target: Ispravljena je greška koja je dozvoljavala dva otvorena dijaloška okvira ulaznih gesti.. (#13854)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: Updated Comtypes to version 1.1.11. (#12953)
segment.target: Ažurirani Comtypes na verziju 1.1.11. (#12953)

segment.source: In builds of Windows Console (`conhost.exe`) with an NVDA API level of 2 (`FORMATTED`) or greater, such as those included with Windows 11 version 22H2 (Sun Valley 2), UI Automation is now used by default. (#10964)
segment.target: U verzijama Windows konzole ('conhost.exe') s NVDA API-jem razine 2 ('FORMATTED') ili većom, kao što su one uključene u Windows 11 verziju 22H2 (Sun Valley 2), automatizacija korisničkog sučelja sada se koristi prema zadanim postavkama. (#10964)

segment.source: This can be overridden by changing the "Windows Console support" setting in NVDA's advanced settings panel.
segment.target: To se može poništiti promjenom postavke "Podrška za Windows konzolu" na NVDA ploči naprednih postavki.

segment.source: To find your Windows Console's NVDA API level, set "Windows Console support" to "UIA when available", then check the NVDA+F1 log opened from a running Windows Console instance.
segment.target: Da biste pronašli razinu NVDA API-ja na Windows konzoli, postavite "Podrška za Windows konzolu" na "UIA kada je dostupna", a zatim provjerite NVDA+F1 dnevnik otvoren iz pokrenute instance Windows konzole.

segment.source: The Chromium virtual buffer is now loaded even when the document object has the MSAA `STATE_SYSTEM_BUSY` exposed via IA2. (#13306)
segment.target: Chromium virtualni međuspremnik sada se učitava čak i kada objekt dokumenta ima MSAA 'STATE_SYSTEM_BUSY' izložen putem IA2. (#13306)

segment.source: A config spec type `featureFlag` has been created for use with experimental features in NVDA. See `devDocs/featureFlag.md` for more information. (#13859)
segment.target: Kreiran je tip konfiguracijske specifikacije 'featureFlag' za korištenje s eksperimentalnim značajkama u NVDA. Pogledajte 'devDocs/featureFlag.md' za više informacija. (#13859)

segment.source: Deprecations
segment.target: Zastarjelosti

segment.source: There are no deprecations proposed in 2022.3.
segment.target: U 2022.3 nisu predložene zastarjelosti.

segment.source: This is a patch release to fix a security issue.
segment.target: Ovo je inačica koja ispravlja sigurnosnu ranjivost.

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravke grešaka

segment.source: Fixed an exploit where it was possible to open the NVDA python console via the log viewer on the lock screen.
segment.target: Ispravljena ranjivost putem koje je bilo moguće otvoriti Python konzolu preko pregledniak zapisnika na sigurnom zaslonu.

segment.source: ([GHSA-585m-rpvv-93qg](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-585m-rpvv-93qg))
segment.target: ([GHSA-585m-rpvv-93qg](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-585m-rpvv-93qg))

segment.source: This is a patch release to fix an accidental API breakage introduced in 2022.2.1.
segment.target: Ovo je verzija koja je izdana u svrhu ispravljanja nekompatibilnosti API sučelja do koje je došlo u inačici 2022.2.1.

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravke grešaka

segment.source: Fixed a bug where NVDA did not announce "Secure Desktop" when entering a secure desktop.
segment.target: Ispravljena greška zbog koje NVDA nije izgovarao "sigurni zaslon" prilikom ulaza u sigurnu radnu površinu.

segment.source: This caused NVDA remote to not recognize secure desktops. (#14094)
segment.target: Ovo je prouzrokovalo nemogućnost NVDA remote da prepoznaje sigurne radne površine. (#14094)

segment.source: This is a patch release to fix a bug introduced in 2022.2.1 with input gestures.
segment.target: Ovo je verzija sa zakrpom koja ispravlja grešku iz verzije 2022.2.1 sa ulaznim gestama.

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravke grešaka

segment.source: Fixed a bug where input gestures didn't always work. (#14065)
segment.target: Ispravljena greška sa ulaznim gestama koje nisu ispravno radile. (#14065)

segment.source: This is a minor release to fix a security issue.
segment.target: Ovo je mala verzija koja ispravlja sigurnosni propust.

segment.source: Please responsibly disclose security issues to <info@nvaccess.org>.
segment.target: Molimo odgovorno prijavljujte sigurnosne propuste na adresu <info@nvaccess.org>.

segment.source: Security Fixes
segment.target: Ispravke sigurnosnih propusta

segment.source: Fixed exploit where it was possible to run a python console from the lockscreen. (GHSA-rmq3-vvhq-gp32)
segment.target: Ispravljena ranjivost u kojoj je bilo moguće pokrenuti python konzolu sa zaključanog zaslona. (GHSA-rmq3-vvhq-gp32)

segment.source: Fixed exploit where it was possible to escape the lockscreen using object navigation. (GHSA-rmq3-vvhq-gp32)
segment.target: Ispravljena ranjivost pomoću koje je bilo moguće izaći iz zaključanog zaslona koristeći objektnu navigaciju. (GHSA-rmq3-vvhq-gp32)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: Deprecations
segment.target: Zastarjelosti

segment.source: These deprecations are currently not scheduled for removal.
segment.target: Uklanjanje ovih zastarjelih trenutačno nije zakazano.

segment.source: The deprecated aliases will remain until further notice.
segment.target: Zastarjeli aliasi ostat će do daljnjeg.

segment.source: Please test the new API and provide feedback.
segment.target: Testirajte novi API i pošaljite povratne informacije.

segment.source: For add-on authors, please open a GitHub issue if these changes stop the API from meeting your needs.
segment.target: Za autore dodataka, otvorite problem s GitHubom ako te promjene spriječe API da zadovolji vaše potrebe.

segment.source: `appModules.lockapp.LockAppObject` should be replaced with `NVDAObjects.lockscreen.LockScreenObject`. (GHSA-rmq3-vvhq-gp32)
segment.target: 'appModules.lockapp.LockAppObject' treba zamijeniti s 'NVDAObjects.lockscreen.LockScreenObject'. (GHSA-rmq3-vvhq-gp32)

segment.source: `appModules.lockapp.AppModule.SAFE_SCRIPTS` should be replaced with `utils.security.getSafeScripts()`. (GHSA-rmq3-vvhq-gp32)
segment.target: 'appModules.lockapp.AppModule.SAFE_SCRIPTS' treba zamijeniti s 'utils.security.getSafeScripts()'. (GHSA-rmq3-vvhq-gp32)

segment.source: This release includes many bug fixes.
segment.target: Ova inačica uključuje puno ispravaka grešaka.

segment.source: Notably, there are significant improvements for Java based applications, braille displays and Windows features.
segment.target: Prije svega, značajno je unapređena suradnja sa aplikacijama baziranim na java sučelju, brajičnim redcima i značajkama operacijskog sustava Windows.

segment.source: New table navigation commands have been introduced.
segment.target: Uvedeni su novi prečaci za kretanje po tablicama.

segment.source: Unicode CLDR has been updated.
segment.target: Unicode CLDR je nadograđen.

segment.source: LibLouis has been updated, which includes a new German braille table.
segment.target: LibLouis je nadograđen, sa novom dodanom njemačkom brajičnom tablicom.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove značajke

segment.source: Support for interacting with Microsoft Loop Components in Microsoft Office products. (#13617)
segment.target: Podrška za interakciju s Microsoft Loop komponentama u proizvodima Microsoft Officea. (#13617)

segment.source: New table navigation commands have been added. (#957)
segment.target: Dodane su nove naredbe za navigaciju u tablicama. (#957)

segment.source: `control+alt+home/end` to jump to first/last column.
segment.target: `control+alt+home/end` za skakanje na prvi/zadnji stupac.

segment.source: `control+alt+pageUp/pageDown` to jump to first/last row.
segment.target: `control+alt+pageUp/pageDown` za skakanje na prvi/zadnji redak.

segment.source: An unassigned script to cycle through language and dialect switching modes has been added. (#10253)
segment.target: Dodana je nedodijeljena skripta za mijenjanje jezika i dijalekta. (#10253)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Izmjene

segment.source: NSIS has been updated to version 3.08. (#9134)
segment.target: NSIS je nadograđen na verziju 3.08. (#9134)

segment.source: CLDR has been updated to version 41.0. (#13582)
segment.target: CLDR je nadograđen na verziju 41.0. (#13582)

segment.source: Updated LibLouis braille translator to [3.22.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.22.0). (#13775)
segment.target: Nadograđen LibLouis brajični prevoditelj na verziju [3.22.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.22.0). (#13775)

segment.source: New braille table: German grade 2 (detailed)
segment.target: Nova brajična tablica: Njemački kratkopis (eksperimentalan)

segment.source: Added new role for "busy indicator" controls. (#10644)
segment.target: • Dodana je nova uloga za kontrole "indikatora zauzetosti". (#10644)

segment.source: NVDA now announces when an NVDA action cannot be performed. (#13500)
segment.target: NVDA sada najavljuje kad se NVDA radnja ne može izvesti. (#13500)

segment.source: This includes when:
segment.target: Ovo uključuje sljedeće:

segment.source: Using the NVDA Windows Store version.
segment.target: kad se koristi NVDA Windows Store verzija.

segment.source: In a secure context.
segment.target: kad se računalo nalazi na sigurnom zaslonu.

segment.source: Waiting for a response to a modal dialog.
segment.target: kad se čeka na odgovor u modalnom dijaloškom okviru. - - -

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravke grešaka

segment.source: Fixes for Java based applications:
segment.target: Ispravke za aplikacije napisane u java programskom jeziku:

segment.source: NVDA will now announce read-only state. (#13692)
segment.target: NVDAće sada izgovarati status samo za čitanje. (#13692)

segment.source: NVDA will now announce disabled/enabled state correctly. (#10993)
segment.target: NVDA će sada ispravno izgovarati stanje uključenosti/isključenosti. (#10993)

segment.source: NVDA will now announce function key shortcuts. (#13643)
segment.target: NVDA će sada izgovarati prečace funkcijskih tipki. (#13643)

segment.source: NVDA can now beep or speak on progress bars. (#13594)
segment.target: NVDA sada može reproducirati zvučne signale ili izgovarati trake napredka. (#13594)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer incorrectly remove text from widgets when presenting to the user. (#13102)
segment.target: NVDA više neće neispravno uklanjati tekst sa widgeta kada se isti prikazuje korisniku. (#13102)

segment.source: NVDA will now announce the state of toggle buttons. (#9728)
segment.target: NVDA će sada izgovarati stanje preklopnih gumbi. (#9728)

segment.source: NVDA will now identify the window in a Java application with multiple windows. (#9184)
segment.target: NVDA će sada prepoznavati prozore u java aplikacijama sa više prozora. (#9184)

segment.source: NVDA will now announce position information for tab controls. (#13744)
segment.target: NVDA će sada izgovarati informacije o poziciji za kontrole kartica. (#13744)

segment.source: Braille fixes:
segment.target: Ispravke brajice:

segment.source: Fix braille output when navigating certain text in Mozilla rich edit controls, such as drafting a message in Thunderbird. (#12542)
segment.target: Ispravljen brajični izlaz u mozillinim kontrolama obogaćenog teksta, kao što je to skiciranje poruka u Mozilla thunderbirdu. (#12542)

segment.source: When braille is tethered automatically and the mouse is moved with mouse tracking enabled,
segment.target: Kada je brajica povezana automatski a miš se kreće s uključenim praćenjem miša,

segment.source: text review commands now update the braille display with the spoken content. (#11519)
segment.target: brajični će redak biti obnovljen. (#11519)

segment.source: It is now possible to pan the braille display through content after use of text review commands. (#8682)
segment.target: Sada je moguće pomicati brajični redak po sadržaju poslije korištenja prečaca pregleda teksta. (#8682)

segment.source: The NVDA installer can now run from directories with special characters. (#13270)
segment.target: • NVDA instalacijski program se sada može pokrenuti iz direktorija s posebnim znakovima. (#13270)

segment.source: In Firefox, NVDA no longer fails to report items in web pages when aria-rowindex, aria-colindex, aria-rowcount or aria-colcount attributes are invalid. (#13405)
segment.target: U Firefoxu, NVDA sada uspijeva prijaviti stavke na web stranicama kad su atributi aria-rowindex, aria-colindex, aria-rowcount ili aria-colcount nevažeći. (#13405)

segment.source: The cursor does not switch row or column anymore when using table navigation to navigate through merged cells. (#7278)
segment.target: Kursor više ne mijenja redak ili stupac kad se koristi tablična navigacija za kretanje kroz spojene ćelije. (#7278)

segment.source: When reading non-interactive PDFs in Adobe Reader, the type and state of form fields (such as checkboxes and radio buttons) are now reported. (#13285)
segment.target: Prilikom čitanja neinteraktivnih PDF-ova u Adobe Readeru, sada se izvještavaju vrsta i stanje polja obrasca (kao što su potvrdni okviri i izborni gumbi). (#13285)

segment.source: "Reset configuration to factory defaults" is now accessible in the NVDA menu during secure mode. (#13547)
segment.target: "Resetiraj konfiguraciju na tvorničke vrijednosti" sada je dostupno u NVDA izborniku tijekom sigurnog načina rada. (#13547)

segment.source: Any locked mouse keys will be unlocked when NVDA exits, previously the mouse button would remain locked. (#13410)
segment.target: Sve zaključane tipke miša otključat će se kad se NVDA čitač zatvori. Prije je tipka miša ostala zaključana. (#13410)

segment.source: Visual Studio now reports line numbers. (#13604)
segment.target: Visual Studio sada izvještava o brojevima redaka. (#13604)

segment.source: Note that for line number reporting to work, showing line numbers must be enabled in Visual Studio and NVDA.
segment.target: Da bi izvještavanje o brojevima redaka funkcioniralo, prikazivanje brojeva redaka mora biti aktivirano u Visual Studiju i NVDA-u.

segment.source: Visual Studio now correctly reports line indentation. (#13574)
segment.target: Visual Studio sada ispravno izvještava o uvlačenju retka. (#13574)

segment.source: NVDA will once again announce Start menu search result details in recent Windows 10 and 11 releases. (#13544)
segment.target: NVDA će još jednom najaviti detalje rezultata pretraživanja izbornika Start u nedavnim izdanjima sustava Windows 10 i 11. (#13544)

segment.source: In Windows 10 and 11 Calculator version 10.1908 and later,
segment.target: U kalkulatoru u Windowsima 10 u inačici 10.1908 i novijim,

segment.source: NVDA will announce results when more commands are pressed, such as commands from scientific mode. (#13383)
segment.target: NVDA će izgovarati rezultate za više pritisnutih naredbi, poput naredaba iz znanstvenog načina. (#13383)

segment.source: In Windows 11, it is again possible to navigate and interact with user interface elements,
segment.target: U Windowsima 11, sada je opet moguće kretanje i interakcija s elementima korisničkog sučelja ,

segment.source: such as Taskbar and Task View using mouse and touch interaction. (#13506)
segment.target: poput trake zadataka i pregleda zadataka uz pomoć miša i dodirnika. (#13506)

segment.source: NVDA will announce status bar content in Windows 11 Notepad. (#13688)
segment.target: NVDA će sada čitati traku stanja u Windows 11 bloku za pisanje. (#13688)

segment.source: Navigator object highlighting now shows up immediately upon activation of the feature. (#13641)
segment.target: Označavanje objekta navigatora pokazuje se trenutno poslije aktivacije značajke. (#13641)

segment.source: Fix reading single column list view items. (#13659, #13735)
segment.target: Ispravljeno čitanje jednostupčastih popisa. (#13659, #13735)

segment.source: Fix eSpeak automatic language switching for English and French falling back to British English and French (France). (#13727)
segment.target: Ispravljeno automatsko prebacivanje jezika prilikom korištenja Espeaka za engleski i francuski vraćajući se na britanski engleski i francuski (Francuska). (#13727)

segment.source: Fix OneCore automatic language switching when trying to switch to a formerly installed language. (#13732)
segment.target: Ispravljeno OneCore automatsko prepoznavanje jezika prilikom pokušaja prebacivanja na jezik koji je bio prije instaliran. (#13732)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: Compiling NVDA dependencies with Visual Studio 2022 (17.0) is now supported.
segment.target: Sada je podržano kompajliranje NVDA ovisnosti sa Visual Studio 2022 (17.0).

segment.source: For development and release builds, Visual Studio 2019 is still used. (#13033)
segment.target: Za razvojne i izdane međuverzije i dalje se koristi Visual Studio 2019. (#13033)

segment.source: When retrieving the count of selected children via accSelection,
segment.target: Prilikom dohvaćanja broja odabrane djece putem accSelectiona,

segment.source: the case where a negative child ID or an IDispatch is returned by `IAccessible::get_accSelection` is now handled properly. (#13277)
segment.target: slučaj u kojem je negativan ID djeteta ili IDispatch vraćen putem 'IAccessible::get_accSelection' sada se ispravno obrađuje. (#13277)

segment.source: New convenience functions `registerExecutableWithAppModule` and `unregisterExecutable` were added to the `appModuleHandler` module.
segment.target: Nove praktične funkcije 'registerExecutableWithAppModule' i 'unregisterExecutable' dodane su modulu 'appModuleHandler'.

segment.source: They can be used to use a single App Module with multiple executables. (#13366)
segment.target: Mogu se koristiti za korištenje jednog modula aplikacije s više izvršnih datoteka. (#13366)

segment.source: Deprecations
segment.target: Zastarjelosti

segment.source: These are proposed API breaking changes.
segment.target: Ovo su predložene promjene API-ja.

segment.source: The deprecated part of the API will continue to be available until the specified release.
segment.target: Zastarjeli dio API-ja i dalje će biti dostupan do navedenog izdanja.

segment.source: If no release is specified, the plan for removal has not been determined.
segment.target: Ako nije navedeno puštanje, plan uklanjanja nije određen.

segment.source: Note, the roadmap for removals is 'best effort' and may be subject to change.
segment.target: Imajte na umu da je plan za uklanjanje "najbolji napor" i može biti podložan promjenama.

segment.source: Please test the new API and provide feedback.
segment.target: Testirajte novi API i pošaljite povratne informacije.

segment.source: For add-on authors, please open a GitHub issue if these changes stop the API from meeting your needs.
segment.target: Za autore dodataka, otvorite problem s GitHubom ako te promjene spriječe API da zadovolji vaše potrebe.

segment.source: `appModuleHandler.NVDAProcessID` is deprecated, use `globalVars.appPid` instead. (#13646)
segment.target: 'appModuleHandler.NVDAProcessID' je zastario, umjesto toga koristite 'globalVars.appPid'. (#13646)

segment.source: `gui.quit` is deprecated, use `wx.CallAfter(mainFrame.onExitCommand, None)` instead. (#13498)
segment.target: 'gui.quit' je zastario, koristite 'wx. CallAfter(mainFrame.onExitCommand, None)' umjesto toga. (#13498)

segment.source: Some alias appModules are marked as deprecated.
segment.target: Neki aliasi appModules označeni su kao zastarjeli.

segment.source: Code which imports from one of them, should instead import from the replacement module. (#13366)
segment.target: Kod koji se uvozi iz jednog od njih, umjesto toga treba uvesti iz zamjenskog modula. (#13366)

segment.source: zendstudio |eclipse
segment.target: zendstudio |eclipse

segment.source: This release includes major improvements to UIA support with MS Office.
segment.target: Ova verzija uključuje veća poboljšanja za UIA podršku u paketu MS Office.

segment.source: For Microsoft Office 16.0.15000 and higher on Windows 11, NVDA will use UI Automation to access Microsoft Word documents by default.
segment.target: Za Microsoft Office 16.0.15000 i novije verzije na Windowsu 11, NVDA će podrazumevano koristiti UI Automation za pristup dokumentima programa Microsoft Word.

segment.source: This provides a significant performance improvement over the old Object model access.
segment.target: Ovo pruža značajno poboljšanje brzine u odnosu na stariji način pristupa.

segment.source: There are improvements to braille display drivers including Seika Notetaker, Papenmeier and HID Braille.
segment.target: Postoje poboljšanja za upravljačke programe za brajične redke kao što su Seika brajična bilježnica, Papenmeier i HID brajični standard.

segment.source: There are also various Windows 11 bug fixes, for apps such as Calculator, Console, Terminal, Mail and Emoji Panel.
segment.target: Takođe su uključene razne ispravke grešaka za Windows 11, u aplikacijama kao što su Kalkulator, naredbeni redak, Terminal, Mail i Emoji panel.

segment.source: eSpeak-NG and LibLouis have been updated, adding new Japanese, German and Catalan tables.
