segment.source: Highlighting of the focus, navigator object, and browse mode caret position can be enabled and configured via the 'vision' category in NVDA's settings dialog.
segment.target: Isticanje fokusa, objekta navigatora i položaja kursora u načinu pregledavanja može se omogućiti i konfigurirati putem kategorije 'vid' u NVDA dijaloškom okviru postavki.

segment.source: Note: This feature is incompatible with the focus highlight add-on, however, the add-on can still be used while the built-in highlighter is disabled.
segment.target: Napomena: Ova značajka nije kompatibilna s dodatkom za isticanje fokusa, međutim, dodatak se i dalje može koristiti dok je ugrađeni highlighter onemogućen.

segment.source: Added Braille Viewer tool, allows viewing braille output via an on-screen window. (#7788)
segment.target: Dodan alat za preglednik Brailleovog pisma, omogućuje pregled Brailleovog ispisa putem prozora na zaslonu. (#7788)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: The user guide now describes how to use NVDA in the Windows Console. (#9957)
segment.target: Korisnički priručnik sada opisuje kako koristiti NVDA u Windows konzoli. (#9957)

segment.source: Running nvda.exe now defaults to replacing an already running copy of NVDA. The -r|--replace command line parameter is still accepted, but ignored. (#8320)
segment.target: Pokretanje nvda.exe sada prema zadanim postavkama zamjenjuje već pokrenutu kopiju NVDA. Parametar naredbenog retka -r|--replace i dalje je prihvaćen, ali zanemaren. (#8320)

segment.source: On Windows 8 and later, NVDA will now report product name and version information for hosted apps such as apps downloaded from Microsoft Store using information provided by the app. (#4259, #10108)
segment.target: U sustavu Windows 8 i novijim verzijama, NVDA će sada izvještavati o nazivu proizvoda i informacijama o verzijama hostiranih aplikacija, kao što su aplikacije preuzete iz trgovine Microsoft Store, koristeći informacije koje pruža aplikacija. (#4259, #10108)

segment.source: When toggling track changes on and off with the keyboard in Microsoft Word, NVDA will announce the state of the setting. (#942)
segment.target: Prilikom uključivanja i isključivanja promjena zapisa pomoću tipkovnice u programu Microsoft Word, NVDA će objaviti stanje postavke. (#942)

segment.source: The NVDA version number is now logged as the first message in the log. This occurs even if logging has been disabled from the GUI. (#9803)
segment.target: Broj verzije NVDA sada je zabilježen kao prva poruka u dnevniku. To se događa čak i ako je zapisivanje onemogućeno iz GUI-ja. (#9803)

segment.source: The settings dialog no longer allows for changing the configured log level if it has been overridden from the command line. (#10209)
segment.target: Dijaloški okvir postavki više ne dopušta promjenu konfigurirane razine zapisnika ako je nadjačana iz naredbenog retka. (#10209)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word, NVDA now announces the display state of non printable characters when pressing the toggle shortcut Ctrl+Shift+8 . (#10241)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Word, NVDA sada objavljuje stanje prikaza znakova koji se ne mogu ispisati pritiskom na prečac Ctrl+Shift+8 . (#10241)

segment.source: Updated Liblouis braille translator to commit 58d67e63. (#10094)
segment.target: Ažuriran Liblouis prevoditelj brajice da izvrši 58d67e63. (#10094)

segment.source: When CLDR characters (including emojis) reporting is enabled, they are announced at all punctuation levels. (#8826)
segment.target: Kada je omogućeno izvještavanje CLDR znakova (uključujući emotikone), oni se najavljuju na svim razinama interpunkcije. (#8826)

segment.source: Third party python packages included in NVDA, such as comtypes, now log their warnings and errors to the NVDA log. (#10393)
segment.target: Python paketi trećih strana uključeni u NVDA, kao što su tipovi, sada bilježe svoja upozorenja i pogreške u NVDA dnevnik. (#10393)

segment.source: Updated Unicode Common Locale Data Repository emoji annotations to version 36.0. (#10426)
segment.target: Ažurirane napomene emojija Unicode Common Locale Data Repository na verziju 36.0. (#10426)

segment.source: When focussing a grouping in browse mode, the description is now also read. (#10095)
segment.target: Kada fokusirate grupiranje u načinu pregledavanja, sada se čita i opis. (#10095)

segment.source: The Java Access Bridge is now included with NVDA to enable access to Java applications, including for 64 bit Java VMs. (#7724)
segment.target: Java Access Bridge sada je uključen u NVDA kako bi omogućio pristup Java aplikacijama, uključujući 64-bitne Java VM-ove. (#7724)

segment.source: If the Java Access Bridge is not enabled for the user, NVDA automatically enables it at NVDA startup. (#7952)
segment.target: Ako Java Access Bridge nije omogućen za korisnika, NVDA ga automatski aktivira pri pokretanju NVDA-e. (#7952)

segment.source: Updated eSpeak-NG to 1.51-dev, commit ca65812ac6019926f2fbd7f12c92d7edd3701e0c. (#10581)
segment.target: Ažuriran eSpeak-NG na 1.51-dev, commit ca65812ac6019926f2fbd7f12c92d7edd3701e0c. (#10581)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci grešaka

segment.source: Emoji and other 32 bit unicode characters now take less space on a braille display when they are shown as hexadecimal values. (#6695)
segment.target: Emoji i drugi 32-bitni Unicode znakovi sada zauzimaju manje prostora na Brailleovom pismu kada su prikazani kao heksadecimalne vrijednosti. (#6695)

segment.source: In Windows 10, NVDA will announce tooltips from universal apps if NVDA is configured to report tooltips in object presentation dialog. (#8118)
segment.target: U sustavu Windows 10, NVDA će objaviti opise alata iz univerzalnih aplikacija ako je NVDA konfiguriran za izvještavanje o opisima alata u dijaloškom okviru prezentacije objekta. (#8118)

segment.source: On Windows 10 Anniversary Update and later, typed text is now reported in Mintty. (#1348)
segment.target: Na Windows 10 Anniversary Update i novijim verzijama, upisani tekst sada se prijavljuje u Minttyju. (#1348)

segment.source: On Windows 10 Anniversary Update and later, output in the Windows Console that appears close to the caret is no longer spelled out. (#513)
segment.target: Na Windows 10 Anniversary Update i novijim verzijama izlaz na Windows konzoli koji se pojavljuje blizu kursora više nije napisan. (#513)

segment.source: Controls in Audacitys compressor dialog are now announced when navigating the dialog. (#10103)
segment.target: Kontrole u dijaloškom okviru kompresora Audacitys sada se najavljuju prilikom navigacije dijaloškim okvirom. (#10103)

segment.source: NVDA no longer treats spaces as words in object review in Scintilla based editors such as Notepad++. (#8295)
segment.target: NVDA više ne tretira razmake kao riječi u pregledu objekata u uređivačima temeljenim na Scintilli kao što je Notepad++. (#8295)

segment.source: NVDA will prevent the system from entering sleep mode when scrolling through text with braille display gestures. (#9175)
segment.target: NVDA će spriječiti sustav da uđe u stanje mirovanja prilikom pomicanja teksta s gestama na Brailleovom pismu. (#9175)

segment.source: On Windows 10, braille will now follow when editing cell contents in Microsoft Excel and in other UIA text controls where it was lagging behind. (#9749)
segment.target: U sustavu Windows 10 brajica će sada slijediti prilikom uređivanja sadržaja ćelije u programu Microsoft Excel i u drugim kontrolama teksta UIA gdje je zaostajala. (#9749)

segment.source: NVDA will once again report suggestions in the Microsoft Edge address bar. (#7554)
segment.target: NVDA će još jednom prijaviti prijedloge u adresnoj traci Microsoft Edgea. (#7554)

segment.source: NVDA is no longer silent when focusing an HTML tab control header in Internet Explorer. (#8898)
segment.target: NVDA više ne šuti prilikom fokusiranja zaglavlja kontrole HTML kartice u Internet Exploreru. (#8898)

segment.source: In Microsoft Edge based on EdgeHTML, NVDA will no longer play search suggestion sound when the window becomes maximized. (#9110, #10002)
segment.target: U pregledniku Microsoft Edge koji se temelji na EdgeHTML-u, NVDA više neće reproducirati zvuk prijedloga za pretraživanje kada prozor postane maksimiziran. (#9110, #10002)

segment.source: ARIA 1.1 combo boxes are now supported in Mozilla Firefox and Google Chrome. (#9616)
segment.target: ARIA 1.1 kombinirani okviri sada su podržani u Mozilla Firefoxu i Google Chromeu. (#9616)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer report content of visually hidden columns for list items in SysListView32 controls. (#8268)
segment.target: NVDA više neće izvještavati o sadržaju vizualno skrivenih stupaca za stavke popisa u kontrolama SysListView32. (#8268)

segment.source: The settings dialog no longer shows "info" as the current log level when in secure mode. (#10209)
segment.target: Dijaloški okvir postavki više ne prikazuje "info" kao trenutnu razinu zapisnika u sigurnom načinu rada. (#10209)

segment.source: In Start menu for Windows 10 Anniversary Update and later, NVDA will announce details of search results. (#10340)
segment.target: U izborniku Start za Windows 10 Anniversary Update i novije, NVDA će objaviti detalje rezultata pretraživanja. (#10340)

segment.source: In browse mode, if moving the cursor or using quick navigation causes the document to change, NVDA no longer speaks incorrect content in some cases. (#8831, #10343)
segment.target: U načinu pregledavanja, ako pomicanje kursora ili korištenje brze navigacije uzrokuje promjenu dokumenta, NVDA više ne govori netočan sadržaj u nekim slučajevima. (#8831, #10343)

segment.source: Some bullet names in Microsoft Word have been corrected. (#10399)
segment.target: Ispravljeni su neki nazivi grafičkih oznaka u programu Microsoft Word. (#10399)

segment.source: In Windows 10 May 2019 Update and later, NVDA will once again announce first selected emoji or clipboard item when emoji panel and clipboard history opens, respectively. (#9204)
segment.target: U ažuriranju sustava Windows 10 za svibanj 2019. i novijima, NVDA će još jednom objaviti prvi odabrani emoji ili stavku međuspremnika kada se otvori ploča emojija i povijest međuspremnika. (#9204)

segment.source: In Poedit, it is once again possible to view some translations for right to left languages. (#9931)
segment.target: U Poeditu je ponovno moguće vidjeti neke prijevode za jezike zdesna nalijevo. (#9931)

segment.source: In the Settings app in Windows 10 April 2018 Update and later, NVDA will no longer announce progress bar information for volume meters found in the System/Sound page. (#10412)
segment.target: U aplikaciji Postavke u ažuriranju sustava Windows 10 za travanj 2018. i novijima, NVDA više neće objavljivati informacije o traci napretka za mjerače glasnoće koji se nalaze na stranici Sustav/zvuk. (#10412)

segment.source: Invalid regular expressions in speech dictionaries no longer completely break speech in NVDA. (#10334)
segment.target: Nevažeći regularni izrazi u govornim rječnicima više ne prekidaju u potpunosti govor u NVDA. (#10334)

segment.source: When reading bulleted items in Microsoft Word with UIA enabled, the bullet from the next list item is no longer inappropriately announced. (#9613)
segment.target: Prilikom čitanja stavki s grafičkim oznakama u programu Microsoft Word s omogućenim UIA-om, grafička oznaka sa sljedeće stavke popisa više se ne najavljuje neprimjereno. (#9613)

segment.source: Some rare braille translation issues and errors with liblouis have been resolved. (#9982)
segment.target: Riješeni su neki rijetki problemi s prijevodom Brailleovog pisma i pogreške s liblouisom. (#9982)

segment.source: Java applications started before NVDA are now accessible without the need to restart the Java app. (#10296)
segment.target: Java aplikacije pokrenute prije NVDA sada su dostupne bez potrebe za ponovnim pokretanjem Java aplikacije. (#10296)

segment.source: In Mozilla Firefox, when the focused element becomes marked as current (aria-current), this change is no longer spoken multiple times. (#8960)
segment.target: U pregledniku Mozilla Firefox, kada fokusirani element postane označen kao trenutni (aria-current), ta se promjena više puta ne izgovara. (#8960)

segment.source: NVDA will now treat certain composit unicode characters such as e-acute as one single character when moving through text. (#10550)
segment.target: NVDA će sada tretirati određene sastavljene Unicode znakove kao što je e-acute kao jedan znak prilikom kretanja kroz tekst. (#10550)

segment.source: Spring Tool Suite Version 4 is now supported. (#10001)
segment.target: Sada je podržan Spring Tool Suite verzije 4. (#10001)

segment.source: Don't double speak name when aria-labelledby relation target is an inner element. (#10552)
segment.target: Nemojte dvostruko izgovarati ime kada je arija-označena relacijskim ciljem unutarnji element. (#10552)

segment.source: On Windows 10 version 1607 and later, typed characters from Braille keyboards are spoken in more situations. (#10569)
segment.target: U sustavu Windows 10 verzije 1607 i novijim verzijama upisani znakovi s Brailleovih tipkovnica izgovaraju se u više situacija. (#10569)

segment.source: When changing the audio output device, tones played by NVDA will now play through the newly selected device. (#2167)
segment.target: Prilikom promjene audio izlaznog uređaja, tonovi koje reproducira NVDA sada će se reproducirati putem novoodabranog uređaja. (#2167)

segment.source: In Mozilla Firefox, moving focus in browse mode is faster. This makes moving the cursor in browse mode more responsive in many cases. (#10584)
segment.target: U pregledniku Mozilla Firefox, pomicanje fokusa u načinu pregledavanja je brže. To u mnogim slučajevima čini pomicanje kursora u načinu pregledavanja responzivnijim. (#10584)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: Updated Python to 3.7. (#7105)
segment.target: Ažuriran Python na 3.7. (#7105)

segment.source: Updated pySerial to version 3.4. (#8815)
segment.target: Ažuriran pySerial na verziju 3.4. (#8815)

segment.source: Updated wxPython to 4.0.3 to support Python 3.5 and later. (#9630)
segment.target: Ažuriran wxPython na 4.0.3 kako bi podržao Python 3.5 i novije verzije. (#9630)

segment.source: Updated six to version 1.12.0. (#9630)
segment.target: Ažurirano šest na verziju 1.12.0. (#9630)

segment.source: Updated py2exe to version 0.9.3.2 (in development, commit b372a8e from albertosottile/py2exe#13). (#9856)
segment.target: Ažuriran py2exe na verziju 0.9.3.2 (u razvoju, commit b372a8e iz albertosottile/py2exe#13). (#9856)

segment.source: Updated UIAutomationCore.dll comtypes module to version 10.0.18362. (#9829)
segment.target: Ažuriran UIAutomationCore.dll modul comtipova na verziju 10.0.18362. (#9829)

segment.source: The tab-completion in the Python console only suggests attributes starting with an underscore if the underscore is first typed. (#9918)
segment.target: Dovršavanje tabulatora u Python konzoli samo predlaže atribute koji počinju s podvlakom ako je podvlaka prvo upisana. (#9918)

segment.source: Flake8 linting tool has been integrated with SCons reflecting code requirements for Pull Requests. (#5918)
segment.target: Alat za linting Flake8 integriran je sa SConima koji odražavaju zahtjeve koda za zahtjeve za povlačenje. (#5918)

segment.source: As NVDA no longer depends on pyWin32, modules such as win32api and win32con are no longer available to add-ons. (#9639)
segment.target: Budući da NVDA više ne ovisi o pyWin32, moduli kao što su win32api i win32con više nisu dostupni za dodatke. (#9639)

segment.source: win32api calls can be replaced with direct calls to win32 dll functions via ctypes.
segment.target: Win32API pozivi mogu se zamijeniti izravnim pozivima na Win32 DLL funkcije putem ctypesa.

segment.source: win32con constants should be defined in your files.
segment.target: Win32con konstante trebaju biti definirane u vašim datotekama.

segment.source: The "async" argument in nvwave.playWaveFile has been renamed to "asynchronous". (#8607)
segment.target: Argument "async" u nvwave.playWaveFile preimenovan je u "asinkroni". (#8607)

segment.source: speakText and speakCharacter methods on synthDriver objects are no longer supported.
segment.target: metode speakText i speakCharacter na objektima synthDriver više nisu podržane.

segment.source: This functionality is handled by SynthDriver.speak.
segment.target: Ovom funkcionalnošću upravlja SynthDriver.speak.

segment.source: SynthSetting classes in synthDriverHandler have been removed. Now use driverHandler.DriverSetting classes instead.
segment.target: SynthSetting klase u synthDriverHandleru su uklonjene. Sada umjesto toga koristite klase driverHandler.DriverSetting.

segment.source: SynthDriver classes should no longer expose index via the lastIndex property.
segment.target: Klase SynthDriver više ne bi trebale izlagati indeks putem svojstva lastIndex.

segment.source: Instead, they should notify the synthDriverHandler.synthIndexReached action with the index, once all previous audio has finished playing before that index.
segment.target: Umjesto toga, trebali bi obavijestiti radnju synthDriverHandler.synthIndexReached s indeksom, nakon što se sav prethodni zvuk završi s reprodukcijom prije tog indeksa.

segment.source: SynthDriver classes must now notify the synthDriverHandler.synthDoneSpeaking action, once all audio from a SynthDriver.speak call has completed playing.
segment.target: Klase SynthDriver sada moraju obavijestiti radnju synthDriverHandler.synthDoneSpeaking nakon što se sav zvuk iz poziva SynthDriver.speak završi reprodukcija.

segment.source: SynthDriver classes must support the speech.PitchCommand in their speak method, as changes in pitch for speak spelling now depends on this functionality.
segment.target: Klase SynthDrivera moraju podržavati govor. PitchCommand u svojoj metodi govora, jer promjene u visini tona za pravopis govora sada ovise o ovoj funkcionalnosti.

segment.source: The speech function getSpeechTextForProperties has been renamed to getPropertiesSpeech. (#10098)
segment.target: Govorna funkcija getSpeechTextForProperties preimenovana je u getPropertiesSpeech. (#10098)

segment.source: The braille function getBrailleTextForProperties has been renamed to getPropertiesBraille. (#10469)
segment.target: Brajicova funkcija getBrailleTextForProperties preimenovana je u getPropertiesBraille. (#10469)

segment.source: Several speech functions have been changed to return speech sequences. (#10098)
segment.target: Nekoliko govornih funkcija promijenjeno je kako bi se vratili govorni slijedovi. (#10098)

segment.source: getControlFieldSpeech
segment.target: getControlFieldSpeech

segment.source: getFormatFieldSpeech
segment.target: getFormatFieldSpeech

segment.source: getSpeechTextForProperties now called getPropertiesSpeech
segment.target: getSpeechTextForProperties sada se naziva getPropertiesSpeech

segment.source: getIndentationSpeech
segment.target: getIndentationSpeech

segment.source: getTableInfoSpeech
segment.target: getTableInfoSpeech

segment.source: Added a textUtils module to simplify string differences between Python 3 strings and Windows unicode strings. (#9545)
segment.target: Dodan je modul textUtils za pojednostavljenje razlika u nizovima između nizova Python 3 i Windows unicode nizova. (#9545)

segment.source: See the module documentation and textInfos.offsets module for example implementations.
segment.target: Pogledajte dokumentaciju modula i modul textInfos.offsets za primjere implementacija.

segment.source: Deprecated functionality now removed. (#9548)
segment.target: Zastarjela funkcionalnost sada je uklonjena. (#9548)

segment.source: AppModules removed:
segment.target: Uklonjeni AppModules:

segment.source: Windows XP sound recorder.
segment.target: Snimač zvuka u sustavu Windows XP.

segment.source: Klango Player, which is abandoned software.
segment.target: Klango Player, koji je napušteni softver.

segment.source: configobj.validate wrapper removed.
segment.target: configobj.validate omot uklonjen.

segment.source: New code should use from configobj import validate instead of import validate
segment.target: Novi kod trebao bi koristiti iz configobj import validate umjesto import validate

segment.source: textInfos.Point and textInfos.Rect replaced by locationHelper.Point and locationHelper.RectLTRB respectively.
segment.target: textInfos.Point i textInfos.Rect zamijenjeni su s locationHelper.Point i locationHelper.RectLTRB.

segment.source: braille.BrailleHandler._get_tether and braille.BrailleHandler.set_tether have been removed.
segment.target: Brailleovo pismo. BrailleHandler._get_tether i Brailleovo pismo. BrailleHandler.set_tether su uklonjeni.

segment.source: config.getConfigDirs has been removed.
segment.target: config.getConfigDirs je uklonjen.

segment.source: config.ConfigManager.getConfigValidationParameter has been replaced by getConfigValidation
segment.target: konfiguracija. ConfigManager.getConfigValidationParameter zamijenjen je s getConfigValidation

segment.source: inputCore.InputGesture.logIdentifier property has been removed.
segment.target: inputCore.InputGesture.logIdentifier svojstvo je uklonjeno.

segment.source: Use _get_identifiers in inputCore.InputGesture instead.
segment.target: Umjesto toga koristite _get_identifiers u inputCore.InputGesture.

segment.source: synthDriverHandler.SynthDriver.speakText/speakCharacter have been removed.
segment.target: synthDriverHandler.SynthDriver.speakText/speakCharacter su uklonjeni.

segment.source: Removed several synthDriverHandler.SynthSetting classes.
segment.target: Uklonjeno je nekoliko klasa synthDriverHandler.SynthSetting.

segment.source: Previously kept for backwards compatibility (#8214), now considered obsolete.
segment.target: Prethodno čuvano za kompatibilnost s prethodnim verzijama (#8214), sada se smatra zastarjelim.

segment.source: Drivers that used the SynthSetting classes should be updated to use the DriverSetting classes.
segment.target: Upravljačke programe koji su koristili klase SynthSetting treba ažurirati kako bi koristili klase DriverSetting.

segment.source: Some legacy code has been removed, particularly:
segment.target: Neki naslijeđeni kod su uklonjeni, posebno:

segment.source: Support for the Outlook pre 2003 message list.
segment.target: Podrška za popis poruka programa Outlook prije 2003.

segment.source: An overlay class for the classic start menu, only found in Windows Vista and earlier.
segment.target: Klasa preklapanja za klasični izbornik Start, koja se nalazi samo u sustavu Windows Vista i starijim verzijama.

segment.source: Dropped support for Skype 7, as it is definitely not working any more.
segment.target: Odbačena je podrška za Skype 7, jer definitivno više ne radi.

segment.source: Added a framework to create vision enhancement providers; modules that can change screen contents, optionally based on input from NVDA about object locations. (#9064)
segment.target: Dodan je okvir za stvaranje pružatelja usluga poboljšanja vida; moduli koji mogu mijenjati sadržaj zaslona, opcionalno na temelju NVDA podataka o lokacijama objekata. (#9064)

segment.source: Add-ons can bundle their own providers in a visionEnhancementProviders folder.
segment.target: Dodaci mogu objediniti vlastite davatelje usluga u mapu visionEnhancementProviders.

segment.source: See the vision and visionEnhancementProviders modules for the implementation of the framework and examples, respectively.
segment.target: Pogledajte module vision i visionEnhancementProviders za implementaciju okvira i primjere.

segment.source: Vision enhancement providers are enabled and configured via the 'vision' category in NVDA's settings dialog.
segment.target: Pružatelji usluga poboljšanja vida omogućeni su i konfigurirani putem kategorije 'vid' u NVDA dijaloškom okviru postavki.

segment.source: Abstract class properties are now supported on objects that inherit from baseObject.AutoPropertyObject (e.g. NVDAObjects and TextInfos). (#10102)
segment.target: Svojstva apstraktne klase sada su podržana na objektima koji nasljeđuju iz baseObject.AutoPropertyObject (npr. NVDAObjects i TextInfos). (#10102)

segment.source: Introduced displayModel.UNIT_DISPLAYCHUNK as a textInfos unit constant specific to DisplayModelTextInfo. (#10165)
segment.target: Uveden displayModel.UNIT_DISPLAYCHUNK kao konstanta jedinice textInfos specifična za DisplayModelTextInfo. (#10165)

segment.source: This new constant allows walking over the text in a DisplayModelTextInfo in a way that more closely resembles how the text chunks are saved in the underlying model.
segment.target: Ova nova konstanta omogućuje prelazak preko teksta u DisplayModelTextInfo na način koji više nalikuje načinu na koji se dijelovi teksta spremaju u temeljni model.

segment.source: displayModel.getCaretRect now returns an instance of locationHelper.RectLTRB. (#10233)
segment.target: displayModel.getCaretRect sada vraća instancu locationHelper.RectLTRB. (#10233)

segment.source: The UNIT_CONTROLFIELD and UNIT_FORMATFIELD constants have been moved from virtualBuffers.VirtualBufferTextInfo to the textInfos package. (#10396)
segment.target: Konstante UNIT_CONTROLFIELD i UNIT_FORMATFIELD premještene su iz virtualBuffers.VirtualBufferTextInfo u paket textInfos. (#10396)

segment.source: For every entry in the NVDA log, information about the originating thread is now included. (#10259)
segment.target: Za svaki unos u NVDA dnevnik sada su uključeni podaci o izvornoj niti. (#10259)

segment.source: UIA TextInfo objects can now be moved/expanded by the page, story and formatField text units. (#10396)
segment.target: UIA TextInfo objekti sada se mogu premještati/proširivati pomoću tekstualnih jedinica stranice, priče i formatField. (#10396)

segment.source: External modules (appModules and globalPlugins) are now less likely to be able to break the creation of NVDAObjects.
segment.target: Manje je vjerojatno da će vanjski moduli (appModules i globalPlugins) sada moći prekinuti stvaranje NVDAObjects.

segment.source: Exceptions caused by the "chooseNVDAObjectOverlayClasses" and "event_NVDAObject_init" methods are now properly caught and logged.
segment.target: Iznimke uzrokovane metodama "chooseNVDAObjectOverlayClasses" i "event_NVDAObject_init" sada su ispravno uhvaćene i zabilježene.

segment.source: The aria.htmlNodeNameToAriaLandmarkRoles dictionary has been renamed to aria.htmlNodeNameToAriaRoles. It now also contains roles that aren't landmarks.
segment.target: Rječnik aria.htmlNodeNameToAriaLandmarkRoles preimenovan je u aria.htmlNodeNameToAriaRoles. Sada sadrži i uloge koje nisu orijentir.

segment.source: scriptHandler.isCurrentScript has been removed due to lack of use. There is no replacement. (#8677)
segment.target: scriptHandler.isCurrentScript je uklonjen zbog nekorištenja. Nema zamjene. (#8677)

segment.source: This is a minor release to fix several crashes present in 2019.2. Fixes include:
segment.target: Ovo je manje izdanje za ispravljanje nekoliko rušenja prisutnih u 2019.2. Popravci uključuju:

segment.source: Addressed several crashes in Gmail seen in both Firefox and Chrome when interacting with particular popup menus such as when creating filters or changing certain Gmail settings. (#10175, #9402, #8924)
segment.target: Riješeno je nekoliko rušenja na Gmailu koja su se pojavila u Firefoxu i Chromeu prilikom interakcije s određenim skočnim izbornicima, kao što je stvaranje filtara ili promjena određenih postavki Gmaila. (#10175, #9402, #8924)

segment.source: In Windows 7, NVDA no longer causes Windows Explorer to crash when the mouse is used in the start menu. (#9435)
segment.target: U sustavu Windows 7 NVDA više ne uzrokuje rušenje Windows Explorera kada se miš koristi u izborniku Start. (#9435)

segment.source: Windows Explorer on Windows 7 no longer crashes when accessing metadata edit fields. (#5337)
segment.target: Windows Explorer u sustavu Windows 7 više se ne ruši prilikom pristupa poljima za uređivanje metapodataka. (#5337)

segment.source: NVDA no longer freezes when interacting with images with a base64 URI in Mozilla Firefox or Google Chrome. (#10227)
segment.target: NVDA se više ne zamrzava prilikom interakcije sa slikama s base64 URI-jem u Mozilla Firefoxu ili Google Chromeu. (#10227)

segment.source: Highlights of this release include auto detection of Freedom Scientific braille displays, an experimental setting in the Advanced panel to stop browse mode from automatically moving focus (which may provide performance improvements), a rate boost option for the Windows OneCore synthesizer to achieve very fast rates, and many other bug fixes.
segment.target: Istaknuti dijelovi ovog izdanja uključuju automatsko otkrivanje brajevih redaka Freedom Scientific, eksperimentalnu postavku na ploči Napredno za zaustavljanje automatskog pomicanja fokusa u načinu pregledavanja (što može pružiti poboljšanja performansi), opciju povećanja brzine za Windows OneCore sintisajzer za postizanje vrlo brzih brzina i mnoge druge ispravke grešaka.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove značajke

segment.source: NVDA's Miranda NG support works with newer versions of the client. (#9053)
segment.target: NVDA Miranda NG podrška radi s novijim verzijama klijenta. (#9053)

segment.source: You can now disable browse mode by default by disabling the new "Enable browse mode on page load" option in NVDA's browse mode settings. (#8716)
segment.target: Sada možete onemogućiti način pregledavanja prema zadanim postavkama tako da onemogućite novu opciju "Omogući način pregledavanja pri učitavanju stranice" u postavkama NVDA načina pregledavanja. (#8716)

segment.source: Note that when this option is disabled, you can still enable browse mode manually by pressing NVDA+space.
segment.target: Imajte na umu da kada je ova opcija onemogućena, i dalje možete ručno uključiti način pregledavanja pritiskom na NVDA+razmak.

segment.source: You can now filter symbols in the punctuation/symbol pronunciation dialog, similar to how filtering works in the elements list and input gestures dialog. (#5761)
segment.target: Sada možete filtrirati simbole u dijaloškom okviru za interpunkciju/izgovor simbola, slično kao što filtriranje funkcionira u dijaloškom okviru popisa elemenata i gesta unosa. (#5761)

segment.source: A command has been added to change the mouse text unit resolution (how much text will be spoken when the mouse moves), it has not been assigned a default gesture. (#9056)
segment.target: Dodana je naredba za promjenu razlučivosti jedinice teksta miša (koliko će se teksta izgovoriti kada se miš pomiče), nije joj dodijeljena zadana gesta. (#9056)

segment.source: The windows OneCore synthesizer now has a rate boost option, which allows for significantly faster speech. (#7498)
segment.target: Windows OneCore sintisajzer sada ima opciju povećanja brzine, što omogućuje znatno brži govor. (#7498)

segment.source: The Rate Boost option is now configurable from the Synth Settings Ring for supported speech synthesizers. (Currently eSpeak-NG and Windows OneCore). (#8934)
segment.target: Opcija Rate Boost sada se može konfigurirati iz Synth Settings Ring za podržane sintisajzere govora. (Trenutno eSpeak-NG i Windows OneCore). (#8934)

segment.source: Configuration profiles can now be manually activated with gestures. (#4209)
segment.target: Konfiguracijski profili sada se mogu ručno aktivirati gestama. (#4209)

segment.source: The gesture must be configured in the "Input gestures" dialog.
segment.target: Gesta mora biti konfigurirana u dijaloškom okviru "Ulazne geste".

segment.source: In Eclipse, added support for autocompletion in code editor. (#5667)
segment.target: U Eclipseu je dodana podrška za automatsko dovršavanje u uređivaču koda. (#5667)

segment.source: Additionally, Javadoc information can be read from the editor when it is present by using NVDA+d.
segment.target: Osim toga, Javadoc informacije mogu se čitati iz uređivača kada su prisutne pomoću NVDA+d.

segment.source: Added an experimental option to the Advanced Settings panel that allows you to stop the system focus from following the browse mode cursor (Automatically set system focus to focusable elements). (#2039) Although this may not be suitable to turn off for all websites, this may fix:
segment.target: Dodana je eksperimentalna opcija na ploču Napredne postavke koja vam omogućuje da zaustavite fokus sustava da slijedi kursor načina pregledavanja (Automatski postavite fokus sustava na elemente koji se mogu fokusirati). (#2039) Iako ovo možda nije prikladno za isključivanje za sve web stranice, ovo može riješiti:

segment.source: Rubber band effect: NVDA sporadically undoes the last browse mode keystroke by jumping to the previous location.
segment.target: Efekt gumene trake: NVDA sporadično poništava zadnji pritisak na tipku u načinu pregledavanja skokom na prethodnu lokaciju.

segment.source: Edit boxes steal system focus when arrowing down through them on some websites.
segment.target: Okviri za uređivanje kradu fokus sustava kada se strelice provlače kroz njih na nekim web stranicama.

segment.source: Browse mode keystrokes are slow to respond.
segment.target: Pritisci tipki u načinu pregledavanja sporo reagiraju.

segment.source: For braille display drivers that support it, driver settings can now be changed from the braille settings category in NVDA's settings dialog. (#7452)
segment.target: Za upravljačke programe Brailleovog pisma koji ga podržavaju, postavke upravljačkog programa sada se mogu promijeniti iz kategorije postavki brajice u NVDA dijaloškom okviru postavki. (#7452)

segment.source: Freedom Scientific braille displays are now supported by braille display auto detection. (#7727)
segment.target: Freedom Scientific Brailleovi zasloni sada su podržani automatskim otkrivanjem brajice. (#7727)

segment.source: Added a command to show the replacement for the symbol under the review cursor. (#9286)
segment.target: Dodana je naredba za prikaz zamjene za simbol ispod kursora za pregled. (#9286)

segment.source: Added an experimental option to the Advanced Settings panel that allows you to try out a new, work-in-progress rewrite of NVDA's Windows Console support using the Microsoft UI Automation API. (#9614)
segment.target: Dodana je eksperimentalna opcija na ploču Napredne postavke koja vam omogućuje da isprobate novo prepisivanje NVDA-ine podrške za Windows konzolu pomoću Microsoftovog API-ja za automatizaciju korisničkog sučelja. (#9614)

segment.source: In the Python Console, the input field now supports pasting multiple lines from the clipboard. (#9776)
segment.target: U Python konzoli, polje za unos sada podržava lijepljenje više redaka iz međuspremnika. (#9776)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: Synthesizer volume is now increased and decreased by 5 instead of 10 when using the settings ring. (#6754)
segment.target: Glasnoća sintisajzera sada je povećana i smanjena za 5 umjesto 10 kada koristite prsten postavki. (#6754)

segment.source: Clarified the text in the add-on manager when NVDA is launched with the --disable-addons flag. (#9473)
segment.target: Pojašnjen je tekst u upravitelju dodataka kada se NVDA pokrene sa zastavicom --disable-addons. (#9473)

segment.source: Updated Unicode Common Locale Data Repository emoji annotations to version 35.0. (#9445)
segment.target: Ažurirane napomene emojija Unicode Common Locale Data Repository na verziju 35.0. (#9445)

segment.source: The hotkey for the filter field in the elements list in browse mode has changed to alt+y. (#8728)
segment.target: Prečac za polje filtra na popisu elemenata u načinu pregledavanja promijenjen je u alt+y. (#8728)

segment.source: When an auto detected braille display is connected via Bluetooth, NVDA will keep searching for USB displays supported by the same driver and switch to a USB connection if it becomes available. (#8853)
segment.target: Kada je automatski detektirani Brailleov zaslon spojen putem Bluetootha, NVDA će nastaviti tražiti USB zaslone koje podržava isti upravljački program i prebaciti se na USB vezu ako postane dostupna. (#8853)

segment.source: Updated eSpeak-NG to commit 67324cc.
segment.target: Ažuriran eSpeak-NG da commit 67324cc.

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to version 3.10.0. (#9439, #9678)
segment.target: Ažuriran prevoditelj brajice liblouis na verziju 3.10.0. (#9439, #9678)

segment.source: NVDA will now report the word 'selected' after reporting the text a user has just selected.(#9028, #9909)
segment.target: NVDA će sada prijaviti riječ 'odabrano' nakon što prijavi tekst koji je korisnik upravo odabrao. (#9028, #9909)

segment.source: In Microsoft Visual Studio Code, NVDA is in focus mode by default. (#9828)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Visual Studio Code, NVDA je prema zadanim postavkama u fokusnom načinu rada. (#9828)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci grešaka

segment.source: NVDA no longer crashes when an add-on directory is empty. (#7686)
segment.target: NVDA se više ne ruši kada je direktorij dodataka prazan. (#7686)

segment.source: LTR and RTL marks are no longer reported in Braille or per-character speech when accessing the properties window. (#8361)
segment.target: Oznake LTR i RTL više se ne prijavljuju na Brailleovom pismu ili govoru po znaku prilikom pristupa prozoru svojstava. (#8361)

segment.source: When jumping to form fields with Browse Mode quick navigation, the entire form field is now announced rather than just the first line. (#9388)
segment.target: Kada prelazite na polja obrasca s brzom navigacijom u načinu pregledavanja, sada se najavljuje cijelo polje obrasca, a ne samo prvi redak. (#9388)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer become silent after exiting the Windows 10 Mail app. (#9341)
segment.target: NVDA više neće utihnuti nakon izlaska iz aplikacije Windows 10 Mail. (#9341)

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to start when the users regional settings are set to a locale unknown to NVDA, such as English (Netherlands). (#8726)
segment.target: NVDA se više ne pokreće kada su korisničke regionalne postavke postavljene na regionalnu shemu nepoznatu NVDA-u, kao što je engleski (Nizozemska). (#8726)

segment.source: When browse mode is enabled in Microsoft Excel and you switch to a browser in focus mode or vice versa, browse mode state is now reported appropriately. (#8846)
segment.target: Kada je način pregledavanja omogućen u programu Microsoft Excel i prebacite se na preglednik u načinu rada fokusa ili obrnuto, stanje načina pregledavanja sada se prijavljuje na odgovarajući način. (#8846)

segment.source: NVDA now properly reports the line at the mouse cursor in Notepad++ and other Scintilla based editors. (#5450)
segment.target: NVDA sada ispravno izvještava o liniji na kursoru miša u Notepad++ i drugim uređivačima koji se temelje na Scintilli. (#5450)

segment.source: In Google Docs (and other web-based editors), braille no longer sometimes incorrectly shows "lst end" before the cursor in the middle of a list item. (#9477)
segment.target: U Google dokumentima (i drugim uređivačima na webu) Brailleovo pismo više ponekad ne prikazuje pogrešno "lst end" ispred pokazivača u sredini stavke popisa. (#9477)

segment.source: In the Windows 10 May 2019 Update, NVDA no longer speaks many volume notifications if changing the volume with hardware buttons when File Explorer has focus. (#9466)
segment.target: U ažuriranju sustava Windows 10 za svibanj 2019., NVDA više ne izgovara mnogo obavijesti o glasnoći ako mijenjate glasnoću hardverskim gumbima kada je File Explorer u fokusu. (#9466)

segment.source: Loading the punctuation/symbol pronunciation dialog is now much faster when using symbol dictionaries containing over 1000 entries. (#8790)
segment.target: Učitavanje dijaloškog okvira za interpunkciju/izgovor simbola sada je mnogo brže kada se koriste rječnici simbola koji sadrže više od 1000 unosa. (#8790)

segment.source: In Scintilla controls such as Notepad++, NVDA can read the correct line when wordwrap is enabled. (#9424)
segment.target: U Scintilla kontrolama kao što je Notepad++, NVDA može pročitati ispravan redak kada je omogućeno prelamanje riječi. (#9424)

segment.source: In Microsoft Excel, the cell location is announced after it changes due to the shift+enter or shift+numpadEnter gestures. (#9499)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Excel lokacija ćelije se objavljuje nakon što se promijeni zbog gesta shift+enter ili shift+numpadEnter. (#9499)

segment.source: In Visual Studio 2017 and up, in the Objects Explorer window, the selected item in objects tree or members tree with categories is now reported correctly. (#9311)
segment.target: U programu Visual Studio 2017 i novijim verzijama, u prozoru Istraživač objekata, odabrana stavka u stablu objekata ili stablu članova s kategorijama sada se ispravno prijavljuje. (#9311)

segment.source: Add-ons with names that only differ in capitalization are no longer treated as separate add-ons. (#9334)
segment.target: Dodaci s nazivima koji se razlikuju samo u velikim slovima više se ne tretiraju kao zasebni dodaci. (#9334)

segment.source: For Windows OneCore voices, the rate set in NVDA is no longer affected by the rate set in Windows 10 Speech Settings. (#7498)
segment.target: Za Windows OneCore glasove na brzinu postavljenu u NVDA više ne utječe brzina postavljena u postavkama govora sustava Windows 10. (#7498)

segment.source: The log can now be opened with NVDA+F1 when there is no developer info for the current navigator object. (#8613)
segment.target: Dnevnik se sada može otvoriti pomoću NVDA+F1 kada nema podataka za razvojne programere za trenutni objekt navigatora. (#8613)

segment.source: It is again possible to use NVDA's table navigation commands in Google Docs, in Firefox and Chrome. (#9494)
segment.target: Ponovno je moguće koristiti NVDA naredbe za navigaciju tablicom u Google dokumentima, Firefoxu i Chromeu. (#9494)

segment.source: The bumper keys now work correctly on Freedom Scientific braille displays. (#8849)
segment.target: Tipke na braniku sada ispravno rade na Brailleovim pismima Freedom Scientific. (#8849)

segment.source: When reading the first character of a document in Notepad++ 7.7 X64, NVDA no longer freezes for up to ten seconds. (#9609)
segment.target: Prilikom čitanja prvog znaka dokumenta u Notepad++ 7.7 X64, NVDA se više ne zamrzava do deset sekundi. (#9609)

segment.source: HTCom can now be used with a Handy Tech Braille display in combination with NVDA. (#9691)
segment.target: HTCom se sada može koristiti s Handy Tech Brailleovim pismom u kombinaciji s NVDA. (#9691)

segment.source: In Mozilla Firefox, updates to a live region are no longer reported if the live region is in a background tab. (#1318)
segment.target: U pregledniku Mozilla Firefox, ažuriranja aktivne regije više se ne prijavljuju ako je aktivna regija na kartici pozadine. (#1318)

segment.source: NVDA's browse mode Find dialog no longer fails to function if NVDA's About dialog is currently open in the background. (#8566)
segment.target: NVDA-ov dijaloški okvir Pronađi način pregledavanja više ne funkcionira ako je NVDA-in dijaloški okvir O nama trenutno otvoren u pozadini. (#8566)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: You can now set the "disableBrowseModeByDefault" property on app modules to leave browse mode off by default. (#8846)
segment.target: Sada možete postaviti svojstvo "disableBrowseModeByDefault" na modulima aplikacije tako da način pregledavanja ostane isključen prema zadanim postavkama. (#8846)

segment.source: The extended window style of a window is now exposed using the `extendedWindowStyle` property on Window objects and their derivatives. (#9136)
segment.target: Prošireni stil prozora prozora sada je izložen pomoću svojstva 'extendedWindowStyle' na objektima prozora i njihovim izvedenicama. (#9136)

segment.source: Updated comtypes package to 1.1.7. (#9440, #8522)
segment.target: Ažuriran paket komtipova na 1.1.7. (#9440, #8522)

segment.source: When using the report module info command, the order of information has changed to present the module first. (#7338)
segment.target: Kada koristite naredbu info modula izvješća, redoslijed informacija promijenio se kako bi se modul prvi prikazao. (#7338)

segment.source: Added an example to demonstrate using nvdaControllerClient.dll from C#. (#9600)
segment.target: Dodan je primjer za demonstraciju korištenja nvdaControllerClient.dll iz C#. (#9600)

segment.source: Added a new isWin10 function to the winVersion module which returns whether or not this copy of NVDA is running on (at least) the supplied release version of Windows 10 (such as 1903). (#9761)
segment.target: Dodana je nova funkcija isWin10 u winVersion modul koja vraća radi li ova kopija NVDA ili ne na (barem) isporučenoj verziji izdanja Windowsa 10 (kao što je 1903). (#9761)

segment.source: The NVDA Python console now contains more useful modules in its namespace (such as appModules, globalPlugins, config and textInfos). (#9789)
segment.target: NVDA Python konzola sada sadrži više korisnih modula u svom imenskom prostoru (kao što su appModules, globalPlugins, config i textInfos). (#9789)

segment.source: The result of the last executed command in the NVDA Python console is now accessible from the _ (line) variable. (#9782)
segment.target: Rezultat posljednje izvršene naredbe u NVDA Python konzoli sada je dostupan iz varijable _ (linija). (#9782)

segment.source: Note that this shadows the gettext translation function also called "_". To access the translation function: del _
segment.target: Imajte na umu da ovo zasjenjuje funkciju prevođenja gettexta koja se također naziva "_". Za pristup funkciji prevođenja: del _

segment.source: This point release fixes the following bugs:
segment.target: Ovo izdanje točke ispravlja sljedeće greške:

segment.source: NVDA no longer causes Excel 2007 to crash or refuses to report if a cell has a formula. (#9431)
segment.target: NVDA više ne uzrokuje rušenje programa Excel 2007 ili odbija izvješćivanje ako ćelija ima formulu. (#9431)

segment.source: Google Chrome no longer crashes when interacting with certain listboxes. (#9364)
segment.target: Google Chrome više se ne ruši prilikom interakcije s određenim okvirima s popisima. (#9364)

segment.source: An issue has been fixed which prevented copying a users configuration to the system configuration profile. (#9448)
segment.target: Riješen je problem koji je sprječavao kopiranje korisničke konfiguracije u konfiguracijski profil sustava. (#9448)

segment.source: In Microsoft Excel, NVDA again uses the localized message when reporting the location of merged cells. (#9471)
segment.target: U Microsoft Excelu, NVDA ponovno koristi lokaliziranu poruku kada izvještava o lokaciji spojenih ćelija. (#9471)

segment.source: Highlights of this release include performance improvements when accessing both Microsoft word and Excel, stability and security improvements such as support for add-ons with version compatibility information, and many other bug fixes.
segment.target: Istaknute značajke ovog izdanja uključuju poboljšanja performansi pri pristupu Microsoft Wordu i Excelu, poboljšanja stabilnosti i sigurnosti kao što su podrška za dodatke s informacijama o kompatibilnosti verzija i mnoge druge ispravke programskih pogrešaka.

segment.source: Please note that starting from this release of NVDA, custom appModules, globalPlugins, braille display drivers and synth drivers will no longer be automatically loaded from your NVDA user configuration directory.
segment.target: Imajte na umu da se od ovog izdanja NVDA-a, prilagođeni appModules, globalPlugins, upravljački programi za Brailleovo pismo i upravljački programi za sintisajzere više neće automatski učitavati iz vašeg NVDA korisničkog konfiguracijskog direktorija.

segment.source: Rather these should be installed as part of an NVDA add-on. For those developing code for an add-on, code for testing can be placed in a new developer scratchpad directory in the NVDA user configuration directory, if the Developer scratchpad option is turned on in NVDA's new Advanced settings panel.
segment.target: Umjesto toga, oni bi trebali biti instalirani kao dio NVDA dodatka. Za one koji razvijaju kod za dodatak, kod za testiranje može se smjestiti u novi direktorij za graditelje u direktoriju za konfiguraciju korisnika NVDA, ako je opcija Razvojni blok uključena u novoj NVDA ploči s naprednim postavkama.

segment.source: These changes are necessary to better ensure compatibility of custom code, so that NVDA does not break when this code becomes incompatible with newer releases.
segment.target: Ove promjene su potrebne kako bi se osigurala bolja kompatibilnost prilagođenog koda, tako da se NVDA ne pokvari kada ovaj kod postane nekompatibilan s novijim izdanjima.

segment.source: Please refer to the list of changes further down for more details on this and how add-ons are now better versioned.
segment.target: Molimo pogledajte popis promjena niže za više detalja o tome i kako su dodaci sada bolje verzionirani.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove značajke

segment.source: New braille tables: Afrikaans, Arabic 8 dot computer braille, Arabic grade 2, Spanish grade 2. (#4435, #9186)
segment.target: Nove tablice na Brailleovom pismu: afrikaans, arapski računalni braille s 8 točaka, arapski razred 2, španjolski razred 2. (#4435, #9186)

segment.source: Added an option to NVDA's mouse settings to make NVDA handle situations where the mouse is controlled by another application. (#8452)
segment.target: Dodana je opcija u NVDA postavkama miša kako bi NVDA upravljao situacijama u kojima mišem upravlja druga aplikacija. (#8452)

segment.source: This will allow NVDA to track the mouse when a system is controlled remotely using TeamViewer or other remote control software.
segment.target: To će omogućiti NVDA da prati miš kada se sustavom upravlja daljinski pomoću TeamViewera ili drugog softvera za daljinsko upravljanje.

segment.source: Added the `--enable-start-on-logon` command line parameter to allow configuring whether silent installations of NVDA set NVDA to start at Windows logon or not. Specify true to start at logon or false to not start at logon. If the --enable-start-on-logon argument is not specified at all then NVDA will default to starting at logon, unless it was already configured not to by a previous installation. (#8574)
segment.target: Dodan je parametar naredbenog retka '--enable-start-on-logon' kako bi se omogućilo konfiguriranje da li tihe instalacije NVDA postavljaju NVDA da se pokreće pri prijavi u Windows ili ne. Navedite true za početak pri prijavi ili false da se ne pokreće pri prijavi. Ako argument --enable-start-on-logon uopće nije naveden, NVDA će se prema zadanim postavkama pokrenuti prilikom prijave, osim ako je već bio konfiguriran da to ne radi prethodna instalacija. (#8574)

segment.source: It is possible to turn NVDA's logging features off by setting logging level to "disabled" from General settings panel. (#8516)
segment.target: Moguće je isključiti NVDA značajke zapisivanja dnevnika postavljanjem razine zapisivanja na "onemogućeno" na ploči Opće postavke. (#8516)

segment.source: The presence of formulae in LibreOffice and Apache OpenOffice spreadsheets is now reported. (#860)
segment.target: Sada se izvještava o prisutnosti formula u proračunskim tablicama LibreOffice i Apache OpenOffice. (#860)

segment.source: In Mozilla Firefox and Google Chrome, browse mode now reports the selected item in list boxes and trees.
segment.target: U Mozilla Firefoxu i Google Chromeu, način pregledavanja sada izvještava o odabranoj stavci u okvirima popisa i stablima.

segment.source: This works in Firefox 66 and later.
segment.target: Ovo radi u Firefoxu 66 i novijim verzijama.

segment.source: This does not work for certain list boxes (HTML select controls) in Chrome.
segment.target: To ne funkcionira za određene okvire popisa (kontrole za odabir HTML-a) u Chromeu.

segment.source: Early support for apps such as Mozilla Firefox on computers with ARM64 (e.g. Qualcomm Snapdragon) processors. (#9216)
segment.target: Rana podrška za aplikacije kao što je Mozilla Firefox na računalima s ARM64 (npr. Qualcomm Snapdragon) procesorima. (#9216)

segment.source: A new Advanced Settings category has been added to NVDA's Settings dialog, including an option to try out NVDA's new support for Microsoft Word via the Microsoft UI Automation API. (#9200)
segment.target: Nova kategorija Napredne postavke dodana je u NVDA dijaloški okvir Postavke, uključujući opciju isprobavanja NVDA-ine nove podrške za Microsoft Word putem Microsoftovog API-ja za automatizaciju korisničkog sučelja. (#9200)

segment.source: Added support for the graphical view in Windows Disk Management. (#1486)
segment.target: Dodana je podrška za grafički prikaz u Windows Disk Managementu. (#1486)

segment.source: Added support for Handy Tech Connect Braille and Basic Braille 84. (#9249)
segment.target: Dodana je podrška za Handy Tech Connect Brailleovo pismo i Basic Braille 84. (#9249)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to version 3.8.0. (#9013)
segment.target: Ažuriran prevoditelj brajice liblouis na verziju 3.8.0. (#9013)

segment.source: Add-on authors now can enforce a minimum required NVDA version for their add-ons. NVDA will refuse to install or load an add-on whose minimum required NVDA version is higher than the current NVDA version. (#6275)
segment.target: Autori dodataka sada mogu nametnuti minimalnu potrebnu NVDA verziju za svoje dodatke. NVDA će odbiti instalirati ili učitati dodatak čija je minimalna potrebna NVDA verzija viša od trenutne NVDA verzije. (#6275)

segment.source: Add-on authors can now specify the last version of NVDA the add-on has been tested against. If an add-on has been only tested against a version of NVDA lower than the current version, then NVDA will refuse to install or load the add-on. (#6275)
segment.target: Autori dodataka sada mogu odrediti posljednju verziju NVDA na kojoj je dodatak testiran. Ako je dodatak testiran samo na verziji NVDA koja je niža od trenutne, NVDA će odbiti instalirati ili učitati dodatak. (#6275)

segment.source: This version of NVDA will allow installing and loading of add-ons that do not yet contain Minimum and Last Tested NVDA version information, but upgrading to future versions of NVDA (E.g. 2019.2) may automatically cause these older add-ons to be disabled.
segment.target: Ova verzija NVDA omogućit će instaliranje i učitavanje dodataka koji još ne sadrže informacije o minimalnoj i posljednjoj testiranoj verziji NVDA-a, ali nadogradnja na buduće verzije NVDA (npr. 2019.2) može automatski uzrokovati onemogućavanje ovih starijih dodataka.

segment.source: The move mouse to navigator object command is now available in Microsoft Word as well as for UIA controls, particularly Microsoft Edge. (#7916, #8371)
segment.target: Naredba za pomicanje miša na objekt navigatora sada je dostupna u programu Microsoft Word, kao i za UIA kontrole, posebno Microsoft Edge. (#7916, #8371)

segment.source: Reporting of text under the mouse has been improved within Microsoft Edge and other UIA applications. (#8370)
segment.target: Izvješćivanje o tekstu ispod miša poboljšano je u pregledniku Microsoft Edge i drugim aplikacijama UIA. (#8370)

segment.source: When NVDA is started with the `--portable-path` command line parameter, the provided path is automatically filled in when trying to create a portable copy of NVDA using the NVDA menu. (#8623)
segment.target: Kada se NVDA pokrene s parametrom naredbenog retka '--portable-path', ponuđena putanja se automatski popunjava prilikom pokušaja stvaranja prijenosne kopije NVDA pomoću NVDA izbornika. (#8623)

segment.source: Updated the path to the Norwegian braille table to reflect the standard from the year 2015. (#9170)
segment.target: Ažuriran je put do tablice norveškog Brailleovog pisma kako bi odražavao standard iz 2015. godine. (#9170)

segment.source: When navigating by paragraph (control+up or down arrows) or navigating by table cell (control+alt+arrows), the existence of spelling errors will no longer be announced, even if NVDA is configured to announce these automatically. This is because paragraphs and table cells can be quite large, and detecting spelling errors in some applications can be very costly. (#9217)
segment.target: Prilikom navigacije po odlomku (control+strelice gore ili dolje) ili navigaciji po ćeliji tablice (control+alt+strelice), postojanje pravopisnih pogrešaka više se neće objavljivati, čak i ako je NVDA konfiguriran da ih automatski najavljuje. To je zato što odlomci i ćelije tablice mogu biti prilično veliki, a otkrivanje pravopisnih pogrešaka u nekim aplikacijama može biti vrlo skupo. (#9217)

segment.source: NVDA no longer automatically loads custom appModules, globalPlugins and braille and synth drivers from the NVDA user configuration directory. This code should be instead packaged as an add-on with correct version information, ensuring that incompatible code is not run with current versions of NVDA. (#9238)
segment.target: NVDA više ne učitava automatski prilagođene appModules, globalPlugins i upravljačke programe za brajicu i sintisajzer iz NVDA direktorija za konfiguraciju korisnika. Ovaj kod bi umjesto toga trebao biti zapakiran kao dodatak s točnim informacijama o verziji, osiguravajući da se nekompatibilni kod ne pokreće s trenutnim verzijama NVDA. (#9238)

segment.source: For developers who need to test code as it is being developed, enable NVDA's developer scratchpad directory in the Advanced category of NVDA settings, and place your code in the 'scratchpad' directory found in the NVDA user configuration directory when this option is enabled.
segment.target: Za programere koji trebaju testirati kod dok se razvija, omogućite NVDA direktorij za brisanje u kategoriji Napredno NVDA postavki i stavite svoj kod u direktorij 'scratchpad' koji se nalazi u direktoriju za konfiguraciju korisnika NVDA kada je ova opcija omogućena.

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci grešaka

segment.source: When using OneCore speech synthesizer on Windows 10 April 2018 Update and later, large chunks of silence are no longer inserted between speech utterances. (#8985)
segment.target: Kada koristite OneCore sintisajzer govora na ažuriranju sustava Windows 10 za travanj 2018. i novijim verzijama, veliki dijelovi tišine više se ne umeću između govornih izgovora. (#8985)

segment.source: When moving by character in plain text controls (such as Notepad) or browse mode, 32 bit emoji characters consisting of two UTF-16 code points (such as 🤦) will now read properly. (#8782)
segment.target: Kada se pomičete po znaku u kontrolama običnog teksta (kao što je Notepad) ili načinu pregledavanja, 32-bitni znakovi emojija koji se sastoje od dvije UTF-16 kodne točke (kao što je 🤦 ) sada će se ispravno čitati. (#8782)

segment.source: Improved restart confirmation dialog after changing NVDA's interface language. The text and the button labels are now more concise and less confusing. (#6416)
segment.target: Poboljšan dijaloški okvir za potvrdu ponovnog pokretanja nakon promjene jezika NVDA sučelja. Oznake teksta i gumba sada su sažetije i manje zbunjujuće. (#6416)

segment.source: If a 3rd party speech synthesizer fails to load, NVDA will fall back to Windows OneCore speech synthesizer on Windows 10, rather than espeak. (#9025)
segment.target: Ako se sintisajzer govora treće strane ne uspije učitati, NVDA će se vratiti na Windows OneCore sintisajzer govora u sustavu Windows 10, umjesto da govori. (#9025)

segment.source: Removed the "Welcome Dialog" entry in the NVDA menu while on secure screens. (#8520)
segment.target: Uklonjen je unos "Dijalog dobrodošlice" u NVDA izborniku dok ste bili na sigurnim zaslonima. (#8520)

segment.source: When tabbing or using quick navigation in browse mode, legends on tab panels are now reported more consistently. (#709)
segment.target: Kada koristite karticu ili koristite brzu navigaciju u načinu pregledavanja, legende na pločama kartica sada se dosljednije izvješćuju. (#709)

segment.source: NVDA will now announce selection changes for certain time pickers such as in the Alarms and Clock app in Windows 10. (#5231)
segment.target: NVDA će sada najaviti promjene odabira za određene birače vremena, kao što su aplikacije Alarmi i sat u sustavu Windows 10. (#5231)

segment.source: In Windows 10's Action Center, NVDA will announce status messages when toggling quick actions such as brightness and focus assist. (#8954)
segment.target: U akcijskom centru sustava Windows 10, NVDA će najavljivati poruke o statusu prilikom prebacivanja brzih radnji kao što su svjetlina i pomoć pri fokusiranju. (#8954)

segment.source: In action Center in Windows 10 October 2018 Update and earlier, NVDA will recognize brightness quick action control as a button instead of a toggle button. (#8845)
segment.target: U akcijskom centru u Windows 10 ažuriranju za listopad 2018. i ranijim verzijama, NVDA će prepoznati kontrolu brze akcije svjetline kao gumb umjesto preklopnog gumba. (#8845)

segment.source: NVDA will again track cursor and announce deleted characters in the Microsoft Excel go to and find edit fields. (#9042)
segment.target: NVDA će ponovno pratiti kursor i objaviti izbrisane znakove u Microsoft Excelu, otići i pronaći polja za uređivanje. (#9042)

segment.source: Fixed a rare browse mode crash in Firefox. (#9152)
segment.target: Ispravljen je rijedak pad načina pregledavanja u Firefoxu. (#9152)

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to report the focus for some controls in the Microsoft Office 2016 ribbon when collapsed.
segment.target: NVDA više ne prijavljuje fokus za neke kontrole na vrpci sustava Microsoft Office 2016 kada je sažet.

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to report the suggested contact when entering addresses in new messages in Outlook 2016. (#8502)
segment.target: NVDA više ne prijavljuje predloženi kontakt prilikom unosa adresa u nove poruke u programu Outlook 2016. (#8502)

segment.source: The last few cursor routing keys on 80 cell eurobraille displays no longer route the cursor to a position at or just after the start of the braille line. (#9160)
segment.target: Posljednjih nekoliko tipki za usmjeravanje kursora na zaslonima eurobrailleovog pisma od 80 ćelija više ne usmjeravaju pokazivač na položaj na ili neposredno nakon početka brajice. (#9160)

segment.source: Fixed table navigation in threaded view in Mozilla Thunderbird. (#8396)
segment.target: Popravljena navigacija tablicom u prikazu s navojem u Mozilla Thunderbirdu. (#8396)

segment.source: In Mozilla Firefox and Google Chrome, switching to focus mode now works correctly for certain list boxes and trees (where the list box/tree is not itself focusable but its items are) . (#3573, #9157)
segment.target: U Mozilla Firefoxu i Google Chromeu, prebacivanje u način fokusiranja sada ispravno funkcionira za određene okvire s popisom i stabla (gdje okvir s popisom/stablo nije sam po sebi fokusiran, ali njegove stavke jesu). (#3573, #9157)

segment.source: Browse mode is now correctly turned on by default when reading messages in Outlook 2016/365 if using NVDA's experimental UI Automation support for Word Documents. (#9188)
segment.target: Način pregledavanja sada je ispravno uključen prema zadanim postavkama kada čitate poruke u programu Outlook 2016/365 ako koristite NVDA eksperimentalnu podršku za automatizaciju korisničkog sučelja za Word dokumente. (#9188)

segment.source: NVDA is now less likely to freeze in such a way that the only way to escape is signing out from your current windows session. (#6291)
segment.target: Manje je vjerojatno da će se NVDA zamrznuti na takav način da je jedini način za bijeg odjava iz trenutne Windows sesije. (#6291)

segment.source: In Windows 10 October 2018 Update and later, when opening cloud clipboard history with clipboard empty, NVDA will announce clipboard status. (#9103)
segment.target: U ažuriranju sustava Windows 10 za listopad 2018. i novijima, prilikom otvaranja povijesti međuspremnika u oblaku s praznim međuspremnikom, NVDA će objaviti status međuspremnika. (#9103)

segment.source: In Windows 10 October 2018 Update and later, when searching for emojis in emoji panel, NVDA will announce top search result. (#9105)
segment.target: U ažuriranju sustava Windows 10 za listopad 2018. i novijim verzijama, prilikom traženja emojija na ploči s emojijima, NVDA će objaviti najbolji rezultat pretraživanja. (#9105)

segment.source: NVDA no longer freezes in the main window of Oracle VirtualBox 5.2 and above. (#9202)
segment.target: NVDA se više ne zamrzava u glavnom prozoru Oracle VirtualBoxa 5.2 i novijih verzija. (#9202)

segment.source: Responsiveness in Microsoft Word when navigating by line, paragraph or table cell may be significantly improved in some documents. A reminder that for best performance, set Microsoft Word to Draft view with alt+w,e after opening a document. (#9217)
segment.target: Responzivnost u programu Microsoft Word prilikom navigacije po liniji, odlomku ili ćeliji tablice može se značajno poboljšati u nekim dokumentima. Podsjetnik da za najbolje performanse postavite Microsoft Word na prikaz skice s alt+w,e nakon otvaranja dokumenta. (#9217)

segment.source: In Mozilla Firefox and Google Chrome, empty alerts are no longer reported. (#5657)
segment.target: U Mozilla Firefoxu i Google Chromeu prazna upozorenja više se ne prijavljuju. (#5657)

segment.source: Significant performance improvements when navigating cells in Microsoft Excel, particularly when the spreadsheet contains comments and or validation dropdown lists. (#7348)
segment.target: Značajna poboljšanja performansi prilikom navigacije ćelijama u programu Microsoft Excel, osobito kada proračunska tablica sadrži padajuće popise za komentare i/ili provjeru valjanosti. (#7348)

segment.source: It should be no longer necessary to turn off in-cell editing in Microsoft Excel's options to access the cell edit control with NVDA in Excel 2016/365. (#8146).
segment.target: Više ne bi trebalo biti potrebno isključiti uređivanje unutar ćelije u opcijama programa Microsoft Excel za pristup kontroli za uređivanje ćelija pomoću NVDA u programu Excel 2016/365. (#8146).

segment.source: Fixed a freeze in Firefox sometimes seen when quick navigating by landmarks, if the Enhanced Aria add-on is in use. (#8980)
segment.target: Popravljeno je zamrzavanje u Firefoxu koje se ponekad viđa prilikom brze navigacije po orijentirima, ako se koristi dodatak Enhanced Aria. (#8980)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: NVDA can now be built with all editions of Microsoft Visual Studio 2017 (not just the Community edition). (#8939)
segment.target: NVDA se sada može izraditi sa svim izdanjima Microsoft Visual Studio 2017 (ne samo sa Community izdanjem). (#8939)

segment.source: You can now include log output from liblouis into the NVDA log by setting the louis boolean flag in the debugLogging section of the NVDA configuration. (#4554)
segment.target: Sada možete uključiti izlaz dnevnika iz liblouisa u NVDA dnevnik postavljanjem louis boolean zastavice u odjeljku debugLogging NVDA konfiguracije. (#4554)

segment.source: Add-on authors are now able to provide NVDA version compatibility information in add-on manifests. (#6275, #9055)
segment.target: Autori dodataka sada mogu pružiti informacije o kompatibilnosti NVDA verzija u manifestima dodataka. (#6275, #9055)

segment.source: minimumNVDAVersion: The minimum required version of NVDA for an add-on to work properly.
segment.target: minimumNVDAVersion: Minimalna potrebna verzija NVDA za ispravan rad dodatka.

segment.source: lastTestedNVDAVersion: The last version of NVDA an add-on has been tested with.
segment.target: lastTestedNVDAVersion: Posljednja verzija NVDA s kojom je testiran dodatak.

segment.source: OffsetsTextInfo objects can now implement the _getBoundingRectFromOffset method to allow retrieval of bounding rectangles per characters instead of points. (#8572)
segment.target: Objekti OffsetsTextInfo sada mogu implementirati metodu _getBoundingRectFromOffset kako bi omogućili dohvaćanje graničnih pravokutnika po znakovima umjesto točaka. (#8572)

segment.source: Added a boundingRect property to TextInfo objects to retrieve the bounding rectangle of a range of text. (#8371)
segment.target: Dodano je svojstvo boundingRect objektima TextInfo za dohvaćanje rubnog pravokutnika raspona teksta. (#8371)

segment.source: Properties and methods within classes can now be marked as abstract in NVDA. These classes will raise an error if instantiated. (#8294, #8652, #8658)
segment.target: Svojstva i metode unutar klasa sada se mogu označiti kao apstraktne u NVDA. Ove će klase pokrenuti pogrešku ako se instanciraju. (#8294, #8652, #8658)

segment.source: NVDA can log the time since input when text is spoken, which helps in measuring perceived responsiveness. This can be enabled by setting the timeSinceInput setting to True in the debugLog section of the NVDA configuration. (#9167)
segment.target: NVDA može zabilježiti vrijeme od unosa kada se izgovara tekst, što pomaže u mjerenju percipirane responzivnosti. To se može omogućiti postavljanjem postavke timeSinceInput na True u odjeljku debugLog NVDA konfiguracije. (#9167)

segment.source: This release fixes a crash at start up if NVDA's user interface language is set to Aragonese. (#9089)
segment.target: Ovo izdanje ispravlja pad pri pokretanju ako je jezik korisničkog sučelja NVDA postavljen na aragonski. (#9089)

segment.source: Highlights of this release include performance improvements in recent Mozilla Firefox versions, announcement of emojis with all synthesizers, reporting of replied/forwarded status in Outlook, reporting the distance of the cursor to the edge of a Microsoft Word page, and many bug fixes.
segment.target: Istaknuti dijelovi ovog izdanja uključuju poboljšanja performansi u nedavnim verzijama Mozilla Firefoxa, najavu emojija sa svim sintisajzerima, izvještavanje o statusu odgovora/proslijeđenja u programu Outlook, izvještavanje o udaljenosti pokazivača do ruba stranice Microsoft Worda i mnoge ispravke grešaka.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove značajke

segment.source: New braille tables: Chinese (China, Mandarin) grade 1 and grade 2. (#5553)
segment.target: Nove tablice na Brailleovom pismu: kineski (Kina, mandarinski) razred 1 i stupanj 2. (#5553)

segment.source: Replied / Forwarded status is now reported on mail items in the Microsoft Outlook message list. (#6911)
segment.target: Status Odgovoreno / Proslijeđeno sada se izvještava o stavkama pošte na popisu poruka programa Microsoft Outlook. (#6911)

segment.source: NVDA is now able to read descriptions for emoji as well as other characters that are part of the Unicode Common Locale Data Repository. (#6523)
segment.target: NVDA sada može čitati opise emojija, kao i druge znakove koji su dio Unicode Common Locale Data Repository. (#6523)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word, the cursor's distance from the top and left edges of the page can be reported by pressing NVDA+numpadDelete. (#1939)
segment.target: U Microsoft Wordu, udaljenost pokazivača od gornjeg i lijevog ruba stranice može se prijaviti pritiskom na NVDA+numpadDelete. (#1939)

segment.source: In Google Sheets with braille mode enabled, NVDA no longer announces 'selected' on every cell when moving focus between cells. (#8879)
segment.target: U Google tablicama s omogućenim načinom brajice, NVDA više ne objavljuje "odabrano" na svakoj ćeliji prilikom premještanja fokusa između ćelija. (#8879)

segment.source: Added support for Foxit Reader and Foxit Phantom PDF. (#8944)
segment.target: Dodana podrška za Foxit Reader i Foxit Phantom PDF. (#8944)

segment.source: Added support for the DBeaver database tool. (#8905)
segment.target: Dodana je podrška za alat baze podataka DBeaver. (#8905)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: "Report help balloons" in the Object Presentations dialog has been renamed to "Report notifications" to include reporting of toast notifications in Windows 8 and later. (#5789)
segment.target: "Izvješćivanje balona pomoći" u dijaloškom okviru Prezentacije objekata preimenovano je u "Obavijesti o prijavi" kako bi se uključilo izvješćivanje o obavijestima o zdravicama u sustavu Windows 8 i novijim verzijama. (#5789)

segment.source: In NVDA's keyboard settings, the checkboxes to enable or disable NVDA modifier keys are now displayed in a list rather than as separate checkboxes.
segment.target: U postavkama NVDA tipkovnice, potvrdni okviri za omogućavanje ili onemogućavanje NVDA modifikatorskih tipki sada se prikazuju na popisu, a ne kao zasebni potvrdni okviri.

segment.source: NVDA will no longer present redundant information when reading clock system tray on some versions of Windows. (#4364)
segment.target: NVDA više neće prikazivati suvišne informacije prilikom čitanja satne programske trake na nekim verzijama sustava Windows. (#4364)

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to version 3.7.0. (#8697)
segment.target: Ažuriran je prevoditelj brajice liblouis na verziju 3.7.0. (#8697)

segment.source: Updated eSpeak-NG to commit 919f3240cbb.
segment.target: Ažuriran eSpeak-NG da izvrši 919f3240cbb.

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci grešaka

segment.source: In Outlook 2016/365, the category and flag status are reported for messages. (#8603)
segment.target: U programu Outlook 2016/365 za poruke se prijavljuju kategorija i status zastavice. (#8603)

segment.source: When NVDA is set to languages such as Kirgyz, Mongolian or Macedonian, it no longer shows a dialog on start-up warning that the language is not supported by the Operating System. (#8064)
segment.target: Kada je NVDA postavljen na jezike kao što su kirgiski, mongolski ili makedonski, više ne prikazuje dijaloški okvir pri pokretanju s upozorenjem da operacijski sustav ne podržava taj jezik. (#8064)

segment.source: Moving the mouse to the navigator object will now much more accurately move the mouse to the browse mode position in Mozilla Firefox, Google Chrome and Acrobat Reader DC. (#6460)
segment.target: Pomicanjem miša na objekt navigatora sada će se mnogo točnije pomaknuti miš na položaj načina pregledavanja u Mozilla Firefoxu, Google Chromeu i Acrobat Readeru DC. (#6460)

segment.source: Interacting with combo boxes on the web in Firefox, Chrome and Internet Explorer has been improved. (#8664)
segment.target: Interakcija s kombiniranim okvirima na webu u Firefoxu, Chromeu i Internet Exploreru je poboljšana. (#8664)

segment.source: If running on the Japanese version of Windows XP or Vista, NVDA now displays OS version requirements message as expected. (#8771)
segment.target: Ako se izvodi na japanskoj verziji sustava Windows XP ili Vista, NVDA sada prikazuje poruku o zahtjevima za verziju OS-a prema očekivanjima. (#8771)

segment.source: Performance improvements when navigating large pages with lots of dynamic changes in Mozilla Firefox. (#8678)
segment.target: Poboljšanja performansi pri navigaciji velikim stranicama s puno dinamičkih promjena u Mozilla Firefoxu. (#8678)

segment.source: Braille no longer shows font attributes if they have been disabled in Document Formatting settings. (#7615)
segment.target: Brailleovo pismo više ne prikazuje atribute fonta ako su onemogućeni u postavkama formatiranja dokumenta. (#7615)

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to track focus in File Explorer and other applications using UI Automation when another app is busy (such as batch processing audio). (#7345)
segment.target: NVDA više ne uspijeva pratiti fokus u File Exploreru i drugim aplikacijama koje koriste automatizaciju korisničkog sučelja kada je druga aplikacija zauzeta (kao što je skupna obrada zvuka). (#7345)

segment.source: In ARIA menus on the web, the Escape key will now be passed through to the menu and no longer turn off focus mode unconditionally. (#3215)
segment.target: U ARIA izbornicima na webu, tipka Escape sada će se prosljeđivati u izbornik i više neće bezuvjetno isključivati način fokusiranja. (#3215)

segment.source: In the new Gmail web interface, when using quick navigation inside messages while reading them, the entire body of the message is no longer reported after the element to which you just navigated. (#8887)
segment.target: U novom Gmail web sučelju, kada koristite brzu navigaciju unutar poruka dok ih čitate, cijeli se korpus poruke više ne prijavljuje nakon elementa na koji ste upravo navigirali. (#8887)

segment.source: After updating NVDA, Browsers such as Firefox and google Chrome should no longer crash, and browse mode should continue to correctly reflect updates to any currently loaded documents. (#7641)
segment.target: Nakon ažuriranja NVDA-a, preglednici kao što su Firefox i Google Chrome više se ne bi trebali rušiti, a način pregledavanja trebao bi nastaviti ispravno odražavati ažuriranja svih trenutno učitanih dokumenata. (#7641)

segment.source: NVDA no longer reports clickable multiple times in a row when navigating clickable content in Browse Mode. (#7430)
segment.target: NVDA više ne izvještava o mogućnosti klikanja više puta zaredom prilikom navigacije sadržajem koji se može kliknuti u načinu pregledavanja. (#7430)

segment.source: Gestures performed on baum Vario 40 braille displays will no longer fail to execute. (#8894)
segment.target: Geste izvedene na baum Vario 40 brajičnom pismu više se neće izvršavati. (#8894)

segment.source: In Google Slides with Mozilla Firefox, NVDA no longer reports selected text on every control with focus. (#8964)
segment.target: U Google prezentacijama s Mozilla Firefoxom, NVDA više ne izvještava o odabranom tekstu na svakoj kontroli s fokusom. (#8964)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: gui.nvdaControls now contains two classes to create accessible lists with check boxes. (#7325)
segment.target: gui.nvdaControls sada sadrži dvije klase za stvaranje pristupačnih popisa s potvrdnim okvirima. (#7325)

segment.source: CustomCheckListBox is an accessible subclass of wx.CheckListBox.
segment.target: CustomCheckListBox je pristupačna podklasa wx. CheckListBox.

segment.source: AutoWidthColumnCheckListCtrl adds accessible check boxes to an AutoWidthColumnListCtrl, which itself is based on wx.ListCtrl.
segment.target: AutoWidthColumnCheckListCtrl dodaje pristupačne potvrdne okvire u AutoWidthColumnListCtrl, koji se i sam temelji na wx-u. ListCtrl.

segment.source: If you need to make a wx widget accessible which isn't already, it is possible to do so by using an instance of gui.accPropServer.IAccPropServer_impl. (#7491)
segment.target: Ako trebate učiniti wx widget pristupačnim, a to već nije, to je moguće učiniti korištenjem instance gui.accPropServer.IAccPropServer_impl. (#7491)

segment.source: See the implementation of gui.nvdaControls.ListCtrlAccPropServer for more info.
segment.target: Dodatne informacije potražite u implementaciji gui.nvdaControls.ListCtrlAccPropServer.

segment.source: Updated configobj to 5.1.0dev commit 5b5de48a. (#4470)
segment.target: Ažuriran configobj na 5.1.0dev commit 5b5de48a. (#4470)
