segment.source: The config.post_configProfileSwitch action now takes the optional prevConf keyword argument, allowing handlers to take action based on differences between configuration before and after the profile switch. (#8758)
segment.target: Akcija config.post_configProfileSwitch sada preuzima neobavezni argument ključne riječi prevConf, omogućujući rukovateljima da poduzmu akciju na temelju razlika između konfiguracije prije i nakon promjene profila. (#8758)

segment.source: This is a minor release to work around a crash in Google Chrome when navigating tweetts on [www.twitter.com](http://www.twitter.com). (#8777)
segment.target: Ovo je manje izdanje za zaobilaženje rušenja u pregledniku Google Chrome prilikom navigacije tweetovima na [www.twitter.com](http://www.twitter.com). (#8777)

segment.source: This is a minor release to fix a critical bug in NVDA which caused 32 bit versions of Mozilla Firefox to crash. (#8759)
segment.target: Ovo je manje izdanje za ispravljanje kritične greške u NVDA koja je uzrokovala pad 32-bitnih verzija Mozilla Firefoxa. (#8759)

segment.source: Highlights of this release include automatic detection of many Braille displays, support for new Windows 10 features including the Windows 10 Emoji input panel, and many other bug fixes.
segment.target: Istaknute značajke ovog izdanja uključuju automatsko otkrivanje mnogih Brailleovih zaslona, podršku za nove značajke sustava Windows 10, uključujući Windows 10 Emoji ploču za unos i mnoge druge ispravke grešaka.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove značajke

segment.source: NVDA will report grammar errors when appropriately exposed by web pages in Mozilla Firefox and Google Chrome. (#8280)
segment.target: NVDA će prijaviti gramatičke pogreške kada ih web stranice u Mozilla Firefoxu i Google Chromeu na odgovarajući način otkriju. (#8280)

segment.source: Content marked as being either inserted or deleted in web pages is now reported in Google Chrome. (#8558)
segment.target: Sadržaj koji je označen kao umetnut ili izbrisan na web-stranicama sada se prijavljuje u pregledniku Google Chrome. (#8558)

segment.source: Added support for BrailleNote QT and Apex BT's scroll wheel when BrailleNote is used as a braille display with NVDA. (#5992, #5993)
segment.target: Dodana je podrška za BrailleNote QT i Apex BT-ov kotačić za pomicanje kada se BrailleNote koristi kao Brailleov zaslon s NVDA. (#5992, #5993)

segment.source: Added scripts for reporting elapsed and total time of current track in Foobar2000. (#6596)
segment.target: Dodane su skripte za izvještavanje o proteklom i ukupnom vremenu trenutne pjesme u Foobar2000. (#6596)

segment.source: The Mac command key symbol (⌘) is now announced when reading text with any synthesizer. (#8366)
segment.target: Simbol Mac naredbene tipke (⌘) sada se najavljuje prilikom čitanja teksta bilo kojim sintisajzerom. (#8366)

segment.source: Custom roles via the aria-roledescription attribute are now supported in all web browsers. (#8448)
segment.target: Prilagođene uloge putem atributa aria-roledescription sada su podržane u svim web preglednicima. (#8448)

segment.source: New braille tables: Czech 8 dot, Central Kurdish, Esperanto, Hungarian, Swedish 8 dot computer braille. (#8226, #8437)
segment.target: Nove tablice na Brailleovom pismu: češki s 8 točaka, središnji kurdski, esperanto, mađarski, švedski s 8 točaka računalno brailleovo pismo. (#8226, #8437)

segment.source: Support has been added to automatically detect braille displays in the background. (#1271)
segment.target: Dodana je podrška za automatsko otkrivanje Brailleovih prikaza u pozadini. (#1271)

segment.source: ALVA, Baum/HumanWare/APH/Orbit, Eurobraille, Handy Tech, Hims, SuperBraille and HumanWare BrailleNote and Brailliant BI/B displays are currently supported.
segment.target: Trenutno su podržani ALVA, Baum/HumanWare/APH/Orbit, Eurobraille, Handy Tech, Hims, SuperBraille i HumanWare BrailleNote i Brailliant BI/B zasloni.

segment.source: You can enable this feature by selecting the automatic option from the list of braille displays in NVDA's braille display selection dialog.
segment.target: Ovu značajku možete omogućiti odabirom opcije automatski s popisa prikaza brajice u NVDA dijaloškom okviru za odabir brajice.

segment.source: Please consult the documentation for additional details.
segment.target: Dodatne pojedinosti potražite u dokumentaciji.

segment.source: Added support for various modern input features introduced in recent Windows 10 releases. These include emoji panel (Fall Creators Update), dictation (Fall Creators Update), hardware keyboard input suggestions (April 2018 Update), and cloud clipboard paste (October 2018 Update). (#7273)
segment.target: Dodana je podrška za razne moderne značajke unosa uvedene u nedavnim izdanjima sustava Windows 10. To uključuje ploču emojija (Fall Creators Update), diktiranje (Fall Creators Update), prijedloge za unos hardverske tipkovnice (ažuriranje za travanj 2018.) i lijepljenje međuspremnika u oblaku (ažuriranje za listopad 2018.). (#7273)

segment.source: Content marked as a block quote using ARIA (role blockquote) is now supported in Mozilla Firefox 63. (#8577)
segment.target: Sadržaj označen kao blok citat pomoću ARIA (role blockquote) sada je podržan u Mozilla Firefoxu 63. (#8577)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: The list of available languages in NVDA's General Settings is now sorted based on language names instead of ISO 639 codes. (#7284)
segment.target: Popis dostupnih jezika u NVDA Općim postavkama sada je sortiran na temelju naziva jezika umjesto ISO 639 kodova. (#7284)

segment.source: Added default gestures for Alt+Shift+Tab and Windows+Tab with all supported Freedom Scientific braille displays. (#7387)
segment.target: Dodane su zadane geste za Alt+Shift+Tab i Windows+Tab sa svim podržanim Freedom Scientific brajicama. (#7387)

segment.source: For ALVA BC680 and protocol converter displays, it is now possible to assign different functions to the left and right smart pad, thumb and etouch keys. (#8230)
segment.target: Za ALVA BC680 i zaslone pretvarača protokola sada je moguće dodijeliti različite funkcije lijevoj i desnoj pametnoj tipki, palcu i tipkama etouch. (#8230)

segment.source: For ALVA BC6 displays, the key combination sp2+sp3 will now announce the current date and time, whereas sp1+sp2 emulates the Windows key. (#8230)
segment.target: Za ALVA BC6 zaslone, kombinacija tipki sp2+sp3 sada će objaviti trenutni datum i vrijeme, dok sp1+sp2 oponaša Windows tipku. (#8230)

segment.source: The user is asked once when NVDA starts if they are happy sending usage statistics to NV Access when checking for NVDA updates. (#8217)
segment.target: Korisnik se jednom pita kada NVDA pokrene je li zadovoljan slanjem statistike korištenja NV Accessu prilikom provjere NVDA ažuriranja. (#8217)

segment.source: When checking for updates, if the user has agreed to allow sending usage statistics to NV Access, NVDA will now send the name of the current synth driver and braille display in use, to aide in better prioritization for future work on these drivers. (#8217)
segment.target: Prilikom provjere ažuriranja, ako je korisnik pristao dopustiti slanje statistike korištenja NV Accessu, NVDA će sada poslati naziv trenutnog sintisajzerskog drajvera i Brailleovog pisma koji se koristi, kako bi pomogao u boljem određivanju prioriteta za budući rad na tim upravljačkim programima. (#8217)

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to version 3.6.0. (#8365)
segment.target: Ažuriran prevoditelj brajice liblouis na verziju 3.6.0. (#8365)

segment.source: Updated the path to the correct Russian eight-dots Braille table. (#8446)
segment.target: Ažuriran put do ispravne ruske tablice Brailleovog pisma s osam točaka. (#8446)

segment.source: Updated eSpeak-ng to 1.49.3dev commit 910f4c2. (#8561)
segment.target: Ažuriran eSpeak-ng na 1.49.3dev commit 910f4c2. (#8561)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci grešaka

segment.source: Accessible labels for controls in Google Chrome are now more readily reported in browse mode when the label does not appear as content itself. (#4773)
segment.target: Pristupačne oznake za kontrole u pregledniku Google Chrome sada se lakše prijavljuju u načinu pregledavanja kada se oznaka ne prikazuje kao sam sadržaj. (#4773)

segment.source: Notifications are now supported in Zoom. For example, this includes mute/unmute status, and incoming messages. (#7754)
segment.target: Obavijesti su sada podržane u Zoomu. Na primjer, to uključuje status isključivanja/uključivanja zvuka i dolazne poruke. (#7754)

segment.source: Switching braille context presentation when in browse mode no longer causes braille output to stop following browse mode cursor. (#7741)
segment.target: Prebacivanje kontekstne prezentacije brajice u modu pretraživanja više ne uzrokuje prestanak ispisa brajice prateći pokazivač načina pretraživanja. (#7741)

segment.source: ALVA BC680 braille displays no longer intermittently fail to initialize. (#8106)
segment.target: ALVA BC680 Brajičevi zasloni više se povremeno ne inicijaliziraju. (#8106)

segment.source: By default, ALVA BC6 displays will no longer execute emulated system keyboard keys when pressing key combinations involving sp2+sp3 to trigger internal functionality. (#8230)
segment.target: Prema zadanim postavkama, ALVA BC6 zasloni više neće izvršavati emulirane tipke sistemske tipkovnice kada pritisnete kombinacije tipki koje uključuju sp2+sp3 za pokretanje interne funkcionalnosti. (#8230)

segment.source: Pressing sp2 on an ALVA BC6 display to emulate the alt key now works as advertised. (#8360)
segment.target: Pritiskom na sp2 na ALVA BC6 zaslonu za emulaciju alt tipke sada radi kako je reklamirano. (#8360)

segment.source: NVDA no longer announces redundant keyboard layout changes. (#7383, #8419)
segment.target: NVDA više ne najavljuje suvišne promjene rasporeda tipkovnice. (#7383, #8419)

segment.source: Mouse tracking is now much more accurate in Notepad and other plain text edit controls when in a document with more than 65535 characters. (#8397)
segment.target: Praćenje miša sada je mnogo preciznije u Notepadu i drugim kontrolama za uređivanje običnog teksta kada je u dokumentu s više od 65535 znakova. (#8397)

segment.source: NVDA will recognize more dialogs in Windows 10 and other modern applications. (#8405)
segment.target: NVDA će prepoznati više dijaloga u sustavu Windows 10 i drugim modernim aplikacijama. (#8405)

segment.source: On Windows 10 October 2018 Update and Server 2019 and above, NVDA no longer fails to track the system focus when an application freezes or floods the system with events. (#7345, #8535)
segment.target: Na Windows 10 ažuriranju za listopad 2018. i Server 2019 i novijim verzijama, NVDA više ne uspijeva pratiti fokus sustava kada se aplikacija zamrzne ili preplavi sustav događajima. (#7345, #8535)

segment.source: Users are now informed when attempting to read or copy an empty status bar. (#7789)
segment.target: Korisnici su sada obaviješteni prilikom pokušaja čitanja ili kopiranja prazne statusne trake. (#7789)

segment.source: Fixed an issue where the "not checked" state on controls is not reported in speech if the control has previously been half checked. (#6946)
segment.target: Riješen je problem zbog kojeg se stanje "nije provjereno" na kontrolama ne prijavljuje u govoru ako je kontrola prethodno napola provjerena. (#6946)

segment.source: In the list of languages in NVDA's General Settings, language name for Burmese is displayed correctly on Windows 7. (#8544)
segment.target: Na popisu jezika u NVDA Općim postavkama, naziv jezika za burmanski jezik ispravno je prikazan u sustavu Windows 7. (#8544)

segment.source: In Microsoft Edge, NVDA will announce notifications such as reading view availability and page load progress. (#8423)
segment.target: U Microsoft Edgeu, NVDA će objaviti obavijesti kao što su dostupnost prikaza za čitanje i napredak učitavanja stranice. (#8423)

segment.source: When navigating into a list on the web, NVDA will now report its label if the web author has provided one. (#7652)
segment.target: Prilikom navigacije na popis na webu, NVDA će sada prijaviti svoju oznaku ako ju je autor web stranice naveo. (#7652)

segment.source: When manually assigning functions to gestures for a particular braille display, these gestures now always show up as being assigned to that display. Previously, they showed up as if they were assigned to the currently active display. (#8108)
segment.target: Prilikom ručnog dodjeljivanja funkcija gestama za određeni brajični zaslon, te se geste sada uvijek prikazuju kao dodijeljene tom zaslonu. Prije su se prikazivali kao da su dodijeljeni trenutno aktivnom zaslonu. (#8108)

segment.source: The 64-bit version of Media Player Classic is now supported. (#6066)
segment.target: Sada je podržana 64-bitna verzija programa Media Player Classic. (#6066)

segment.source: Several improvements to braille support in Microsoft Word with UI Automation enabled:
segment.target: Nekoliko poboljšanja podrške za Brailleovo pismo u programu Microsoft Word s omogućenom automatizacijom korisničkog sučelja:

segment.source: Similar to other multiline text fields, When positioned at the start of a document in Braille, the display is now panned such that the first character of the document is at the start of the display. (#8406)
segment.target: Slično drugim tekstnim poljima s više redaka, kada se postavi na početak dokumenta na Brailleovom pismu, zaslon se sada pomiče tako da je prvi znak dokumenta na početku prikaza. (#8406)

segment.source: Reduced overly verbose focus presentation in both speech and braille when focusing a Word document. (#8407)
segment.target: Smanjena je pretjerano opširna prezentacija fokusa u govoru i na Brailleovom pismu prilikom fokusiranja dokumenta programa Word. (#8407)

segment.source: Cursor routing in braille now works correctly when in a list in a Word document. (#7971)
segment.target: Usmjeravanje pokazivača na Brailleovom pismu sada ispravno funkcionira kada je na popisu u dokumentu programa Word. (#7971)

segment.source: Newly inserted bullets/numbers in a Word document are correctly reported in both speech and braille. (#7970)
segment.target: Novoumetnute grafičke oznake/brojevi u Word dokumentu ispravno se prijavljuju i u govoru i na Brailleovom pismu. (#7970)

segment.source: In Windows 10 1803 and later, it is now possible to install add-ons if the "Use Unicode UTF-8 for worldwide language support" feature is enabled. (#8599)
segment.target: U sustavu Windows 10 1803 i novijim verzijama sada je moguće instalirati dodatke ako je omogućena značajka "Koristi Unicode UTF-8 za svjetsku jezičnu podršku". (#8599)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer make iTunes 12.9 and newer completely unusable to interact with. (#8744)
segment.target: NVDA više neće učiniti iTunes 12.9 i novije verzije potpuno neupotrebljivima za interakciju. (#8744)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: Added scriptHandler.script, which can function as a decorator for scripts on scriptable objects. (#6266)
segment.target: Dodan scriptHandler.script, koji može funkcionirati kao dekorator za skripte na objektima koji se mogu skriptirati. (#6266)

segment.source: A system test framework has been introduced for NVDA. (#708)
segment.target: Uveden je okvir za testiranje sustava za NVDA. (#708)

segment.source: Some changes have been made to the hwPortUtils module: (#1271)
segment.target: Napravljene su neke promjene u modulu hwPortUtils: (#1271)

segment.source: listUsbDevices now yields dictionaries with device information including hardwareID and devicePath.
segment.target: listUsbDevices sada daje rječnike s informacijama o uređaju, uključujući hardwareID i devicePath.

segment.source: Dictionaries yielded by listComPorts now also contain a usbID entry for COM ports with USB VID/PID information in their hardware ID.
segment.target: Rječnici koje daje listComPorts sada također sadrže unos usbID-a za COM priključke s USB VID/PID informacijama u njihovom hardverskom ID-u.

segment.source: Updated wxPython to 4.0.3. (#7077)
segment.target: Ažuriran wxPython na 4.0.3. (#7077)

segment.source: As NVDA now only supports Windows 7 SP1 and later, the key "minWindowsVersion" used to check if UIA should be enabled for a particular release of Windows has been removed. (#8422)
segment.target: Budući da NVDA sada podržava samo Windows 7 SP1 i novije verzije, uklonjen je ključ "minWindowsVersion" koji se koristi za provjeru treba li UIA biti omogućen za određeno izdanje Windowsa. (#8422)

segment.source: You can now register to be notified about configuration saves/reset actions via new config.pre_configSave, config.post_configSave, config.pre_configReset, and config.post_configReset actions. (#7598)
segment.target: Sada se možete registrirati da biste bili obaviješteni o radnjama spremanja/resetiranja konfiguracije putem novih radnji config.pre_configSave, config.post_configSave, config.pre_configReset i config.post_configReset. (#7598)

segment.source: config.pre_configSave is used to be notified when NVDA's configuration is about to be saved, and config.post_configSave is called after configuration has been saved.
segment.target: config.pre_configSave se koristi za obavještavanje kada se NVDA konfiguracija sprema za spremanje, a config.post_configSave se poziva nakon spremanja konfiguracije.

segment.source: config.pre_configReset and config.post_configReset includes a factory defaults flag to specify if settings are reloaded from disk (false) or reset to defaults (true).
segment.target: config.pre_configReset i config.post_configReset uključuje zastavicu tvornički zadane postavke koja određuje hoće li se postavke ponovno učitati s diska (false) ili vratiti na zadane postavke (true).

segment.source: config.configProfileSwitch has been renamed to config.post_configProfileSwitch to reflect the fact that this action is called after profile switch takes place. (#7598)
segment.target: config.configProfileSwitch preimenovan je u config.post_configProfileSwitch kako bi odražavao činjenicu da se ta radnja poziva nakon promjene profila. (#7598)

segment.source: UI Automation interfaces updated to Windows 10 October 2018 Update and Server 2019 (IUIAutomation6 / IUIAutomationElement9). (#8473)
segment.target: Sučelja za automatizaciju korisničkog sučelja ažurirana su na Windows 10 ažuriranje za listopad 2018. i Server 2019 (IUIAutomation6 / IUIAutomationElement9). (#8473)

segment.source: This release includes translation updates due to last-minute removal of a feature which caused problems.
segment.target: Ovo izdanje uključuje ažuriranja prijevoda zbog uklanjanja značajke koja je uzrokovala probleme u zadnji čas.

segment.source: Highlights of this release include Support for tables in Kindle for PC, support for HumanWare BrailleNote Touch and BI14 Braille displays, Improvements to both Onecore and Sapi5 speech synthesizers, improvements in Microsoft Outlook and much more.
segment.target: Istaknuti dijelovi ovog izdanja uključuju podršku za tablice u Kindleu za PC, podršku za HumanWare BrailleNote Touch i BI14 Brailleove zaslone, poboljšanja Onecore i Sapi5 sintisajzera govora, poboljšanja u programu Microsoft Outlook i još mnogo toga.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove značajke

segment.source: row and column span for table cells is now reported in speech and braille. (#2642)
segment.target: Raspon redaka i stupaca za ćelije tablice sada se izvještava u govoru i Brailleovom pismu. (#2642)

segment.source: NVDA table navigation commands are now supported in Google Docs (with Braille mode enabled). (#7946)
segment.target: Naredbe za navigaciju NVDA tablicom sada su podržane u Google dokumentima (s omogućenim Brailleovim modom). (#7946)

segment.source: Added ability to read and navigate tables in Kindle for PC. (#7977)
segment.target: Dodana je mogućnost čitanja i navigacije tablicama u Kindleu za PC. (#7977)

segment.source: Support for HumanWare BrailleNote touch and Brailliant BI 14 braille displays via both USB and bluetooth. (#6524)
segment.target: Podrška za HumanWare BrailleNote touch i Brailliant BI 14 brajice putem USB-a i Bluetootha. (#6524)

segment.source: In Windows 10 Fall Creators Update and later, NVDA can announce notifications from apps such as Calculator and Windows Store. (#7984)
segment.target: U Windows 10 Fall Creators Update i novijim verzijama, NVDA može najavljivati obavijesti iz aplikacija kao što su Kalkulator i Windows Store. (#7984)

segment.source: New braille translation tables: Lithuanian 8 dot, Ukrainian, Mongolian grade 2. (#7839)
segment.target: Nove tablice za prijevod Brailleovog pisma: litavski 8 točaka, ukrajinski, mongolski razred 2. (#7839)

segment.source: Added a script to report formatting information for the text under a specific braille cell. (#7106)
segment.target: Dodana je skripta za izvješćivanje o informacijama o oblikovanju teksta ispod određene ćelije brajice. (#7106)

segment.source: When updating NVDA, it is now possible to postpone the installation of the update to a later moment. (#4263)
segment.target: Prilikom ažuriranja NVDA-a sada je moguće odgoditi instalaciju ažuriranja za kasniji trenutak. (#4263)

segment.source: New languages: Mongolian, Swiss German.
segment.target: Novi jezici: mongolski, švicarski njemački.

segment.source: You can now toggle control, shift, alt, windows and NVDA from your braille keyboard and combine these modifiers with braille input (e.g. press control+s). (#7306)
segment.target: Sada možete prebacivati control, shift, alt, windows i NVDA s brajice i kombinirati te modifikatore s brajičnim unosom (npr. pritisnite control+s). (#7306)

segment.source: You can assign these new modifier toggles using the commands found under Emulated system keyboard keys in the Input gestures dialog.
segment.target: Ove nove prekidače modifikatora možete dodijeliti pomoću naredbi koje se nalaze u odjeljku Emulirane tipke sistemske tipkovnice u dijaloškom okviru Geste unosa.

segment.source: Restored support for Handy Tech Braillino and Modular (with old firmware) displays. (#8016)
segment.target: Vraćena podrška za Handy Tech Braillino i Modular (sa starim firmware) zaslonima. (#8016)

segment.source: Date and time for supported Handy Tech devices (such as Active Braille and Active Star) will now automatically be synchronized by NVDA when out of sync more than five seconds. (#8016)
segment.target: Datum i vrijeme za podržane Handy Tech uređaje (kao što su Active Braille i Active Star) sada će se automatski sinkronizirati od strane NVDA kada nisu sinkronizirani dulje od pet sekundi. (#8016)

segment.source: An input gesture can be assigned to temporarily disable all configuration profile triggers. (#4935)
segment.target: Može se dodijeliti gesta unosa kako bi se privremeno onemogućili svi okidači konfiguracijskog profila. (#4935)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: The status column in the addons manager has been changed to indicate if the addon is enabled or disabled rather than running or suspended. (#7929)
segment.target: Stupac statusa u upravitelju dodataka promijenjen je kako bi se naznačilo je li dodatak omogućen ili onemogućen, a ne pokrenut ili obustavljen. (#7929)

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to 3.5.0. (#7839)
segment.target: Ažuriran prevoditelj brajice liblouis na 3.5.0. (#7839)

segment.source: The Lithuanian braille table has been renamed to Lithuanian 6 dot to avoid confusion with the new 8 dot table. (#7839)
segment.target: Litavska tablica na Brailleovom pismu preimenovana je u litavsku tablicu sa 6 točaka kako bi se izbjegla zabuna s novom tablicom s 8 točaka. (#7839)

segment.source: The French (Canada) grade 1 and grade 2 tables have been removed. Instead, the French (unified) 6 dot computer braille and Grade 2 tables will be used respectively. (#7839)
segment.target: Francuske (Kanada) tablice 1. i 2. razreda su uklonjene. Umjesto toga, koristit će se francuska (ujedinjena) računalna brajica sa 6 točaka i tablice 2. stupnja. (#7839)

segment.source: The secondary routing buttons on Alva BC6, EuroBraille and Papenmeier braille displays now report formatting information for the text under the braille cell of that button. (#7106)
segment.target: Sekundarni gumbi za usmjeravanje na Alva BC6, EuroBrailleovom i Papenmeierovom Brailleovom pismu sada izvještavaju o informacijama o oblikovanju teksta ispod brajice tog gumba. (#7106)

segment.source: Contracted braille input tables will automatically fall back to uncontracted mode in non-editable cases (i.e. controls where there is no cursor or in browse mode). (#7306)
segment.target: Skraćene tablice za unos Brailleovog pisma automatski će se vratiti u neskraćeni način rada u slučajevima koji se ne mogu uređivati (tj. kontrole u kojima nema pokazivača ili u načinu pregledavanja). (#7306)

segment.source: NVDA is now less verbose when an appointment or time slot in the Outlook calendar covers an entire day. (#7949)
segment.target: NVDA je sada manje opširan kada termin ili termin u Outlook kalendaru pokriva cijeli dan. (#7949)

segment.source: All of NVDA's Preferences can now be found in one settings dialog under NVDA Menu -> Preferences -> Settings, rather than scattered throughout many dialogs. (#577)
segment.target: Sve NVDA postavke sada se mogu pronaći u jednom dijaloškom okviru postavki pod NVDA izbornikom -> Postavke -> Postavke, umjesto da su razbacane po mnogim dijaloškim okvirima. (#577)

segment.source: The default speech synthesizer when running on Windows 10 is now oneCore speech rather than eSpeak. (#8176)
segment.target: Zadani sintisajzer govora kada se izvodi u sustavu Windows 10 sada je oneCore govor, a ne eSpeak. (#8176)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci grešaka

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to read focused controls in the Microsoft Account sign-in screen in Settings after entering an email address. (#7997)
segment.target: NVDA više ne uspijeva čitati fokusirane kontrole na zaslonu za prijavu na Microsoftov račun u Postavkama nakon unosa adrese e-pošte. (#7997)

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to read the page when going back to a previous page in Microsoft Edge. (#7997)
segment.target: NVDA više ne uspijeva pročitati stranicu kada se vratite na prethodnu stranicu u Microsoft Edgeu. (#7997)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer incorrectly announce the final character of a windows 10 sign-in PIN as the machine unlocks. (#7908)
segment.target: NVDA više neće pogrešno najavljivati konačni znak PIN-a za prijavu na Windows 10 dok se uređaj otključava. (#7908)

segment.source: Labels of checkboxes and radio buttons in Chrome and Firefox are no longer reported twice when tabbing or using quick navigation in Browse mode. (#7960)
segment.target: Oznake potvrdnih okvira i izbornih gumba u Chromeu i Firefoxu više se ne prijavljuju dvaput prilikom kartice ili upotrebe brze navigacije u načinu pregledavanja. (#7960)

segment.source: aria-current with a value of false will be announced as "false" instead of "true". (#7892).
segment.target: aria-current s vrijednošću false bit će objavljen kao "false" umjesto "true". (#7892).

segment.source: Windows OneCore Voices no longer fails to load if the configured voice has been uninstalled. (#7553)
segment.target: Windows OneCore Voices više se ne učitava ako je konfigurirani glas deinstaliran. (#7553)

segment.source: Changing voices in the Windows OneCore Voices is now a lot faster. (#7999)
segment.target: Promjena glasova u Windows OneCore Voices sada je puno brža. (#7999)

segment.source: Fixed malformed braille output for several braille tables, including capital signs in 8 dot contracted Danish braille. (#7526, #7693)
segment.target: Popravljen je neispravan izlaz Brailleovog pisma za nekoliko tablica na Brailleovom pismu, uključujući velike znakove u danskom Brailleovom pismu sa skraćenim 8 točaka. (#7526, #7693)

segment.source: NVDA can now report more bullet types in Microsoft Word. (#6778)
segment.target: NVDA sada može prijaviti više vrsta grafičkih oznaka u programu Microsoft Word. (#6778)

segment.source: Pressing the report formatting script no longer incorrectly moves the reviewPosition and therefore pressing it multiple times no longer gives different results. (#7869)
segment.target: Pritiskom na skriptu za oblikovanje izvješća više se ne pomiče reviewPosition pogrešno i stoga višekratni pritisak više ne daje različite rezultate. (#7869)

segment.source: Braille input no longer allows you to use contracted braille in cases where it is not supported (i.e. whole words will no longer be sent to the system outside text content and in browse mode). (#7306)
segment.target: Unos Brailleovog pisma više ne dopušta korištenje ugovorene brajice u slučajevima kada nije podržan (tj. cijele riječi više se neće slati u sustav izvan tekstualnog sadržaja i u načinu pregledavanja). (#7306)

segment.source: Fixed connection stability issues for Handy Tech Easy Braille and Braille Wave displays. (#8016)
segment.target: Riješeni su problemi sa stabilnošću veze za zaslone Handy Tech Easy Braille i Braille Wave. (#8016)

segment.source: On Windows 8 and later, NVDA will no longer announce "unknown" when opening quick link menu )Windows+X) and selecting items from this menu. (#8137)
segment.target: U sustavu Windows 8 i novijim verzijama, NVDA više neće objavljivati "nepoznato" prilikom otvaranja izbornika brzih veza )Windows+X) i odabira stavki iz ovog izbornika. (#8137)

segment.source: Model specific gestures to buttons on Hims displays are now working as advertised in the user guide. (#8096)
segment.target: Geste specifične za model na gumbima na Hims zaslonima sada rade kako je oglašeno u korisničkom priručniku. (#8096)

segment.source: NVDA will now try to correct system COM registration issues causing programs such as Firefox and Internet Explorer to become inaccessible and report "Unknown" by NVDA. (#2807)
segment.target: NVDA će sada pokušati ispraviti probleme s registracijom COM-a sustava uzrokujući da programi kao što su Firefox i Internet Explorer postanu nedostupni i prijave "Nepoznato" od strane NVDA-e. (#2807)

segment.source: Worked around a bug in Task Manager causing NVDA to not allow users to access the contents of specific details about processes. (#8147)
segment.target: Zaobišao je grešku u Upravitelju zadataka zbog koje NVDA ne dopušta korisnicima pristup sadržaju određenih detalja o procesima. (#8147)

segment.source: Newer Microsoft SAPI5 voices no longer lag at the end of speech, making it much more efficient to navigate with these voices. (#8174)
segment.target: Noviji glasovi Microsoft SAPI5 više ne zaostaju na kraju govora, što čini navigaciju s tim glasovima mnogo učinkovitijom. (#8174)

segment.source: NVDA no longer reports (LTR and RTL marks) in Braille or per-character speech when accessing the clock in recent versions of Windows. (#5729)
segment.target: NVDA više ne izvještava (LTR i RTL oznake) na Brailleovom pismu ili govoru po znaku prilikom pristupa satu u novijim verzijama sustava Windows. (#5729)

segment.source: Detection of scroll keys on Hims Smart Beetle displays is once more no longer unreliable. (#6086)
segment.target: Otkrivanje tipki za pomicanje na zaslonima Hims Smart Beetle ponovno nije nepouzdano. (#6086)

segment.source: In some text controls, particularly in Delphi applications, the information provided about editing and navigating is now much more reliable. (#636, #8102)
segment.target: U nekim tekstualnim kontrolama, posebno u Delphi aplikacijama, informacije o uređivanju i navigaciji sada su mnogo pouzdanije. (#636, #8102)

segment.source: In Windows 10 RS5, NVDA no longer reports extra redundant information when switching tasks with alt+tab. (#8258)
segment.target: U sustavu Windows 10 RS5 NVDA više ne izvještava o dodatnim suvišnim informacijama prilikom prebacivanja zadataka pomoću alt+tab. (#8258)

segment.source: Changes for developers
segment.target: Promjene za razvojne programere

segment.source: The developer info for UIA objects now contains a list of the UIA patterns available. (#5712)
segment.target: Informacije za razvojne inženjere za UIA objekte sada sadrže popis dostupnih UIA uzoraka. (#5712)

segment.source: App modules can now force certain windows to always use UIA by implementing the isGoodUIAWindow method. (#7961)
segment.target: Moduli aplikacije sada mogu prisiliti određene prozore da uvijek koriste UIA implementacijom metode isGoodUIAWindow. (#7961)

segment.source: The hidden boolean flag "outputPass1Only" in the braille section of the configuration has again been removed. Liblouis no longer supports pass 1 only output. (#7839)
segment.target: Skrivena logička oznaka "outputPass1Only" u odjeljku Brailleovog pisma konfiguracije ponovno je uklonjena. Liblouis više ne podržava izlaz samo za prolaz 1. (#7839)

segment.source: This is a special release of NVDA which addresses a bug in the Onecore Windows Speech synthesizer driver, which was causing it to speak with a higher pitch and speed in Windows 10 Redstone 4 (1803). (#8082)
segment.target: Ovo je posebno izdanje NVDA koje rješava grešku u upravljačkom programu Onecore Windows Speech sintisajzera, zbog čega je govorio s većom visinom i brzinom u sustavu Windows 10 Redstone 4 (1803). (#8082)

segment.source: Highlights of this release include support for charts in Microsoft word and PowerPoint, support for new braille displays including Eurobraille and the Optelec protocol converter, improved support for Hims and Optelec braille displays, performance improvements for Mozilla Firefox 58 and higher, and much more.
segment.target: Istaknuti dijelovi ovog izdanja uključuju podršku za grafikone u Microsoft Wordu i PowerPointu, podršku za nove Brailleove zaslone uključujući Eurobraille i pretvarač protokola Optelec, poboljšanu podršku za Brailleove zaslone Hims i Optelec, poboljšanja performansi za Mozilla Firefox 58 i novije verzije i još mnogo toga.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove značajke

segment.source: It is now possible to interact with charts in Microsoft Word and Microsoft PowerPoint, similar to the existing support for charts in Microsoft Excel. (#7046)
segment.target: Sada je moguća interakcija s grafikonima u programima Microsoft Word i Microsoft PowerPoint, slično postojećoj podršci za grafikone u programu Microsoft Excel. (#7046)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word: When in browse mode, cursor to an embedded chart and press enter to interact with it.
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Word: Kada ste u načinu pregledavanja, pokazivač na ugrađeni grafikon i pritisnite enter za interakciju s njim.

segment.source: In Microsoft PowerPoint when editing a slide: tab to a chart object, and press enter or space to interact with the chart.
segment.target: U programu Microsoft PowerPoint prilikom uređivanja slajda: tabulatorom do objekta grafikona i pritisnite enter ili razmaknicu za interakciju s grafikonom.

segment.source: To stop interacting with a chart, press escape.
segment.target: Da biste zaustavili interakciju s grafikonom, pritisnite escape.

segment.source: New language: Kyrgyz.
segment.target: Novi jezik: kirgiski.

segment.source: Added support for VitalSource Bookshelf. (#7155)
segment.target: Dodana podrška za VitalSource Bookshelf. (#7155)

segment.source: Added support for the Optelec protocol converter, a device that allows one to use Braille Voyager and Satellite displays using the ALVA BC6 communication protocol. (#6731)
segment.target: Dodana je podrška za pretvarač protokola Optelec, uređaj koji omogućuje korištenje Brailleovog Voyagera i satelitskih zaslona pomoću komunikacijskog protokola ALVA BC6. (#6731)

segment.source: It is now possible to use braille input with an ALVA 640 Comfort braille display. (#7733)
segment.target: Sada je moguće koristiti Brailleov ulaz s ALVA 640 Comfort brajičnim pismom. (#7733)

segment.source: NVDA's braille input functionality can be used with these as well as other BC6 displays with firmware 3.0.0 and above.
segment.target: NVDA funkcija brajičnog unosa može se koristiti s ovim, kao i s drugim BC6 zaslonima s firmverom 3.0.0 i novijim.

segment.source: Early support for Google Sheets with Braille mode enabled. (#7935)
segment.target: Rana podrška za Google tablice s omogućenim načinom rada Brailleovog pisma. (#7935)

segment.source: Support for Eurobraille Esys, Esytime and Iris braille displays. (#7488)
segment.target: Podrška za Eurobraille Esys, Esytime i Iris Brailleove zaslone. (#7488)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: The HIMS Braille Sense/Braille EDGE/Smart Beetle and Hims Sync Braille display drivers have been replaced by one driver. The new driver will automatically be activated for former syncBraille driver users. (#7459)
segment.target: Upravljački programi HIMS Braille Sense/Braille EDGE/Smart Beetle i Hims Sync Brailleovog zaslona zamijenjeni su jednim upravljačkim programom. Novi upravljački program automatski će se aktivirati za bivše korisnike upravljačkog programa za sinkronizaciju Brailleovog pisma. (#7459)

segment.source: Some keys , notably scroll keys, have been reassigned to follow the conventions used by Hims products. Consult the user guide for more details.
segment.target: Neke tipke, posebno tipke za pomicanje, preraspoređene su kako bi slijedile konvencije koje koriste Himsovi proizvodi. Za više detalja pogledajte korisnički priručnik.

segment.source: When typing with the on-screen keyboard via touch interaction, by default you now need to double tap each key the same way you would activate any other control. (#7309)
segment.target: Kada tipkate zaslonskom tipkovnicom putem interakcije dodirom, prema zadanim postavkama sada morate dvaput dodirnuti svaku tipku na isti način na koji biste aktivirali bilo koju drugu kontrolu. (#7309)

segment.source: To use the existing "touch typing" mode where simply lifting your finger off the key is enough to activate it, Enable this option in the new Touch Interaction settings dialog found in the Preferences menu.
segment.target: Da biste koristili postojeći način "tipkanja dodirom" u kojem je jednostavno podizanje prsta s tipke dovoljno da biste ga aktivirali, omogućite ovu opciju u novom dijaloškom okviru postavki interakcije dodirom koji se nalazi u izborniku Postavke.

segment.source: It is no longer necessary to explicitly tether braille to focus or review, as this will happen automatically by default. (#2385)
segment.target: Više nije potrebno izričito vezati Brailleovo pismo za fokusiranje ili pregled jer će se to automatski dogoditi prema zadanim postavkama. (#2385)

segment.source: Note that automatic tethering to review will only occur when using a review cursor or object navigation command. Scrolling will not activate this new behavior.
segment.target: Imajte na umu da će se automatsko povezivanje za pregled dogoditi samo kada koristite pokazivač pregleda ili naredbu za navigaciju objektom. Pomicanje neće aktivirati ovo novo ponašanje.

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci grešaka

segment.source: Browseable messages such as showing current formatting when pressing NVDA+f twice quickly no longer fails when NVDA is installed on a path with non-ASCII characters. (#7474)
segment.target: Poruke koje se mogu pregledavati, kao što je prikaz trenutnog formatiranja kada se dvaput brzo pritisne NVDA+f, više ne uspijevaju kada je NVDA instaliran na putu s ne-ASCII znakovima. (#7474)

segment.source: Focus is now once again restored correctly when returning to Spotify from another application. (#7689)
segment.target: Fokus se sada ponovno ispravno vraća kada se vratite na Spotify iz druge aplikacije. (#7689)

segment.source: In Windows 10 Fall Creaters Update, NVDA no longer fails to update when Controlled Folder Access is enabled from Windows Defender Security Center. (#7696)
segment.target: U Windows 10 Fall Creaters Update, NVDA se više ne ažurira kada je omogućen kontrolirani pristup mapi iz Windows Defender Security Centera. (#7696)

segment.source: Detection of scroll keys on Hims Smart Beetle displays is no longer unreliable. (#6086)
segment.target: Otkrivanje tipki za pomicanje na zaslonima Hims Smart Beetle više nije nepouzdano. (#6086)

segment.source: A slight performance improvement when rendering large amounts of content in Mozilla Firefox 58 and later. (#7719)
segment.target: Blago poboljšanje performansi pri renderiranju velikih količina sadržaja u Mozilla Firefoxu 58 i novijim verzijama. (#7719)

segment.source: In Microsoft Outlook, reading emails containing tables no longer causes errors. (#6827)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Outlook čitanje e-pošte koja sadrži tablice više ne uzrokuje pogreške. (#6827)

segment.source: Braille display gestures that emulate system keyboard key modifiers can now also be combined with other emulated system keyboard keys if one or more of the involved gestures are model specific. (#7783)
segment.target: Geste na Brailleovom pismu koje oponašaju modifikatore tipki tipkovnice sustava sada se mogu kombinirati i s drugim emuliranim tipkama tipkovnice sustava ako je jedna ili više uključenih gesti specifično za model. (#7783)

segment.source: In Mozilla Firefox, browse mode now works correctly in pop-ups created by extensions such as LastPass and bitwarden. (#7809)
segment.target: U pregledniku Mozilla Firefox, način pregledavanja sada ispravno funkcionira u skočnim prozorima koje stvaraju proširenja kao što su LastPass i bitwarden. (#7809)

segment.source: NVDA no longer sometimes freezes on every focus change if Firefox or Chrome have stopped responding such as due to a freeze or crash. (#7818)
segment.target: NVDA se više ne zamrzava pri svakoj promjeni fokusa ako Firefox ili Chrome prestanu reagirati, primjerice zbog zamrzavanja ili rušenja. (#7818)

segment.source: In twitter clients such as Chicken Nugget, NVDA will no longer ignore the last 20 characters of 280 character tweets when reading them. (#7828)
segment.target: U twitter klijentima kao što je Chicken Nugget, NVDA više neće ignorirati posljednjih 20 znakova od 280 znakova tweetova kada ih čita. (#7828)

segment.source: NVDA now uses the correct language when announcing symbols when text is selected. (#7687)
segment.target: NVDA sada koristi ispravan jezik prilikom najavljivanja simbola kada je odabran tekst. (#7687)

segment.source: In recent versions of Office 365, it is again possible to navigate Excel charts using the arrow keys. (#7046)
segment.target: U novijim verzijama sustava Office 365 ponovno je moguće kretati se Excel grafikonima pomoću tipki sa strelicama. (#7046)

segment.source: In speech and braille output, control states will now always be reported in the same order, regardless whether they are positive or negative. (#7076)
segment.target: U govoru i Brailleovom pismu, kontrolna stanja sada će se uvijek izvještavati istim redoslijedom, bez obzira jesu li pozitivna ili negativna. (#7076)

segment.source: In apps such as Windows 10 Mail, NVDA will no longer fail to announce deleted characters when pressing backspace. (#7456)
segment.target: U aplikacijama kao što je Windows 10 Mail, NVDA više neće propuštati najavljivati izbrisane znakove kada pritisnete backspace. (#7456)

segment.source: All keys on the Hims Braille Sense Polaris displays are now working as expected. (#7865)
segment.target: Sve tipke na zaslonima Hims Braille Sense Polaris sada rade prema očekivanjima. (#7865)

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to start on Windows 7 complaining about an internal api-ms dll, when a particular version of the Visual Studio 2017 redistributables have been installed by another application. (#7975)
segment.target: NVDA se više ne pokreće u sustavu Windows 7 koji se žali na interni api-ms dll, kada je određena verzija programa Visual Studio 2017 za redistribuciju instalirana u drugoj aplikaciji. (#7975)

segment.source: Changes for developers
segment.target: Promjene za razvojne programere

segment.source: Added a hidden boolean flag to the braille section in the configuration: "outputPass1Only". (#7301, #7693, #7702)
segment.target: Dodana je skrivena logička zastavica u odjeljak brajice u konfiguraciji: "outputPass1Only". (#7301, #7693, #7702)

segment.source: This flag defaults to true. If false, liblouis multi pass rules will be used for braille output.
segment.target: Ova zastavica je zadana na true. Ako je netočno, liblouis multi pass pravila koristit će se za Brailleov izlaz.

segment.source: A new dictionary (braille.RENAMED_DRIVERS) has been added to allow for smooth transition for users using drivers that have been superseded by others. (#7459)
segment.target: Novi rječnik (Brailleovo pismo. RENAMED_DRIVERS) je dodan kako bi se omogućio nesmetan prijelaz za korisnike koji koriste upravljačke programe koje su zamijenili drugi. (#7459)

segment.source: Updated comtypes package to 1.1.3. (#7831)
segment.target: Ažuriran paket komtipova na 1.1.3. (#7831)

segment.source: Implemented a generic system in braille.BrailleDisplayDriver to deal with displays which send confirmation/acknowledgement packets. See the handyTech braille display driver as an example. (#7590, #7721)
segment.target: Implementiran je generički sustav na Brailleovom pismu. BrailleDisplayDriver za rad sa zaslonima koji šalju pakete potvrde/potvrde. Pogledajte handyTech upravljački program za brajicu kao primjer. (#7590, #7721)

segment.source: A new "isAppX" variable in the config module can be used to detect if NVDA is running as a Windows Desktop Bridge Store app. (#7851)
segment.target: Nova varijabla "isAppX" u konfiguracijskom modulu može se koristiti za otkrivanje radi li NVDA kao Windows Desktop Bridge Store aplikacija. (#7851)

segment.source: For document implementations such as NVDAObjects or browseMode that have a textInfo, there is now a new documentBase.documentWithTableNavigation class that can be inherited from to gain standard table navigation scripts. Please refer to this class to see which helper methods must be provided by your implementation for table navigation to work. (#7849)
segment.target: Za implementacije dokumenata kao što su NVDAObjects ili browseMode koje imaju textInfo, sada postoji nova klasa documentBase.documentWithTableNavigation koja se može naslijediti da bi se dobile standardne skripte za navigaciju tablicama. Molimo pogledajte ovaj razred da biste vidjeli koje pomoćne metode mora osigurati vaša implementacija da bi navigacija tablicom funkcionirala. (#7849)

segment.source: The scons batch file now better handles when Python 3 is also installed, making use of the launcher to specifically launch python 2.7 32 bit. (#7541)
segment.target: Skupna datoteka scons sada se bolje nosi kada je instaliran i Python 3, koristeći pokretač za posebno pokretanje pythona 2.7 32 bita. (#7541)

segment.source: hwIo.Hid now takes an additional parameter exclusive, which defaults to True. If set to False, other applications are allowed to communicate with a device while it is connected to NVDA. (#7859)
segment.target: hwIo.Hid sada uzima dodatni parametar exclusive, koji je zadani True. Ako je postavljeno na False, drugim aplikacijama dopušteno je komunicirati s uređajem dok je povezan s NVDA. (#7859)

segment.source: Highlights of this release include many fixes and enhancements to web support including browse mode for web dialogs by default, better reporting of field group labels in browse mode, support for new Windows 10 technologies such as Windows Defender Application Guard and Windows 10 on ARM64, and automatic reporting of screen orientation and battery status.
segment.target: Istaknuti dijelovi ovog izdanja uključuju mnoge popravke i poboljšanja web-podrške, uključujući način pregledavanja za web-dijaloške okvire prema zadanim postavkama, bolje izvješćivanje o oznakama grupa polja u načinu pregledavanja, podršku za nove tehnologije sustava Windows 10 kao što su Windows Defender Application Guard i Windows 10 na ARM64 te automatsko izvješćivanje o orijentaciji zaslona i statusu baterije.

segment.source: Please note that this version of NVDA no longer supports Windows XP or Windows Vista. The minimum requirement for NVDA is now windows 7 with Service Pack 1.
segment.target: Imajte na umu da ova verzija NVDA više ne podržava Windows XP ili Windows Vista. Minimalni preduvjet za NVDA sada je Windows 7 sa servisnim paketom Service Pack 1.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove značajke

segment.source: In browse mode, it is now possible to skip past/to the start of landmarks using the skip to end/beginning of container commands (comma/shift+comma). (#5482)
segment.target: U načinu pregledavanja, sada je moguće preskočiti pored/na početak orijentira pomoću naredbi "preskoči na kraj/početak kontejnera" (zarez/shift+zarez). (#5482)

segment.source: In Firefox, Chrome and Internet Explorer, quick navigation to edit fields and form fields now includes editable rich text content (I.e. contentEditable). (#5534)
segment.target: U Firefoxu, Chromeu i Internet Exploreru brza navigacija za uređivanje polja i polja obrazaca sada uključuje sadržaj obogaćenog teksta koji se može uređivati (tj. (#5534)

segment.source: In web browsers, the Elements List can now list form fields and buttons. (#588)
segment.target: U web-preglednicima popis elemenata sada može navesti polja i gumbe obrasca. (#588)

segment.source: Initial support for Windows 10 on ARM64. (#7508)
segment.target: Početna podrška za Windows 10 na ARM64. (#7508)

segment.source: Early support for reading and interactive navigation of mathematical content for Kindle books with accessible math. (#7536)
segment.target: Rana podrška za čitanje i interaktivnu navigaciju matematičkim sadržajem za Kindle knjige s pristupačnom matematikom. (#7536)

segment.source: Added support for Azardi e-book reader. (#5848)
segment.target: Dodana podrška za Azardi čitač e-knjiga. (#5848)

segment.source: Version information for add-ons is now reported when being updated. (#5324)
segment.target: Informacije o verziji dodataka sada se prijavljuju prilikom ažuriranja. (#5324)

segment.source: Added new command line parameters to create a portable copy of NVDA. (#6329)
segment.target: Dodani su novi parametri naredbenog retka za stvaranje prijenosne kopije NVDA. (#6329)

segment.source: Support for Microsoft Edge running within Windows Defender Application Guard in Windows 10 Fall Creators Update. (#7600)
segment.target: Podrška za Microsoft Edge koji se izvodi unutar Windows Defender Application Guarda u Windows 10 Fall Creators Update. (#7600)

segment.source: If running on a laptop or tablet, NVDA will now report when a charger is connected/disconnected, and when the screen orientation changes. (#4574, #4612)
segment.target: Ako radi na prijenosnom računalu ili tabletu, NVDA će sada izvijestiti kada je punjač spojen/isključen i kada se promijeni orijentacija zaslona. (#4574, #4612)

segment.source: New language: Macedonian.
segment.target: Novi jezik: makedonski.

segment.source: New braille translation tables: Croatian grade 1, Vietnamese grade 1. (#7518, #7565)
segment.target: Nove tablice prijevoda na Brailleovom pismu: hrvatski razred 1, vijetnamski razred 1. razred. (#7518, #7565)

segment.source: Support for the Actilino braille display from Handy Tech has been added. (#7590)
segment.target: Dodana je podrška za Actilino Brailleov zaslon tvrtke Handy Tech. (#7590)

segment.source: Braille input for Handy Tech braille displays is now supported. (#7590)
segment.target: Unos brajice za zaslone za Brailleovo pismo Handy Tech sada je podržan. (#7590)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: The minimum supported Operating System for NVDA is now Windows 7 Service Pack 1, or Windows Server 2008 R2 Service Pack 1. (#7546)
segment.target: Minimalni podržani operativni sustav za NVDA sada je Windows 7 Service Pack 1 ili Windows Server 2008 R2 Service Pack 1. (#7546)

segment.source: Web dialogs in Firefox and Chrome web browsers now automatically use browse Mode, unless inside of a web application. (#4493)
segment.target: Web dijaloški okviri u Firefox i Chrome web preglednicima sada automatski koriste način pregledavanja, osim ako se ne nalaze u web aplikaciji. (#4493)

segment.source: In browse mode, tabbing and moving with quick navigation commands no longer announces jumping out of containers such as lists and tables, which makes navigating more efficient. (#2591)
segment.target: U načinu pregledavanja, tabulatori i pomicanje pomoću naredbi za brzu navigaciju više ne najavljuju iskakanje iz spremnika kao što su popisi i tablice, što navigaciju čini učinkovitijom. (#2591)

segment.source: In Browse mode for Firefox and Chrome, the name of form field groups are now announced when moving into them with quick navigation or when tabbing. (#3321)
segment.target: U načinu pregledavanja za Firefox i Chrome, nazivi grupa polja obrasca sada se najavljuju kada se krećete u njih brzom navigacijom ili prilikom kartice. (#3321)

segment.source: In browse mode, the quick navigation command for embedded objects (o and shift+o) now includes audio and video elements as well as elements with the aria roles application and dialog. (#7239)
segment.target: U načinu pregledavanja, naredba za brzu navigaciju za ugrađene objekte (o i shift+o) sada uključuje audio i video elemente, kao i elemente s aplikacijom aria uloga i dijaloškim okvirom. (#7239)

segment.source: Espeak-ng has been updated to 1.49.2, resolving some issues with producing release builds. (#7385, #7583)
segment.target: Espeak-ng je ažuriran na 1.49.2, rješavajući neke probleme s proizvodnjom verzija izdanja. (#7385, #7583)

segment.source: On the third activation of the 'read status bar' command, its contents is copied to the clipboard. (#1785)
segment.target: Pri trećoj aktivaciji naredbe 'čitaj statusnu traku', njezin se sadržaj kopira u međuspremnik. (#1785)

segment.source: When assigning gestures to keys on a Baum display, you can limit them to the model of the braille display in use (e.g. VarioUltra or Pronto). (#7517)
segment.target: Kada dodjeljujete geste tipkama na Baumovom zaslonu, možete ih ograničiti na model zaslona za brajicu koji se koristi (npr. VarioUltra ili Pronto). (#7517)

segment.source: The hotkey for the filter field in the elements list in browse mode has changed from alt+f to alt+e. (#7569)
segment.target: Prečac za polje filtra na popisu elemenata u načinu pregledavanja promijenio se iz alt+f u alt+e. (#7569)

segment.source: An unbound command has been added for browse mode to toggle the inclusion of layout tables on the fly. You can find this command in the Browse mode category of the Input Gestures dialog. (#7634)
segment.target: Dodana je nevezana naredba za način pregledavanja kako bi se uključilo uključivanje tablica izgleda u hodu. Ovu naredbu možete pronaći u kategoriji Način pregledavanja u dijaloškom okviru Ulazne geste. (#7634)

segment.source: Upgraded liblouis braille translator to 3.3.0. (#7565)
segment.target: Nadograđen liblouis prevoditelj brajice na 3.3.0. (#7565)

segment.source: The hotkey for the regular expression radio button in the dictionary dialog has changed from alt+r to alt+e. (#6782)
segment.target: Prečac za izborni gumb regularnog izraza u dijaloškom okviru rječnika promijenio se iz alt+r u alt+e. (#6782)

segment.source: Voice dictionary files are now versioned and have been moved to the 'speechDicts/voiceDicts.v1' directory. (#7592)
segment.target: Datoteke glasovnog rječnika sada su verzionirane i premještene su u direktorij 'speechDicts/voiceDicts.v1'. (#7592)

segment.source: Versioned files (user configuration, voice dictionaries) modifications are no longer saved when NVDA is run from the launcher. (#7688)
segment.target: Izmjene verzija datoteka (korisnička konfiguracija, glasovni rječnici) više se ne spremaju kada se NVDA pokrene iz pokretača. (#7688)

segment.source: The Braillino, Bookworm and Modular (with old firmware) braille displays from Handy Tech are no longer supported out of the box. Install the Handy Tech Universal Driver and NVDA add-on to use these displays. (#7590)
segment.target: Braillino, Bookworm i Modular (sa starim firmware) Braillino, Bookworm i modularni (sa starim firmware) zasloni za brajicu tvrtke Handy Tech više nisu podržani iz kutije. Instalirajte Handy Tech Universal Driver i NVDA dodatak za korištenje ovih zaslona. (#7590)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci grešaka

segment.source: Links are now indicated in braille in applications such as Microsoft Word. (#6780)
segment.target: Veze su sada označene na Brailleovom pismu u aplikacijama kao što je Microsoft Word. (#6780)

segment.source: NVDA no longer becomes noticeably slower when many tabs are open in either Firefox or Chrome web browsers. (#3138)
segment.target: NVDA više ne postaje osjetno sporiji kada je otvoreno mnogo kartica u Firefox ili Chrome web preglednicima. (#3138)

segment.source: Cursor routing for the MDV Lilli Braille display no longer incorrectly moves one braille cell ahead of where it should be. (#7469)
segment.target: Usmjeravanje kursora za MDV Lilli Brailleov zaslon više se ne pomiče pogrešno za jednu Brajicovu ćeliju ispred mjesta na kojem bi trebala biti. (#7469)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer and other MSHTML documents, the HTML5 required attribute is now supported to indicate the required state of a form field. (#7321)
segment.target: U pregledniku Internet Explorer i drugim MSHTML dokumentima sada je podržan obavezni atribut HTML5 koji označava obavezno stanje polja obrasca. (#7321)

segment.source: Braille displays are now updated when typing Arabic characters in a left-aligned WordPad document. (#511)
segment.target: Brajičevi se zasloni sada ažuriraju prilikom upisivanja arapskih znakova u dokument programa WordPad poravnat ulijevo. (#511)

segment.source: Accessible labels for controls in Mozilla Firefox are now more readily reported in browse mode when the label does not appear as content itself. (#4773)
segment.target: Pristupačne oznake za kontrole u Mozilla Firefoxu sada se lakše prijavljuju u načinu pregledavanja kada se oznaka ne pojavljuje kao sam sadržaj. (#4773)

segment.source: On windows 10 Creaters Update, NVDA can again access Firefox after a restart of NVDA. (#7269)
segment.target: Na Windows 10 Creaters Updateu, NVDA može ponovno pristupiti Firefoxu nakon ponovnog pokretanja NVDA-a. (#7269)

segment.source: When restarting NVDA with Mozilla Firefox in focus, browse mode will again be available, though you may need to alt+tab away and back again. (#5758)
segment.target: Prilikom ponovnog pokretanja NVDA s Mozilla Firefoxom u fokusu, način pregledavanja će ponovno biti dostupan, iako ćete možda morati isključiti alt+tab i ponovno natrag. (#5758)

segment.source: It is now possible to access math content in Google Chrome on a system with out Mozilla Firefox installed. (#7308)
segment.target: Sada je moguće pristupiti matematičkom sadržaju u pregledniku Google Chrome na sustavu bez instaliranog Mozilla Firefoxa. (#7308)

segment.source: The Operating System and other applications should be more stable directly after installing NVDA before rebooting, as compaired with installs of previous NVDA versions. (#7563)
segment.target: Operativni sustav i druge aplikacije trebale bi biti stabilnije neposredno nakon instalacije NVDA prije ponovnog pokretanja, u usporedbi s instalacijama prethodnih NVDA verzija. (#7563)

segment.source: When using a content recognition command (e.g. NVDA+r), NVDA now reports an error message instead of nothing if the navigator object has disappeared. (#7567)
segment.target: Kada koristite naredbu za prepoznavanje sadržaja (npr. NVDA+r), NVDA sada izvještava o pogrešci umjesto ništa ako je objekt navigatora nestao. (#7567)

segment.source: Backward scrolling functionality has been fixed for Freedom Scientific braille displays containing a left bumper bar. (#7713)
segment.target: Ispravljena je funkcija pomicanja unatrag za Brailleove zaslone Freedom Scientific koji sadrže lijevu šipku branika. (#7713)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: "scons tests" now checks that translatable strings have translator comments. You can also run this alone with "scons checkPot". (#7492)
segment.target: "Scons testovi" sada provjerava imaju li prevodivi nizovi komentare prevoditelja. Ovo možete pokrenuti i sami s "scons checkPot". (#7492)

segment.source: There is now a new extensionPoints module which provides a generic framework to enable code extensibility at specific points in the code. This allows interested parties to register to be notified when some action occurs (extensionPoints.Action), to modify a specific kind of data (extensionPoints.Filter) or to participate in deciding whether something will be done (extensionPoints.Decider). (#3393)
segment.target: Sada postoji novi modul extensionPoints koji pruža generički okvir za omogućavanje proširivosti koda na određenim točkama u kodu. To omogućuje zainteresiranim stranama da se registriraju kako bi bile obaviještene kada se dogodi neka radnja (extensionPoints.Action), da izmijene određenu vrstu podataka (extensionPoints.Filter) ili da sudjeluju u odlučivanju hoće li se nešto poduzeti (extensionPoints.Decider). (#3393)

segment.source: You can now register to be notified about configuration profile switches via the config.configProfileSwitched Action. (#3393)
segment.target: Sada se možete registrirati da biste bili obaviješteni o promjenama konfiguracijskog profila putem radnje config.configProfileSwitched. (#3393)

segment.source: Braille display gestures that emulate system keyboard key modifiers (such as control and alt) can now be combined with other emulated system keyboard keys without explicit definition. (#6213)
segment.target: Geste na Brailleovom pismu koje oponašaju modifikatore tipki tipkovnice sustava (kao što su Control i Alt) sada se mogu kombinirati s drugim emuliranim tipkama tipkovnice sustava bez eksplicitne definicije. (#6213)

segment.source: For example, if you have a key on your display bound to the alt key and another display key to downArrow, combining these keys will result in the emulation of alt+downArrow.
segment.target: Na primjer, ako imate tipku na zaslonu vezanu za tipku alt i drugu tipku za prikaz sa strelicom prema dolje, kombiniranje tih tipki rezultirat će emulacijom alt+downArrow.

segment.source: The braille.BrailleDisplayGesture class now has an extra model property. If provided, pressing a key will generate an additional, model specific gesture identifier. This allows a user to bind gestures limited to a specific braille display model.
segment.target: Brailleovo pismo. Klasa BrailleDisplayGesture sada ima dodatno svojstvo modela. Ako je navedeno, pritiskom na tipku generirat će se dodatni identifikator geste specifičan za model. To korisniku omogućuje povezivanje gesta ograničenih na određeni model Brailleovog pisma.

segment.source: See the baum driver as an example for this new functionality.
segment.target: Pogledajte baum upravljački program kao primjer za ovu novu funkcionalnost.

segment.source: NVDA is now compiled with Visual Studio 2017 and the Windows 10 SDK. (#7568)
segment.target: NVDA je sada kompajliran sa Visual Studio 2017 i Windows 10 SDK. (#7568)

segment.source: Highlights of this release include input of contracted braille, support for new Windows OneCore voices available on Windows 10, in-built support for Windows 10 OCR, and many significant improvements regarding Braille and the web.
segment.target: Istaknuti dijelovi ovog izdanja uključuju unos ugovorene Brailleove pisme, podršku za nove Windows OneCore glasove dostupne u sustavu Windows 10, ugrađenu podršku za Windows 10 OCR i mnoga značajna poboljšanja u vezi s Brailleovim pismom i webom.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove značajke

segment.source: A Braille setting has been added to "show messages indefinitely". (#6669)
segment.target: Dodana je postavka Brailleovog pisma za "prikazivanje poruka na neodređeno vrijeme". (#6669)

segment.source: In Microsoft Outlook message lists, NVDA now reports if a message is flagged. (#6374)
segment.target: Na popisima poruka u programu Microsoft Outlook, NVDA sada izvještava je li poruka označena zastavicom. (#6374)

segment.source: In Microsoft PowerPoint, the exact type of a shape is now reported when editing a slide (such as triangle, circle, video or arrow), rather than just "shape". (#7111)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft PowerPoint sada se prilikom uređivanja slajda (kao što su trokut, krug, videozapis ili strelica) izvješćuje o točnoj vrsti oblika, a ne samo o "obliku". (#7111)

segment.source: Mathematical content (provided as MathML) is now supported in Google Chrome. (#7184)
segment.target: Matematički sadržaj (dostupan kao MathML) sada je podržan u pregledniku Google Chrome. (#7184)

segment.source: NVDA can now speak using the new Windows OneCore voices (also known as Microsoft Mobile voices) included in Windows 10. You access these by selecting Windows OneCore voices in NVDA's Synthesizer dialog. (#6159)
segment.target: NVDA sada može govoriti koristeći nove Windows OneCore glasove (poznate i kao Microsoft Mobile glasovi) uključene u Windows 10. Njima možete pristupiti odabirom Windows OneCore glasova u NVDA dijaloškom okviru sintisajzera. (#6159)

segment.source: NVDA user configuration files can now be stored in the user's local application data folder. This is enabled via a setting in the registry. See "System Wide Parameters" in the User Guide for more details. (#6812)
segment.target: NVDA korisničke konfiguracijske datoteke sada se mogu pohraniti u korisnikovu mapu s podacima lokalne aplikacije. To je omogućeno putem postavke u registru. Za više detalja pogledajte "Parametri za cijeli sustav" u Korisničkom priručniku. (#6812)

segment.source: In web browsers, NVDA now reports placeholder values for fields (specifically, aria-placeholder is now supported). (#7004)
segment.target: U web preglednicima, NVDA sada izvještava o vrijednostima rezerviranih mjesta za polja (točnije, sada je podržano aria-placeholder). (#7004)

segment.source: In Browse mode for Microsoft Word, it is now possible to navigate to spelling errors using quick navigation (w and shift+w). (#6942)
segment.target: U načinu pregledavanja za Microsoft Word sada je moguće navigirati do pravopisnih pogrešaka pomoću brze navigacije (w i shift+w). (#6942)

segment.source: Added support for the Date picker control found in Microsoft Outlook Appointment dialogs. (#7217)
segment.target: Dodana je podrška za kontrolu Odabir datuma koja se nalazi u dijaloškim okvirima Obveze programa Microsoft Outlook. (#7217)

segment.source: The currently selected suggestion is now reported in Windows 10 Mail to/cc fields and the Windows 10 Settings search field. (#6241)
segment.target: Trenutačno odabrani prijedlog sada se prijavljuje u poljima Windows 10 Pošta na/cc i polje za pretraživanje postavki sustava Windows 10. (#6241)

segment.source: A sound is now playd to indicate the appearance of suggestions in certain search fields in Windows 10 (E.g. start screen, settings search, Windows 10 mail to/cc fields). (#6241)
segment.target: Sada se reproducira zvuk koji označava pojavu prijedloga u određenim poljima za pretraživanje u sustavu Windows 10 (npr. početni zaslon, pretraživanje postavki, polja pošte na / cc u sustavu Windows 10). (#6241)

segment.source: NVDA now automatically reports notifications in Skype for Business Desktop, such as when someone starts a conversation with you. (#7281)
segment.target: NVDA sada automatski izvještava o obavijestima u Skype za tvrtke za stolna računala, primjerice kada netko započne razgovor s vama. (#7281)

segment.source: NVDA now automatically reports incoming chat messages while in a Skype for Business conversation. (#7286)
segment.target: NVDA sada automatski izvještava o dolaznim chat porukama dok ste u Skype za Business razgovoru. (#7286)

segment.source: NVDA now automatically reports notifications in Microsoft Edge, such as when a download starts. (#7281)
segment.target: NVDA sada automatski izvještava o obavijestima u Microsoft Edgeu, primjerice kada preuzimanje započne. (#7281)

segment.source: You can now type in both contracted and uncontracted braille on a braille display with a braille keyboard. See the Braille Input section of the User Guide for details. (#2439)
segment.target: Sada možete upisivati i skraćenu i neskraćenu brajicu na Brailleovom pismu s brajičnom tipkovnicom. Pojedinosti potražite u odjeljku Unos brajice u Korisničkom priručniku. (#2439)

segment.source: You can now enter Unicode braille characters from the braille keyboard on a braille display by selecting Unicode braille as the input table in Braille Settings. (#6449)
segment.target: Sada možete unijeti Unicode brajeve znakove s brajične tipkovnice na Brajičevom pismu tako da odaberete Unicode brajicu kao ulaznu tablicu u postavkama brajice. (#6449)

segment.source: Added support for the SuperBraille braille display used in Taiwan. (#7352)
segment.target: Dodana je podrška za SuperBrailleov zaslon na brajici koji se koristi na Tajvanu. (#7352)

segment.source: New braille translation tables: Danish 8 dot computer braille, Lithuanian, Persian 8 dot computer braille, Persian grade 1, Slovenian 8 dot computer braille. (#6188, #6550, #6773, #7367)
segment.target: Nove tablice za prevođenje Brailleovog pisma: danski računalni braille s 8 točaka, litavski, perzijski računalni braille s 8 točaka, perzijski razred 1, slovenski računalni braille s 8 točaka. (#6188, #6550, #6773, #7367)

segment.source: Improved English (U.S.) 8 dot computer braille table, including support for bullets, the euro sign and accented letters. (#6836)
segment.target: Poboljšana engleska (SAD) računalna brajeva tablica s 8 točaka, uključujući podršku za grafičke oznake, znak eura i slova s naglaskom. (#6836)

segment.source: NVDA can now use the OCR functionality included in Windows 10 to recognize the text of images or inaccessible applications. (#7361)
segment.target: NVDA sada može koristiti OCR funkcionalnost uključenu u Windows 10 za prepoznavanje teksta slika ili nedostupnih aplikacija. (#7361)

segment.source: The language can be set from the new Windows 10 OCR dialog in NVDA Preferences.
segment.target: Jezik se može postaviti u novom Windows 10 OCR dijaloškom okviru u NVDA postavkama.

segment.source: To recognize the content of the current navigator object, press NVDA+r.
segment.target: Za prepoznavanje sadržaja trenutnog objekta navigatora pritisnite NVDA+r.

segment.source: See the Content Recognition section of the User Guide for further details.
segment.target: Dodatne pojedinosti potražite u odjeljku Prepoznavanje sadržaja u Korisničkom priručniku.

segment.source: You can now choose what context information is shown on a braille display when an object gets focus using the new "Focus context presentation" setting in the Braille Settings dialog. (#217)
segment.target: Sada možete odabrati koje će se kontekstne informacije prikazivati na Brailleovom pismu kada se objekt fokusira pomoću nove postavke "Fokus kontekstne prezentacije" u dijaloškom okviru Postavke brajice. (#217)

segment.source: For example, the "Fill display for context changes" and "Only when scrolling back" options can make working with lists and menus more efficient, since the items won't continually change their position on the display.
segment.target: Na primjer, opcije "Ispuni prikaz za promjene konteksta" i "Samo pri pomicanju unatrag" mogu učiniti rad s popisima i izbornicima učinkovitijim, budući da stavke neće stalno mijenjati svoj položaj na zaslonu.

segment.source: See the section on the "Focus context presentation" setting in the User Guide for further details and examples.
segment.target: Pogledajte odjeljak o postavki "Prezentacija konteksta fokusa" u Korisničkom priručniku za dodatne pojedinosti i primjere.

segment.source: In Firefox and Chrome, NVDA now supports complex dynamic grids such as spreadsheets where only some of the content might be loaded or displayed (specifically, the aria-rowcount, aria-colcount, aria-rowindex and aria-colindex attributes introduced in ARIA 1.1). (#7410)
segment.target: U Firefoxu i Chromeu, NVDA sada podržava složene dinamičke rešetke kao što su proračunske tablice u kojima se samo dio sadržaja može učitati ili prikazati (točnije, atributi aria-rowcount, aria-colcount, aria-rowindex i aria-colindex uvedeni u ARIA 1.1). (#7410)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: An unbound command has been added to restart NVDA on demand. You can find it in the Miscelaneous category of the Input Gestures dialog. (#6396)
segment.target: Dodana je nevezana naredba za ponovno pokretanje NVDA na zahtjev. Možete ga pronaći u kategoriji Razno dijaloškog okvira Ulazne geste. (#6396)

segment.source: The keyboard layout can now be set from the NVDA Welcome dialog. (#6863)
segment.target: Raspored tipkovnice sada se može podesiti iz NVDA dijaloškog okvira dobrodošlice. (#6863)

segment.source: Many more control types and states have been abbreviated for braille. Landmarks have also been abbreviated. Please see "Control Type, State and Landmark Abbreviations" under Braille in the User Guide for a complete list. (#7188, #3975)
segment.target: Mnogo više vrsta kontrole i stanja skraćeno je za Brailleovo pismo. Znamenitosti su također skraćene. Za potpuni popis pogledajte "Vrsta kontrole, država i kratice orijentira" pod Brailleovim pismom u Korisničkom priručniku. (#7188, #3975)

segment.source: Updated eSpeak NG to 1.49.1. (#7280)
segment.target: Ažuriran eSpeak NG na 1.49.1. (#7280)

segment.source: The output and input table lists in the Braille Settings dialog are now sorted alphabetically. (#6113)
segment.target: Popisi izlazne i ulazne tablice u dijaloškom okviru Postavke brajice sada su poredani abecednim redom. (#6113)

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to 3.2.0. (#6935)
segment.target: Ažuriran liblouis prevoditelj brajice na 3.2.0. (#6935)

segment.source: The default braille table is now Unified English Braille Code grade 1. (#6952)
segment.target: Zadana tablica brajice sada je Unified English Braille Code 1. stupnja. (#6952)

segment.source: By default, NVDA now only shows the parts of the context information that have changed on a braille display when an object gets focus. (#217)
segment.target: Prema zadanim postavkama, NVDA sada prikazuje samo dijelove kontekstnih informacija koji su se promijenili na Brailleovom pismu kada se objekt fokusira. (#217)

segment.source: Previously, it always showed as much context information as possible, regardless of whether you have seen the same context information before.
segment.target: Prije je uvijek prikazivao što više informacija o kontekstu, bez obzira na to jeste li već vidjeli iste informacije o kontekstu.

segment.source: You can revert to the old behaviour by changing the new "Focus context presentation" setting in the Braille Settings dialog to "Always fill display".
segment.target: Možete se vratiti na staro ponašanje promjenom nove postavke "Kontekstna prezentacija fokusa" u dijaloškom okviru postavki Brailleovog pisma u "Uvijek ispuniti prikaz".

segment.source: When using Braille, the cursor can be configured to be a different shape when tethered to focus or review. (#7122)
segment.target: Kada koristite Brailleovo pismo, pokazivač se može konfigurirati tako da bude različitog oblika kada je vezan za fokusiranje ili pregled. (#7122)

segment.source: The NVDA logo has been updated. The updated NVDA logo is a stylised blend of the letters NVDA in white, on a solid purple background. This ensures it will be visible on any colour background, and uses the purple from the NV Access logo. (#7446)
segment.target: NVDA logotip je ažuriran. Ažurirani NVDA logotip stilizirana je mješavina slova NVDA u bijeloj boji, na jednobojnoj ljubičastoj pozadini. To osigurava da će biti vidljiv na pozadini bilo koje boje i koristi ljubičastu boju s logotipa NV Access. (#7446)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci grešaka

segment.source: Editable div elements in Chrome no longer have their label reported as their value while in browse mode. (#7153)
segment.target: Oznaka elemenata div koji se mogu uređivati u Chromeu više se ne prijavljuje kao vrijednost dok su u načinu pregledavanja. (#7153)

segment.source: Pressing end while in browse mode for an empty Microsoft Word document no longer causes a runtime error. (#7009)
segment.target: Pritiskom na end dok ste u načinu pregledavanja za prazan Microsoft Word dokument više ne uzrokuje pogrešku tijekom izvođenja. (#7009)

segment.source: Browse mode is now correctly supported in Microsoft Edge where a document has been given a specific ARIA role of document. (#6998)
segment.target: Način pregledavanja sada je ispravno podržan u pregledniku Microsoft Edge gdje je dokumentu dodijeljena određena ARIA uloga dokumenta. (#6998)

segment.source: In browse mode, you can now select or unselect to the end of the line using shift+end even when the caret is on the last character of the line. (#7157)
segment.target: U načinu pregledavanja sada možete odabrati ili poništiti odabir do kraja retka pomoću shift+end čak i kada je kursor na posljednjem znaku retka. (#7157)

segment.source: If a dialog contains a progress bar, the dialog text is now updated in braille when the progress bar changes. This means, for example, that the remaining time can now be read in NVDA's "Downloading Update" dialog. (#6862)
segment.target: Ako dijaloški okvir sadrži traku napretka, tekst dijaloškog okvira sada se ažurira na Brailleovom pismu kada se promijeni traka napretka. To znači, na primjer, da se preostalo vrijeme sada može očitati u NVDA dijaloškom okviru "Preuzimanje ažuriranja". (#6862)

segment.source: NVDA will now announce selection changes for certain Windows 10 combo boxes such as AutoPlay in Settings. (#6337).
segment.target: NVDA će sada objaviti promjene odabira za određene kombinirane okvire sustava Windows 10 kao što je automatska reprodukcija u postavkama. (#6337).

segment.source: Pointless information is no longer announced when entering Meeting / Appointment creation dialogs in Microsoft Outlook. (#7216)
segment.target: Besmislene informacije više se ne objavljuju prilikom ulaska u dijaloške okvire za stvaranje sastanka / sastanka u programu Microsoft Outlook. (#7216)

segment.source: Beeps for indeterminate progress bar dialogs such as the update checker only when progress bar output is configured to include beeps. (#6759)
segment.target: Zvučni signali za neodređene dijaloške okvire trake napretka, kao što je alat za provjeru ažuriranja, samo kada je izlaz trake napretka konfiguriran tako da uključuje zvučne signale. (#6759)

segment.source: In Microsoft Excel 2003 and 2007, cells are again reported when arrowing around a worksheet. (#7243)
segment.target: U programima Microsoft Excel 2003 i 2007 ćelije se ponovno prijavljuju prilikom strelica oko radnog lista. (#7243)

segment.source: In Windows 10 Creators Update and later, browse mode is again automatically enabled when reading emails in Windows 10 Mail. (#7289)
segment.target: U Windows 10 Creators Update i novijim verzijama, način pregledavanja ponovno je automatski omogućen prilikom čitanja e-pošte u Windows 10 Mailu. (#7289)
