segment.source: On most braille displays with a braille keyboard, dot 7 now erases the last entered braille cell or character, and dot 8 presses the enter key. (#6054)
segment.target: Na većini brajevih zaslona s brajičnom tipkovnicom, točka 7 sada briše posljednju unesenu brajičnu ćeliju ili znak, a točka 8 pritišće tipku Enter. (#6054)

segment.source: In editable text, when moving the caret (e.g. with the cursor keys or backspace), NVDA's spoken feedback is now more accurate in many cases, particularly in Chrome and terminal applications. (#6424)
segment.target: U tekstu koji se može uređivati, prilikom pomicanja kursora (npr. tipkama kursora ili backspaceom), NVDA govorne povratne informacije sada su točnije u mnogim slučajevima, posebno u Chrome i terminalnim aplikacijama. (#6424)

segment.source: The content of the Signature Editor in Microsoft Outlook 2016 can now be read. (#7253)
segment.target: Sada se može čitati sadržaj uređivača potpisa u programu Microsoft Outlook 2016. (#7253)

segment.source: In Java Swing applications, NVDA no longer sometimes causes the application to crash when navigating tables. (#6992)
segment.target: U Java Swing aplikacijama, NVDA više ponekad ne uzrokuje rušenje aplikacije prilikom navigacije tablicama. (#6992)

segment.source: In Windows 10 Creators Update, NVDA will no longer announce toast notifications multiple times. (#7128)
segment.target: U Windows 10 Creators Updateu, NVDA više neće najavljivati obavijesti o tostu više puta. (#7128)

segment.source: In The start menu in Windows 10, pressing Enter to close the start menu after a search no longer causes NVDA to announce search text. (#7370)
segment.target: U izborniku Start u sustavu Windows 10 pritiskom na Enter za zatvaranje izbornika Start nakon pretraživanja više ne uzrokuje da NVDA najavljuje tekst pretraživanja. (#7370)

segment.source: Performing quick navigation to headings in Microsoft Edge is now significantly faster. (#7343)
segment.target: Brza navigacija do naslova u pregledniku Microsoft Edge sada je znatno brža. (#7343)

segment.source: In Microsoft Edge, navigating in browse mode no longer skips large parts of certain web pages such as the Wordpress 2015 theme. (#7143)
segment.target: U pregledniku Microsoft Edge navigacija u načinu pregledavanja više ne preskače velike dijelove određenih web-stranica kao što je tema Wordpress 2015. (#7143)

segment.source: In Microsoft Edge, landmarks are correctly localized in languages other than English. (#7328)
segment.target: U pregledniku Microsoft Edge orijentiri su ispravno lokalizirani na jezike koji nisu engleski. (#7328)

segment.source: Braille now correctly follows the selection when selecting text beyond the width of the display. For example, if you select multiple lines with shift+downArrow, braille now shows the last line you selected. (#5770)
segment.target: Brailleovo pismo sada ispravno prati odabir prilikom odabira teksta izvan širine zaslona. Ako, primjerice, odaberete više redaka pomoću shift+strelica prema dolje, brajica sada prikazuje zadnji redak koji ste odabrali. (#5770)

segment.source: In Firefox, NVDA no longer spuriously reports "section" several times when opening details for a tweet on twitter.com. (#5741)
segment.target: U Firefoxu, NVDA više ne izvještava lažno o "odjeljku" nekoliko puta kada otvara detalje za tweet na twitter.com. (#5741)

segment.source: Table navigation commands are no longer available for layout tables in Browse Mode unless reporting of layout tables is enabled. (#7382)
segment.target: Naredbe za navigaciju tablicom više nisu dostupne za tablice izgleda u načinu pregledavanja osim ako nije omogućeno izvješćivanje o tablicama izgleda. (#7382)

segment.source: In Firefox and Chrome, Browse Mode table navigation commands now skip over hidden table cells. (#6652, #5655)
segment.target: U Firefoxu i Chromeu naredbe za navigaciju tablicom Način pregledavanja sada preskaču skrivene ćelije tablice. (#6652, #5655)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: Timestamps in the log now include milliseconds. (#7163)
segment.target: Vremenske oznake u dnevniku sada uključuju milisekunde. (#7163)

segment.source: NVDA must now be built with Visual Studio Community 2015. Visual Studio Express is no longer supported. (#7110)
segment.target: NVDA se sada mora izgraditi pomoću Visual Studio Community 2015. Visual Studio Express više nije podržan. (#7110)

segment.source: The Windows 10 Tools and SDK are now also required, which can be enabled when installing Visual Studio.
segment.target: Sada su potrebni i Windows 10 alati i SDK, koji se mogu omogućiti prilikom instalacije Visual Studija.

segment.source: See the Installed Dependencies section of the readme for additional details.
segment.target: Dodatne pojedinosti potražite u odjeljku Instalirane ovisnosti u readme-u.

segment.source: Support for content recognizers such as OCR and image description tools can be easily implemented using the new contentRecog package. (#7361)
segment.target: Podrška za prepoznavače sadržaja kao što su OCR i alati za opis slika može se jednostavno implementirati pomoću novog paketa contentRecog. (#7361)

segment.source: The Python json package is now included in NVDA binary builds. (#3050)
segment.target: Python json paket sada je uključen u NVDA binarne verzije. (#3050)

segment.source: Highlights of this release include full support for audio ducking in the Windows 10 Creators Update; fixes for several selection issues in browse mode, including problems with select all; significant improvements in Microsoft Edge support; and improvements on the web such as indication of elements marked as current (using aria-current).
segment.target: Istaknute značajke ovog izdanja uključuju punu podršku za prigušivanje zvuka u ažuriranju Windows 10 Creators Update; popravci za nekoliko problema s odabirom u načinu pregledavanja, uključujući probleme s odabirom svega; značajna poboljšanja u podršci za Microsoft Edge; i poboljšanja na webu, kao što je označavanje elemenata označenih kao tekući (pomoću ARIA-current).

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove značajke

segment.source: Cell border information can now be reported in Microsoft Excel by using NVDA+f. (#3044)
segment.target: Informacije o obrubu ćelije sada se mogu prijaviti u programu Microsoft Excel pomoću NVDA+f. (#3044)

segment.source: In web browsers, NVDA now indicates when an element has been marked as current (specifically, using the aria-current attribute). (#6358)
segment.target: U web preglednicima, NVDA sada pokazuje kada je element označen kao trenutni (točnije, koristeći atribut aria-current). (#6358)

segment.source: Automatic language switching is now supported in Microsoft Edge. (#6852)
segment.target: Automatska promjena jezika sada je podržana u pregledniku Microsoft Edge. (#6852)

segment.source: Added support for Windows Calculator on Windows 10 Enterprise LTSB (Long-Term Servicing Branch) and Server. (#6914)
segment.target: Dodana je podrška za Windows Calculator na Windows 10 Enterprise LTSB (Long-Term Servicing Branch) i Serveru. (#6914)

segment.source: Performing the read current line command three times quickly spells the line with character descriptions. (#6893)
segment.target: Izvođenjem naredbe za čitanje trenutnog retka tri puta brzo se piše redak s opisima znakova. (#6893)

segment.source: New language: Burmese.
segment.target: Novi jezik: burmanski.

segment.source: Unicode up and down arrows and fraction symbols are now spoken appropriately. (#3805)
segment.target: Unicode strelice gore i dolje i simboli razlomaka sada se izgovaraju na odgovarajući način. (#3805)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: When navigating with simple review in applications using UI Automation, more extraneous objects are now ignored, making navigation easier. (#6948, #6950)
segment.target: Prilikom navigacije jednostavnim pregledom u aplikacijama koje koriste automatizaciju korisničkog sučelja, više stranih objekata sada se zanemaruje, što olakšava navigaciju. (#6948, #6950)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci grešaka

segment.source: Web page menu items can now be activated while in browse mode. (#6735)
segment.target: Stavke izbornika web stranice sada se mogu aktivirati dok ste u načinu pregledavanja. (#6735)

segment.source: Pressing escape while the configuration profile "Confirm Deletion" dialog is active now dismisses the dialog. (#6851)
segment.target: Pritiskom na escape dok je konfiguracijski profil "Potvrdi brisanje" dijaloški okvir sada se zatvara dijaloški okvir. (#6851)

segment.source: Fixed some crashes in Mozilla Firefox and other Gecko applications where the multi-process feature is enabled. (#6885)
segment.target: Ispravljena su neka rušenja u Mozilla Firefoxu i drugim Gecko aplikacijama gdje je omogućena značajka više procesa. (#6885)

segment.source: Reporting of background color in screen review is now more accurate when text was drawn with a transparent background. (#6467)
segment.target: Izvještavanje o boji pozadine u pregledu zaslona sada je točnije kada je tekst nacrtan s prozirnom pozadinom. (#6467)

segment.source: Improved support for control descriptions provided on web pages in Internet Explorer 11 (specifically, support for aria-describedby within iframes and when multiple IDs are provided). (#5784)
segment.target: Poboljšana podrška za opise kontrola na web-stranicama u pregledniku Internet Explorer 11 (konkretno, podrška za aria-describedby unutar iframeova i kada je navedeno više ID-ova). (#5784)

segment.source: In the Windows 10 Creators Update, NVDA's audio ducking again works as in previous Windows releases; i.e. Duck with speech and sounds, always duck and no ducking are all available. (#6933)
segment.target: U ažuriranju Windows 10 Creators Update, NVDA-ino prigušivanje zvuka ponovno radi kao u prethodnim izdanjima sustava Windows; tj. Patka s govorom i zvukovima, uvijek patka i bez saganja su dostupni. (#6933)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer fail to navigate to or report certain (UIA) controls where a keyboard shortcut is not defined. (#6779)
segment.target: NVDA više neće propuštati navigaciju ili prijavljivanje određenih (UIA) kontrola u kojima tipkovnički prečac nije definiran. (#6779)

segment.source: Two empty spaces are no longer added in keyboard shortcut information for certain (UIA) controls. (#6790)
segment.target: Dva prazna mjesta više se ne dodaju u informacije o tipkovnim prečacima za određene (UIA) kontrole. (#6790)

segment.source: Certain combinations of keys on HIMS displays (e.g. space+dot4) no longer fail intermittently. (#3157)
segment.target: Određene kombinacije tipki na HIMS zaslonima (npr. razmak+točka4) više ne otkazuju povremeno. (#3157)

segment.source: Fixed an issue when opening a serial port on systems using certain languages other than English which caused connecting to braille displays to fail in some cases. (#6845)
segment.target: Riješen je problem prilikom otvaranja serijskog porta na sustavima koji koriste određene jezike osim engleskog, što je u nekim slučajevima uzrokovalo neuspjeh povezivanja s Brailleovim zaslonima. (#6845)

segment.source: Reduced the chance of the configuration file being corrupted when Windows shuts down. Configuration files are now written to a temporary file before replacing the actual configuration file. (#3165)
segment.target: Smanjena je mogućnost oštećenja konfiguracijske datoteke prilikom isključivanja sustava Windows. Konfiguracijske datoteke sada se zapisuju u privremenu datoteku prije zamjene stvarne konfiguracijske datoteke. (#3165)

segment.source: When performing the read current line command twice quickly to spell the line, the appropriate language is now used for the spelled characters. (#6726)
segment.target: Kada dvaput brzo izvršite naredbu za čitanje trenutnog retka kako biste napisali redak, sada se koristi odgovarajući jezik za napisane znakove. (#6726)

segment.source: Navigating by line in Microsoft Edge is now up to three times faster in the Windows 10 Creators Update. (#6994)
segment.target: Navigacija po liniji u Microsoft Edgeu sada je do tri puta brža u ažuriranju Windows 10 Creators Update. (#6994)

segment.source: NVDA no longer announces "Web Runtime grouping" when focusing Microsoft Edge documents in the Windows 10 Creators Update. (#6948)
segment.target: NVDA više ne najavljuje "Web Runtime grupiranje" kada fokusira Microsoft Edge dokumente u Windows 10 Creators Update. (#6948)

segment.source: All existing versions of SecureCRT are now supported. (#6302)
segment.target: Sada su podržane sve postojeće verzije SecureCRT-a. (#6302)

segment.source: Adobe Acrobat Reader no longer crashes in certain PDF documents (specifically, those containing empty ActualText attributes). (#7021, #7034)
segment.target: Adobe Acrobat Reader više se ne ruši u određenim PDF dokumentima (točnije onima koji sadrže prazne atribute stvarnog teksta). (#7021, #7034)

segment.source: In browse mode in Microsoft Edge, interactive tables (ARIA grids) are no longer skipped when navigating to tables with t and shift+t. (#6977)
segment.target: U načinu pregledavanja u pregledniku Microsoft Edge interaktivne tablice (ARIA rešetke) više se ne preskaču prilikom navigacije do tablica s t i shift+t. (#6977)

segment.source: In browse mode, pressing shift+home after selecting forward now unselects to the beginning of the line as expected. (#5746)
segment.target: U načinu pregledavanja, pritiskom na shift+home nakon odabira naprijed sada se poništava odabir na početku retka kao što se očekivalo. (#5746)

segment.source: In browse mode, select all (control+a) no longer fails to select all text if the caret is not at the start of the text. (#6909)
segment.target: U načinu pregledavanja odabir svega (control+a) više ne uspijeva odabrati sav tekst ako se kursor ne nalazi na početku teksta. (#6909)

segment.source: Fixed some other rare selection problems in browse mode. (#7131)
segment.target: Riješeni su neki drugi rijetki problemi s odabirom u načinu pregledavanja. (#7131)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: Commandline arguments are now processed with Python's argparse module, rather than optparse. This allows certain options such as -r and -q to be handled exclusively. (#6865)
segment.target: Argumenti naredbenog retka sada se obrađuju pomoću Pythonovog modula argparse, a ne optparse. To omogućuje isključivo rukovanje određenim opcijama kao što su -r i -q. (#6865)

segment.source: core.callLater now queues the callback to NVDA's main queue after the given delay, rather than waking the core and executing it directly. This stops possible freezes due to the core accidentally going to sleep after processing a callback, in the midle of a modal call such as the desplaying of a message box. (#6797)
segment.target: core.callLater sada stavlja povratni poziv u NVDA glavni red čekanja nakon zadanog kašnjenja, umjesto da probudi jezgru i izvrši je izravno. Ovo zaustavlja moguća zamrzavanja zbog slučajnog odlaska jezgre u stanje mirovanja nakon obrade povratnog poziva, u sredini modalnog poziva, kao što je uklanjanje okvira s porukama. (#6797)

segment.source: The InputGesture.identifiers property has been changed so that it is no longer normalized. (#6945)
segment.target: Svojstvo InputGesture.identifiers promijenjeno je tako da se više ne normalizira. (#6945)

segment.source: Subclasses no longer need to normalize identifiers before returning them from this property.
segment.target: Podklase više ne moraju normalizirati identifikatore prije nego što ih vrate iz ovog svojstva.

segment.source: If you want normalized identifiers, there is now an InputGesture.normalizedIdentifiers property which normalizes the identifiers returned by the identifiers property .
segment.target: Ako želite normalizirane identifikatore, sada postoji svojstvo InputGesture.normalizedIdentifiers koje normalizira identifikatore koje vraća svojstvo identifiers .

segment.source: The InputGesture.logIdentifier property is now deprecated. Callers should use InputGesture.identifiers[0] instead. (#6945)
segment.target: Svojstvo InputGesture.logIdentifier sada je zastarjelo. Pozivatelji bi umjesto toga trebali koristiti InputGesture.identifiers[0]. (#6945)

segment.source: Removed some deprecated code:
segment.target: Uklonjen je neki zastarjeli kod:

segment.source: `speech.REASON_*` constants: `controlTypes.REASON_*` should be used instead. (#6846)
segment.target: 'govor. REASON_*' konstante: umjesto toga treba koristiti 'controlTypes.REASON_*'. (#6846)

segment.source: `i18nName` for synth settings: `displayName` and `displayNameWithAccelerator` should be used instead. (#6846, #5185)
segment.target: 'i18nName' za postavke sintisajzera: umjesto toga treba koristiti 'displayName' i 'displayNameWithAccelerator'. (#6846, #5185)

segment.source: `config.validateConfig`. (#6846, #667)
segment.target: 'config.validateConfig'. (#6846, #667)

segment.source: `config.save`: `config.conf.save` should be used instead. (#6846, #667)
segment.target: 'config.save': umjesto toga treba koristiti 'config.conf.save'. (#6846, #667)

segment.source: The list of completions in the autocomplete context menu of the Python Console no longer shows any object path leading up to the final symbol being completed. (#7023)
segment.target: Popis dovršetka u kontekstnom izborniku automatskog dovršavanja Python konzole više ne prikazuje nijedan put objekta koji vodi do dovršetka konačnog simbola. (#7023)

segment.source: There is now a unit testing framework for NVDA. (#7026)
segment.target: Sada postoji okvir za testiranje jedinica za NVDA. (#7026)

segment.source: Unit tests and infrastructure are located in the tests/unit directory. See the docstring in the tests\unit\init.py file for details.
segment.target: Jedinični testovi i infrastruktura nalaze se u imeniku testova/jedinica. Pojedinosti potražite u docstringu u datoteci tests\unit\init.py.

segment.source: You can run tests using "scons tests". See the "Running Tests" section of readme.md for details.
segment.target: Testove možete pokrenuti pomoću "scons testova". Pojedinosti potražite u odjeljku "Izvođenje testova" u readme.md.

segment.source: If you are submitting a pull request for NVDA, you should first run the tests and ensure they pass.
segment.target: Ako šaljete zahtjev za povlačenje za NVDA, prvo biste trebali pokrenuti testove i provjeriti jesu li prošli.

segment.source: Highlights of this release include reporting of sections and text columns in Microsoft Word; Support for reading, navigating and annotating books in Kindle for PC; and improved support for Microsoft Edge.
segment.target: Istaknute značajke ovog izdanja uključuju izvještavanje o odjeljcima i tekstualnim stupcima u programu Microsoft Word; Podrška za čitanje, navigaciju i komentiranje knjiga u Kindleu za PC; i poboljšana podrška za Microsoft Edge.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove značajke

segment.source: In Microsoft Word, the types of section breaks and section numbers can now be reported. This is enabled with the "Report page numbers" option in the Document Formatting dialog. (#5946)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Word sada se mogu prijaviti vrste prijeloma sekcija i brojevi sekcija. To je omogućeno opcijom "Brojevi stranica izvješća" u dijaloškom okviru Oblikovanje dokumenta. (#5946)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word, text columns can now be reported. This is enabled with the "Report page numbers" option in the document formatting dialog. (#5946)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Word sada se mogu izvještavati o tekstnim stupcima. To je omogućeno opcijom "Brojevi stranica izvješća" u dijaloškom okviru za oblikovanje dokumenta. (#5946)

segment.source: Automatic language switching is now supported in WordPad. (#6555)
segment.target: Automatska promjena jezika sada je podržana u programu WordPad. (#6555)

segment.source: The NVDA find command (NVDA+control+f) is now supported in browse mode in Microsoft Edge. (#6580)
segment.target: NVDA naredba za pronalaženje (NVDA+control+f) sada je podržana u načinu pregledavanja u pregledniku Microsoft Edge. (#6580)

segment.source: Quick navigation for buttons in browse mode (b and shift+b) is now supported in Microsoft Edge. (#6577)
segment.target: Brza navigacija gumbima u načinu pregledavanja (b i shift+b) sada je podržana u pregledniku Microsoft Edge. (#6577)

segment.source: When copying a sheet in Microsoft Excel, column and row headers are remembered. (#6628)
segment.target: Prilikom kopiranja lista u programu Microsoft Excel pamte se zaglavlja stupaca i redaka. (#6628)

segment.source: Support for reading and navigating books in Kindle for PC version 1.19, including access to links, footnotes, graphics, highlighted text and user notes. Please see the Kindle for PC section of the NVDA User Guide for further information. (#6247, #6638)
segment.target: Podrška za čitanje i navigaciju knjigama u Kindleu za PC verzije 1.19, uključujući pristup vezama, fusnotama, grafikama, istaknutom tekstu i korisničkim bilješkama. Za više informacija pogledajte odjeljak Kindle za PC u NVDA korisničkom priručniku. (#6247, #6638)

segment.source: Browse mode table navigation is now supported in Microsoft Edge. (#6594)
segment.target: Navigacija tablicom načina pregledavanja sada je podržana u pregledniku Microsoft Edge. (#6594)

segment.source: In Microsoft Excel, the report review cursor location command (desktop: NVDA+numpadDelete, laptop: NVDA+delete) now reports the name of the worksheet and the cell location. (#6613)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Excel naredba za pregled pokazivača izvješća (radna površina: NVDA+numpadDelete, prijenosno računalo: NVDA+delete) sada izvještava o nazivu radnog lista i lokaciji ćelije. (#6613)

segment.source: Added an option to the exit dialog to restart with debug level logging. (#6689)
segment.target: Dodana je opcija u izlazni dijaloški okvir za ponovno pokretanje s zapisivanjem na razini otklanjanja pogrešaka. (#6689)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: The minimum braille cursor blink rate is now 200 ms. If this was previously set lower, it will be increased to 200 ms. (#6470)
segment.target: Minimalna brzina treptanja kursora na Brailleovom pismu sada je 200 ms. Ako je ovo prethodno postavljeno niže, povećat će se na 200 ms. (#6470)

segment.source: A check box has been added to the braille settings dialog to allow enabling/disabling braille cursor blinking. Previously a value of zero was used to achieve this. (#6470)
segment.target: U dijaloški okvir postavki brajice dodan je potvrdni okvir koji omogućuje omogućavanje/onemogućavanje treptanja pokazivača brajice. Ranije se za to koristila vrijednost nula. (#6470)

segment.source: Updated eSpeak NG (commit e095f008, 10 January 2017). (#6717)
segment.target: Ažurirano eSpeak NG (commit e095f008, 10. siječnja 2017.). (#6717)

segment.source: Due to changes In the Windows 10 Creators Update, the "Always duck" mode is no longer available in NVDA's Audio ducking settings. It is still available on older windows 10 releases. (#6684)
segment.target: Zbog promjena U ažuriranju za kreatore sustava Windows 10, način "Uvijek se spušta" više nije dostupan u NVDA postavkama prigušivanja zvuka. Još uvijek je dostupan na starijim izdanjima sustava Windows 10. (#6684)

segment.source: Due to changes in the Windows 10 Creators Update, the "Duck when outputting speech and sounds" mode can no longer ensure audio has ducked fully before starting to speak, nor will it keep audio ducked long enough after speaking to stop rappid bouncing in volume. These changes do not affect older windows 10 releases. (#6684)
segment.target: Zbog promjena u ažuriranju Windows 10 Creators Update, način rada "Duck when outoutput speech and sounds" više ne može osigurati da se zvuk potpuno sagnuo prije nego što počne govoriti, niti će zadržati zvuk dovoljno dugo nakon govora da zaustavi rappid poskakivanje u glasnoći. Te promjene ne utječu na starija izdanja sustava Windows 10. (#6684)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci grešaka

segment.source: Fixed freeze in Microsoft Word when moving by paragraph through a large document while in browse mode. (#6368)
segment.target: Popravljeno zamrzavanje u programu Microsoft Word pri kretanju po odlomku kroz veliki dokument dok je u načinu pregledavanja. (#6368)

segment.source: Tables in Microsoft Word that have been copied from Microsoft Excel are no longer treeted as layout tables and therefore are no longer ignored. (#5927)
segment.target: Tablice u programu Microsoft Word koje su kopirane iz programa Microsoft Excel više se ne prikazuju kao tablice izgleda i stoga se više ne zanemaruju. (#5927)

segment.source: When trying to type in Microsoft Excel while in protected view, NVDA now makes a sound rather than speaking characters that were not actually typed. (#6570)
segment.target: Kada pokušavate tipkati u Microsoft Excelu dok ste u zaštićenom prikazu, NVDA sada proizvodi zvuk umjesto da izgovara znakove koji zapravo nisu upisani. (#6570)

segment.source: Pressing escape in Microsoft Excel no longer incorrectly switches to browse mode, unless the user has previously switched to browse mode explicitly with NVDA+space and then entered focus mode by pressing enter on a form field. (#6569)
segment.target: Pritiskom na escape u Microsoft Excelu više se ne prebacuje pogrešno u način pregledavanja, osim ako je korisnik prethodno prešao u način pregledavanja eksplicitno s NVDA+razmak i zatim ušao u način fokusiranja pritiskom na enter u polju obrasca. (#6569)

segment.source: NVDA no longer freezes in Microsoft Excel spreadsheets where an entire row or column is merged. (#6216)
segment.target: NVDA se više ne zamrzava u Microsoft Excel proračunskim tablicama gdje se spaja cijeli redak ili stupac. (#6216)

segment.source: Reporting of cropped/overflowed text in Microsoft Excel cells should now be more accurate. (#6472)
segment.target: Izvješćivanje o izrezanom/preplavljenom tekstu u ćelijama programa Microsoft Excel sada bi trebalo biti točnije. (#6472)

segment.source: NVDA now reports when a check box is read-only. (#6563)
segment.target: NVDA sada izvještava kada je potvrdni okvir samo za čitanje. (#6563)

segment.source: The NVDA launcher will no longer show a warning dialog when it can't play the logo sound due to no audio device being available. (#6289)
segment.target: NVDA pokretač više neće prikazivati dijaloški okvir upozorenja kada ne može reproducirati zvuk logotipa jer nema dostupnog audio uređaja. (#6289)

segment.source: Controls in the Microsoft Excel Ribbon that are unavailable are now reported as such. (#6430)
segment.target: Kontrole na vrpci programa Microsoft Excel koje nisu dostupne sada se prijavljuju kao takve. (#6430)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer announce "pane" when minimizing windows. (#6671)
segment.target: NVDA više neće najavljivati "okno" prilikom minimiziranja prozora. (#6671)

segment.source: Typed characters are now spoken in Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps (including Microsoft Edge) in the Windows 10 Creators Update. (#6017)
segment.target: Upisani znakovi sada se izgovaraju u aplikacijama Universal Windows Platform (UWP) (uključujući Microsoft Edge) u ažuriranju Windows 10 Creators Update. (#6017)

segment.source: Mouse tracking now works across all screens on computers with multiple monitors. (#6598)
segment.target: Praćenje miša sada radi na svim zaslonima na računalima s više monitora. (#6598)

segment.source: NVDA no longer becomes unusable after exiting Windows Media Player while focused on a slider control. (#5467)
segment.target: NVDA više ne postaje neupotrebljiv nakon izlaska iz Windows Media Playera dok je usredotočen na kontrolu klizača. (#5467)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: Profiles and configuration files are now automatically upgraded to meet the requirements of schema modifications. If there is an error during upgrade, a notification is shown, the configuration is reset and the old configuration file is available in the NVDA log at 'Info' level. (#6470)
segment.target: Profili i konfiguracijske datoteke sada se automatski nadograđuju kako bi zadovoljili zahtjeve izmjena sheme. Ako dođe do pogreške tijekom nadogradnje, prikazuje se obavijest, konfiguracija se resetira i stara konfiguracijska datoteka dostupna je u NVDA dnevniku na razini 'Info'. (#6470)

segment.source: Highlights of this release include improved support for Microsoft Edge; browse mode in the Windows 10 Mail app; and significant improvements to NVDA's dialogs.
segment.target: Istaknute značajke ovog izdanja uključuju poboljšanu podršku za Microsoft Edge; način pregledavanja u aplikaciji Windows 10 Mail; i značajna poboljšanja NVDA dijaloga.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove značajke

segment.source: NVDA can now indicate line indentation using tones. This can be configured using the "Line indentation reporting" combo box in NVDA's Document Formatting preferences dialog. (#5906)
segment.target: NVDA sada može označavati uvlačenje linije pomoću tonova. To se može konfigurirati pomoću kombiniranog okvira "Izvješćivanje o uvlačenju linije" u NVDA dijaloškom okviru postavki formatiranja dokumenta. (#5906)

segment.source: Support for the Orbit Reader 20 braille display. (#6007)
segment.target: Podrška za Orbit Reader 20 Braille Display. (#6007)

segment.source: An option to open the speech viewer window on startup has been added. This can be enabled via a check box in the speech viewer window. (#5050)
segment.target: Dodana je opcija za otvaranje prozora preglednika govora pri pokretanju. To se može omogućiti putem potvrdnog okvira u prozoru preglednika govora. (#5050)

segment.source: When re-opening the speech viewer window, the location and dimensions will now be restored. (#5050)
segment.target: Prilikom ponovnog otvaranja prozora preglednika govora, mjesto i dimenzije sada će se vratiti. (#5050)

segment.source: Cross-reference fields in Microsoft Word are now treated like hyperlinks. They are reported as links and can be activated. (#6102)
segment.target: Polja unakrsnih referenci u programu Microsoft Word sada se tretiraju kao hiperveze. Prijavljuju se kao poveznice i mogu se aktivirati. (#6102)

segment.source: Support for the Baum SuperVario2, Baum Vario 340 and HumanWare Brailliant2 braille displays. (#6116)
segment.target: Podrška za Baum SuperVario2, Baum Vario 340 i HumanWare Brailliant2 brajice. (#6116)

segment.source: Initial support for the Anniversary update of Microsoft Edge. (#6271)
segment.target: Početna podrška za ažuriranje Microsoft Edgea za godišnjicu. (#6271)

segment.source: Browse mode is now used when reading emails in the Windows 10 mail app. (#6271)
segment.target: Način pregledavanja sada se koristi prilikom čitanja e-pošte u aplikaciji za poštu sustava Windows 10. (#6271)

segment.source: New language: Lithuanian.
segment.target: Novi jezik: litavski.

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to 3.0.0. This includes significant enhancements to Unified English Braille. (#6109, #4194, #6220, #6140)
segment.target: Ažuriran prevoditelj brajice liblouis na 3.0.0. To uključuje značajna poboljšanja objedinjenog engleskog Brailleovog pisma. (#6109, #4194, #6220, #6140)

segment.source: In the Add-ons Manager, the Disable add-on and Enable add-on buttons now have keyboard shortcuts (alt+d and alt+e, respectively). (#6388)
segment.target: U Upravitelju dodataka, gumbi Onemogući dodatak i Omogući dodatak sada imaju tipkovne prečace (alt+d i alt+e). (#6388)

segment.source: Various padding and alignment issues in NVDA's dialogs have been resolved. (#6317, #5548, #6342, #6343, #6349)
segment.target: Razni problemi s podmetanjem i poravnanjem u NVDA dijaloškim okvirima su riješeni. (#6317, #5548, #6342, #6343, #6349)

segment.source: The document formatting dialog has been adjusted so that the contents scrolls. (#6348)
segment.target: Dijaloški okvir za oblikovanje dokumenta prilagođen je tako da se sadržaj pomiče. (#6348)

segment.source: Adjusted the layout of the Symbol Pronunciation dialog so the full width of the dialog is used for the symbols list. (#6101)
segment.target: Prilagođen je izgled dijaloškog okvira Izgovor simbola tako da se puna širina dijaloškog okvira koristi za popis simbola. (#6101)

segment.source: In browse mode in web browsers, the edit field (e and shift+e) and form field (f and shift+f) single letter navigation commands can now be used to move to read-only edit fields. (#4164)
segment.target: U načinu pregledavanja u web-preglednicima, jednoslovne navigacijske naredbe polja za uređivanje (e i shift+e) i polja obrasca (f i shift+f) sada se mogu koristiti za premještanje u polja za uređivanje samo za čitanje. (#4164)

segment.source: In NVDA's Document Formatting settings, "Announce formatting changes after the cursor" has been renamed to "Report formatting changes after the cursor", as it affects braille as well as speech. (#6336)
segment.target: U NVDA postavkama oblikovanja dokumenta, "Najavi promjene formatiranja nakon kursora" preimenovano je u "Prijavi promjene formatiranja nakon kursora", jer utječe na Brailleovo pismo kao i na govor. (#6336)

segment.source: Adjusted the appearance of the NVDA "Welcome dialog". (#6350)
segment.target: Podešen je izgled NVDA "Dijaloga dobrodošlice". (#6350)

segment.source: NVDA dialog boxes now have their "ok" and "cancel" buttons aligned to the right of the dialog. (#6333)
segment.target: NVDA dijaloški okviri sada imaju gumbe "ok" i "cancel" poravnate desno od dijaloškog okvira. (#6333)

segment.source: Spin Controls are now used for numeric input fields such as the "Capital pitch change percentage" setting in the Voice Settings dialog. You can enter the desired value or use the up and down arrow keys to adjust the value. (#6099)
segment.target: Kontrole vrtnje sada se koriste za numerička polja za unos kao što je postavka "Postotak promjene visine tona velikim slovom" u dijaloškom okviru Postavke glasa. Možete unijeti željenu vrijednost ili koristiti tipke sa strelicama gore i dolje za podešavanje vrijednosti. (#6099)

segment.source: The way IFrames (documents embedded within documents) are reported has been made more consistent across web browsers. IFrames are now reported as "frame" in Firefox. (#6047)
segment.target: Način na koji se IFrames (dokumenti ugrađeni u dokumente) izvještavaju postao je dosljedniji u svim web preglednicima. IFrame se sada prijavljuju kao "okvir" u Firefoxu. (#6047)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci grešaka

segment.source: Fixed a rare error when exiting NVDA while the speech viewer is open. (#5050)
segment.target: Ispravljena je rijetka pogreška prilikom izlaska iz NVDA dok je preglednik govora otvoren. (#5050)

segment.source: Image maps now render as expected in browse mode in Mozilla Firefox. (#6051)
segment.target: Slikovne karte sada se prikazuju prema očekivanjima u načinu pregledavanja u pregledniku Mozilla Firefox. (#6051)

segment.source: While in the dictionary dialog, pressing the enter key now saves any changes you have made and closes the dialog. Previously, pressing enter did nothing. (#6206)
segment.target: Dok ste u dijaloškom okviru rječnika, pritiskom na tipku enter sada se spremaju sve promjene koje ste napravili i zatvara se dijaloški okvir. Prije toga, pritiskom na Enter nije bilo ništa. (#6206)

segment.source: Messages are now displayed in braille when changing input modes for an input method (native input/alphanumeric, full shaped/half shaped, etc.). (#5892, #5893)
segment.target: Poruke se sada prikazuju na Brailleovom pismu prilikom promjene načina unosa za način unosa (izvorni unos/alfanumerički, puni oblik/poluoblikovan itd.). (#5892, #5893)

segment.source: When disabling and then immediately re-enabling an add-on or vice versa, the add-on status now correctly reverts to what it was previously. (#6299)
segment.target: Kada onemogućite, a zatim odmah ponovno omogućite dodatak ili obrnuto, status dodatka sada se ispravno vraća na ono što je bio prije. (#6299)

segment.source: When using Microsoft Word, page number fields in headers can now be read. (#6004)
segment.target: Kada koristite Microsoft Word, polja s brojevima stranica u zaglavljima sada se mogu čitati. (#6004)

segment.source: The mouse can now be used to move focus between the symbol list and the edit fields in the symbol pronunciation dialog. (#6312)
segment.target: Miš se sada može koristiti za pomicanje fokusa između popisa simbola i polja za uređivanje u dijaloškom okviru za izgovor simbola. (#6312)

segment.source: In browse mode in Microsoft Word, Fixed an issue that stops the elements list from appearing when a document contains an invalid hyperlink. (#5886)
segment.target: U načinu pregledavanja u programu Microsoft Word, riješen je problem koji sprječava pojavljivanje popisa elemenata kada dokument sadrži nevažeću hipervezu. (#5886)

segment.source: After being closed via the task bar or the alt+F4 shortcut, the speech viewer check box in the NVDA menu will now reflect the actual visibility of the window. (#6340)
segment.target: Nakon zatvaranja putem programske trake ili prečaca alt+F4, potvrdni okvir preglednika govora u NVDA izborniku sada će odražavati stvarnu vidljivost prozora. (#6340)

segment.source: The reload plugins command no longer causes problems for triggered configuration profiles, new documents in web browsers and screen review. (#2892, #5380)
segment.target: Naredba za ponovno učitavanje dodataka više ne uzrokuje probleme za pokrenute konfiguracijske profile, nove dokumente u web preglednicima i pregled zaslona. (#2892, #5380)

segment.source: In the list of languages in NVDA's General Settings dialog, languages such as Aragonese are now displayed correctly on Windows 10. (#6259)
segment.target: Na popisu jezika u NVDA dijaloškom okviru Opće postavke, jezici poput aragonskog sada se ispravno prikazuju u sustavu Windows 10. (#6259)

segment.source: Emulated system keyboard keys (e.g. a button on a braille display which emulates pressing the tab key) are now presented in the configured NVDA language in input help and the Input Gestures dialog. Previously, they were always presented in English. (#6212)
segment.target: Emulirane tipke sistemske tipkovnice (npr. gumb na Brailleovom pismu koji emulira pritiskanje tipke tabulatora) sada su prikazani na konfiguriranom NVDA jeziku u pomoći za unos i dijaloškom okviru Geste unosa. Prije su uvijek bili predstavljeni na engleskom jeziku. (#6212)

segment.source: Changing the NVDA language (from the General Settings dialog) now has no effect until NVDA is restarted. (#4561)
segment.target: Promjena NVDA jezika (iz dijaloškog okvira Opće postavke) sada nema učinka dok se NVDA ponovno ne pokrene. (#4561)

segment.source: It is no longer possible to leave the Pattern field blank for a new speech dictionary entry. (#6412)
segment.target: Više nije moguće ostaviti polje Uzorak prazno za novi unos u govorni rječnik. (#6412)

segment.source: Fixed a rare issue when scanning for serial ports on some systems which made some braille display drivers unusable. (#6462)
segment.target: Riješen je rijedak problem prilikom skeniranja serijskih priključaka na nekim sustavima zbog kojeg su neki upravljački programi za Brailleovo pismo bili neupotrebljivi. (#6462)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word, Numbered bullets in table cells are now read when moving by cell. (#6446)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Word numerirane grafičke oznake u ćelijama tablice sada se čitaju prilikom premještanja po ćeliji. (#6446)

segment.source: It is now possible to assign gestures to commands for the Handy Tech braille display driver in the NVDA Input Gestures dialog. (#6461)
segment.target: Sada je moguće dodijeliti geste naredbama za upravljački program za Brailleovo pismo Handy Tech u dijaloškom okviru NVDA Input Gestures. (#6461)

segment.source: In Microsoft Excel, pressing enter or numpadEnter when navigating a spreadsheet now correctly reports navigation to the next row. (#6500)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Excel pritiskom na Enter ili numpad prilikom navigacije proračunskom tablicom sada ispravno izvještava o navigaciji do sljedećeg retka. (#6500)

segment.source: iTunes no longer intermittently freezes forever when using browse mode for the iTunes Store, Apple Music, etc. (#6502)
segment.target: iTunes se više ne zamrzava povremeno zauvijek kada koristite način pregledavanja za iTunes Store, Apple Music itd. (#6502)

segment.source: Fixed crashes in 64 bit Mozilla and Chrome-based applications. (#6497)
segment.target: Ispravljena rušenja u 64-bitnim aplikacijama temeljenim na Mozilli i Chromeu. (#6497)

segment.source: In Firefox with multi-process enabled, browse mode and editable text fields now function correctly. (#6380)
segment.target: U Firefoxu s omogućenim više procesa, način pregledavanja i tekstualna polja koja se mogu uređivati sada ispravno funkcioniraju. (#6380)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: It is now possible to provide app modules for executables containing a dot (.) in their names. Dots are replaced with underscores (_). (#5323)
segment.target: Sada je moguće osigurati module aplikacije za izvršne datoteke koje sadrže točku (.) u nazivu. Točke se zamjenjuju podvlakama (_). (#5323)

segment.source: The new gui.guiHelper module includes utilities to simplify the creation of wxPython GUIs, including automatic management of spacing. This facilitates better visual appearance and consistency, as well as easing creation of new GUIs for blind developers. (#6287)
segment.target: Novi modul gui.guiHelper uključuje uslužne programe za pojednostavljenje izrade wxPython GUI-ja, uključujući automatsko upravljanje razmacima. To olakšava bolji vizualni izgled i dosljednost, kao i olakšavanje stvaranja novih GUI-ja za slijepe programere. (#6287)

segment.source: Highlights of this release include the ability to disable individual add-ons; support for form fields in Microsoft Excel; significant improvements to reporting of colors; fixes and improvements related to several braille displays; and fixes and improvements to support for Microsoft Word.
segment.target: Istaknute značajke ovog izdanja uključuju mogućnost onemogućavanja pojedinačnih dodataka; podrška za polja obrazaca u programu Microsoft Excel; značajna poboljšanja u izvješćivanju o bojama; popravci i poboljšanja vezani uz nekoliko Brailleovih zaslona; te popravci i poboljšanja podrške za Microsoft Word.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove značajke

segment.source: Browse mode can now be used to read PDF documents in Microsoft Edge in the Windows 10 Anniversary Update. (#5740)
segment.target: Način pregledavanja sada se može koristiti za čitanje PDF dokumenata u pregledniku Microsoft Edge u ažuriranju Windows 10 Anniversary Update. (#5740)

segment.source: Strikethrough and double-strikethrough are now reported if appropriate in Microsoft Word. (#5800)
segment.target: Precrtani i dvostruki precrtani sada se prijavljuju ako je prikladno u programu Microsoft Word. (#5800)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word, the title of a table is now reported if one has been provided. If there is a description, it can be accessed using the open long description command (NVDA+d) in browse mode. (#5943)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Word naslov tablice sada se prijavljuje ako je naveden. Ako postoji opis, može mu se pristupiti pomoću naredbe otvorenog dugog opisa (NVDA+d) u načinu pregledavanja. (#5943)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word, NVDA now reports position information when moving paragraphs (alt+shift+downArrow and alt+shift+upArrow). (#5945)
segment.target: U Microsoft Wordu, NVDA sada izvještava o položaju prilikom premještanja paragrafa (alt+shift+strelica prema dolje i alt+shift+strelica gore). (#5945)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word, line spacing is now reported via NVDA's report formatting command, when changing it with various Microsoft word shortcut keys, and when moving to text with different line spacing if Report Line Spacing is turned on in NVDA's Document Formatting Settings. (#2961)
segment.target: U Microsoft Wordu, razmak između redaka sada se prijavljuje putem NVDA naredbe za oblikovanje izvješća, kada ga mijenjate pomoću različitih tipki prečaca Microsoft Word i kada prelazite na tekst s različitim proredima ako je Izvješćivanje o razmaku između redaka uključeno u NVDA postavkama oblikovanja dokumenta. (#2961)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer, HTML5 structural elements are now recognised. (#5591)
segment.target: U pregledniku Internet Explorer sada se prepoznaju strukturni elementi HTML5. (#5591)

segment.source: Reporting of comments (such as in Microsoft Word) can now be disabled via a Report Comments checkbox in NVDA's Document Formatting settings dialog. (#5108)
segment.target: Izvještavanje o komentarima (kao što je u Microsoft Wordu) sada se može onemogućiti putem potvrdnog okvira Prijavi komentare u NVDA dijaloškom okviru postavki formatiranja dokumenta. (#5108)

segment.source: It is now possible to disable individual add-ons in the Add-ons Manager. (#3090)
segment.target: Sada je moguće onemogućiti pojedinačne dodatke u Upravitelju dodataka. (#3090)

segment.source: Additional key assignments have been added for ALVA BC640/680 series braille displays. (#5206)
segment.target: Dodane su dodatne dodjele tipki za zaslone za brajicu serije ALVA BC640/680. (#5206)

segment.source: There is now a command to move the braille display to the current focus. Currently, only the ALVA BC640/680 series has a key assigned to this command, but it can be assigned manually for other displays in the Input Gestures dialog if desired. (#5250)
segment.target: Sada postoji naredba za premještanje brajičnog zaslona na trenutni fokus. Trenutno samo ALVA serija BC640/680 ima tipku dodijeljenu ovoj naredbi, ali se po želji može ručno dodijeliti za druge zaslone u dijaloškom okviru Input Gestures. (#5250)

segment.source: In Microsoft Excel, you can now interact with form fields. You move to form fields using the Elements List or single letter navigation in browse mode. (#4953)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Excel sada možete komunicirati s poljima obrazaca. Na polja obrasca prelazite pomoću popisa elemenata ili navigacije jednim slovom u načinu pregledavanja. (#4953)

segment.source: You can now assign an input gesture to toggle simple review mode using the Input Gestures dialog. (#6173)
segment.target: Sada možete dodijeliti gestu unosa za prebacivanje jednostavnog načina pregleda pomoću dijaloškog okvira Geste unosa. (#6173)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: NVDA now reports colors using a basic well-understood set of 9 color hues and 3 shades, with brightness and paleness variations. This is rather than using more subjective and less understood color names. (#6029)
segment.target: NVDA sada izvještava o bojama koristeći osnovni dobro shvaćeni skup od 9 nijansi boja i 3 nijanse, s varijacijama svjetline i blijedosti. Ovo je umjesto korištenja subjektivnijih i manje razumljivih naziva boja. (#6029)

segment.source: The existing NVDA+F9 then NVDA+F10 behavior has been modified to select text on the first press of F10. When F10 is pressed twice (in quick succession) the text is copied to the clipboard. (#4636)
segment.target: Postojeće ponašanje NVDA+F9, a zatim NVDA+F10 je izmijenjeno tako da odabire tekst pri prvom pritisku na F10. Kada se F10 pritisne dvaput (u brzom slijedu), tekst se kopira u međuspremnik. (#4636)

segment.source: Updated eSpeak NG to version Master 11b1a7b (22 June 2016). (#6037)
segment.target: Ažuriran eSpeak NG na verziju Master 11b1a7b (22. lipnja 2016.). (#6037)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci grešaka

segment.source: In browse mode in Microsoft Word, copying to the clipboard now preserves formatting. (#5956)
segment.target: U načinu pregledavanja u programu Microsoft Word, kopiranje u međuspremnik sada čuva oblikovanje. (#5956)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word, NVDA now reports appropriately when using Word's own table navigation commands (alt+home, alt+end, alt+pageUp and alt+pageDown) and table selection commands (shift added to the navigation commands). (#5961)
segment.target: U Microsoft Wordu, NVDA sada izvještava na odgovarajući način kada koristi Wordove vlastite naredbe za navigaciju tablicom (alt+home, alt+end, alt+pageUp i alt+pageDown) i naredbe za odabir tablice (shift dodan navigacijskim naredbama). (#5961)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word dialog boxes, NVDA's object navigation has been greatly improved. (#6036)
segment.target: U dijaloškim okvirima Microsoft Worda, NVDA navigacija objektima je znatno poboljšana. (#6036)

segment.source: In some applications such as Visual Studio 2015, shortcut keys (e.g. control+c for Copy) are now reported as expected. (#6021)
segment.target: U nekim aplikacijama, kao što je Visual Studio 2015, tipke prečaca (npr. kontrola+c za kopiranje) sada se prijavljuju prema očekivanjima. (#6021)

segment.source: Fixed a rare issue when scanning for serial ports on some systems which made some braille display drivers unusable. (#6015)
segment.target: Riješen je rijedak problem prilikom skeniranja serijskih priključaka na nekim sustavima zbog kojeg su neki upravljački programi za Brailleovo pismo bili neupotrebljivi. (#6015)

segment.source: Reporting colors in Microsoft Word is now more accurate as changes in Microsoft Office Themes are now taken into account. (#5997)
segment.target: Boje izvješćivanja u programu Microsoft Word sada su točnije jer se sada uzimaju u obzir promjene u temama sustava Microsoft Office. (#5997)

segment.source: Browse mode for Microsoft Edge and support for Start Menu search suggestions is again available on Windows 10 builds after April 2016. (#5955)
segment.target: Način pregledavanja za Microsoft Edge i podrška za prijedloge pretraživanja izbornika Start ponovno su dostupni u međuverzijama sustava Windows 10 nakon travnja 2016. (#5955)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word, automatic table header reading works better when dealing with merged cells. (#5926)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Word automatsko čitanje zaglavlja tablice bolje funkcionira kada se radi o spojenim ćelijama. (#5926)

segment.source: In the Windows 10 Mail app, NVDA no longer fails to read the content of messages. (#5635)
segment.target: U aplikaciji Windows 10 Mail NVDA više ne uspijeva čitati sadržaj poruka. (#5635)

segment.source: When speak command keys is on, lock keys such as caps lock are no longer announced twice. (#5490)
segment.target: Kada je tipka za izgovaranje naredbi uključena, tipke za zaključavanje kao što je Caps Lock više se ne najavljuju dvaput. (#5490)

segment.source: Windows User Account Control dialogs are again read correctly in the Windows 10 Anniversary update. (#5942)
segment.target: Dijaloški okviri za kontrolu korisničkog računa sustava Windows ponovno se ispravno čitaju u ažuriranju Windows 10 Anniversary (#5942)

segment.source: In the Web Conference Plugin (such as used on out-of-sight.net) NVDA no longer beeps and speaks progress bar updates related to microphone input. (#5888)
segment.target: U dodatku za web konferencije (kao što je korišten na out-of-sight.net) NVDA više ne oglašava zvučne signale i ne izgovara ažuriranja trake napretka koja se odnose na ulaz mikrofona. (#5888)

segment.source: Performing a Find Next or Find Previous command in Browse Mode will now correctly do a case sensitive search if the original Find was case sensitive. (#5522)
segment.target: Izvođenje naredbe Pronađi sljedeće ili Pronađi prethodno u načinu pregledavanja sada će ispravno izvršiti pretraživanje s razlikom od velikih i malih slova ako je izvorni Pronalaženje razlikovalo velika i mala slova. (#5522)

segment.source: When editing dictionary entries, feedback is now given for invalid regular expressions. NVDA no longer crashes if a dictionary file contains an invalid regular expression. (#4834)
segment.target: Prilikom uređivanja unosa u rječniku, sada se daju povratne informacije za nevažeće regularne izraze. NVDA se više ne ruši ako datoteka rječnika sadrži nevažeći regularni izraz. (#4834)

segment.source: If NVDA is unable to communicate with a braille display (e.g. because it has been disconnected), it will automatically disable use of the display. (#1555)
segment.target: Ako NVDA ne može komunicirati s Brailleovim pismom (npr. jer je isključen), automatski će onemogućiti korištenje zaslona. (#1555)

segment.source: Slightly improved performance of filtering in the Browse Mode Elements List in some cases. (#6126)
segment.target: Malo su poboljšane performanse filtriranja na popisu elemenata načina pregledavanja u nekim slučajevima. (#6126)

segment.source: In Microsoft Excel, the background pattern names reported by NVDA now match those used by Excel. (#6092)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Excel, nazivi pozadinskih uzoraka koje je prijavio NVDA sada odgovaraju onima koje koristi Excel. (#6092)

segment.source: Improved support for the Windows 10 logon screen, including announcement of alerts and activating of the password field with touch. (#6010)
segment.target: Poboljšana podrška za zaslon za prijavu u sustav Windows 10, uključujući najavu upozorenja i aktiviranje polja za lozinku dodirom. (#6010)

segment.source: NVDA now correctly detects the secondary routing buttons on ALVA BC640/680 series braille displays. (#5206)
segment.target: NVDA sada ispravno prepoznaje sekundarne tipke za usmjeravanje na zaslonima za brajicu serije ALVA BC640/680. (#5206)

segment.source: NVDA can again report Windows Toast notifications in recent builds of Windows 10. (#6096)
segment.target: NVDA ponovno može prijaviti Windows Toast obavijesti u nedavnim verzijama sustava Windows 10. (#6096)

segment.source: NVDA no longer occasionally stops recognising key presses on Baum compatible and HumanWare Brailliant B braille displays. (#6035)
segment.target: NVDA više ne prestaje povremeno prepoznavati pritiske tipki na Baum kompatibilnim i HumanWare Brailliant B Braille zaslonima. (#6035)

segment.source: If reporting of line numbers is enabled in NVDA's Document Formatting preferences, line numbers are now shown on a braille display. (#5941)
segment.target: Ako je prijavljivanje brojeva redaka omogućeno u NVDA postavkama formatiranja dokumenta, brojevi redaka sada se prikazuju na Brailleovom pismu. (#5941)

segment.source: When speech mode is off, reporting objects (such as pressing NVDA+tab to report the focus) now appears in the Speech Viewer as expected. (#6049)
segment.target: Kada je govorni mod isključen, objekti za prijavljivanje (kao što je pritiskanje NVDA+tab za prijavu fokusa) sada se pojavljuju u Pregledniku govora prema očekivanjima. (#6049)

segment.source: In the Outlook 2016 message list, associated draft information is no longer reported. (#6219)
segment.target: Na popisu poruka programa Outlook 2016 više se ne prijavljuju povezane skice. (#6219)

segment.source: In Google Chrome and Chrome-based browsers in a language other than English, browse mode no longer fails to work in many documents. (#6249)
segment.target: U pregledniku Google Chrome i preglednicima temeljenim na Chromeu na jeziku koji nije engleski, način pregledavanja više ne funkcionira u mnogim dokumentima. (#6249)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: Logging information directly from a property no longer results in the property being called recursively over and over again. (#6122)
segment.target: Zapisivanje podataka izravno iz svojstva više ne rezultira rekurzivnim pozivanjem svojstva iznova i iznova. (#6122)

segment.source: This release fixes crashes in Microsoft Word:
segment.target: Ovo izdanje popravlja rušenja u programu Microsoft Word:

segment.source: NVDA no longer causes Microsoft Word to crash immediately after it starts in Windows XP. (#6033)
segment.target: NVDA više ne uzrokuje rušenje Microsoft Worda odmah nakon pokretanja u sustavu Windows XP. (#6033)

segment.source: Removed reporting of grammar errors, as this causes crashes in Microsoft Word. (#5954, #5877)
segment.target: Uklonjeno je izvješćivanje o gramatičkim pogreškama jer to uzrokuje rušenje u programu Microsoft Word. (#5954, #5877)

segment.source: Highlights of this release include the ability to indicate spelling errors while typing; support for reporting grammar errors in Microsoft Word; and improvements and fixes to Microsoft Office support.
segment.target: Istaknute značajke ovog izdanja uključuju mogućnost označavanja pravopisnih pogrešaka tijekom tipkanja; podrška za prijavljivanje gramatičkih pogrešaka u programu Microsoft Word; te poboljšanja i popravci podrške za Microsoft Office.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove značajke

segment.source: In browse mode in Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls, using first letter navigation to move by annotation (a and shift+a) now moves to inserted and deleted text. (#5691)
segment.target: U načinu pregledavanja u pregledniku Internet Explorer i drugim MSHTML kontrolama, korištenje navigacije prvim slovom za pomicanje napomenom (a i shift+a) sada se premješta na umetnuti i izbrisani tekst. (#5691)

segment.source: In Microsoft Excel, NVDA now reports the level of a group of cells, as well as whether it is collapsed or expanded. (#5690)
segment.target: U Microsoft Excelu, NVDA sada izvještava o razini grupe ćelija, kao i o tome je li sažeta ili proširena. (#5690)

segment.source: Pressing the Report text formatting command (NVDA+f) twice presents the information in browse mode so it can be reviewed. (#4908)
segment.target: Dvaput pritiskom na naredbu Oblikovanje teksta izvješća (NVDA+f) prikazuju se informacije u načinu pregledavanja kako bi ih se moglo pregledati. (#4908)

segment.source: In Microsoft Excel 2010 and later, cell shading and gradient fill is now reported. Automatic reporting is controlled by the Report colors option in NVDA's Document Formatting preferences. (#3683)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Excel 2010 i novijim verzijama sada se izvješćuje o sjenčanju ćelija i ispuni gradijenta. Automatskim izvještavanjem upravlja opcija Boje izvješća u NVDA postavkama oblikovanja dokumenta. (#3683)

segment.source: New braille translation table: Koine Greek. (#5393)
segment.target: Nova tablica za prijevod Brailleovog pisma: Koine grčki. (#5393)

segment.source: In the Log Viewer, you can now save the log using the shortcut key control+s. (#4532)
segment.target: U pregledniku dnevnika sada možete spremiti zapisnik pomoću tipke prečaca control+s. (#4532)

segment.source: If reporting of spelling errors is enabled and supported in the focused control, NVDA will play a sound to alert you of a spelling error made while typing. This can be disabled using the new "Play sound for spelling errors while typing" option in NVDA's Keyboard Settings dialog. (#2024)
segment.target: Ako je prijavljivanje pravopisnih pogrešaka omogućeno i podržano u fokusiranoj kontroli, NVDA će reproducirati zvuk koji će vas upozoriti na pravopisnu pogrešku napravljenu tijekom tipkanja. To se može onemogućiti pomoću nove opcije "Reproduciraj zvuk za pravopisne pogreške tijekom tipkanja" u NVDA dijaloškom okviru Postavke tipkovnice. (#2024)

segment.source: Grammar errors are now reported in Microsoft Word. This can be disabled using the new "Report grammar errors" option in NVDA's Document Formatting preferences dialog. (#5877)
segment.target: Gramatičke pogreške sada se prijavljuju u programu Microsoft Word. To se može onemogućiti pomoću nove opcije "Prijavi gramatičke pogreške" u NVDA dijaloškom okviru postavki oblikovanja dokumenta. (#5877)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: In browse mode and editable text fields, NVDA now treats numpadEnter the same as the main enter key. (#5385)
segment.target: U načinu pregledavanja i tekstualnim poljima koja se mogu uređivati, NVDA sada tretira numpad Enter isto kao i glavnu tipku za unos. (#5385)

segment.source: NVDA has switched to the eSpeak NG speech synthesizer. (#5651)
segment.target: NVDA je prešao na eSpeak NG sintetizator govora. (#5651)

segment.source: In Microsoft Excel, NVDA no longer ignores a column header for a cell when there is a blank row between the cell and the header. (#5396)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Excel NVDA više ne zanemaruje zaglavlje stupca za ćeliju kada postoji prazan redak između ćelije i zaglavlja. (#5396)

segment.source: In Microsoft Excel, coordinates are now announced before headers to eliminate ambiguity between headers and content. (#5396)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Excel koordinate se sada najavljuju prije zaglavlja kako bi se uklonila dvosmislenost između zaglavlja i sadržaja. (#5396)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci grešaka

segment.source: In browse mode, when attempting to use single letter navigation to move to an element which isn't supported for the document, NVDA reports that this isn't supported rather than reporting that there is no element in that direction. (#5691)
segment.target: U načinu pregledavanja, kada pokušavate koristiti navigaciju jednim slovom za prelazak na element koji nije podržan za dokument, NVDA izvještava da to nije podržano umjesto da izvještava da nema elementa u tom smjeru. (#5691)

segment.source: When listing sheets in the Elements List in Microsoft Excel, sheets containing only charts are now included. (#5698)
segment.target: Prilikom navođenja listova na popisu elemenata u programu Microsoft Excel sada su uključeni listovi koji sadrže samo grafikone. (#5698)

segment.source: NVDA no longer reports extraneous information when switching windows in a Java application with multiple windows such as IntelliJ or Android Studio. (#5732)
segment.target: NVDA više ne izvještava o suvišnim informacijama prilikom prebacivanja prozora u Java aplikaciji s više prozora kao što su IntelliJ ili Android Studio. (#5732)

segment.source: In Scintilla based editors such as Notepad++, braille is now updated correctly when moving the cursor using a braille display. (#5678)
segment.target: U uređivačima temeljenim na Scintilli, kao što je Notepad++, Brailleovo pismo se sada ispravno ažurira prilikom pomicanja kursora pomoću zaslona brajice. (#5678)

segment.source: NVDA no longer sometimes crashes when enabling braille output. (#4457)
segment.target: NVDA se više ponekad ne ruši prilikom omogućavanja Brailleovog izlaza. (#4457)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word, paragraph indentation is now always reported in the measurement unit chosen by the user (e.g. centimeters or inches). (#5804)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Word uvlačenje odlomka sada se uvijek prijavljuje u mjernoj jedinici koju je odabrao korisnik (npr. centimetri ili inči). (#5804)

segment.source: When using a braille display, many NVDA messages that were previously only spoken are now brailled as well. (#5557)
segment.target: Kada koristite Brailleov zaslon, mnoge NVDA poruke koje su se prije samo izgovarale sada se također brailliraju. (#5557)

segment.source: In accessible Java applications, the level of tree view items is now reported. (#5766)
segment.target: U pristupačnim Java aplikacijama sada se izvještava o razini stavki prikaza stabla. (#5766)

segment.source: Fixed crashes in Adobe Flash in Mozilla Firefox in some cases. (#5367)
segment.target: Ispravljena rušenja u Adobe Flashu u Mozilla Firefoxu u nekim slučajevima. (#5367)

segment.source: In Google Chrome and Chrome-based browsers, documents within dialogs or applications can now be read in browse mode. (#5818)
segment.target: U preglednikima Google Chrome i Chrome, dokumenti unutar dijaloških okvira ili aplikacija sada se mogu čitati u načinu pregledavanja. (#5818)

segment.source: In Google Chrome and Chrome-based browsers, you can now force NVDA to switch to browse mode in web dialogs or applications. (#5818)
segment.target: U Google Chromeu i preglednicima koji se temelje na Chromeu, sada možete prisiliti NVDA da se prebaci u način pregledavanja u web dijaloškim okvirima ili aplikacijama. (#5818)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls, moving focus to certain controls (specifically, where aria-activedescendant is used) no longer incorrectly switches to browse mode. This occurred, for example, when moving to suggestions in address fields when composing a message in Gmail. (#5676)
segment.target: U pregledniku Internet Explorer i drugim MSHTML kontrolama premještanje fokusa na određene kontrole (konkretno, gdje se koristi aria-activedescendant) više se ne prebacuje pogrešno u način pregledavanja. To se dogodilo, na primjer, prilikom prelaska na prijedloge u adresnim poljima prilikom sastavljanja poruke na Gmailu. (#5676)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word, NVDA no longer freezes in large tables when reporting of table row/column headers is enabled. (#5878)
segment.target: U Microsoft Wordu, NVDA se više ne zamrzava u velikim tablicama kada je omogućeno izvještavanje o zaglavljima redaka/stupaca tablice. (#5878)

segment.source: In Microsoft word, NVDA no longer incorrectly reports text with an outline level (but not a built-in heading style) as a heading. (#5186)
segment.target: U Microsoft Wordu, NVDA više ne izvještava pogrešno o tekstu s razinom obrisa (ali ne i ugrađenim stilom naslova) kao naslovom. (#5186)

segment.source: In browse mode in Microsoft Word, the Move past end/to start of container commands (comma and shift+comma) now work for tables. (#5883)
segment.target: U načinu pregledavanja u programu Microsoft Word, naredbe Premjesti preko kraja/na početak spremnika (zarez i shift+zarez) sada rade za tablice. (#5883)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: NVDA's C++ components are now built with Microsoft Visual Studio 2015. (#5592)
segment.target: NVDA C++ komponente sada su izgrađene s Microsoft Visual Studio 2015. (#5592)

segment.source: You can now present a text or HTML message to the user in browse mode using ui.browseableMessage. (#4908)
segment.target: Sada možete predstaviti tekstualnu ili HTML poruku korisniku u načinu pregledavanja pomoću ui.browseableMessage. (#4908)

segment.source: In the User Guide, when a <!-- KC:setting command is used for a setting which has a common key for all layouts, the key may now be placed after a full-width colon (：) as well as the regular colon (:). (#5739) -->
segment.target: In the User Guide, when a <!-- KC:setting command is used for a setting which has a common key for all layouts, the key may now be placed after a full-width colon (：) as well as the regular colon (:). (#5739) -->

segment.source: Highlights of this release include the ability to optionally lower the volume of other sounds; improvements to braille output and braille display support; several significant fixes to Microsoft Office support; and fixes to browse mode in iTunes.
segment.target: Istaknuti dijelovi ovog izdanja uključuju mogućnost opcionalnog smanjenja glasnoće drugih zvukova; poboljšanja Brailleovog izlaza i podrške za Brailleovo pismo; nekoliko značajnih popravaka podrške za Microsoft Office; i popravke načina pregledavanja u iTunesu.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove značajke

segment.source: New braille translation tables: Polish 8 dot computer braille, Mongolian. (#5537, #5574)
segment.target: Nove tablice za prijevod Brailleovog pisma: poljska računalna brajica s 8 točaka, mongolska. (#5537, #5574)

segment.source: You can turn off the braille cursor and change its shape using the new Show cursor and Cursor shape options in the Braille Settings dialog. (#5198)
segment.target: Možete isključiti pokazivač brajice i promijeniti njegov oblik pomoću novih opcija Prikaži pokazivač i Oblik kursora u dijaloškom okviru Postavke brajice. (#5198)

segment.source: NVDA can now connect to a HIMS Smart Beetle braille display via Bluetooth. (#5607)
segment.target: NVDA se sada može povezati s HIMS Smart Beetle Brailleovim pismom putem Bluetootha. (#5607)

segment.source: NVDA can optionally lower the volume of other sounds when installed on Windows 8 and later. This can be configured using the Audio ducking mode option in the NVDA Synthesizer dialog or by pressing NVDA+shift+d. (#3830, #5575)
segment.target: NVDA može po želji smanjiti glasnoću drugih zvukova kada je instaliran na Windows 8 i novijim verzijama. To se može konfigurirati pomoću opcije Način prigušivanja zvuka u dijaloškom okviru NVDA sintisajzera ili pritiskom na NVDA+shift+d. (#3830, #5575)

segment.source: Support for the APH Refreshabraille in HID mode and the Baum VarioUltra and Pronto! when connected via USB. (#5609)
segment.target: Podrška za APH Refreshabraille u HID načinu rada i Baum VarioUltra i Pronto! kada je spojen putem USB-a. (#5609)

segment.source: Support for HumanWare Brailliant BI/B braille displays when the protocol is set to OpenBraille. (#5612)
segment.target: Podrška za HumanWare Brailliant BI/B Brailleovo pismo prikazuje se kada je protokol postavljen na OpenBraille. (#5612)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: Reporting of emphasis is now disabled by default. (#4920)
segment.target: Izvješćivanje o naglasku sada je onemogućeno prema zadanim postavkama. (#4920)

segment.source: In the Elements List dialog in Microsoft Excel, the shortcut for Formulas has been changed to alt+r so that it is different to the shortcut for the Filter field. (#5527)
segment.target: U dijaloškom okviru Popis elemenata u programu Microsoft Excel prečac za formule promijenjen je u alt+are tako da se razlikuje od prečaca za polje Filtar. (#5527)

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to 2.6.5. (#5574)
segment.target: Ažuriran prevoditelj brajevog pisma liblouis na 2.6.5. (#5574)

segment.source: The word "text" is no longer reported when moving the focus or review cursor to text objects. (#5452)
segment.target: Riječ "tekst" više se ne prijavljuje prilikom premještanja fokusa ili pregleda kursora na tekstualne objekte. (#5452)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci grešaka

segment.source: In iTunes 12, browse mode now updates correctly when a new page loads in the iTunes Store. (#5191)
segment.target: U aplikaciji iTunes 12 način pretraživanja sada se ispravno ažurira kada se nova stranica učita u trgovini iTunes Store. (#5191)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls, moving to specific heading levels with single letter navigation now behaves as expected when the level of a heading is overridden for accessibility purposes (specifically, when aria-level overrides the level of an h tag). (#5434)
segment.target: U pregledniku Internet Explorer i drugim MSHTML kontrolama prelazak na određene razine naslova s navigacijom jednim slovom sada se ponaša kao što se očekuje kada je razina naslova nadjačana u svrhu pristupačnosti (točnije, kada razina arije nadjačava razinu oznake h). (#5434)

segment.source: In Spotify, focus no longer frequently lands on "unknown" objects. (#5439)
segment.target: U Spotifyju fokus više ne pada često na "nepoznate" objekte. (#5439)

segment.source: Focus is now restored correctly when returning to Spotify from another application. (#5439)
segment.target: Fokus se sada ispravno vraća prilikom povratka na Spotify iz druge aplikacije. (#5439)

segment.source: When toggling between browse mode and focus mode, the mode is reported in braille as well as speech. (#5239)
segment.target: Prilikom prebacivanja između načina pregledavanja i načina fokusiranja, način rada se izvještava na Brailleovom pismu i govoru. (#5239)

segment.source: The Start buttn on the Taskbar is no longer reported as a list and/or as selected in some versions of Windows. (#5178)
segment.target: Pokreni stražnjicu na programskoj traci više se ne prijavljuje kao popis i/ili kao odabrano u nekim verzijama sustava Windows. (#5178)

segment.source: Messages such as "inserted" are no longer reported when composing messages in Microsoft Outlook. (#5486)
segment.target: Poruke kao što je "umetnuto" više se ne prijavljuju prilikom sastavljanja poruka u programu Microsoft Outlook. (#5486)

segment.source: When using a braille display and text is selected on the current line (e.g. when searching in a text editor for text which occurs on the same line), the braille display will be scrolled if appropriate. (#5410)
segment.target: Kada se upotrebljava prikaz brajice i odabire se tekst u trenutnom retku (npr. kada u uređivaču teksta pretražujete tekst koji se nalazi u istom retku), prikaz brajice pomiče se prema potrebi. (#5410)

segment.source: NVDA no longer silently exits when closing a Windows command console with alt+f4 in Windows 10. (#5343)
segment.target: NVDA više ne izlazi tiho prilikom zatvaranja Windows naredbene konzole s alt+f4 u sustavu Windows 10. (#5343)

segment.source: In the Elements List in browse mode, when you change the type of element, the Filter by field is now cleared. (#5511)
segment.target: Na popisu elemenata u načinu pregledavanja, kada promijenite vrstu elementa, polje Filtriraj po sada je obrisano. (#5511)

segment.source: In editable text in Mozilla applications, moving the mouse again reads the appropriate line, word, etc. as expected instead of the entire content. (#5535)
segment.target: U tekstu koji se može uređivati u Mozillinim aplikacijama, ponovnim pomicanjem miša čita se odgovarajući redak, riječ itd. kako se očekuje umjesto cijelog sadržaja. (#5535)

segment.source: When moving the mouse in editable text in Mozilla applications, reading no longer stops at elements such as links within the word or line being read. (#2160, #5535)
segment.target: Prilikom pomicanja miša u tekstu koji se može uređivati u Mozillinim aplikacijama, čitanje se više ne zaustavlja na elementima kao što su poveznice unutar riječi ili retka koji se čita. (#2160, #5535)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer, the shoprite.com website can now be read in browse mode instead of reporting as blank. (Specifically, malformed lang attributes are now handled gracefully.) (#5569)
segment.target: U pregledniku Internet Explorer web-mjesto shoprite.com sada se može čitati u načinu pregledavanja umjesto da se prijavljuje kao prazno. (Konkretno, neispravni atributi langa sada se obrađuju graciozno.) (#5569)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word, tracked changes such as "inserted" are no longer reported when track changes markup is not displayed. (#5566)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Word evidentirane promjene kao što je "umetnute" više se ne prijavljuju kada se ne prikaže oznaka praćenja promjena. (#5566)

segment.source: When a toggle button is focused, NVDA now reports when it is changed from pressed to not pressed. (#5441)
segment.target: Kada je preklopna tipka fokusirana, NVDA sada izvještava kada je promijenjena iz pritisnute u nepritisnutu. (#5441)

segment.source: Reporting of mouse shape changes again works as expected. (#5595)
segment.target: Izvješćivanje o promjenama oblika miša ponovno funkcionira prema očekivanjima. (#5595)

segment.source: When speaking line indentation, non-breaking spaces are now treated as normal spaces. Previously, this could cause announcements such as "space space space" instead of "3 space". (#5610)
segment.target: Kada izgovarate uvlačenje redaka, razmaci bez loma sada se tretiraju kao normalni razmaci. Ranije je to moglo uzrokovati najave kao što je "svemirski prostor" umjesto "3 prostora". (#5610)

segment.source: When closing a modern Microsoft input method candidate list, focus is correctly restored to either the input composition or the underlying document. (#4145)
segment.target: Prilikom zatvaranja popisa kandidata za modernu Microsoftovu metodu unosa, fokus se ispravno vraća na sastav unosa ili temeljni dokument. (#4145)

segment.source: In Microsoft Office 2013 and later, when the ribbon is set to show only tabs, items in the ribbon are again reported as expected when a tab is activated. (#5504)
segment.target: U sustavu Microsoft Office 2013 i novijim verzijama, kada je vrpca postavljena na prikaz samo kartica, stavke na vrpci ponovno se prijavljuju prema očekivanjima kada se kartica aktivira. (#5504)

segment.source: Fixes and improvements to touch screen gesture detection and binding. (#5652)
segment.target: Popravci i poboljšanja prepoznavanja i povezivanja gesta na dodirnom zaslonu. (#5652)

segment.source: Touch screen hovers are no longer reported in input help. (#5652)
segment.target: Lebdenja dodirnog zaslona više se ne prijavljuju u pomoći za unos. (#5652)

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to list comments in the Elements List for Microsoft Excel if a comment is on a merged cell. (#5704)
segment.target: NVDA više ne uspijeva navesti komentare na popisu elemenata za Microsoft Excel ako je komentar na spojenoj ćeliji. (#5704)

segment.source: In a very rare case, NVDA no longer fails to read sheet content in Microsoft Excel with reporting of row and column headers enabled. (#5705)
segment.target: U vrlo rijetkim slučajevima, NVDA više ne uspijeva čitati sadržaj lista u Microsoft Excelu s omogućenim izvještavanjem o zaglavljima redaka i stupaca. (#5705)

segment.source: In Google Chrome, navigating within an Input composition when entering east Asian characters now works as expected. (#4080)
segment.target: U pregledniku Google Chrome navigacija unutar ulazne kompozicije prilikom unosa istočnoazijskih znakova sada funkcionira prema očekivanjima. (#4080)

segment.source: When searching Apple Music in iTunes, browse mode for the search results document is now updated as expected. (#5659)
segment.target: Prilikom pretraživanja Apple Musica u iTunesu, način pregledavanja dokumenta s rezultatima pretraživanja sada se ažurira prema očekivanjima. (#5659)

segment.source: In Microsoft Excel, pressing shift+f11 to create a new sheet now reports your new position instead of reporting nothing. (#5689)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Excel pritiskom na shift+f11 za stvaranje novog lista sada se izvještava o novoj poziciji umjesto da se ništa ne prijavljuje. (#5689)

segment.source: Fixed problems with braille display output when entering Korean characters. (#5640)
segment.target: Riješeni su problemi s izlazom na Brailleovom pismu prilikom unosa korejskih znakova. (#5640)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: The new audioDucking.AudioDucker class allows code which outputs audio to indicate when background audio should be ducked. (#3830)
segment.target: Nova klasa audioDucking.AudioDucker omogućuje kod koji izlazi zvuk kako bi naznačio kada pozadinski zvuk treba sakriti. (#3830)

segment.source: nvwave.WavePlayer's constructor now has a wantDucking keyword argument which specifies whether background audio should be ducked while audio is playing. (#3830)
segment.target: nvwave. Konstruktor WavePlayera sada ima argument ključne riječi wantDucking koji određuje treba li se pozadinski zvuk sakriti tijekom reprodukcije zvuka. (#3830)

segment.source: When this is enabled (which is the default), it is essential that WavePlayer.idle be called when appropriate.
segment.target: Kada je to omogućeno (što je zadano), bitno je da se WavePlayer.idle pozove kada je to prikladno.

segment.source: Enhanced I/O for braille displays: (#5609)
