segment.target: Poboljšani I/O za Brailleove zaslone: (#5609)

segment.source: Thread-safe braille display drivers can declare themselves as such using the BrailleDisplayDriver.isThreadSafe attribute. A driver must be thread-safe to benefit from the following features.
segment.target: Upravljački programi Brailleovog zaslona koji su sigurni za nit mogu se proglasiti takvim pomoću atributa BrailleDisplayDriver.isThreadSafe. Upravljački program mora biti siguran za nit kako bi imao koristi od sljedećih značajki.

segment.source: Data is written to thread-safe braille display drivers in the background, thus improving performance.
segment.target: Podaci se zapisuju na upravljačke programe Brailleovog pisma koji su sigurni za nit u pozadini, čime se poboljšavaju performanse.

segment.source: hwIo.Serial extends pyserial to call a callable when data is received instead of drivers having to poll.
segment.target: hwIo.Serial proširuje pyserial da pozove poziv kada se primi podatak umjesto da vozači moraju anketirati.

segment.source: hwIo.Hid provides support for braille displays communicating via USB HID.
segment.target: hwIo.Hid pruža podršku za Brailleove zaslone koji komuniciraju putem USB HID-a.

segment.source: hwPortUtils and hwIo can optionally provide detailed debug logging, including devices found and all data sent and received.
segment.target: hwPortUtils i hwIo po želji mogu pružiti detaljno bilježenje otklanjanja pogrešaka, uključujući pronađene uređaje i sve poslane i primljene podatke.

segment.source: There are several new properties accessible from touch screen gestures: (#5652)
segment.target: Postoji nekoliko novih svojstava dostupnih putem gesta na zaslonu osjetljivom na dodir: (#5652)

segment.source: MultitouchTracker objects now contain a childTrackers property which contains the MultiTouchTrackers the tracker was composed of. For example, 2 finger double tap has child trackers for two 2-finger taps. The 2-finger taps themselves have child trackers for two taps.
segment.target: MultitouchTracker objekti sada sadrže svojstvo childTrackers koje sadrži MultiTouchTrackers od kojeg se sastojao. Na primjer, dvostruki dodir s 2 prsta ima praćenje djece za dva dodira s 2 prsta. Sami dodiri s 2 prsta imaju praćenje djece za dva dodira.

segment.source: MultiTouchTracker objects now also contain a rawSingleTouchTracker property if the tracker was the result of one single finger doing a tap, flick or hover. The SingleTouchTracker allows access to the underlying ID assigned to the finger by the operating system and whether or not the finger is still in contact at the current time.
segment.target: Objekti MultiTouchTracker sada sadrže i svojstvo rawSingleTouchTracker ako je tragač rezultat dodira, pomicanja prsta ili lebdenja jednim prstom. SingleTouchTracker omogućuje pristup temeljnom ID-u koji je dodijelio prstu operativni sustav i je li prst još uvijek u kontaktu u trenutnom trenutku.

segment.source: TouchInputGestures now have x and y properties, removing the need to access the tracker for trivial cases.
segment.target: TouchInputGestures sada imaju svojstva x i y, uklanjajući potrebu za pristupom trackeru za trivijalne slučajeve.

segment.source: TouchInputGesturs now contain a preheldTracker property, which is a MultitouchTracker object representing the other fingers held while this action was being performed.
segment.target: TouchInputGesturs sada sadrže svojstvo preheldTracker, što je MultitouchTracker objekt koji predstavlja ostale prste koje se drže tijekom izvođenja ove akcije.

segment.source: Two new touch screen gestures can be emitted: (#5652)
segment.target: Mogu se emitirati dvije nove geste na zaslonu osjetljivom na dodir: (#5652)

segment.source: Plural tap and holds (e.g. double tap and hold)
segment.target: Dodir i zadržavanje u množini (npr. dvostruki dodir i držanje)

segment.source: A generalized identifier with finger count removed for holds (e.g. hold+hover for 1finger_hold+hover).
segment.target: Generalizirani identifikator s uklonjenim brojem prstiju za zadržavanja (npr. držanje+lebdenje za 1finger_hold+lebdeći).

segment.source: Highlights of this release include performance improvements in Windows 10; inclusion in the Ease of Access Center in Windows 8 and later; enhancements for Microsoft Excel, including listing and renaming of sheets and access to locked cells in protected sheets; and support for editing of rich text in Mozilla Firefox, Google Chrome and Mozilla Thunderbird.
segment.target: Istaknute značajke ovog izdanja uključuju poboljšanja performansi u sustavu Windows 10; uključivanje u centar za olakšani pristup u sustavu Windows 8 i novijim verzijama; poboljšanja za Microsoft Excel, uključujući popis i preimenovanje listova te pristup zaključanim ćelijama u zaštićenim listovima; i podrška za uređivanje obogaćenog teksta u Mozilla Firefoxu, Google Chromeu i Mozilla Thunderbirdu.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove značajke

segment.source: NVDA now appears in the Ease of Access Center in Windows 8 and later. (#308)
segment.target: NVDA se sada pojavljuje u Centru za olakšani pristup u sustavu Windows 8 i novijim verzijama. (#308)

segment.source: When moving around cells in Excel, formatting changes are now automatically reported if the appropriate options are turned on in NVDA's Document Formatting Settings dialog. (#4878)
segment.target: Prilikom kretanja po ćelijama u Excelu, promjene formatiranja sada se automatski prijavljuju ako su odgovarajuće opcije uključene u NVDA dijaloškom okviru Postavke oblikovanja dokumenta. (#4878)

segment.source: A Report Emphasis option has been added to NVDA's Document formatting settings dialog. On by default, this option allows NVDA to automatically report the existence of emphasised text in documents. So far, this is only supported for em and strong tags in Browse Mode for Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls. (#4920)
segment.target: Opcija Naglasak izvješća dodana je u NVDA dijaloški okvir Postavke oblikovanja dokumenta. Uključeno prema zadanim postavkama, ova opcija omogućuje NVDA da automatski prijavi postojanje naglašenog teksta u dokumentima. Zasad je to podržano samo za em i jake oznake u načinu pregledavanja za Internet Explorer i druge MSHTML kontrole. (#4920)

segment.source: The existence of inserted and deleted text is now reported in Browse Mode for Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls if NVDA's Report Editor Revisions option is enabled. (#4920)
segment.target: Postojanje umetnutog i obrisanog teksta sada se prijavljuje u načinu pregledavanja za Internet Explorer i druge MSHTML kontrole ako je NVDA opcija Revizije uređivača izvješća omogućena. (#4920)

segment.source: When viewing track changes in NVDA's Elements List for Microsoft Word, more information such as what formatting properties were changed is now displayed. (#4920)
segment.target: Kada pregledavate promjene zapisa na NVDA popisu elemenata za Microsoft Word, sada se prikazuje više informacija kao što su svojstva oblikovanja koja su promijenjena. (#4920)

segment.source: Microsoft Excel: listing and renaming of sheets is now possible from NVDA's Elements List (NVDA+f7). (#4630, #4414)
segment.target: Microsoft Excel: popis i preimenovanje listova sada je moguće iz NVDA popisa elemenata (NVDA+f7). (#4630, #4414)

segment.source: It is now possible to configure whether actual symbols are sent to speech synthesizers (e.g. to cause a pause or change in inflection) in the Symbol Pronunciation dialog. (#5234)
segment.target: Sada je moguće konfigurirati šalju li se stvarni simboli sintetizatorima govora (npr. da izazovu pauzu ili promjenu fleksije) u dijaloškom okviru Izgovor simbola. (#5234)

segment.source: In Microsoft Excel, NVDA now reports any input messages set by the sheet author on cells. (#5051)
segment.target: U Microsoft Excelu, NVDA sada izvještava o svim ulaznim porukama koje je autor lista postavio na ćelije. (#5051)

segment.source: Support for the Baum Pronto! V4 and VarioUltra braille displays when connected via Bluetooth. (#3717)
segment.target: Podrška za Baum Pronto! Prikazi brajice V4 i VarioUltra kada su povezani putem Bluetootha. (#3717)

segment.source: Support for editing of rich text in Mozilla applications such as Google Docs with braille support enabled in Mozilla Firefox and HTML composition in Mozilla Thunderbird. (#1668)
segment.target: Podrška za uređivanje obogaćenog teksta u Mozilla aplikacijama kao što su Google dokumenti s omogućenom podrškom za brajicu u Mozilla Firefoxu i HTML kompozicijom u Mozilla Thunderbirdu. (#1668)

segment.source: Support for editing of rich text in Google Chrome and Chrome-based browsers such as Google Docs with braille support enabled. (#2634)
segment.target: Podrška za uređivanje obogaćenog teksta u Google Chromeu i preglednicima koji se temelje na Chromeu kao što su Google dokumenti s omogućenom podrškom za Brailleovo pismo. (#2634)

segment.source: This requires Chrome version 47 or later.
segment.target: Za to je potrebna verzija Chromea 47 ili novija.

segment.source: In browse mode in Microsoft Excel, you can navigate to locked cells in protected sheets. (#4952)
segment.target: U načinu pregledavanja u programu Microsoft Excel možete se kretati do zaključanih ćelija u zaštićenim listovima. (#4952)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: The Report Editor Revisions option in NVDA's Document formatting settings dialog is now turned on by default. (#4920)
segment.target: Opcija Revizije uređivača izvješća u NVDA dijaloškom okviru Postavke oblikovanja dokumenta sada je uključena prema zadanim postavkama. (#4920)

segment.source: When moving by character in Microsoft Word with NVDA's Report Editor Revisions option enabled, less information is now reported for track changes, which makes navigation more efficient. To view the extra information, use the Elements List. (#4920)
segment.target: Kada se pomičete po znakovima u Microsoft Wordu s uključenom NVDA opcijom Revizije uređivača izvješća, sada se prijavljuje manje informacija o promjenama zapisa, što navigaciju čini učinkovitijom. Da biste vidjeli dodatne informacije, upotrijebite popis elemenata. (#4920)

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to 2.6.4. (#5341)
segment.target: Ažuriran prevoditelj brajice liblouis na 2.6.4. (#5341)

segment.source: Several symbols (including basic mathematical symbols) have been moved to level some so that they are spoken by default. (#3799)
segment.target: Nekoliko simbola (uključujući osnovne matematičke simbole) premješteno je na razinu tako da se prema zadanim postavkama izgovaraju. (#3799)

segment.source: If the synthesizer supports it, speech should now pause for parentheses and the en dash (–). (#3799)
segment.target: Ako sintisajzer to podržava, govor bi sada trebao pauzirati za zagrade i crticu (–). (#3799)

segment.source: When selecting text, the text is reported before the indication of selection instead of after. (#1707)
segment.target: Prilikom odabira teksta, tekst se prijavljuje prije naznake odabira, a ne poslije. (#1707)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci grešaka

segment.source: Major performance improvements when navigating the Outlook 2010/2013 message list. (#5268)
segment.target: Velika poboljšanja performansi prilikom navigacije popisom poruka programa Outlook 2010/2013. (#5268)

segment.source: In a chart in Microsoft Excel, navigating with certain keys (such as changing sheets with control+pageUp and control+pageDown) now works correctly. (#5336)
segment.target: U grafikonu u programu Microsoft Excel navigacija određenim tipkama (kao što je promjena listova pomoću control+pageUp i control+pageDown) sada ispravno funkcionira. (#5336)

segment.source: Fixed the visual appearance of the buttons in the warning dialog which is displayed when you attempt to downgrade NVDA. (#5325)
segment.target: Popravljen je vizualni izgled gumba u dijaloškom okviru upozorenja koji se prikazuje kada pokušate smanjiti NVDA. (#5325)

segment.source: In Windows 8 and later, NVDA now starts a lot earlier when configured to start after logging on to Windows. (#308)
segment.target: U sustavu Windows 8 i novijim verzijama, NVDA se sada pokreće puno ranije kada je konfiguriran za pokretanje nakon prijave u Windows. (#308)

segment.source: If you enabled this using a previous version of NVDA, you will need to disable it and enable it again in order for the change to take effect. Follow this procedure:
segment.target: Ako ste to omogućili pomoću prethodne verzije NVDA-a, morat ćete je onemogućiti i ponovno omogućiti kako bi promjena stupila na snagu. Slijedite ovaj postupak:

segment.source: Open the General Settings dialog.
segment.target: Otvorite dijaloški okvir Opće postavke.

segment.source: Uncheck the Automatically start NVDA after I log on to Windows checkbox.
segment.target: Poništite potvrdni okvir Automatski pokreni NVDA nakon što se prijavim na Windows.

segment.source: Press the OK button.
segment.target: Pritisnite gumb OK.

segment.source: Open the General Settings dialog again.
segment.target: Ponovno otvorite dijaloški okvir Opće postavke.

segment.source: Check the Automatically start NVDA after I log on to Windows checkbox.
segment.target: Označite potvrdni okvir Automatski pokreni NVDA nakon što se prijavim na Windows.

segment.source: Press the OK button.
segment.target: Pritisnite gumb OK.

segment.source: Performance enhancements for UI Automation including File Explorer and Task Viewer. (#5293)
segment.target: Poboljšanja performansi za automatizaciju korisničkog sučelja, uključujući File Explorer i Preglednik zadataka. (#5293)

segment.source: NVDA now correctly switches to focus mode when tabbing to read-only ARIA grid controls in Browse Mode for Mozilla Firefox and other Gecko-based controls. (#5118)
segment.target: NVDA se sada ispravno prebacuje u način fokusiranja kada prelazite na ARIA kontrole mreže samo za čitanje u načinu pregledavanja za Mozilla Firefox i druge kontrole temeljene na Gecku. (#5118)

segment.source: NVDA now correctly reports "no previous" instead of "no next" when there are no more objects when flicking left on a touch screen.
segment.target: NVDA sada ispravno izvještava "nema prethodnog" umjesto "nema sljedećeg" kada više nema objekata prilikom pomicanja ulijevo na zaslonu osjetljivom na dodir.

segment.source: Fixed problems when typing multiple words into the filter field in the Input Gestures dialog. (#5426)
segment.target: Riješeni su problemi prilikom upisivanja više riječi u polje filtra u dijaloškom okviru Geste unosa. (#5426)

segment.source: NVDA no longer freezes in some cases when reconnecting to a HumanWare Brailliant BI/B series display via USB. (#5406)
segment.target: NVDA se više ne zamrzava u nekim slučajevima prilikom ponovnog povezivanja sa zaslonom serije HumanWare Brailliant BI/B putem USB-a. (#5406)

segment.source: In languages with conjunct characters, character descriptions now work as expected for upper case English characters. (#5375)
segment.target: U jezicima s konjunkcijskim znakovima opisi znakova sada funkcioniraju kao što se očekuje za velike engleske znakove. (#5375)

segment.source: NVDA should no longer occasionally freeze when bringing up the Start Menu in Windows 10. (#5417)
segment.target: NVDA se više ne bi trebao povremeno zamrzavati prilikom otvaranja izbornika Start u sustavu Windows 10. (#5417)

segment.source: In Skype for Desktop, notifications which are displayed before a previous notification disappears are now reported. (#4841)
segment.target: U Skypeu za stolna računala sada se prijavljuju obavijesti koje se prikazuju prije nestanka prethodne obavijesti. (#4841)

segment.source: Notifications are now reported correctly in Skype for Desktop 7.12 and later. (#5405)
segment.target: Obavijesti se sada ispravno prijavljuju u Skypeu za stolna računala 7.12 i novijim verzijama. (#5405)

segment.source: NVDA now correctly reports the focus when dismissing a context menu in some applications such as Jart. (#5302)
segment.target: NVDA sada ispravno izvještava o fokusu prilikom odbacivanja kontekstnog izbornika u nekim aplikacijama kao što je Jart. (#5302)

segment.source: In Windows 7 and later, Color is again reported in certain applications such as Wordpad. (#5352)
segment.target: U sustavu Windows 7 i novijim verzijama, boja se ponovno prijavljuje u određenim aplikacijama kao što je Wordpad. (#5352)

segment.source: When editing in Microsoft PowerPoint, pressing enter now reports automatically entered text such as a bullet or number. (#5360)
segment.target: Prilikom uređivanja u programu Microsoft PowerPoint, pritiskom na Enter sada se automatski unosi tekst kao što je grafička oznaka ili broj. (#5360)

segment.source: Highlights of this release include initial support for Windows 10; the ability to disable single letter navigation in browse mode (useful for some web apps); improvements in Internet Explorer; and fixes for garbled text when typing in certain applications with braille enabled.
segment.target: Istaknute značajke ovog izdanja uključuju početnu podršku za Windows 10; mogućnost onemogućavanja navigacije jednim slovom u načinu pregledavanja (korisno za neke web aplikacije); poboljšanja u pregledniku Internet Explorer; i popravci iskrivljenog teksta prilikom tipkanja u određenim aplikacijama s omogućenom brajicom.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove značajke

segment.source: The existence of spelling errors is announced in editable fields for Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls. (#4174)
segment.target: Postojanje pravopisnih pogrešaka najavljuje se u poljima koja se mogu uređivati za Internet Explorer i druge MSHTML kontrole. (#4174)

segment.source: Many more Unicode math symbols are now spoken when they appear in text. (#3805)
segment.target: Sada se izgovara mnogo više Unicode matematičkih simbola kada se pojave u tekstu. (#3805)

segment.source: Search suggestions in the Windows 10 start screen are automatically reported. (#5049)
segment.target: Prijedlozi za pretraživanje na početnom zaslonu sustava Windows 10 automatski se prijavljuju. (#5049)

segment.source: Support for the EcoBraille 20, EcoBraille 40, EcoBraille 80 and EcoBraille Plus braille displays. (#4078)
segment.target: Podrška za zaslone za brajice EcoBraille 20, EcoBraille 40, EcoBraille 80 i EcoBraille Plus. (#4078)

segment.source: In browse mode, you can now toggle single letter navigation on and off by pressing NVDA+shift+space. When off, single letter keys are passed to the application, which is useful for some web applications such as Gmail, Twitter and Facebook. (#3203)
segment.target: U načinu pregledavanja sada možete uključiti i isključiti navigaciju jednim slovom pritiskom na NVDA+shift+razmak. Kada su isključeni, jednoslovni ključevi prosljeđuju se aplikaciji, što je korisno za neke web aplikacije kao što su Gmail, Twitter i Facebook. (#3203)

segment.source: New braille translation tables: Finnish 6 dot, Irish grade 1, Irish grade 2, Korean grade 1 (2006), Korean grade 2 (2006). (#5137, #5074, #5097)
segment.target: Nove tablice za prijevod Brailleovog pisma: finski 6 točaka, irski razred 1, irski razred 2, korejski razred 1 (2006), korejski razred 2 (2006). (#5137, #5074, #5097)

segment.source: The QWERTY keyboard on the Papenmeier BRAILLEX Live Plus braille display is now supported. (#5181)
segment.target: Sada je podržana QWERTY tipkovnica na Brajičnom pismu Papenmeier BRAILLEX Live Plus. (#5181)

segment.source: Experimental support for the Microsoft Edge web browser and browsing engine in Windows 10. (#5212)
segment.target: Eksperimentalna podrška za web-preglednik Microsoft Edge i mehanizam za pregledavanje u sustavu Windows 10. (#5212)

segment.source: New language: Kannada.
segment.target: Novi jezik: Kannada.

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to 2.6.3. (#5137)
segment.target: Ažuriran prevoditelj brajevog pisma na 2.6.3. (#5137)

segment.source: When attempting to install an earlier version of NVDA than is currently installed, you will now be warned that this is not recommended and that NVDA should be completely uninstalled before proceeding. (#5037)
segment.target: Kada pokušavate instalirati stariju verziju NVDA od trenutno instalirane, sada ćete biti upozoreni da se to ne preporučuje i da NVDA treba potpuno deinstalirati prije nego što nastavite. (#5037)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci grešaka

segment.source: In browse mode for Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls, quick navigation by form field no longer incorrectly includes presentational list items. (#4204)
segment.target: U načinu pregledavanja za Internet Explorer i druge MSHTML kontrole brza navigacija po polju obrasca više ne uključuje pogrešno stavke prezentacijskog popisa. (#4204)

segment.source: In Firefox, NVDA no longer inappropriately reports the content of an ARIA tab panel when focus moves inside it. (#4638)
segment.target: U Firefoxu, NVDA više ne prijavljuje neprimjereno sadržaj ARIA kartice kada se fokus pomakne unutar nje. (#4638)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls, tabbing into sections, articles or dialogs no longer inappropriately reports all content in the container. (#5021, #5025)
segment.target: U pregledniku Internet Explorer i drugim MSHTML kontrolama tabulatorom u odjeljke, članke ili dijaloške okvire više se ne prijavljuje neprimjereno sav sadržaj u spremniku. (#5021, #5025)

segment.source: When using Baum/HumanWare/APH braille displays with a braille keyboard, braille input no longer stops functioning after pressing another type of key on the display. (#3541)
segment.target: Kada koristite Baum/HumanWare/APH brajeve zaslone s brajičnom tipkovnicom, unos brajice više ne prestaje funkcionirati nakon pritiska na drugu vrstu tipke na zaslonu. (#3541)

segment.source: In Windows 10, extraneous information is no longer reported when pressing alt+tab or alt+shift+tab to switch between applications. (#5116)
segment.target: U sustavu Windows 10 suvišne informacije više se ne prijavljuju kada pritisnete alt+tab ili alt+shift+tab za prebacivanje između aplikacija. (#5116)

segment.source: Typed text is no longer garbled when using certain applications such as Microsoft Outlook with a braille display. (#2953)
segment.target: Upisani tekst više se ne iskrivljuje kada koristite određene aplikacije kao što je Microsoft Outlook sa zaslonom brajice. (#2953)

segment.source: In browse mode in Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls, the correct content is now reported when an element appears or changes and is immediately focused. (#5040)
segment.target: U načinu pregledavanja u pregledniku Internet Explorer i drugim MSHTML kontrolama sada se prijavljuje ispravan sadržaj kada se element pojavi ili promijeni i odmah se fokusira. (#5040)

segment.source: In browse mode in Microsoft Word, single letter navigation now updates the braille display and the review cursor as expected. (#4968)
segment.target: U načinu pregledavanja u programu Microsoft Word, navigacija jednim slovom sada ažurira Brailleov prikaz i kursor za pregled prema očekivanjima. (#4968)

segment.source: In braille, extraneous spaces are no longer displayed between or after indicators for controls and formatting. (#5043)
segment.target: Na Brailleovom pismu suvišni razmaci više se ne prikazuju između ili poslije indikatora za kontrole i oblikovanje. (#5043)

segment.source: When an application is responding slowly and you switch away from that application, NVDA is now much more responsive in other applications in most cases. (#3831)
segment.target: Kada aplikacija sporo reagira i vi se prebacite s te aplikacije, NVDA sada u većini slučajeva puno bolje reagira u drugim aplikacijama. (#3831)

segment.source: Windows 10 Toast notifications are now reported as expected. (#5136)
segment.target: Windows 10 Toast obavijesti sada se prijavljuju prema očekivanjima. (#5136)

segment.source: The value is now reported as it changes in certain (UI Automation) combo boxes where this was not working previously.
segment.target: Vrijednost se sada izvještava kako se mijenja u određenim kombiniranim okvirima (automatizacija korisničkog sučelja) u kojima to prije nije funkcioniralo.

segment.source: In browse mode in web browsers, tabbing now behaves as expected after tabbing to a frame document. (#5227)
segment.target: U načinu pregledavanja u web-preglednicima, tabulatori se sada ponašaju prema očekivanjima nakon ulaganja tabulatora u dokument okvira. (#5227)

segment.source: The Windows 10 lock screen can now be dismissed using a touch screen. (#5220)
segment.target: Zaključani zaslon sustava Windows 10 sada se može odbaciti pomoću zaslona osjetljivog na dodir. (#5220)

segment.source: In Windows 7 and later, text is no longer garbled when typing in certain applications such as Wordpad and Skype with a braille display. (#4291)
segment.target: U sustavu Windows 7 i novijim verzijama tekst se više ne iskrivljuje prilikom upisivanja u određenim aplikacijama kao što su Wordpad i Skype sa zaslonom za brajicu. (#4291)

segment.source: On the Windows 10 lock screen, it is no longer possible to read the clipboard, access running applications with the review cursor, change NVDA configuration, etc. (#5269)
segment.target: Na zaključanom zaslonu sustava Windows 10 više nije moguće čitati međuspremnik, pristupati pokrenutim aplikacijama pomoću kursora za pregled, mijenjati NVDA konfiguraciju itd. (#5269)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: You can now inject raw input from a system keyboard that is not handled natively by Windows (e.g. a QWERTY keyboard on a braille display) using the new keyboardHandler.injectRawKeyboardInput function. (#4576)
segment.target: Sada možete ubaciti neobrađeni unos sa sistemske tipkovnice kojom Windows ne upravlja izvorno (npr. QWERTY tipkovnica na Brailleovom pismu) pomoću nove funkcije keyboardHandler.injectRawKeyboardInput. (#4576)

segment.source: eventHandler.requestEvents has been added to request particular events that are blocked by default; e.g. show events from a specific control or certain events even when in the background. (#3831)
segment.target: eventHandler.requestEvents dodan je za zahtjev za određene događaje koji su blokirani prema zadanim postavkama; npr. prikazati događaje iz određene kontrole ili određene događaje čak i kada su u pozadini. (#3831)

segment.source: Rather than a single i18nName attribute, synthDriverHandler.SynthSetting now has separate displayNameWithAccelerator and displayName attributes to avoid reporting of the accelerator in the synth settings ring in some languages.
segment.target: Umjesto jednog atributa i18nName, synthDriverHandler.SynthSetting sada ima odvojene atribute displayNameWithAccelerator i displayName kako bi se izbjeglo izvještavanje o akceleratoru u prstenu postavki sintisajzera na nekim jezicima.

segment.source: For backwards compatibility, in the constructor, displayName is optional and will be derived from displayNameWithAccelerator if not provided. However, if you intend to have an accelerator for a setting, both should be provided.
segment.target: Za kompatibilnost s prethodnim verzijama, u konstruktoru, displayName nije obavezan i bit će izveden iz displayNameWithAccelerator ako nije naveden. Međutim, ako namjeravate imati akcelerator za postavku, treba osigurati oboje.

segment.source: The i18nName attribute is deprecated and may be removed in a future release.
segment.target: Atribut i18nName je zastario i može se ukloniti u budućem izdanju.

segment.source: Highlights of this release include the ability to read charts in Microsoft Excel and support for reading and interactive navigation of mathematical content.
segment.target: Istaknute značajke ovog izdanja uključuju mogućnost čitanja grafikona u programu Microsoft Excel i podršku za čitanje i interaktivnu navigaciju matematičkim sadržajem.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove značajke

segment.source: Moving forward and backward by sentence in Microsoft Word and Outlook is now possible with alt+downArrow and alt+upArrow respectively. (#3288)
segment.target: Pomicanje naprijed i natrag po rečenicama u Microsoft Wordu i Outlooku sada je moguće uz alt+downArrow i alt+upArrow. (#3288)

segment.source: New braille translation tables for several Indian languages. (#4778)
segment.target: Nove tablice za prijevod Brailleovog pisma za nekoliko indijskih jezika. (#4778)

segment.source: In Microsoft Excel, NVDA now reports when a cell has overflowing or cropped content. (#3040)
segment.target: U Microsoft Excelu NVDA sada izvještava kada ćelija ima prepun ili izrezan sadržaj. (#3040)

segment.source: In Microsoft Excel, you can now use the Elements List (NVDA+f7) to allow listing of charts, comments and formulas. (#1987)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Excel sada možete koristiti popis elemenata (NVDA+f7) kako biste omogućili popis grafikona, komentara i formula. (#1987)

segment.source: Support for reading charts in Microsoft Excel. To use this, select the chart using the Elements List (NVDA+f7) and then use the arrow keys to move between the data points. (#1987)
segment.target: Podrška za čitanje grafikona u programu Microsoft Excel. Da biste to koristili, odaberite grafikon pomoću popisa elemenata (NVDA+f7), a zatim koristite tipke sa strelicama za pomicanje između podatkovnih točaka. (#1987)

segment.source: Using MathPlayer 4 from Design Science, NVDA can now read and interactively navigate mathematical content in web browsers and in Microsoft Word and PowerPoint. See the "Reading Mathematical Content" section in the User Guide for details. (#4673)
segment.target: Koristeći MathPlayer 4 iz Design Sciencea, NVDA sada može čitati i interaktivno navigirati matematičkim sadržajem u web preglednicima te u Microsoft Wordu i PowerPointu. Za detalje pogledajte odjeljak "Čitanje matematičkog sadržaja" u Korisničkom priručniku. (#4673)

segment.source: It is now possible to assign input gestures (keyboard commands, touch gestures, etc.) for all NVDA preferences dialogs and document formatting options using the Input Gestures dialog. (#4898)
segment.target: Sada je moguće dodijeliti geste unosa (tipkovničke naredbe, dodirne geste, itd.) za sve dijaloške okvire NVDA postavki i opcije oblikovanja dokumenta pomoću dijaloškog okvira Ulazne geste. (#4898)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: In NVDA's Document Formatting dialog, the keyboard shortcuts for Report lists, Report links, Report line numbers and Report font name have been changed. (#4650)
segment.target: U NVDA dijaloškom okviru Oblikovanje dokumenta, promijenjeni su tipkovni prečaci za popise izvješća, veze na izvješća, brojeve redaka izvješća i naziv fonta izvješća. (#4650)

segment.source: In NVDA's Mouse Settings dialog, keyboard shortcuts have been added for play audio coordinates when mouse moves and brightness controls audio coordinates volume. (#4916)
segment.target: U NVDA dijaloškom okviru Postavke miša, dodani su tipkovnički prečaci za reprodukciju audio koordinata kada se miš pomiče, a svjetlina kontrolira glasnoću audio koordinata. (#4916)

segment.source: Significantly improved reporting of color names. (#4984)
segment.target: Značajno poboljšano izvještavanje o nazivima boja. (#4984)

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to 2.6.2. (#4777)
segment.target: Ažuriran prevoditelj brajice liblouis na 2.6.2. (#4777)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci grešaka

segment.source: Character descriptions are now handled correctly for conjunct characters in certain Indian languages. (#4582)
segment.target: Opisi znakova sada se ispravno obrađuju za konjunkcijske znakove u određenim indijskim jezicima. (#4582)

segment.source: If the "Trust voice's language when processing characters and symbols" option is enabled, the Punctuation/Symbol pronunciation dialog now correctly uses the voice language. Also, the language for which pronunciation is being edited is shown in the dialog's title. (#4930)
segment.target: Ako je omogućena opcija "Vjeruj jeziku glasa prilikom obrade znakova i simbola", dijaloški okvir Interpunkcija/izgovor simbola sada ispravno koristi jezik glasa. Također, jezik za koji se izgovor uređuje prikazan je u naslovu dijaloškog okvira. (#4930)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls, typed characters are no longer inappropriately announced in editable combo boxes such as the Google search field on the Google home page. (#4976)
segment.target: U Internet Exploreru i drugim MSHTML kontrolama upisani znakovi više se ne objavljuju neprimjereno u kombiniranim okvirima koji se mogu uređivati, kao što je polje za Google pretraživanje na Googleovoj početnoj stranici. (#4976)

segment.source: When selecting colors in Microsoft Office applications, color names are now reported. (#3045)
segment.target: Prilikom odabira boja u aplikacijama sustava Microsoft Office sada se prijavljuju nazivi boja. (#3045)

segment.source: Danish braille output now works again. (#4986)
segment.target: Danski Brailleov izlaz sada ponovno funkcionira. (#4986)

segment.source: PageUp/pageDown can again be used to change slides within a PowerPoint slide show. (#4850)
segment.target: PageUp/pageDown ponovno se može koristiti za promjenu slajdova unutar dijaprojekcije programa PowerPoint. (#4850)

segment.source: In Skype for Desktop 7.2 and later, typing notifications are now reported and problems immediately after moving focus out of a conversation have been fixed. (#4972)
segment.target: U Skypeu za stolna računala 7.2 i novijim verzijama sada se prijavljuju obavijesti o tipkanju i riješeni su problemi odmah nakon premještanja fokusa iz razgovora. (#4972)

segment.source: Fixed problems when typing certain punctuation/symbols such as brackets into the filter field in the Input Gestures dialog. (#5060)
segment.target: Riješeni su problemi prilikom upisivanja određenih interpunkcijskih znakova/simbola kao što su zagrade u polje filtra u dijaloškom okviru Geste unosa. (#5060)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls, pressing g or shift+g to navigate to graphics now includes elements marked as images for accessibility purposes (i.e. ARIA role img). (#5062)
segment.target: U pregledniku Internet Explorer i drugim MSHTML kontrolama pritiskom na g ili shift+g za navigaciju do grafike sada se nalaze elementi označeni kao slike u svrhu pristupačnosti (npr. ARIA uloga img). (#5062)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: brailleInput.handler.sendChars(mychar) will no longer filter out a character if it is equal to the previous character by ensuring that the key sent is correctly released. (#4139)
segment.target: brailleInput.handler.sendChars(mychar) više neće filtrirati znak ako je jednak prethodnom znaku tako što će osigurati da je poslani ključ ispravno otpušten. (#4139)

segment.source: Scripts for changing touch modes will now honor new labeles added to touchHandler.touchModeLabels. (#4699)
segment.target: Skripte za promjenu načina dodira sada će poštovati nove oznake dodane u touchHandler.touchModeLabels. (#4699)

segment.source: Add-ons can provide their own math presentation implementations. See the mathPres package for details. (#4509)
segment.target: Dodaci mogu pružiti vlastite implementacije matematičke prezentacije. Za detalje pogledajte mathPres paket. (#4509)

segment.source: Speech commands have been implemented to insert a break between words and to change the pitch, volume and rate. See BreakCommand, PitchCommand, VolumeCommand and RateCommand in the speech module. (#4674)
segment.target: Implementirane su govorne naredbe za umetanje pauze između riječi i promjenu visine, glasnoće i brzine. Pogledajte BreakCommand, PitchCommand, VolumeCommand i RateCommand u govornom modulu. (#4674)

segment.source: There is also speech.PhonemeCommand to insert specific pronunciation, but the current implementations only support a very limited number of phonemes.
segment.target: Tu je i govor. PhonemeNaredba za umetanje određenog izgovora, ali trenutne implementacije podržavaju samo vrlo ograničen broj fonema.

segment.source: Highlights of this release include browse mode for documents in Microsoft Word and Outlook; major enhancements to support for Skype for Desktop; and significant fixes for Microsoft Internet Explorer.
segment.target: Istaknute značajke ovog izdanja uključuju način pregledavanja dokumenata u programima Microsoft Word i Outlook; velika poboljšanja podrške za Skype za stolna računala; i značajne popravke za Microsoft Internet Explorer.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove značajke

segment.source: You can now add new symbols in the Symbol Pronunciation dialog. (#4354)
segment.target: Sada možete dodati nove simbole u dijaloškom okviru Izgovor simbola. (#4354)

segment.source: In the Input Gestures dialog, you can use the new "Filter by" field to show only gestures containing specific words. (#4458)
segment.target: U dijaloškom okviru Ulazne geste možete koristiti novo polje "Filtriraj prema" za prikaz samo gesta koje sadrže određene riječi. (#4458)

segment.source: NVDA now automatically reports new text in mintty. (#4588)
segment.target: NVDA sada automatski izvještava o novom tekstu u mintty. (#4588)

segment.source: In the browse mode Find dialog, there is now an option to perform a case sensitive search. (#4584)
segment.target: U dijaloškom okviru Pronađi način pregledavanja sada postoji mogućnost pretraživanja osjetljivog na velika i mala slova. (#4584)

segment.source: Quick navigation (pressing h to move by heading, etc.) and Elements List (NVDA+f7) are now available in Microsoft Word documents by turning on browse mode with NVDA+space. (#2975)
segment.target: Brza navigacija (pritiskom na h za pomicanje po naslovu itd.) i Popis elemenata (NVDA+f7) sada su dostupni u Microsoft Word dokumentima uključivanjem načina pregledavanja s NVDA+razmak. (#2975)

segment.source: Reading HTML messages in Microsoft Outlook 2007 and later has been majorly improved as Browse mode is automatically enabled for these messages. If browse mode is not enabled in some rare situations, you can force it on with NVDA+space. (#2975)
segment.target: Čitanje HTML poruka u programu Microsoft Outlook 2007 i novijim verzijama znatno je poboljšano jer je način pregledavanja automatski omogućen za te poruke. Ako način pregledavanja nije omogućen u nekim rijetkim situacijama, možete ga prisilno uključiti pomoću NVDA+razmaka. (#2975)

segment.source: Table column headers in Microsoft word are automatically reported for tables where a header row has been explicitly specified by the author via Microsoft word's table properties. (#4510)
segment.target: Zaglavlja stupaca tablice u Microsoft Wordu automatski se prijavljuju za tablice u kojima je autor izričito odredio redak zaglavlja putem svojstava tablice Microsoft Worda. (#4510)

segment.source: However, For tables where rows have been merged, this will not work automatically. In this situation, you can still set column headers manually in NVDA with NVDA+shift+c.
segment.target: Međutim, za tablice u kojima su spojeni reci to neće funkcionirati automatski. U tom slučaju i dalje možete ručno postaviti zaglavlja stupaca u NVDA uređaju s NVDA+shift+c.

segment.source: In Skype for Desktop, notifications are now reported. (#4741)
segment.target: U Skypeu za stolna računala sada se prijavljuju obavijesti. (#4741)

segment.source: In Skype for Desktop, you can now report and review recent messages using NVDA+control+1 through NVDA+control+0; e.g. NVDA+control+1 for the most recent message and NVDA+control+0 for the tenth most recent. (#3210)
segment.target: U Skypeu za stolna računala sada možete prijaviti i pregledati nedavne poruke koristeći NVDA+control+1 do NVDA+control+0; npr. NVDA+control+1 za najnoviju poruku i NVDA+control+0 za desetu najnoviju. (#3210)

segment.source: In a conversation in Skype for Desktop, NVDA now reports when a contact is typing. (#3506)
segment.target: U razgovoru u Skypeu za stolna računala, NVDA sada izvještava kada kontakt tipka. (#3506)

segment.source: NVDA can now be installed silently via the command line without starting the installed copy after installation. To do this, use the --install-silent option. (#4206)
segment.target: NVDA se sada može tiho instalirati putem naredbenog retka bez pokretanja instalirane kopije nakon instalacije. Da biste to učinili, upotrijebite opciju --install-silent. (#4206)

segment.source: Support for the Papenmeier BRAILLEX Live 20, BRAILLEX Live and BRAILLEX Live Plus braille displays. (#4614)
segment.target: Podrška za brajice Papenmeier BRAILLEX Live 20, BRAILLEX Live i BRAILLEX Live Plus. (#4614)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: In NVDA's Document Formatting settings dialog, the option to report spelling errors now has a shortcut key (alt+r). (#793)
segment.target: U NVDA dijaloškom okviru postavki oblikovanja dokumenta, opcija za prijavu pravopisnih pogrešaka sada ima tipku prečaca (alt+r). (#793)

segment.source: NVDA will now use the synthesizer/voice's language for character and symbol processing (including punctuation/symbol names), regardless of whether automatic language switching is turned on. To turn off this feature so that NVDA again uses its interface language, uncheck the new option in Voice settings called Trust Voice's language when processing characters and symbols. (#4210)
segment.target: NVDA će sada koristiti jezik sintisajzera/glasa za obradu znakova i simbola (uključujući nazive interpunkcijskih znakova/simbola), bez obzira na to je li uključena automatska promjena jezika. Da biste isključili ovu značajku kako bi NVDA ponovno koristio jezik sučelja, poništite novu opciju u postavkama Glasa pod nazivom Vjeruj jeziku Glasa prilikom obrade znakova i simbola. (#4210)

segment.source: Support for the Newfon synthesizer has been removed. Newfon is now available as an NVDA add-on. (#3184)
segment.target: Podrška za Newfon sintisajzer je uklonjena. Newfon je sada dostupan kao NVDA dodatak. (#3184)

segment.source: Skype for Desktop 7 or later is now required for use with NVDA; earlier versions are not supported. (#4218)
segment.target: Skype za stolna računala 7 ili noviji sada je potreban za korištenje s NVDA; Starije verzije nisu podržane. (#4218)

segment.source: Downloading of NVDA updates is now more secure. (Specifically, the update information is retrieved via https and the hash of the file is verified after it is downloaded.) (#4716)
segment.target: Preuzimanje NVDA ažuriranja sada je sigurnije. (Točnije, podaci o ažuriranju dohvaćaju se putem https-a, a hash datoteke provjerava se nakon preuzimanja.) (#4716)

segment.source: eSpeak has been upgraded to version 1.48.04 (#4325)
segment.target: eSpeak je nadograđen na verziju 1.48.04 (#4325)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci grešaka

segment.source: In Microsoft Excel, merged row and column header cells are now handled correctly. For example, if A1 and B1 are merged, then B2 will now have A1 and B1 reported as its column header rather than nothing at all. (#4617)
segment.target: U programu Microsoft Excel spojene ćelije zaglavlja retka i stupca sada se ispravno obrađuju. Na primjer, ako su A1 i B1 spojeni, tada će B2 sada imati A1 i B1 prijavljene kao zaglavlje stupca, a ne ništa. (#4617)

segment.source: When editing the content of a text box in Microsoft PowerPoint 2003, NVDA will correctly report the content of each line. Previously, in each paragraph, lines would increasingly be off by one character. (#4619)
segment.target: Prilikom uređivanja sadržaja tekstualnog okvira u programu Microsoft PowerPoint 2003, NVDA će ispravno izvijestiti o sadržaju svakog retka. Prije toga, u svakom odlomku, retci bi sve više bili pomaknuti za jedan znak. (#4619)

segment.source: All of NVDA's dialogs are now centred on the screen, improving visual presentation and usability. (#3148)
segment.target: Svi NVDA dijalozi sada su usredotočeni na zaslon, poboljšavajući vizualnu prezentaciju i upotrebljivost. (#3148)

segment.source: In Skype for desktop, when entering an introductory message to add a contact, entering and moving through the text now works correctly. (#3661)
segment.target: U Skypeu za stolna računala, prilikom unosa uvodne poruke za dodavanje kontakta, unos i pomicanje teksta sada ispravno funkcionira. (#3661)

segment.source: When focus moves to a new item in tree views in the Eclipse IDE, if the previously focused item is a check box, it is no longer incorrectly announced. (#4586)
segment.target: Kada se fokus premjesti na novu stavku u prikazima stabla u Eclipse IDE-u, ako je prethodno fokusirana stavka potvrdni okvir, više se ne objavljuje pogrešno. (#4586)

segment.source: In the Microsoft Word spell check dialog, the next error will be automatically reported when the last one has been changed or ignored using respective shortcut keys. (#1938)
segment.target: U dijaloškom okviru za provjeru pravopisa programa Microsoft Word, sljedeća će se pogreška automatski prijaviti kada je posljednja promijenjena ili zanemarena pomoću odgovarajućih tipki prečaca. (#1938)

segment.source: Text can again be read correctly in places such as Tera Term Pro's terminal window and documents in Balabolka. (#4229)
segment.target: Tekst se opet može ispravno pročitati na mjestima kao što su prozor terminala Tera Term Pro i dokumenti u Balabolki. (#4229)

segment.source: Focus now correctly returns to the document being edited When finishing input composition of text in Korean and other east Asian languages while editing within a frame in Internet Explorer and other MSHTML documents. (#4045)
segment.target: Fokus se sada ispravno vraća na dokument koji se uređuje Kada dovršavate sastavljanje teksta na korejskom i drugim istočnoazijskim jezicima tijekom uređivanja unutar okvira u pregledniku Internet Explorer i drugim MSHTML dokumentima. (#4045)

segment.source: In the Input Gestures dialog, when selecting a keyboard layout for a keyboard gesture being added, pressing escape now closes the menu as expected instead of closing the dialog. (#3617)
segment.target: U dijaloškom okviru Ulazne geste, prilikom odabira rasporeda tipkovnice za dodanu tipkovnicu, pritiskom na escape sada se zatvara izbornik prema očekivanjima umjesto zatvaranja dijaloškog okvira. (#3617)

segment.source: When removing an add-on, the add-on directory is now correctly deleted after restarting NVDA. Previously, you had to restart twice. (#3461)
segment.target: Prilikom uklanjanja dodatka, direktorij dodataka sada se ispravno briše nakon ponovnog pokretanja NVDA-e. Prije ste morali ponovno pokrenuti dva puta. (#3461)

segment.source: Major problems have been fixed when using Skype for Desktop 7. (#4218)
segment.target: Riješeni su glavni problemi pri korištenju Skypea za stolna računala 7. (#4218)

segment.source: When you send a message in Skype for Desktop, it is no longer read twice. (#3616)
segment.target: Kada pošaljete poruku u Skypeu za stolna računala, ona se više ne čita dvaput. (#3616)

segment.source: In Skype for Desktop, NVDA should no longer occasionally spuriously read a large flood of messages (perhaps even an entire conversation). (#4644)
segment.target: U Skypeu za stolna računala, NVDA više ne bi trebao povremeno lažno čitati veliku poplavu poruka (možda čak i cijeli razgovor). (#4644)

segment.source: fixed a problem where NVDA's Report date/time command did not honor the regional settings specified by the user in some cases. (#2987)
segment.target: riješen je problem zbog kojeg NVDA-ina naredba za prijavu datuma/vremena nije poštovala regionalne postavke koje je odredio korisnik u nekim slučajevima. (#2987)

segment.source: In browse mode, nonsensical text (sometimes spanning several lines) is no longer presented for certain graphics such as found on Google Groups. (Specifically, this occurred with base64 encoded images.) (#4793)
segment.target: U načinu pregledavanja besmisleni tekst (ponekad se proteže nekoliko redaka) više se ne prikazuje za određene grafike kao što su one koje se nalaze u Google grupama. (Konkretno, to se dogodilo sa slikama kodiranim base64.) (#4793)

segment.source: NVDA should no longer freeze after a few seconds when moving focus away from a Windows Store app as it becomes suspended. (#4572)
segment.target: NVDA se više ne bi trebao zamrzavati nakon nekoliko sekundi kada se fokus odmakne od aplikacije iz Windows trgovine jer se obustavlja. (#4572)

segment.source: The aria-atomic attribute on live regions in Mozilla Firefox is now honored even when the atomic element itself changes. Previously, it only affected descendant elements. (#4794)
segment.target: Atribut aria-atom na živim područjima u Mozilla Firefoxu sada se poštuje čak i kada se sam atomski element promijeni. Prije je to utjecalo samo na elemente potomaka. (#4794)

segment.source: Browse mode will reflect updates, and live regions will be announced, for browse mode documents within ARIA applications embedded in a document in Internet Explorer or other MSHTML controls. (#4798)
segment.target: Način pregledavanja odražavat će ažuriranja i najavit će se živa područja za dokumente načina pregledavanja unutar ARIA aplikacija ugrađenih u dokument u pregledniku Internet Explorer ili drugim MSHTML kontrolama. (#4798)

segment.source: When text is changed or added in live regions in Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls where the author has specified that text is relevant, only the changed or added text is announced, rather than all of the text in the containing element. (#4800)
segment.target: Kada se tekst promijeni ili doda u aktivnim područjima u pregledniku Internet Explorer i drugim MSHTML kontrolama gdje je autor naveo da je tekst relevantan, najavljuje se samo promijenjeni ili dodani tekst, a ne sav tekst u elementu koji sadrži. (#4800)

segment.source: Content indicated by the aria-labelledby attribute on elements in Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls correctly replaces the original content where it is appropriate to do so. (#4575)
segment.target: Sadržaj označen atributom aria-labelledby na elementima u pregledniku Internet Explorer i drugim MSHTML kontrolama ispravno zamjenjuje izvorni sadržaj tamo gdje je to prikladno. (#4575)

segment.source: When checking spelling in Microsoft Outlook 2013, the misspelled word is now announced. (#4848)
segment.target: Prilikom provjere pravopisa u programu Microsoft Outlook 2013 sada se objavljuje pogrešno napisana riječ. (#4848)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls, content inside elements hidden with visibility:hidden is no longer inappropriately presented in browse mode. (#4839, #3776)
segment.target: U pregledniku Internet Explorer i drugim MSHTML kontrolama sadržaj unutar elemenata skrivenih pomoću visibility:hidden više nije neprikladno prikazan u načinu pregledavanja. (#4839, #3776)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls, the title attribute on form controls no longer inappropriately takes preference over other label associations. (#4491)
segment.target: U pregledniku Internet Explorer i drugim MSHTML kontrolama atribut title na kontrolama obrasca više ne ima neprikladnu prednost u odnosu na druge asocijacije oznaka. (#4491)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls, NVDA no longer ignores focusing of elements due to the aria-activedescendant attribute. (#4667)
segment.target: U Internet Exploreru i drugim MSHTML kontrolama, NVDA više ne zanemaruje fokusiranje elemenata zbog atributa aria-activedescendant. (#4667)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: Updated wxPython to 3.0.2.0. (#3763)
segment.target: Ažuriran wxPython na 3.0.2.0. (#3763)

segment.source: Updated Python to 2.7.9. (#4715)
segment.target: Ažuriran Python na 2.7.9. (#4715)

segment.source: NVDA no longer crashes when restarting after removing or updating an add-on which imports speechDictHandler in its installTasks module. (#4496)
segment.target: NVDA se više ne ruši prilikom ponovnog pokretanja nakon uklanjanja ili ažuriranja dodatka koji uvozi speechDictHandler u svoj modul installTasks. (#4496)

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove značajke

segment.source: New languages: Colombian Spanish, Punjabi.
segment.target: Novi jezici: kolumbijski španjolski, pandžapski.

segment.source: It is now possible to restart NVDA or restart NVDA with add-ons disabled from NVDA's exit dialog. (#4057)
segment.target: Sada je moguće ponovno pokrenuti NVDA ili ponovno pokrenuti NVDA s deaktiviranim dodacima iz izlaznog dijaloškog okvira NVDA-e. (#4057)

segment.source: NVDA can also be started with add-ons disabled by using the --disable-addons command line option.
segment.target: NVDA se također može pokrenuti s onemogućenim dodacima pomoću opcije naredbenog retka --disable-addons.

segment.source: In speech dictionaries, it is now possible to specify that a pattern should only match if it is a whole word; i.e. it does not occur as part of a larger word. (#1704)
segment.target: U govornim rječnicima sada je moguće odrediti da se uzorak treba podudarati samo ako se radi o cijeloj riječi; tj. ne pojavljuje se kao dio veće riječi. (#1704)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: If an object you have moved to with object navigation is inside a browse mode document, but the object you were on previously was not, the review mode is automatically set to document. Previously, this only happened if the navigator object was moved due to the focus changing. (#4369)
segment.target: Ako se objekt na koji ste se premjestili pomoću navigacije objektom nalazi unutar dokumenta načina pregledavanja, ali objekt na kojem ste prethodno bili nije, način pregleda automatski se postavlja na dokument. Prije se to događalo samo ako je objekt navigatora pomaknut zbog promjene fokusa. (#4369)

segment.source: The Braille display and Synthesizer lists in the respective settings dialogs are now alphabetically sorted except for No braille/No speech, which are now at the bottom. (#2724)
segment.target: Popisi Brailleovog pisma i sintisajzera u odgovarajućim dijaloškim okvirima postavki sada su abecednim redom poredani osim Bez brajice/Bez govora, koji su sada na dnu. (#2724)

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to 2.6.0. (#4434, #3835)
segment.target: Ažuriran prevoditelj brajevog pisma liblouis na 2.6.0. (#4434, #3835)

segment.source: In browse mode, pressing e and shift+e to navigate to edit fields now includes editable combo boxes. This includes the search box in the latest version of Google Search. (#4436)
segment.target: U načinu pregledavanja, pritiskom na e i shift+e za navigaciju do polja za uređivanje sada se nalaze kombinirani okviri koji se mogu uređivati. To uključuje okvir za pretraživanje u najnovijoj verziji Google pretraživanja. (#4436)

segment.source: Clicking the NVDA icon in the Notification Area with the left mouse button now opens the NVDA menu instead of doing nothing. (#4459)
segment.target: Klikom na ikonu NVDA u području obavijesti lijevom tipkom miša sada se otvara NVDA izbornik umjesto da ne radite ništa. (#4459)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci grešaka

segment.source: When moving focus back to a browse mode document (e.g. alt+tabbing to an already opened web page), the review cursor is properly positioned at the virtual caret, rather than the focused control (e.g. a nearby link). (#4369)
segment.target: Prilikom premještanja fokusa natrag na dokument načina pregledavanja (npr. alt+tabulator na već otvorenu web-stranicu), pokazivač pregleda ispravno je postavljen na virtualni kursor, a ne na fokusiranu kontrolu (npr. obližnja veza). (#4369)

segment.source: In PowerPoint slide shows, the review cursor correctly follows the virtual caret. (#4370)
segment.target: U dijaprojekcijama programa PowerPoint pokazivač pregleda ispravno slijedi virtualni kursor. (#4370)

segment.source: In Mozilla Firefox and other Gecko-based browsers, new content within a live region will be announced even if the new content has a usable ARIA live type different to the parent live region; e.g. when content marked as assertive is added to a live region marked as polite. (#4169)
segment.target: U Mozilla Firefoxu i drugim preglednicima koji se temelje na Gecku, novi sadržaj unutar žive regije bit će najavljen čak i ako novi sadržaj ima upotrebljivu ARIA live vrstu različitu od nadređene žive regije; npr. kada se sadržaj označen kao asertivan doda u živu regiju označenu kao pristojna. (#4169)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls, some cases where a document is contained within another document no longer prevent the user from accessing some of the content (specifically, framesets inside framesets). (#4418)
segment.target: U pregledniku Internet Explorer i drugim MSHTML kontrolama neki slučajevi u kojima je dokument sadržan u drugom dokumentu više ne sprječavaju korisnika da pristupi nekom sadržaju (točnije, skupovima okvira unutar skupova okvira). (#4418)

segment.source: NVDA no longer crashes when attempting to use a Handy Tech braille display in some cases. (#3709)
segment.target: NVDA se u nekim slučajevima više ne ruši prilikom pokušaja korištenja zaslona za brajicu Handy Tech. (#3709)

segment.source: In Windows Vista, a spurious "Entry Point Not Found" dialog is no longer displayed in several cases such as when starting NVDA from the Desktop shortcut or via the shortcut key. (#4235)
segment.target: U sustavu Windows Vista, lažni dijaloški okvir "Ulazna točka nije pronađena" više se ne prikazuje u nekoliko slučajeva, kao što je pokretanje NVDA iz prečaca na radnoj površini ili putem tipke prečaca. (#4235)

segment.source: Serious problems with editable text controls in dialogs in recent versions of Eclipse have been fixed. (#3872)
segment.target: Ozbiljni problemi s kontrolama teksta koje se mogu uređivati u dijalozima u novijim verzijama Eclipsea su riješeni. (#3872)

segment.source: In Outlook 2010, moving the caret now works as expected in the location field of appointments and meeting requests. (#4126)
segment.target: U programu Outlook 2010 premještanje kursora sada funkcionira prema očekivanjima u polju mjesta obveza i zahtjeva za sastanak. (#4126)

segment.source: Inside a live region, content which is marked as not being live (e.g. aria-live="off") is now correctly ignored. (#4405)
segment.target: Unutar živog područja, sadržaj koji je označen kao neaktivan (npr. aria-live="off") sada se ispravno zanemaruje. (#4405)

segment.source: When reporting the text of a status bar that has a name, the name is now correctly separated from the first word of the status bar text. (#4430)
segment.target: Prilikom prijavljivanja teksta statusne trake koja ima naziv, naziv je sada ispravno odvojen od prve riječi teksta statusne trake. (#4430)

segment.source: In password entry fields with speaking of typed words enabled, multiple asterisks are no longer pointlessly reported when beginning new words. (#4402)
segment.target: U poljima za unos lozinke s omogućenim govorom o upisanim riječima, više zvjezdica više se ne prijavljuje besmisleno kada započinju nove riječi. (#4402)

segment.source: In the Microsoft Outlook message list, items are no longer pointlessly announced as Data Items. (#4439)
segment.target: Na popisu poruka programa Microsoft Outlook stavke se više ne objavljuju besmisleno kao podatkovne stavke. (#4439)

segment.source: When selecting text in the code editing control in the Eclipse IDE, the entire selection is no longer announced every time the selection changes. (#2314)
segment.target: Prilikom odabira teksta u kontroli za uređivanje koda u Eclipse IDE-u, cijeli odabir više se ne najavljuje svaki put kada se odabir promijeni. (#2314)

segment.source: Various versions of Eclipse, such as Spring Tool Suite and the version included in the Android Developer Tools bundle, are now recognised as Eclipse and handled appropriately. (#4360, #4454)
segment.target: Različite verzije Eclipsea, kao što su Spring Tool Suite i verzija uključena u paket Android Developer Tools, sada su prepoznate kao Eclipse i s njima se postupa na odgovarajući način. (#4360, #4454)

segment.source: Mouse tracking and touch exploration in Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls (including many Windows 8 applications) is now much more accurate on high DPI displays or when document zoom is changed. (#3494)
segment.target: Praćenje miša i istraživanje dodirom u pregledniku Internet Explorer i drugim MSHTML kontrolama (uključujući mnoge aplikacije sustava Windows 8) sada su mnogo precizniji na zaslonima s visokim razlučivošću ili kada se promijeni zumiranje dokumenta. (#3494)

segment.source: Mouse tracking and touch exploration in Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls will now announce the label of more buttons. (#4173)
segment.target: Praćenje miša i istraživanje dodira u pregledniku Internet Explorer i drugim MSHTML kontrolama sada će najaviti oznaku više gumba. (#4173)

segment.source: When using a Papenmeier BRAILLEX braille display with BrxCom, keys on the display now work as expected. (#4614)
segment.target: Kada koristite Papenmeier BRAILLEX brajičin zaslon s BrxComom, tipke na zaslonu sada rade prema očekivanjima. (#4614)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Promjene za programere

segment.source: For executables which host many different apps (e.g. javaw.exe), code can now be provided to load specific app modules for each app instead of loading the same app module for all hosted apps. (#4360)
segment.target: Za izvršne datoteke koje hostiraju mnogo različitih aplikacija (npr. javaw.exe), sada se može pružiti kod za učitavanje određenih modula aplikacije za svaku aplikaciju umjesto učitavanja istog modula aplikacije za sve hostirane aplikacije. (#4360)

segment.source: See the code documentation for appModuleHandler.AppModule for details.
segment.target: Pojedinosti potražite u dokumentaciji koda za appModuleHandler.AppModule.

segment.source: Support for javaw.exe is implemented.
segment.target: Implementirana je podrška za javaw.exe.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nove značajke

segment.source: The sounds played when NVDA starts and exits can be disabled via a new option in the General Settings dialog. (#834)
segment.target: Zvukovi koji se reproduciraju prilikom pokretanja i izlaska NVDA mogu se onemogućiti putem nove opcije u dijaloškom okviru Opće postavke. (#834)

segment.source: Help for add-ons can be accessed from the Add-ons Manager for add-ons which support this. (#2694)
segment.target: Pomoći za dodatke može se pristupiti iz Upravitelja dodataka za dodatke koji to podržavaju. (#2694)

segment.source: Support for the Calendar in Microsoft Outlook 2007 and above (#2943) including:
segment.target: Podrška za kalendar u programu Microsoft Outlook 2007 i novijim verzijama (#2943), uključujući:

segment.source: Announcement of the current time when moving around with the arrow keys.
segment.target: Najava trenutnog vremena pri kretanju pomoću tipki sa strelicama.

segment.source: Indication if the selected time is within any appointments.
segment.target: Naznaka je li odabrano vrijeme unutar bilo kojeg termina.

segment.source: announcement of the selected appointment when pressing tab.
segment.target: Najava odabrane obveze pritiskom na karticu.

segment.source: Smart filtering of the date so as to only announce the date if the new selected time or appointment is on a different day to the last.
segment.target: Pametno filtriranje datuma tako da se datum najavljuje samo ako je novo odabrano vrijeme ili sastanak na drugi dan od prethodnog.

segment.source: Enhanced support for the Inbox and other message lists in Microsoft Outlook 2010 and above (#3834) including:
segment.target: Poboljšana podrška za ulaznu poštu i druge popise poruka u programu Microsoft Outlook 2010 i novijim verzijama (#3834), uključujući:

segment.source: The ability to silence column headers (from, subject, etc.) by turning off the Report Table row and column headers option in Document Formatting settings.
segment.target: Mogućnost utišavanja zaglavlja stupaca (od, predmet itd.) isključivanjem mogućnosti zaglavlja redaka i stupaca tablice izvješća u postavkama oblikovanja dokumenta.

segment.source: The ability to use table navigation commands (control + alt + arrows) to move through the individual columns.
segment.target: Mogućnost korištenja naredbi za navigaciju tablicom (kontrola + alt + strelice) za kretanje kroz pojedinačne stupce.

segment.source: Microsoft word: If an inline image has no alternative text set, NVDA will instead report the title of the image if the author has provided one. (#4193)
segment.target: Microsoft word: Ako umetnuta slika nema postavljen alternativni tekst, NVDA će umjesto toga prijaviti naslov slike ako ga je autor naveo. (#4193)

segment.source: Microsoft Word: NVDA can now report paragraph indenting with the report formatting command (NVDA+f). It can also be reported automatically when the new Report Paragraph indenting option is enabled in Document Formatting settings. (#4165)
segment.target: Microsoft Word: NVDA sada može prijaviti uvlačenje odlomaka pomoću naredbe za oblikovanje izvješća (NVDA+f). Također se može automatski prijaviti kada je nova mogućnost uvlačenja odlomka izvješća omogućena u postavkama oblikovanja dokumenta. (#4165)

segment.source: Report automatically inserted text such as a new bullet, number or tab indent when pressing enter in editable documents and text fields. (#4185)
segment.target: Prijavite automatski umetnuti tekst, kao što je nova grafička oznaka, broj ili uvlaka tabulatora pritiskom na Enter u dokumentima i tekstnim poljima koja se mogu uređivati. (#4185)

segment.source: Microsoft word: Pressing NVDA+alt+c will report the text of a comment if the cursor is within one. (#3528)
segment.target: Microsoft word: Pritiskom na NVDA+alt+c prijavit će se tekst komentara ako je pokazivač unutar njega. (#3528)

segment.source: Improved support for automatic column and row header reading in Microsoft Excel (#3568) including:
segment.target: Poboljšana podrška za automatsko čitanje zaglavlja stupaca i redaka u programu Microsoft Excel (#3568), uključujući:

segment.source: Support of Excel defined name ranges to identify header cells (compatible with Jaws screen reader) .
segment.target: Podrška za Excel definirane raspone naziva za identifikaciju ćelija zaglavlja (kompatibilno s čitačem zaslona Jaws).

segment.source: The set column header (NVDA+shift+c) and set row header (NVDA+shift+r) commands now store the settings in the worksheet so that they are available the next time the sheet is opened, and will be available to other screen readers that support the defined name range scheme.
segment.target: Naredbe postavi zaglavlje stupca (NVDA+shift+c) i postavi zaglavlje retka (NVDA+shift+r) sada pohranjuju postavke na radnom listu tako da budu dostupne prilikom sljedećeg otvaranja lista, a bit će dostupne i drugim čitačima zaslona koji podržavaju definiranu shemu raspona naziva.

segment.source: These commands can also now be used multiple times per sheet to set different headers for different regions.
segment.target: Ove se naredbe sada mogu koristiti i više puta po listu za postavljanje različitih zaglavlja za različite regije.

segment.source: Support for automatic column and row header reading in Microsoft Word (#3110) including:
segment.target: Podrška za automatsko čitanje zaglavlja stupaca i redaka u programu Microsoft Word (#3110), uključujući:

segment.source: Support of Microsoft Word bookmarks to identify header cells (compatible with Jaws screen reader).
segment.target: Podrška za Microsoft Word oznake za prepoznavanje ćelija zaglavlja (kompatibilno s čitačem zaslona Jaws).

segment.source: - set column header (NVDA+shift+c) and set row header (NVDA+shift+r) commands while on the first header cell in a table allow you to tell NVDA that these headers should be reported automatically. Settings are stored in the document so that they are available the next time the document is opened, and will be available to other screen readers that support the bookmark scheme.
segment.target: - naredbe za postavljanje zaglavlja stupca (NVDA+shift+c) i postavljanje zaglavlja retka (NVDA+shift+r) dok se nalazi u prvoj ćeliji zaglavlja u tablici omogućuju vam da obavijestite NVDA da se ta zaglavlja trebaju automatski prijaviti. Postavke se pohranjuju u dokument tako da su dostupne prilikom sljedećeg otvaranja dokumenta, a bit će dostupne i drugim čitačima zaslona koji podržavaju shemu knjižnih oznaka.

segment.source: Microsoft Word: Report the distance from the left edge of the page when the tab key is pressed. (#1353)
segment.target: Microsoft Word: Prijavite udaljenost od lijevog ruba stranice kada se pritisne tipka Tab. (#1353)

segment.source: Microsoft Word: provide feedback in speech and braille for most available formatting shortcut keys (bold, italic, underline, alignment, outline level, superscript, subscript and font size). (#1353)
segment.target: Microsoft Word: pružite povratne informacije u govoru i brajici za većinu dostupnih tipki prečaca za oblikovanje (podebljano, kurziv, podcrtano, poravnanje, razina strukture, eksponent, indeks i veličina fonta). (#1353)

segment.source: Microsoft Excel: If the selected cell contains comments, they can be now reported by pressing NVDA+alt+c. (#2920)
segment.target: Microsoft Excel: Ako odabrana ćelija sadrži komentare, oni se sada mogu prijaviti pritiskom na NVDA+alt+c. (#2920)

segment.source: Microsoft Excel: Provide an NVDA-specific dialog to edit the comments on the currently selected cell when pressing Excel's shift+f2 command to enter comment editing mode. (#2920)
segment.target: Microsoft Excel: Omogućite dijaloški okvir specifičan za NVDA za uređivanje komentara na trenutno odabranoj ćeliji kada pritisnete Excelovu naredbu shift+f2 za ulazak u način uređivanja komentara. (#2920)

segment.source: Microsoft Excel: speech and braille feedback for many more selection movement shortcuts (#4211) including:
segment.target: Microsoft Excel: povratne informacije o govoru i Brailleovom pismu za mnoge druge prečace kretanja odabira (#4211), uključujući:

segment.source: Vertical page movement (pageUp and pageDown);
segment.target: Okomito pomicanje stranice (pageUp i pageDown);

segment.source: Horizontal page movement (alt+pageUp and alt+pageDown);
segment.target: Vodoravno pomicanje stranice (alt+pageUp i alt+pageDown);

segment.source: Extend selection (the above keys with Shift added); and
segment.target: Proširite odabir (gornje tipke s dodanim Shiftom); i

segment.source: Selecting the current region (control+shift+8).
segment.target: Odabir trenutačne regije (control+shift+8).

segment.source: Microsoft Excel: The vertical and horizontal alignment for cells can now be reported with the report formatting command (NVDA+f). It can also be reported automatically if the Report alignment option in Document Formatting settings is enabled. (#4212)
segment.target: Microsoft Excel: Okomito i vodoravno poravnanje ćelija sada se može prijaviti pomoću naredbe za oblikovanje izvješća (NVDA+f). Također se može automatski prijaviti ako je omogućena mogućnost poravnanja izvješća u postavkama oblikovanja dokumenta. (#4212)

segment.source: Microsoft Excel: The style of a cell can now be reported with the report formatting command (NVDA+f). It can also be reported automatically if the Report Style option in Document formatting settings is enabled. (#4213)
segment.target: Microsoft Excel: Stil ćelije sada se može prijaviti pomoću naredbe za oblikovanje izvješća (NVDA+f). Također se može automatski prijaviti ako je omogućena mogućnost Stil izvješća u postavkama oblikovanja dokumenta. (#4213)

segment.source: Microsoft PowerPoint: when moving shapes around a slide with the arrow keys, the shape's current location is now reported (#4214) including:
segment.target: Microsoft PowerPoint: prilikom premještanja oblika po slajdu pomoću tipki sa strelicama sada se prijavljuje trenutna lokacija oblika (#4214), uključujući:

segment.source: The distance between the shape and each of the slide edges is reported.
segment.target: Prikazuje se udaljenost između oblika i svakog od rubova klizača.

segment.source: If the shape covers or is covered by another shape, then the distance overlapped and the overlapped shape are reported.
segment.target: Ako oblik prekriva ili je prekriven drugim oblikom, tada se izvještava o preklapajućoj udaljenosti i preklapajućem obliku.

segment.source: To report this information at any time without moving a shape, press the report location command (NVDA+delete).
segment.target: Da biste prijavili ove informacije u bilo kojem trenutku bez pomicanja oblika, pritisnite naredbu Prijavi lokaciju (NVDA+brisanje).

segment.source: When selecting a shape, if it is covered by another shape, NVDA will report that it is obscured.
segment.target: Prilikom odabira oblika, ako je prekriven drugim oblikom, NVDA će prijaviti da je zaklonjen.

segment.source: The report location command (NVDA+delete) is more context specific in some situations. (#4219)
segment.target: Naredba za lokaciju izvješća (NVDA+delete) u nekim je situacijama više specifična za kontekst. (#4219)

segment.source: In standard edit fields and browse mode, the cursor position as a percentage through the content and its screen coordinates are reported.
segment.target: U standardnim poljima za uređivanje i načinu pregledavanja izvještava se o položaju pokazivača kao postotak kroz sadržaj i njegove koordinate zaslona.

segment.source: On shapes in PowerPoint Presentations, position of the shape relative to the slide and other shapes is reported.
segment.target: Na oblicima u prezentacijama programa PowerPoint izvješćuje se o položaju oblika u odnosu na slajd i druge oblike.

segment.source: Pressing this command twice will produce the previous behaviour of reporting the location information for the entire control.
segment.target: Dvaput pritiskom na ovu naredbu proizvest će se prethodno ponašanje izvješćivanja o informacijama o lokaciji za cijelu kontrolu.

segment.source: New language: Catalan.
segment.target: Novi jezik: katalonski.

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Promjenama

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to 2.5.4. (#4103)
segment.target: Ažuriran prevoditelj brajevog pisma na 2.5.4. (#4103)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Ispravci grešaka

segment.source: In Google Chrome and Chrome-based browsers, certain chunks of text (such as those with emphasis) are no longer repeated when reporting the text of an alert or dialog. (#4066)
segment.target: U Google Chromeu i preglednicima koji se temelje na Chromeu određeni dijelovi teksta (kao što su oni s naglaskom) više se ne ponavljaju prilikom prijavljivanja teksta upozorenja ili dijaloškog okvira. (#4066)

segment.source: In browse mode in Mozilla applications, pressing enter on a button, etc. no longer fails to activate it (or activates the wrong control) in certain cases such as the buttons at the top of Facebook. (#4106)
segment.target: U načinu pregledavanja u Mozillinim aplikacijama, pritiskom na enter na gumbu itd. više se ne uspijeva aktivirati (ili aktivira pogrešna kontrola) u određenim slučajevima kao što su gumbi na vrhu Facebooka. (#4106)

segment.source: Useless information is no longer announced when tabbing in iTunes. (#4128)
segment.target: Beskorisne informacije više se ne objavljuju prilikom kartica u iTunesu. (#4128)

segment.source: In certain lists in iTunes such as the Music list, moving to the next item using object navigation now works correctly. (#4129)
segment.target: Na određenim popisima u iTunesu, kao što je popis Glazba, prelazak na sljedeću stavku pomoću navigacije objektima sada ispravno funkcionira. (#4129)

segment.source: HTML elements considered headings because of WAI ARIA markup are now included in the Browse mode Elements list and quick navigation for Internet Explorer documents. (#4140)
segment.target: HTML elementi koji se smatraju naslovima zbog oznake WAI ARIA sada su uključeni u popis elemenata načina pregledavanja i brzu navigaciju za dokumente preglednika Internet Explorer. (#4140)

segment.source: Following same-page links in recent versions of Internet Explorer now correctly moves to and reports the destination position in browse mode documents. (#4134)
segment.target: Praćenje veza na istoj stranici u novijim verzijama preglednika Internet Explorer sada se ispravno premješta na odredišni položaj i izvještava o njemu u dokumentima načina pregledavanja. (#4134)

segment.source: Microsoft Outlook 2010 and above: Overall access to secure dialogs such as the New profiles and mail setup dialogs has been improved. (#4090, #4091, #4095)
segment.target: Microsoft Outlook 2010 i novije verzije: Poboljšan je ukupni pristup sigurnim dijaloškim okvirima kao što su Novi profili i dijaloški okviri za postavljanje pošte. (#4090, #4091, #4095)

segment.source: Microsoft Outlook: Useless verbosity has been decreased in command toolbars when navigating through certain dialogs. (#4096, #3407)
segment.target: Microsoft Outlook: Beskorisna opširnost smanjena je u naredbenim alatnim trakama prilikom navigacije kroz određene dijaloške okvire. (#4096, #3407)

segment.source: Microsoft word: Tabbing to a blank cell in a table no longer incorrectly announces exiting the table. (#4151)
segment.target: Microsoft Word: Prelazak tabulatora u praznu ćeliju u tablici više ne označava pogrešno izlazak iz tablice. (#4151)

segment.source: Microsoft Word: The first character past the end of a table (including a new blank line) is no longer incorrectly considered to be inside the table. (#4152)
segment.target: Microsoft Word: prvi znak iza kraja tablice (uključujući novi prazan redak) više se ne smatra pogrešno unutar tablice. (#4152)

segment.source: Microsoft Word 2010 spell check dialog: The actual misspelled word is reported rather than inappropriately reporting just the first bold word. (#3431)
segment.target: Dijaloški okvir za provjeru pravopisa programa Microsoft Word 2010: Prijavljuje se stvarna pogrešno napisana riječ, a ne neprimjereno prijavljuje samo prvu podebljanu riječ. (#3431)

segment.source: In browse mode in Internet Explorer and other MSHTML controls, tabbing or using single letter navigation to move to form fields again reports the label in many cases where it didn't (specifically, where HTML label elements are used). (#4170)
segment.target: U načinu pregledavanja u pregledniku Internet Explorer i drugim MSHTML kontrolama, tabulatorima ili navigacijom jednim slovom za ponovno premještanje na polja obrasca izvještava o natpisu u mnogim slučajevima kada se to nije dogodilo (konkretno, kada se koriste elementi HTML oznake). (#4170)

segment.source: Microsoft Word: Reporting the existence and placement of comments is more accurate. (#3528)
segment.target: Microsoft Word: Izvješćivanje o postojanju i postavljanju komentara je točnije. (#3528)

segment.source: Navigation of certain dialogs in MS Office products such as Word, Excel and Outlook has been improved by no longer reporting particular control container toolbars which are not useful to the user. (#4198)
